S01ratnml_u:3522: nūnaṃ madatyayād rājā sarvasvam āhariṣyati // Rm_10.26{26} //
S01ratnml_u:3523: tadā nāmāpi me loke na kaś cana grahīṣyati /
S01ratnml_u:3524: yad artham eva saṃpattīḥ sādhayāmi prayatnataḥ // Rm_10.27{27} //
S01ratnml_u:3525: tad eva yadi nāsty evaṃ tat kiṃ me syāt sujīvite // Rm_10.28{28/} //
S01ratnml_u:3527: yasmāc ciram api sthitvā mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ tadaiva hi // Rm_10.29{29} //
S01ratnml_u:3528: tan me bhogye 'pi vāṃchā na bhuktvāpi kiṃ sukhaṃ vinā /
S01ratnml_u:3529: aputrasya sukhaṃ naiva paratreha niranvayāt // Rm_10.30{30} //
S01ratnml_u:3530: tan me janmāpi vyarthaṃ syād dhy aputro 'smi niranvayāt /
S01ratnml_u:3531: hā hato 'haṃ svadaivena kiṃ mayātra kariṣyate // Rm_10.31{31} //
S01ratnml_u:3532: kasyāgre saṃvadiṣyāmi ko me buddhiṃ pradāsyati /
S01ratnml_u:3534: kasyāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāsye ko māṃ samuddhariṣyati // Rm_10.32{32} //
S01ratnml_u:3536: nirutsāhī gṛhān naiva nirapāyāt kadācana // Rm_10.33{33} //
S01ratnml_u:3539: kiṃ te duḥkhaṃ samutpannaṃ kenaivaṃ tiṣṭhase sakhe /
S01ratnml_u:3540: vaktavyaṃ cet tadā āśu sarvathā vaktum arhasi // Rm_10.35{31} //
S01ratnml_u:3541: iti pṛṣṭe suhṛdbhis tair gṛhasthaḥ sa viniśvasan /
S01ratnml_u:3542: tān sarvān suhṛdo dṛṣṭvā tad duḥkhaṃ samudāharat // Rm_10.36{36} //
S01ratnml_u:3543: suhṛdo me bhavanto hi tan mayātra pracakṣyate /
S01ratnml_u:3544: saṃpattir mahatī me 'sti putro naiva sutāpi naḥ // Rm_10.37{37} //
S01ratnml_u:3545: tena me saṃpadaḥ sarvā vinakṣyanti nirarthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3548: tan me janmāpi vyarthaṃ syād aputrasya niranvayāt // Rm_10.39{39} //
S01ratnml_u:3549: tathā hato 'haṃ svadaivena kiṃ mayātra cariṣyate /
S01ratnml_u:3551: tasya grīhapateś caivāṃ tad upāyaṃ samādiśat /
S01ratnml_u:3552: kiṃ bhadrātra viṣādena yatra devādhikāratā // Rm_10.41{41} //
S01ratnml_u:3553: tathāpi kriyatāṃ yatnaṃ klaibyaṃ tyaktvā tvayādhunā /
S01ratnml_u:3554: yad aśakyaṃ valair dravyais tad upāyena śakyate // Rm_10.42{42} //
S01ratnml_u:3555: tasmāt klaibyam iha tyaktvā kuru yatnaṃ samāhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3556: devatārādhanāṃ kṛtvā sarvakāryyaṃ hi sādhayet // Rm_10.43{43} //
S01ratnml_u:3557: tadādau devatāḥ pūjya yācasva putram ātmanā /
S01ratnml_u:3559: putro vā duhitā vāpi samupapatsyate dhruvaṃ // Rm_10.44{44} //
S01ratnml_u:3560: tatas te saṃtatiś caivaṃ varddhiṣyati kramāt tathā /
S01ratnml_u:3561: tadāpi bhṛśato muktaḥ sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyāt // Rm_10.45{45} //
S01ratnml_u:3567: evaṃ putrābhilāsī sa sadā ca santatīchayā /
S01ratnml_u:3568: devatārādhanaṃ kṛtvā tasthau nityaṃ samutsukaḥ // Rm_10.48{48} //
S01ratnml_u:3570: na putro duhitā vāpi nodapādi cirād api // Rm_10.49{49} //
S01ratnml_u:3573: tataḥ kaścit suhṛt sādhuḥ saṃbuddhopāsakaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3574: taṃ gṛhastham upāgatya tathaivaṃ paryyabodhayat // Rm_10.51{51} //
S01ratnml_u:3575: sādho kin te viṣādena tad dhīraṃ samupāśraya /
S01ratnml_u:3576: yadi te santatau vāṃchā tan me śrutvā tataś cara // Rm_10.52{52} //
S01ratnml_u:3577: kim evaṃ devatāḥ pūjya yācase putram ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:3578: yatra daivādhikāratvaṃ tatra kiṃ devatā valaṃ // Rm_10.53{53} //
S01ratnml_u:3579: vaṃśārthe yadi te bhaktir asty evaṃ devatāsu tat /
S01ratnml_u:3582: nūnaṃ te satsutaḥ śīghram utpatsyati na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_10.55{55} //
S01ratnml_u:3584: puṇyam utpatsyate nūnaṃ tena sadgatim āpnuyāt // Rm_10.56{56} //
S01ratnml_u:3585: ye buddhaśaraṇaṃ yānti te labhanti śubhāśayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3586: ye viśuddhāśayā loke saddharmaṃ te śṛṇvanti hi // Rm_10.57{57} //
S01ratnml_u:3587: ye saddharmānuśṛṇvan to bodhicittaṃ labhanti te /
S01ratnml_u:3588: pralabdhabodhicittā ye te caranti guṇārthinaḥ // Rm_10.58{58} //
S01ratnml_u:3589: guṇakāmāś ca ye loke te bhajanti jinātmajān /
S01ratnml_u:3591: bodhicaryāratā ye ca na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3593: evaṃ matvā jinaṃ smṛtvā saddharmaṃ samupāśrayeḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3594: tatas te saṃbhaved bhadram ihāmutrāpi sarvataḥ // Rm_10.61{61} //
S01ratnml_u:3596: tatheti pratisaṃśrutya saṃbuddhaṃ smartum aichata // Rm_10.62{62} //
S01ratnml_u:3598: saṃbuddhaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā vaṃśam evam ayācata // Rm_10.63{63} //
S01ratnml_u:3599: namas te bhagavan nātha bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:3601: tan māṃ karuṇāya dṛṣṭyā draṣṭum arhasi sarvathā // Rm_10.64{64} //
S01ratnml_u:3603: tvayā mahyaṃ hitārthāya satputraṃ dātum arhasi // Rm_10.65{65} //
S01ratnml_u:3604: ity evaṃ sa gṛhī sādhuḥ putrābhilaṣitaḥ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:3605: sabhāryyaḥ sugataṃ smṛtvā tathā nityaṃ samutsukaḥ // Rm_10.66{66} //
S01ratnml_u:3606: tadaiva samaye kaścid devaputro divaś cyutaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3608: tataḥ svāpannasatvābhūt sā bhāryā gṛhiṇaḥ satī /
S01ratnml_u:3610: pravṛddhagarbhā sā dṛṣṭvā svayaṃ ca garbham ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:3611: dakṣapārśvagataṃ satvaṃ matvā caivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_10.69{69} //
S01ratnml_u:3612: nūnaṃ me jāyate garbhe satvo buddhānubhāvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3613: yad ayaṃ dakṣiṇe vartti tena putro bhavet khalu // Rm_10.70{70} //
S01ratnml_u:3614: iti niścitya sā nārī putrotpatyāśayā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:3615: svasvāmino pure sthitvā rahasyaivaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_10.71{71} //
S01ratnml_u:3616: dṛṣṭyāryyaputra varddhasva yad ahaṃ garbhiṇī bhave /
S01ratnml_u:3617: nūnam ayaṃ bhavet putro yat sthito dakṣiṇodare // Rm_10.72{72} //
S01ratnml_u:3618: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasthaḥ pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3619: daksiṇaṃ vāhum unnamya nandann evam udānayat // Rm_10.73{73} //
S01ratnml_u:3621: jātaḥ syān nāmajātā me kulavaṃśasthitir bhavet // Rm_10.74{74} //
S01ratnml_u:3622: kṛtyāni ca prakurvīta bibhṛyād bharaṇaṃ prati /
S01ratnml_u:3624: yad asmākaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ karma dānādikaṃ śubhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3625: etat puṇyānubhāvena bhavet kuśalam etayoḥ // Rm_10.76{76} //
S01ratnml_u:3626: tatas tena sadā bharttā saha saṃmodacāriṇī /
S01ratnml_u:3628: tataḥ sā samaye sūta putraṃ divyātisuṃdaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3632: tataḥ sā jananī tasya vālakasya karadvayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3636: sakhībhir veditaṃ śrutvā vismito draṣṭum āyayau // Rm_10.81{81} //
S01ratnml_u:3638: darśayitvā sutaṃ putraṃ śaṃkitaivaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_10.82{82} //
S01ratnml_u:3639: svāmiṃ paśya mahāścaryyam asya hemānvitau karau /
S01ratnml_u:3640: tac chubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ vā darśayitvā vicāraya // Rm_10.83{83} //
S01ratnml_u:3641: iti bhāryyoditaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā taṃ vālakaṃ ciraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3642: dīnāraṃ bhujayoḥ paśyaṃ tasthau savismayānvitaḥ // Rm_10.84{84} //
S01ratnml_u:3643: tatas tasya gṛhastho 'sau nimittaṃ jñātum ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:3644: naimittikaṃ samāhūya dārakaṃ tam adarśayat // Rm_10.85{86} //
S01ratnml_u:3646: tan nimittaṃ parijñāya tat phalaṃ vaktum arhatha // Rm_10.86{86} //
S01ratnml_u:3647: ity ukte tena te sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ śubhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3648: dīnāre bhujayoś cāpi parijñāyaivam abravīt // Rm_10.87{87} //
S01ratnml_u:3649: sādho gṛhapate hy asya dārakasya karadvayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3650: suvarṇalakṣaṇopetaṃ tat te bhadraṃ bhavet khalu // Rm_10.88{88} //
S01ratnml_u:3651: tavāyaṃ dārako dātā maheśākhyo bhavet kila /
S01ratnml_u:3653: apanīya svayaṃ hastād idaṃ dīnāram arpayet /
S01ratnml_u:3654: apanīte punar anyat prādur bhavet tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_10.90{90} //
S01ratnml_u:3655: ity evaṃ taiḥ samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā saṃharṣito gṛhī /
S01ratnml_u:3656: tato jātimahaṃ kṛtvā jñātīn evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.91{91} //
S01ratnml_u:3659: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te jñātayas tathā /
S01ratnml_u:3660: dṛṣṭvā tasya nimittāni saṃmatenaivam abruvan // Rm_10.93{93} //
S01ratnml_u:3662: tan nāmnā prasiddho 'stu hiraṇyapāṇir ity ayaṃ // Rm_10.94{94} //
S01ratnml_u:3664: tatheti tasya putrasya cakre nāmavyavasthitaṃ // Rm_10.95{95} //
S01ratnml_u:3666: aṣṭāsu yo 'pi dhātrīṣu tena pitrā samarpitaḥ // Rm_10.96{96} //
S01ratnml_u:3668: varddhito 'bhūt kramād āśu hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_10.97{97} //
S01ratnml_u:3672: tataḥ sa śikṣituṃ vidyāḥ sadguruṃ samupāśrayat /
S01ratnml_u:3673: kramāt teṣāṃ prasādāc ca vidyāpāraṃ yayau laghuḥ // Rm_10.99{99} //
S01ratnml_u:3675: svahastaṃ saṃprasāryyaiva dadau dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_10.100{100} //
S01ratnml_u:3676: gurubhyo brāhmaṇebhyaś ca yācakebhyaḥ sa dārakaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3677: svahastaṃ saṃprasāryyaiva dadau hemaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_10.101{1} //
S01ratnml_u:3679: arthino dhanalubdhāś ca saṃpratīyuḥ samaṃtataḥ // Rm_10.102{2} //
S01ratnml_u:3682: tadā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ sa dṛṣṭvaitān arthino mudā /
S01ratnml_u:3683: sarvopakaraṇaiś cāpi sarvāṃs tān samatoṣayat // Rm_10.104{4} //
S01ratnml_u:3684: tatas te yācakāḥ sarve tenaiva paritarpitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3685: yathechayā sukhaṃ bhuktvā pracerur dharmamānasā // Rm_10.105{5} //
S01ratnml_u:3686: tathā vīthigataś caivaṃ hastadvayaṃ prasārya saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3687: hemarāśiṃ samutthāpya sarvebhyaḥ pradadau mudā // Rm_10.106{6} //
S01ratnml_u:3688: tathā sarve 'pi te lokā dhanāḍhyāḥ sukhino 'bhavan /
S01ratnml_u:3689: naiko 'bhūt kṛpano duḥkhī no 'pi kaścid daridritaḥ // Rm_10.107{7} //
S01ratnml_u:3692: tadā tasyaiva tat kīrttiḥ sarvatra bhuvaneṣv api /
S01ratnml_u:3695: tad yaśaḥ pratilabdhaṃ sa manasaivaṃ vyacintayat // Rm_10.110{10} //
S01ratnml_u:3696: yad asya bhujayor hema cintāmaṇisamaṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:3699: tad ahaṃ prārthanāṃ kṛtvā pratigṛhṇīya tat maṇiṃ // Rm_10.112{12} //
S01ratnml_u:3700: ity asau manasā dhyatvā lobhākṛṣṭo tvarānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3702: taṃ hiraṇyabhujaṃ pretya tad dīnāraṃ samayācata // Rm_10.113{13} //
S01ratnml_u:3703: jayo 'stu te sadā sādho dīrghāyuś ca sumaṃgalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3704: tathaiva tvaṃ sadā bhūyā arthināṃ kalpapādapaḥ // Rm_10.114{14} //
S01ratnml_u:3706: tadarthaṃ pūrayitvā me cittaṃ harṣaya sarvataḥ // Rm_10.115{15} //
S01ratnml_u:3708: dṛṣṭvā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ sa taṃ vipraṃ pratyabhāṣata // Rm_10.116{16} //
S01ratnml_u:3709: sādhu vipra prasīda tvaṃ yadarthaṃ samupāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3710: tadarthaṃ saṃpradatvādya harṣayiṣyāmi te manaḥ // Rm_10.117{17} //
S01ratnml_u:3711: tac chaṃkā mā kṛthā hy atra yad yat te hṛdi rocate /
S01ratnml_u:3712: tat tan nūnaṃ pradāsye te tad vadasva yad īhitaṃ // Rm_10.118{18} //
S01ratnml_u:3714: svastīty āśīrvaco datvā tad dīnāram ayācata // Rm_10.119{19} //
S01ratnml_u:3716: tad dīnāraṃ pradatvā me cittaṃ saṃharṣayārthadaḥ // Rm_10.120{20} //
S01ratnml_u:3717: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā tat pitāsau suvismitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3718: savandhujñātimitras taṃ putram evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.121{21} //
S01ratnml_u:3719: śṛṇu putra mayā proktaṃ tavaiva hitakāraṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3720: yadi te svāminī prītis tat karttavyaṃ hi sarvathā // Rm_10.122{22} //
S01ratnml_u:3721: tvaṃ hi putra mayā labdhaḥ saṃbuddhasyānubhāvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3722: tat saṃbuddhaśāsane kāryyam eva dātu samarhasi // Rm_10.123{23} //
S01ratnml_u:3723: yac cedan bhujayor jātaṃ dīnāraṃ maṇisaṃnibhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3724: tad api sugatasyaiva prabhāvān manyatāṃ khalu // Rm_10.124{24} //
S01ratnml_u:3725: yac cedaṃ te karodbhūtaṃ jīvitaṃ sahajendriyaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3726: tat svakarāt samuddhṛtya kathaṃ dadyā dvijātaye // Rm_10.125{25} //
S01ratnml_u:3727: yadīdaṃ dāsyate hastāt samuddhṛtya valād api /
S01ratnml_u:3728: tadā te jīvitaṃ vāpi sahānena vrajaṃ khalu // Rm_10.126{26} //
S01ratnml_u:3729: tasmād evaṃ parijñāya yadi te jīvita priyaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3730: tad evaṃ sahajaṃ hema mā pradāhi dvijātaye // Rm_10.127{27} //
S01ratnml_u:3731: tad anyad dīyatāṃ tasmai yad yad vastu samīchitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3732: idaṃ tu sarvathānyasmai dātavyaṃ naiva yatnataḥ // Rm_10.128{28} //
S01ratnml_u:3734: tena yadā paribhraṣṭas tadā kiṃ tena manyase // Rm_10.129{29} //
S01ratnml_u:3735: yenāpi ca tvayā sarve yācakāḥ saṃpratarpitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3737: tac cintāmaṇisāmānyaṃ kathaṃ dātuṃ samichasi // Rm_10.130{30} //
S01ratnml_u:3738: yat tvayā sukṛtaṃ karma prakṛtvā puṇyam ācitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3739: nūnaṃ tasya vipākatvaṃ bhuṃjayos te pratiṣṭhitaṃ // Rm_10.131{31} //
S01ratnml_u:3740: tasmād idaṃ mahāratnaṃ kasmiñcin mā pradīyatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3741: datvā tv idaṃ mahāratnaṃ kim anyal labdham ichasi // Rm_10.132{32} //
S01ratnml_u:3742: yadi tv idaṃ mahāratnaṃ dātum evaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3743: saṃpradehi jinendrāya tat puṇyam akṣayaṃ vahuṃ // Rm_10.133{33} //
S01ratnml_u:3745: puṇyena dīyate kīrttiṃ nirvṛtiṃ ca samāpnuyāt // Rm_10.134{34} //
S01ratnml_u:3746: yadi puṇye 'sti te vāṃchā tad buddhaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3747: dehi buddhānuśāsinyā tad dānaṃ hi mahatphalaṃ // Rm_10.135{35} //
S01ratnml_u:3748: tato nityaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā kṛtvā saṃbodhisādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3749: kramād bodhicariṃ prāpte nirvṛtiṃ vā samāpnuyāḥ // Rm_10.136{36} //
S01ratnml_u:3750: iti pitrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāsau hemabhṛt sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3751: tatheti niścayaṃ kṛtvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.137{37} //
S01ratnml_u:3752: satyaṃ tāta tvayādiṣṭaṃ tat sarvaṃ hitam eva me /
S01ratnml_u:3753: tasmāt tathā cariṣyāmi tvadājñāṃ śirasā vahan // Rm_10.138{38} //
S01ratnml_u:3754: kiṃ tu satyaṃ mayā proktām idaṃ dātuṃ dvijātaye /
S01ratnml_u:3755: tat katham anyathā kṛtvā puṇyam eva samāpnuyāt // Rm_10.139{39} //
S01ratnml_u:3756: tat satyaṃ pūraṇe tāta pradadyāmi mamātmanaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3757: atha na dāsyate hy atra kiyat kālaṃ hi jīvitaṃ // Rm_10.140{40} //
S01ratnml_u:3759: tathaivaṃ sahajīvena vinakṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_10.141{41} //
S01ratnml_u:3761: tathaivaṃ saṃpradatvāsmai punaḥ prāpsyāmi te 'dhikaṃ // Rm_10.142{42} //
S01ratnml_u:3763: tathā satyānubhāvena punar anyaj janiṣyate // Rm_10.143{43} //
S01ratnml_u:3764: dharmeṇa tuṣyate buddho mūlaṃ dharmasya satyavāk /
S01ratnml_u:3765: tat satyapāraṇārthena dāsyāmy aham idaṃ maṇiṃ // Rm_10.144{44} //
S01ratnml_u:3766: satyaṃ vinā na phullante puṇyāni prakṛtāny api /
S01ratnml_u:3768: satyena varddhate dharmaṃ dharmeṇa pālyate naraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3769: dharmiṣṭhaḥ sadgatiṃ yāti tasmāt satyaṃ mahadvalī // Rm_10.146{46} //
S01ratnml_u:3771: sarvathāsmai pradāsyāmi mā kṛthās taṃ nivāraṇaṃ // Rm_10.147{47} //
S01ratnml_u:3773: iti putravacaḥ śrutvā pitā sa vismayānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3774: tathety abhyanumoditvā tasthau tūṣṇī vilokayan // Rm_10.148{48} //
S01ratnml_u:3776: tad dīnāraṃ sahasotkṛtya viprāya pradadau mudā // Rm_10.149{49} //
S01ratnml_u:3777: tat pradattam asau vipraḥ pratigṛhya pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3778: datvāśīrvacanaṃ tasmai svagṛhaṃ sahasā yayau // Rm_10.150{50} //
S01ratnml_u:3782: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sarve te lokā āśu suvismitāḥ // Rm_10.152{52} //
S01ratnml_u:3783: tato hiraṇyapāṇiḥ sa evaṃ lokān praharṣayan /
S01ratnml_u:3786: saṃbuddhaṃ sugataṃ draṣṭuṃ vihāraṃ samupāviśat // Rm_10.154{54} //
S01ratnml_u:3792: natvā pādau munes tasya purastāt samupāśrayan // Rm_10.157{57} //
S01ratnml_u:3797: bhadanta dātum ichāmi saṃghebhyo bhojanaṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:3798: tad ājñāṃ dehi me śāsta yadi te 'sti kṛpā mayi // Rm_10.160{60} //
S01ratnml_u:3800: sa ānaṃdaḥ samālokya dārakaṃ taṃ samādiśat // Rm_10.161{61} //
S01ratnml_u:3801: sādhu vatsa mahābhāgyād bhadram ālocitaṃ tvayā /
S01ratnml_u:3802: yady atra dāsyate bhojyaṃ kārṣāpaṇaṃ pradīyatāṃ // Rm_10.162{62} //
S01ratnml_u:3803: evaṃkṛte tu te vatsa maṃgalaṃ sarvadā bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:3804: ataś ca durgatiṃ hitvā sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_10.163{63} //
S01ratnml_u:3806: svayaṃ hastau prasāryyaiva hemarāśiṃ vyadhāt punaḥ // Rm_10.164{64} //
S01ratnml_u:3807: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavaḥ sarve vismitāḥ saṃpraharṣitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3809: taddravyaiḥ sādhayāmāsa bhojyāni surasāni ca // Rm_10.165{65} //
S01ratnml_u:3810: tataḥ sa dārako bhojyais taiḥ praṇītasusādhitaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3813: sarvasaṃghaṃ praṇamyaivaṃ punas tasthau kṛtāṃjaliḥ // Rm_10.167{67} //
S01ratnml_u:3815: āryyasatyaṃ samāyuktaṃ dideśa dharmam uttamaṃ // Rm_10.168{68} //
S01ratnml_u:3819: saṃbuddhasagaṇaṃ natvā svagehaṃ harṣito yayau // Rm_10.170{70} //
S01ratnml_u:3820: tatra sarvaṃ sa tadvṛttaṃ pitror ākhyāya harṣitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3823: tad anujñāṃ pradattaṃ me hitaṃ mayi yadīcchatha // Rm_10.172{72} //
S01ratnml_u:3824: iti putroditaṃ śrutvā svātmajaṃ sa pitāvadat /
S01ratnml_u:3825: mā kṛthā sahasā putra pravrajyācaraṇe manaḥ // Rm_10.173{73} //
S01ratnml_u:3827: tvaṃ vṛddhimān mahādātā tat pravrajyāṃ kutaś careḥ // Rm_10.174{74} //
S01ratnml_u:3828: kiṃ vāpyate vivāhas tvaṃ daharaś ca kumārikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3829: pravrajyā duṣkaraṃ sthānaṃ tat kathaṃ pracaret sutaḥ // Rm_10.175{75} //
S01ratnml_u:3830: tat tāvat tvaṃ yuvā putra vivāhitvā kulastriyaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3831: bhuktvā saukhyaṃ yathākāmaṃ gṛhe dharmaṃ samācara // Rm_10.176{76} //
S01ratnml_u:3833: kuladharmaṃ pratisthāpya tataḥ pravraja vārddhikaḥ // Rm_10.177{77} //
S01ratnml_u:3834: yadā vṛddho daridraś ca pravrajyāṃ hi tadā caret /
S01ratnml_u:3835: yāvad yuvā samṛddhaś ca tāvat tvaṃ pravraja kathaṃ // Rm_10.178{78} //
S01ratnml_u:3837: tadetadā kathaṃ putra pravrajyāvratam ācareḥ // Rm_10.179{79} //
S01ratnml_u:3838: ity etad duṣkaraṃ matvā pravrajyācaraṇe manaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3839: sarvathā tvaṃ vinirvārya kuladharmaṃ samācara // Rm_10.180{80} //
S01ratnml_u:3840: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ imu putra bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3844: bodhayan pitaraṃ dharme punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.182{82} //
S01ratnml_u:3845: satyam eva tathā tāta yad etad bhāṣyate tvayā /
S01ratnml_u:3846: tathāpi śrūyatāṃ tāta yad abhiprāyakaṃ mama // Rm_10.183{83} //
S01ratnml_u:3847: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ jīvitaṃ cāpi bhaṃguraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3848: kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca kṣaṇasaṃpad ghanopamaṃ // Rm_10.184{84} //
S01ratnml_u:3850: pravrajyāvratam āśritya prāptum ichāmi nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_10.185{85} //
S01ratnml_u:3851: api ca dullabhaṃ janma mānuṣaṃ bhavacāriṇāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3852: sarveṣām api jantūnāṃ maraṇaṃ sarvathā dhruvaṃ // Rm_10.186{86} //
S01ratnml_u:3854: vinā dharmānubhāvena kathaṃ sadgatim āpnuyāt // Rm_10.187{87} //
S01ratnml_u:3855: saṃbuddho 'pi sasaṃgho 'yaṃ sthāsyati na sadeha ca /
S01ratnml_u:3856: anyatrāpi vrajen nūnaṃ nirvṛtiṃ vā gamiṣyati // Rm_10.188{88} //
S01ratnml_u:3860: sarvalokāś ca kāmāṃdhā bhaveyuḥ kleśamāninaḥ // Rm_10.190{90} //
S01ratnml_u:3861: tada dharmānusaṃvṛttau matiḥ kasyāpi no caret /
S01ratnml_u:3862: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dhartuṃ kaḥ samartho bhaviṣyati // Rm_10.191{91} //
S01ratnml_u:3864: aviśodhitacittātmā na yāyāt paramāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_10.192{92} //
S01ratnml_u:3866: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dharttuṃ ichāmi tāta sāṃprataṃ // Rm_10.193{93} //
S01ratnml_u:3867: tad yadi me hitaṃ draṣṭum ichasi tāta sarvadā /
S01ratnml_u:3868: tad anujñāṃ samādātum arhasi mātra cāraye // Rm_10.194{94} //
S01ratnml_u:3869: iti puroditaṃ śrutvā pitā sa paribodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3871: tadā tajjananī cāsau dṛṣṭvā taṃ sutam ātmajaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3872: snehād aśru vimocantī nivārayitum abravīt // Rm_10.196{96} //
S01ratnml_u:3873: hā putra katham ekānte māṃ vihāya kva yāsyase /
S01ratnml_u:3874: mā putra sahasā gacha kiṃcit kālaṃ vinodaya // Rm_10.197{97} //
S01ratnml_u:3875: yāvaj jīvāmy ahaṃ tāta tāvan mā gāḥ kuhāpi ca /
S01ratnml_u:3877: mṛtāyāṃ mayi bho putra tadā vrajasva vāṃchite // Rm_10.198{98} //
S01ratnml_u:3878: acireṇaiva māṃ mṛtyur grahīṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3879: tāvad eva gṛhe sthitvā dānaṃ kurvan sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_10.199{99} //
S01ratnml_u:3881: natvā tāṃ jananīm evaṃ bodhayitum abhāṣata // Rm_10.200{100} //
S01ratnml_u:3882: yat tvayāmve rudanty evaṃ mṛtyunāma prakīrtitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3883: tena me coditaṃ cittaṃ pravrajyāvratasādhane // Rm_10.201{1} //
S01ratnml_u:3884: dhruvaṃ janmavatāṃ mṛtyur mṛtānāṃ janma ca dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3885: parivarttini saṃsāre mṛtaḥ ko hi na jāyate // Rm_10.202{2} //
S01ratnml_u:3886: dharmiṣṭho vīryāvāṃś cāpi maraṇaṃ yāti sarvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3887: pāpiṣṭho nighnitaś cāpi maraṇaṃ yāti sarvataḥ // Rm_10.203{3} //
S01ratnml_u:3888: dharmiṣṭhaḥ satsukhaṃ bhuktvā mṛto yāty eva sadgatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3889: pāpiṣṭho duḥkhatāṃ bhuktvā mṛto gachati durgatiṃ // Rm_10.204{4} //
S01ratnml_u:3891: tadā saṃtyajyate sarvair vaṃdhumitrajanair api // Rm_10.205{5} //
S01ratnml_u:3892: tadā na vidyate ko 'pi hitakārī sahānugaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3893: dharma ekaḥ sahāyaḥ syāt sarvatrāpi hitārthakṛt // Rm_10.206{6} //
S01ratnml_u:3894: tasmāt mātaḥ prayatnena karttavyaṃ dharmam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:3895: dharmeṇa rakṣyate sarva ihāmutra sahāpi hi // Rm_10.207{7} //
S01ratnml_u:3897: dharmeṇa sudhṛtāḥ satvā nimagnā duḥkhasāgare // Rm_10.208{8} //
S01ratnml_u:3898: dharmeṇa jīyate duṣṭo dharmeṇa jīyate kaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3899: dharmeṇa jīyate rāgo mṛtyur dharmeṇa jīyate // Rm_10.209{9} //
S01ratnml_u:3900: dharmeṇa sukule janma lakṣmī dharmeṇa sthīyate /
S01ratnml_u:3901: vidyāyaśo 'rthamoksāś ca prāpyante dharmataḥ khalu // Rm_10.210{10} //
S01ratnml_u:3904: yam āśritya mahāsatvā jitvā kleśagaṇān laghuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3905: sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya vrajanti nirvṛtiṃ parāṃ // Rm_10.212{12} //
S01ratnml_u:3906: iti matvā hi te sarve bhikṣavo bhavanispṛhāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3909: tad anujñāṃ pradatvā me nātra kāryo viṣāditaḥ // Rm_10.214{14} //
S01ratnml_u:3911: yadi na dīyate 'nujñā tad api no viyogataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3912: akasmān mṛtyunā ghrāya grasiṣyati puro hi naḥ // Rm_10.215{15} //
S01ratnml_u:3913: tadā kiṃ te kariṣyāmi mamāpi kiṃ kariṣyasi /
S01ratnml_u:3914: kṛtvānuśocanāṃ caiva yāsyāmo maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_10.216{16} //
S01ratnml_u:3915: iti mātaḥ parijñāya tad anujñāṃ pradehi me /
S01ratnml_u:3916: viṣādaṃ mā kṛthā atra prasādīnī bhavet prabhu // Rm_10.217{17} //
S01ratnml_u:3917: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityam ihāmutrāpi saṃbhavet /
S01ratnml_u:3918: ahaṃ ca saugataṃ dharmaṃ dhṛtvā nirvṛtim āpnuyāṃ // Rm_10.218{18} //
S01ratnml_u:3922: tayoś ca caraṇe natvā sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_10.220{20} //
S01ratnml_u:3926: āśu jetavanaṃ gatvā vihāraṃ samupāviśat // Rm_10.222{22} //
S01ratnml_u:3928: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_10.223{23} //
S01ratnml_u:3929: namas te bhagavac chāsta bhavatāṃ caraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:3930: tat pravrajyāvrataṃ datvā brahmacaryaṃ pradehi me // Rm_10.224{24} //
S01ratnml_u:3932: ehi bhikṣo kumāra tvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ carehi sa // Rm_10.225{25} //
S01ratnml_u:3933: iti prokto munīndro 'sau pāṇinā tac chiraḥ spṛśan /
S01ratnml_u:3938: vyāyacchad ghaṭamānaś ca samādhiṣu samāhitaḥ // Rm_10.228{28} //
S01ratnml_u:3939: tad idaṃ paṃcagaṃdaṃ ca bhavacakraṃ calācalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3941: bhiṃdan sarvam avidyāṅgaṃ prāpya vidyāḥ śubhaṃkarāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3950: pūjyo mānyo 'bhivaṃdyaś ca babhūva sa hiraṇyabhṛt /
S01ratnml_u:3951: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ yatiṃ // Rm_10.234{34} //
S01ratnml_u:3952: vismitāḥ śrīghanaṃ natvā paprachus tasya karmatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3953: bhagavan kena dharmeṇa hiraṇyapāṇir ayaṃ sudhīḥ // Rm_10.235{35} //
S01ratnml_u:3954: sarvārthino hi saṃtarpya sākṣād arhan bhavaty api /
S01ratnml_u:3955: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān tān tathābravīt // Rm_10.236{36} //
S01ratnml_u:3957: anena yat kṛtaṃ karma tan mayā kathyate 'dhunā // Rm_10.237{37} //
S01ratnml_u:3961: bodhicaryāṃ samādiśya kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat // Rm_10.239{39} //
S01ratnml_u:3963: tadā rājā kṛkī nāma matvā taṃ nirvṛtiṃ gataṃ // Rm_10.240{40} //
S01ratnml_u:3965: tatas taddhāturatnāni garbha āropya sādarāt // Rm_10.241{41} //
S01ratnml_u:3966: hemaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kārayām āsa sa prabhuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3967: tat susiddhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sadvidhānair mahotsavaiḥ // Rm_10.242{42} //
S01ratnml_u:3968: mahaś cāpi tadā tatra sthāpayitvā bhajan nṛpaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3971: tataḥ sa pādayor natvā praṇidhānaṃ vyadhāt tathā // Rm_10.244{44} //
S01ratnml_u:3973: yat puṇyaṃ ca vipākena jāyeyaṃ sukule sadā // Rm_10.245{45} //
S01ratnml_u:3975: evaṃvidhaṃ ca śāstāram ārogya samupāśritaḥ // Rm_10.246{46} //
S01ratnml_u:3976: etad dharmaṃ samāsādya prāpnuyāṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3978: hiraṇyapāṇir ayaṃ dātā bhavaty arhaṃ sa sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3979: evaṃ sarve 'pi saṃsāre bhuṃjate karmajaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_10.248{48} //
S01ratnml_u:3981: yenaivaṃ yat kṛtaṃ karma tenaiva bhuṃjyate phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3982: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana // Rm_10.249{49} //
S01ratnml_u:3983: śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ vāpi bhuktaṃ tu kṣīyate khalu /
S01ratnml_u:3984: nāgnibhir dahyate karma klidyate nodakair api // Rm_10.250{50} //
S01ratnml_u:3985: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate nāpi bhūmiṣu kṣīyate na hi /
S01ratnml_u:3986: anyathāpi bhaven naiva saṃsāre karmaṇo gatiḥ // Rm_10.251{51} //
S01ratnml_u:3987: śubhasya śubhataiva syāt kṛṣṇasya kṛṣṇataiva hi /
S01ratnml_u:3988: miśrasya miśritaiva syād anyathā na sadā bhavet // Rm_10.252{52} //
S01ratnml_u:3989: evaṃ matvātha saṃsāre caritavyaṃ sadā śubhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:3990: na praṇasyaṃti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api // Rm_10.253{53} //
S01ratnml_u:3991: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti prāṇināṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:3992: ity asau bhagavān buddhaḥ satkarmadeśanāmataiḥ // Rm_10.254{54} //
S01ratnml_u:3993: tarpayan sa kalāṃl lokān tato viśrāntam ādadhau /
S01ratnml_u:3994: iti śāstroditaṃ śrutvā sarve te bhikṣusāṃghikāḥ // Rm_10.255{55} //
S01ratnml_u:3995: śubheṣv eva sadā nityaṃ saṃpraceruḥ samāhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:3996: mahārāja tvayāpy evaṃ caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_10.256{56} //
S01ratnml_u:3997: bodhayitvā prajāñ caivaṃ sthāpanīyāḥ śubhe sadā /
S01ratnml_u:3998: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhavet khalu /
S01ratnml_u:3999: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya saṃbodhipadam āpuṇyāḥ // Rm_10.257{57} //
S01ratnml_u:4000: iti tena samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa nṛpatīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4002: śṛṇvanti ye śrāvayantīha yaś ca hiraṇyapāṇer avadānam etat /
S01ratnml_u:4003: te kleśamuktāḥ sugatānubhaktāḥ prayānti nūnaṃ sugatālayeṣu // Rm_10.259{59} //
S01ratnml_u:4008: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā bhūyo 'py evam abhāṣata // Rm_11.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:4009: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4010: yathā te guruṇākhyātaṃ tathā me vaktum arhasi // Rm_11.2{2} //
S01ratnml_u:4012: upagupto mahābhijñas taṃ nṛpaṃ pratyabhāṣata // Rm_11.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:4013: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4014: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tad anumodanāṃ kuru // Rm_11.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:4019: bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ upāsakaiś ca cailakaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4020: bodhisatvair mahāsatvais tadanyaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ // Rm_11.7{7} //
S01ratnml_u:4022: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ prayayur bodhikāminaḥ // Rm_11.8{8} //
S01ratnml_u:4024: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca maṃtriṇo janāḥ // Rm_11.9{9} //
S01ratnml_u:4025: amātyāḥ sādhavaḥ paurā dhaninaś ca mahājanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4026: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca tathānye sarvajātikāḥ // Rm_11.10{10} //
S01ratnml_u:4028: taṃ buddhaṃ sugataṃ nāthaṃ pūjayitvā samaṃtataḥ // Rm_11.11{11} //
S01ratnml_u:4031: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:4036: āsīd gṛhapatiḥ prāḍhyaḥ kuveravat samṛddhimān // Rm_11.15{15} //
S01ratnml_u:4042: tasyāsau ramaṇī bhāryā saṃvṛttā garbhiṇī satī /
S01ratnml_u:4043: asūta samaye putraṃ prāsādikaṃ manoharaṃ // Rm_11.18{18} //
S01ratnml_u:4044: sa ca jātismaro vālo jātamātraḥ svakau bhujau /
S01ratnml_u:4046: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
S01ratnml_u:4047: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.20{20} //
S01ratnml_u:4049: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sā mātā trāsitā vismitābhavat // Rm_11.21{21} //
S01ratnml_u:4050: kim etad iti saṃtrastā dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:4051: bharttāraṃ sahasāhūya agram enam adarśayat // Rm_11.22{22} //
S01ratnml_u:4052: tadāsau dārakaś cāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ janakaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:4053: hastau dṛṣṭvā tathāliṃgya cuṃvayitvā caivam abravīt // Rm_11.23{23} //
S01ratnml_u:4054: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
S01ratnml_u:4055: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.24{24} //
S01ratnml_u:4056: iti saṃdarśayaṃ hastāv evaṃ cāpy avadac chiśuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4057: dārako 'sau punaḥ supto nidrāṃ bheje yad ichayā // Rm_11.25{25} //
S01ratnml_u:4058: tato 'sau janako 'py etad dṛṣṭvā śrutvā pravismitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4059: kiṃ etad iti sāśaṃkā jñātin āhūya cābravīt /
S01ratnml_u:4061: tan nimittaṃ nirīkṣyaitat satyaṃ me vaktum arhatha /
S01ratnml_u:4062: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te jñātayo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:4063: tat putraṃ dārakaṃ draṣṭuṃ tat koṣṭhaṃ samupādiśat /
S01ratnml_u:4064: tathāsau dārakaś caivaṃ tān dṛṣṭvā samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:4066: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā /
S01ratnml_u:4067: bhavanto 'rhatsu mā cittaṃ dūṣayata kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:4068: kharāṃ vācaṃ ca mārhatsu niścārayata sarvadā /
S01ratnml_u:4069: evaṃ saṃdarśayaṃ hastau vacanaṃ saṃvadaṃ śiśuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4070: dārako 'sau punaḥ supto nidrāṃ bheje yad ichayā /
S01ratnml_u:4071: etat te jñātayo dṛṣṭvā śrutvā sarve 'pi vismitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4072: kim etad iti bhāṣanto vabhūvuḥ parisaṃkitāḥ // Rm_11.26{26} //
S01ratnml_u:4073: tatas te jñātayaḥ sarve vijñāya tasya lakṣaṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4074: saṃmīlya tam upāmaṃtrya gṛhasthaḥ pratiharṣitaḥ // Rm_11.27{27} //
S01ratnml_u:4075: tasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā punar evam avocata /
S01ratnml_u:4079: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te jñātayas tataḥ // Rm_11.29{29} //
S01ratnml_u:4080: saṃmīlya saṃmataṃ kṛtvā taṃ gṛhasthaṃ samabruvan /
S01ratnml_u:4081: yad ayaṃ te suto vālo jātamātraḥ svakau bhujau // Rm_11.30{30} //
S01ratnml_u:4082: paśyan āliṃgyā cuṃvitva mudā caivaṃ prabhāṣate /
S01ratnml_u:4083: tad ayaṃ dārako nāmnā hastaka iti viśrutaḥ // Rm_11.31{31} //
S01ratnml_u:4086: tena nāmnā prasiddhena prathayām āsa taṃ sutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4089: tatas tāsāṃ prayatnaiḥ sa pathyopacāraṇaiḥ kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:4090: dine dine pravṛddho 'bhūd hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_11.34{34} //
S01ratnml_u:4091: evaṃ sa hastakas tābhiḥ pālyamānaḥ pravarddhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4092: kumāraḥ sakhibhiḥ sārddhaṃ krīḍāsthānaṃ gato 'ramat // Rm_11.35{35} //
S01ratnml_u:4093: tatra teṣāṃ sakhīnāṃ ca hastako 'sau puraḥsthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4094: hastāv āliṃgya saṃrakṣya cuṃvitvaivam abhāṣata // Rm_11.36{36} //
S01ratnml_u:4095: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
S01ratnml_u:4096: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.37{37} //
S01ratnml_u:4098: kharāṃ vācaṃ ca mārhatsu niścārayata keṣu cit // Rm_11.38{38} //
S01ratnml_u:4099: iti saṃrakṣitau hastau tenaivaṃ ca prabhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4102: guruṃ samyag upāśritya vidyāpāraṃ yayau laghu // Rm_11.40{40} //
S01ratnml_u:4103: tatra teṣāṃ guruṇāṃ ca hastako 'sau puraḥsthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4104: hastau dṛṣṭvā samāliṃgya cuṃvitvā caivam abravīt // Rm_11.41{41} //
S01ratnml_u:4105: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
S01ratnml_u:4106: aho labdhav imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.42{42} //
S01ratnml_u:4107: bhavanto 'rhatsu mā cittaṃ dūṣayata kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:4108: kharāṃ vācaṃ ca mārhatsu niścārayata keṣu cit // Rm_11.43{43} //
S01ratnml_u:4109: iti dṛṣṭvā ca saṃśrutya sarve te guravo 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:4110: sarve śiṣya gaṇāś cāpi vabhūvur vismayānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4111: yasmiṃś ca samaye tatra deśe bhayaupakrame /
S01ratnml_u:4114: tadāsau hastako 'py evaṃ samudbhrāntaḥ svakau bhujau /
S01ratnml_u:4116: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
S01ratnml_u:4117: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā /
S01ratnml_u:4118: bhavanto 'rhatsu mā cittaṃ dūṣayata kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:4119: kharāṃ vācaiva mārhatsu niścārayata keṣu cit /
S01ratnml_u:4120: evaṃ hastau susaṃrakṣya tenaivaṃ ca prabhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4121: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca te sarve lokā āsan suvismitāḥ // Rm_11.44{44} //
S01ratnml_u:4129: pādau tasya muner natvā dharmaṃ śrotuṃ puro 'viśat // Rm_11.48{48} //
S01ratnml_u:4136: saṃbuddhasugataṃ natvā svagehaṃ sahasā yayau // Rm_11.52{52} //
S01ratnml_u:4140: tad anujñāṃ pradattaṃ me hitaṃ mayi yadīchatha // Rm_11.54{54} //
S01ratnml_u:4142: mā kṛthāḥ sahasā putra pravrajyāsādhane manaḥ // Rm_11.55{55} //
S01ratnml_u:4143: pravrajyā duṣkaraṃ sthānaṃ tad anyadvratam ācara /
S01ratnml_u:4146: kiṃcid duḥkhe 'nabhijñāya tat pravrajyāṃ careḥ kathaṃ // Rm_11.57{57} //
S01ratnml_u:4147: tad yāvad yauvanaṃ dehaṃ yāvat saṃpac ca te gṛhe /
S01ratnml_u:4148: tāvad gehe sukhaṃ bhuktvā gṛhī dharmaṃ samācara // Rm_11.58{58} //
S01ratnml_u:4149: yadā vṛddho daridro ca pravrajyāyāṃ tadā cara /
S01ratnml_u:4151: yāvad yuvā samṛddhaś ca tāvat tvaṃ pravrajeḥ kathaṃ // Rm_11.59{59} //
S01ratnml_u:4153: tad etasmiṃ kathaṃ putra pravrajyāvratam ācareḥ // Rm_11.60{60} //
S01ratnml_u:4154: ity etad duṣkaraṃ matvā pravrajyācaraṇe manaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4156: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityam ihāmutrāpi sarvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4158: iti vākyaṃ pituḥ śrutvā hastako 'sau viśaṃkitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4159: pitarau bodhayan dharme punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_11.63{63} //
S01ratnml_u:4160: satyam etat tathā tāta tvayaivaṃ satyam ucyate /
S01ratnml_u:4161: atrāpi śrūyatāṃ tāta mamābhiprāyam ucyatāṃ // Rm_11.64{64} //
S01ratnml_u:4162: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ jīvitaṃ cāpi caṃcaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4163: kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca saṃpac cāpi ghanopamā // Rm_11.65{65} //
S01ratnml_u:4165: pravrajyāvratam ādhāya prāptum ichāmi sadgatiṃ // Rm_11.66{66} //
S01ratnml_u:4166: api ca janma mānuṣyaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavacāriṇāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4167: tatrāpi maraṇaṃ nityaṃ purataḥ sarvasaṃmukhaṃ // Rm_11.67{67} //
S01ratnml_u:4169: vinā dharmānucāreṇa sadgatiṃ katham āpnuyāṃ // Rm_11.68{68} //
S01ratnml_u:4171: ato 'nyatrāpi yāyād vā nirvṛtiṃ cāvrajet khalu // Rm_11.69{69} //
S01ratnml_u:4172: saṃbuddhe nirvṛtiṃ yāte saddharma lapsyate kutaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4175: sarve satvāś ca kāmārttā bhaveyuḥ kleśabhāginaḥ // Rm_11.71{71} //
S01ratnml_u:4176: tadā dharmānucāreṣu buddhiḥ kasya kathaṃ caret /
S01ratnml_u:4177: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ sthātuṃ kaḥ samartho bhavet tadā // Rm_11.72{72} //
S01ratnml_u:4178: na ca saṃśuddhyate cittaṃ pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ vinā /
S01ratnml_u:4179: aviśodhitacitte hi naiva yāyāc chivāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_11.73{73} //
S01ratnml_u:4180: tac cittapariśuddhyarthaṃ nirvṛte ca yad āptaye /
S01ratnml_u:4181: pravrajyāvratam ādātum ichāmi tāta sāṃprataṃ // Rm_11.74{74} //
S01ratnml_u:4182: yad atra yadi me tāta hitaṃ kartuṃ samichasi /
S01ratnml_u:4183: pravrajyāsādhane 'nujñāṃ dātuṃ me prārhasi drutaṃ // Rm_11.75{75} //
S01ratnml_u:4186: tathety abhyanumoditvā tad anujñāṃ vyasṛjata // Rm_11.76{76} //
S01ratnml_u:4187: tac chrutvā jananī cāsau dṛṣṭvā taṃ putram ātmajaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4189: hā putra katham ekānte māṃ vihāya kva yāsyasi /
S01ratnml_u:4190: sahasā putra mā kārṣī pravrajyācaritaṃ manaḥ // Rm_11.78{78} //
S01ratnml_u:4191: yāvaj jīvāmy ahaṃ jīva tāvan mā pravrajātmaje /
S01ratnml_u:4192: mṛtāyāṃ mayi putra tvaṃ pravrajasva yathechayā // Rm_11.79{79} //
S01ratnml_u:4193: acireṇa hi me mṛtyur bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4194: tāvad eva gṛhe dharmaṃ kurvan bhuktvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_11.80{80} //
S01ratnml_u:4195: iti mātur vacaḥ śrutvā putro 'sau paricoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4196: mātaraṃ tāṃ praṇatvaivaṃ bodhayitum abhāṣata // Rm_11.81{81} //
S01ratnml_u:4197: yat tvayāmve rudanty evaṃ mṛtyunāmātra kīrttyate /
S01ratnml_u:4198: tena me preritaṃ cittaṃ pravrajyāvratadhāraṇe // Rm_11.82{82} //
S01ratnml_u:4200: jāto na mriyate ko hi mṛtaḥ kaś ca na jāyate // Rm_11.83{83} //
S01ratnml_u:4201: gṛhastho dharmakṛc cāpi yāty evaṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4202: brahmacārī vanastho 'pi yāty evaṃ maraṇaṃ khalu // Rm_11.84{84} //
S01ratnml_u:4204: kṛcchreṇa sādhayan dharmaṃ mṛto yāti surālayaṃ // Rm_11.85{85} //
S01ratnml_u:4205: yāvad dharmaphalaṃ svarge tāvad bhuktvā sukhaṃ vaset /
S01ratnml_u:4206: tato dharmaphale hīne svargāc cyuto yated adhaḥ // Rm_11.86{86} //
S01ratnml_u:4208: vividhāni ca duḥkhāni bhuktvā jīvaṃ ciraṃ vaset // Rm_11.87{87} //
S01ratnml_u:4209: yāvan na jāyate tasya puṇyānumodanā matau /
S01ratnml_u:4210: tāvat karmajaduḥkhāni prabhuktvā narake caret // Rm_11.88{88} //
S01ratnml_u:4211: yadā tu jāyate tasya triratnasmaraṇe matiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4214: tadā taṃ sugataṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmākaraiḥ parispṛśet // Rm_11.90{90} //
S01ratnml_u:4217: tatrāpi yadi dharmeṣu caran nityam ataṃdritaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4218: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya prayāyāt paramāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_11.92{92} //
S01ratnml_u:4219: evaṃ māta gṛhastho hi kṛtvāpi dharmam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:4221: sukhaduḥkhāni saṃbhuktvā saṃsāre carate bhraman // Rm_11.93{93} //
S01ratnml_u:4225: tan mamātra tvayā māta naiva kāryā nivāraṇā // Rm_11.95{95} //
S01ratnml_u:4226: yadi puṇye 'sti te vāṃchā tad anujñāśu dīyatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4227: yadi na dīyate 'nujñā tad api nau viyogatā // Rm_11.96{96} //
S01ratnml_u:4228: akasmāt mṛtyur āgatya bhaviṣyati purāpi nau /
S01ratnml_u:4229: tadā te kiṃ kariṣyāmi kiṃ mamāpi kariṣyasi // Rm_11.97{97} //
S01ratnml_u:4231: iti mātar viditvā tvaṃ tadanujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_11.98{98} //
S01ratnml_u:4232: vighnatāṃ mā kṛthā hy atra dharme bhavānumodinī /
S01ratnml_u:4233: tathā cec chubhatā nityam ihāmutrāpi te bhavet // Rm_11.99{99} //
S01ratnml_u:4234: ahaṃ ca saugatiṃ caryāṃ kṛtvā yāsyāmi nirvṛtīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4235: iti putroditaṃ śrutvā matāsau paribodhitā // Rm_11.100{100} //
S01ratnml_u:4238: tayoḥ pādān praṇatvaivaṃ sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_11.102{2} //
S01ratnml_u:4240: sarvān atithivargāṃś ca vāṃchitārthaiḥ pratoṣayan // Rm_11.103{3} //
S01ratnml_u:4242: jetavanaṃ pragatvā sa vihāraṃ samupāviśat // Rm_11.104{4} //
S01ratnml_u:4245: namas te bhagavan nātha bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:4246: tat pravrajyāṃ vrataṃ dehi cariṣye brahmasaṃvaraṃ // Rm_11.106{6} //
S01ratnml_u:4247: iti tenārthite buddho bhagavān tam abhāṣata /
S01ratnml_u:4248: ehi bhikṣo kumārātra cara brahmavrataṃ varaṃ // Rm_11.107{7} //
S01ratnml_u:4249: ity ādiśya munīndro 'sau pāṇinā tac chiraḥ spṛśan /
S01ratnml_u:4250: samyak pravrājayitvāśu svasaṃghe taṃ samagrahīt // Rm_11.108{8} //
S01ratnml_u:4254: vyāyaccha ghaṭamānaś ca samādhiṣu samāhitaḥ // Rm_11.110{10} //
S01ratnml_u:4255: tad idaṃ paṃcagaṃḍaṃ ca bhavacakraṃ calācalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4257: bhindan sarvam avidyāṅgaṃ prāpya vidyāgaṇāḥ śivāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4259: pratisaṃvidguṇāḥ prāpya jitvā kleśagaṇāṃ yatiḥ // Rm_11.112{12} //
S01ratnml_u:4267: sahasā kleśagaṇāñ jitvā sākṣād arhan bhavaty api // Rm_11.116{16} //
S01ratnml_u:4268: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ yatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4269: vismitāḥ śrīghanaṃ natvā paprachus tasya karmatāṃ // Rm_11.117{17} //
S01ratnml_u:4271: yad anena kṛtaṃ karma tat samādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_11.118{18} //
S01ratnml_u:4272: iti te bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4273: tān svaśiṣyān yatīn bhikṣūn samāmaṃtryābravīt tathā // Rm_11.119{19} //
S01ratnml_u:4274: śṛṇudhvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sarve yūyaṃ hi vismayānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4275: yad anena kṛtaṃ karma tan mayā vaḥ pracakṣyatāṃ // Rm_11.120{20} //
S01ratnml_u:4276: purāsīd bhagavān buddhaḥ kāśyapo nāma sarvavit /
S01ratnml_u:4283: śāsane dvau yatī bhikṣū saṃśītikau vabhūvatuḥ // Rm_11.124{24} //
S01ratnml_u:4287: sa jñāto 'rhan mahāpuṇyaḥ sarvalokaiḥ prapūjitaḥ // Rm_11.126{26} //
S01ratnml_u:4289: sa kena cit pūjito naivaṃ yathā so 'rhaṃ yatiḥ sudhīḥ // Rm_11.127{27} //
S01ratnml_u:4290: yadā so 'rhan mahābhijño yatra yatra nimaṃtritaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4294: gantukāmas tadā tatra paścācchramaṇam aicchata // Rm_11.129{29} //
S01ratnml_u:4295: tad āgamanam anviṣya naiva pratyalabhat kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:4296: tatas taddarśanābhāvād anyam āhūya bhikṣukaṃ // Rm_11.130{30} //
S01ratnml_u:4297: taṃ paścācchramaṇaṃ kṛtvā dātur gṛham upācarat /
S01ratnml_u:4299: tam arhantam apaśyan sa tasthau tūṣṇī nirāśitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4300: tathaivaṃ taṃ niṣīdantaṃ dṛṣṭvā te bhikṣavo narāḥ // Rm_11.132{32} //
S01ratnml_u:4302: bhadanta paśyatādyāyaṃ tenāhato na nīyate // Rm_11.133{33} //
S01ratnml_u:4304: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ proktaṃ śrutvāsau pratibheditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4306: yad adya māṃ parityajya samāhūyānyato harāt /
S01ratnml_u:4307: gachata bhojanaṃ bhoktuṃ tad ahasto bhavatv asau // Rm_11.135{35} //
S01ratnml_u:4308: tadāsau bhojanaṃ bhuktvā tenaivaṃ bhikṣuṇā saha /
S01ratnml_u:4309: svāśramaṃ samupāyātas tam adrākṣīd ruṣākulaṃ // Rm_11.136{36} //
S01ratnml_u:4310: ity evaṃ śapitaṃ vāpi matvā so 'rhaṃ mahāmatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4311: dṛṣṭvā taṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā tūṣṇībhūtvā vyaciṃtayat // Rm_11.137{37} //
S01ratnml_u:4312: aho ayaṃ mahāmūḍha īdṛg mayi prabhāṣate /
S01ratnml_u:4313: etat karmaphalaṃ ghoraṃ kathaṃ bhokṣyati nārake // Rm_11.138{38} //
S01ratnml_u:4314: yad ayaṃ mama doṣeṇa krodhenaivaṃ khalīkṛtaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4315: tad etat karmavaipākyaṃ mayaiva paripācyatāṃ // Rm_11.139{39} //
S01ratnml_u:4316: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā sa mahārhaṃ kṛpānidhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4318: tataḥ so 'py ayatir bhikṣur dṛṣṭvā taṃ dhyānasaṃsthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4321: procitaṃ pātakaṃ ghoraṃ tad bhavān kṣantum arhati // Rm_11.142{42} //
S01ratnml_u:4324: tadatyayaṃ bhavāñ chāstaḥ pratihartuṃ samarhati // Rm_11.143{43} //
S01ratnml_u:4325: adyāgreṇa sadā cāpi bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:4326: tan me yad aparādhatvaṃ tat sarvaṃ kṣantum arhati // Rm_11.144{43/} //
S01ratnml_u:4327: punar naitat kariṣye 'haṃ akarttavyaṃ yady atra hi /
S01ratnml_u:4328: avaktavyaṃ ca yat kiṃ cin na tad vakṣyāmi sarvathā // Rm_11.145{44} //
S01ratnml_u:4329: abhāvyaṃ cāpi yat kiṃcid bhāvayiṣye na tat punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4330: yad eva taṃ prakarttavyaṃ tad eva hi karomy ahaṃ // Rm_11.146{45} //
S01ratnml_u:4331: vaktavyam eva vakṣye 'haṃ bhāvyam eva prabhāvaye /
S01ratnml_u:4332: etat sarvaṃ samāsena samādeṣṭuṃ samarhati // Rm_11.147{46} //
S01ratnml_u:4333: bhavadājñāṃ śirodhṛtvā satyam evaṃ caret sadā // Rm_11.148{47/} //
S01ratnml_u:4334: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa samādheḥ samutthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4335: taṃ bhikṣuṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā paśyann evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_11.149{48} //
S01ratnml_u:4336: śṛṇu vatsa samādhāya tvām atrāhaṃ prabodhaye /
S01ratnml_u:4337: yathā me gaditaṃ śrutvā tathā kuru samāhitaḥ // Rm_11.150{49} //
S01ratnml_u:4339: strīṇāṃ saṃgānurāgaṃ ca akarttavyaṃ kadā cana // Rm_11.151{50} //
S01ratnml_u:4341: saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ ca pāruṣyaṃ ca kadā cana // Rm_11.152{51} //
S01ratnml_u:4342: mithyādṛṣṭir abhidhyā ca vyāpādaṃ ca tathā sadā /
S01ratnml_u:4343: bhikṣubhir manasā naiva ciṃtanīyā kadā cana // Rm_11.153{52} //
S01ratnml_u:4345: tasmād evaṃ parijñāya tyaktavyāni sukhārthibhiḥ // Rm_11.154{53} //
S01ratnml_u:4347: saddharmāṇāṃ pratikṣepaṃ kartavyaṃ na kadā cana // Rm_11.155{54} //
S01ratnml_u:4348: tathā vāryāpavādatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ na kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:4349: paṃcānaṃtaryapāpāni naiva kāryāṇi kena cit // Rm_11.156{55} //
S01ratnml_u:4351: patanto narakeṣv eva kleśāndhāni ca santi hi // Rm_11.157{56} //
S01ratnml_u:4352: tasmād etāni karmāṇi mānasāpi ca mā kṛthā /
S01ratnml_u:4355: āryāṣṭāṃgikamārge ca caritvā vratam ādarāt // Rm_11.159{58} //
S01ratnml_u:4358: pravaraṃ vratam ākhyātaṃ sarvair api munīśvaraiḥ // Rm_11.160{59} //
S01ratnml_u:4361: evam etat parijñāya vrataṃ kṛtvā samācaran /
S01ratnml_u:4362: tatas te kramataḥ pāpaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ kṣiṇuyād drutaṃ // Rm_11.162{61} //
S01ratnml_u:4363: tataś ca kramaśaḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣitvātra samāhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4365: tatas tvaṃ kramaśaś caivaṃ śodhayitvā trimaṃḍalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4368: tatheti ca parijñāya tadvrataṃ kartum aichata // Rm_11.165{64} //
S01ratnml_u:4369: tathā tasyārhataḥ śāstuḥ sadaivaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4370: kramāc chikṣāś ca śikṣitvā tad upoṣadham ācarat // Rm_11.166{65} //
S01ratnml_u:4373: bhikṣavo jñāyatām eṣa yo 'sau bhikṣuḥ pṛthagjanaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4374: yad anenārhate śāstre śapitaṃ ruṣṭacetasā // Rm_11.168{67} //
S01ratnml_u:4376: yac cānenārhataḥ śastur gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ sadā // Rm_11.169{68} //
S01ratnml_u:4378: tenāyaṃ śāsanenātra pravrajyārhaṃ bhavaty api // Rm_11.170{69} //
S01ratnml_u:4379: iti hi bhikṣavo matvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā /
S01ratnml_u:4380: śubhena sadgatiṃ yāṃti kṛṣṇena durgatiṃ sadā // Rm_11.171{70} //
S01ratnml_u:4382: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tasyaiva karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ // Rm_11.172{71} //
S01ratnml_u:4383: tenaiva bhujyate loke nānyena spṛśyate kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:4384: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana // Rm_11.173{72} //
S01ratnml_u:4385: bhuktaṃ tu kṣīyate karma śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:4386: nāgnibhir dahyate kena vāyubhiś ca na śuṣyate // Rm_11.174{73} //
S01ratnml_u:4387: klidyate nodakaiś cāpi kṣīyate naiva bhūmiṣu /
S01ratnml_u:4388: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api // Rm_11.175{74} //
S01ratnml_u:4389: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti prāṇināṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:4390: evam etat prabhaṣitvā jinendro 'sau mahāmuniḥ // Rm_11.176{75} //
S01ratnml_u:4391: bodhayan sakalāṃl lokān samādhiṃ vidadhe tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4392: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sarve ca sāṃghikāḥ // Rm_11.177{76} //
S01ratnml_u:4393: śubheṣv eva sadā raktāḥ pracerire samāhitāḥ // Rm_11.178{77} //
S01ratnml_u:4394: ity evaṃ me samākhyātaṃ guruṇā śāṇavāsinā /
S01ratnml_u:4396: tathaivaṃ te mayā khyātaṃ śrutvā caivaṃ śubhe cara // Rm_11.179{78} //
S01ratnml_u:4399: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4400: kramād bodhipathaḥ prāpya saṃbodhim āpnuyāḥ khalu // Rm_11.181{80} //
S01ratnml_u:4402: śrutvā tatheti vaṃditvā prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_11.182{81} //
S01ratnml_u:4404: ye cāpi śrāvayanti pratidinam aniśaṃ bodhicaryābhiraktāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4405: te sarve kleśamuktāḥ suvimalamanaso bodhisatvā guṇāḍhyā
S01ratnml_u:4406: bhuktvā saukhyaṃ prakāmaṃ munivaranilayaṃ saṃprayāṃti pramodāḥ // Rm_11.183{82} //
S01ratnml_u:4411: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:4412: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4413: yathā te guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathā me khyātum arhasi // Rm_12.2{2} //
S01ratnml_u:4415: upagupto yatiś caivaṃ taṃ nṛpaṃ pratyabhāṣata // Rm_12.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:4416: śṛṇu rājan samādhāya yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4417: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tac chrutvā mudito bhava // Rm_12.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:4424: śrāvakair bhikṣubhiḥ sārddham upāsakaiś ca cailakaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4425: bodhisatvagaṇaiś cāpi tathānyaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ // Rm_12.8{8} //
S01ratnml_u:4427: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ prāyayur bodhivāṃchinaḥ // Rm_12.9{9} //
S01ratnml_u:4429: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś cāpi vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca maṃtriṇaḥ // Rm_12.10{10} //
S01ratnml_u:4430: amātyā dhaninaḥ paurāḥ sādhavaś ca mahājanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4431: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca tathānye sarvajātikāḥ // Rm_12.11{11} //
S01ratnml_u:4433: saṃbuddhaṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā pūjayitvā samaṃtataḥ // Rm_12.12{12} //
S01ratnml_u:4436: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupāśritān /
S01ratnml_u:4440: tadaiva samaye tasyāṃ śrāvastyāṃ puri saṃsthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4445: tato 'sau svāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4446: svasahāyāś ca tāṃ sarvāṃ samāhūya samabravīt // Rm_12.18{18} //
S01ratnml_u:4447: bhavaṃto śrūyatāṃ sarve yad abhilaṣitaṃ mama /
S01ratnml_u:4448: atrāsti yadi vo vāṃchā tan me svāgantum arhatha // Rm_12.19{19} //
S01ratnml_u:4450: tat prāyāta mayā sārddhaṃ yadi saṃpattim ichatha // Rm_12.20{20} //
S01ratnml_u:4451: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te ratnalobhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4452: sahasā gaṃtum ichante ratnākare mahodadhau // Rm_12.21{21} //
S01ratnml_u:4453: tato 'sau sārthabhṛc chīghraṃ sarve sārthagaṇaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:4456: sarve te pracaranto vai tīraṃ prāpur mahodadheḥ // Rm_12.23{23} //
S01ratnml_u:4457: tato bhāṃḍāni naukāyām āropyāruhya ca svayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4462: tataḥ pratyāgatā abdhes tīrāntikaṃ samāyayuḥ // Rm_12.26{26} //
S01ratnml_u:4464: bhidyate vahanaṃ teṣāṃ hṛdayaiḥ sā sahāśu tat // Rm_12.27{27} //
S01ratnml_u:4468: kecid vāhuvalādhānaṃ samuttīrya sthalaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.29{29} //
S01ratnml_u:4470: utpravanto nimajjantaḥ kheditā nidhanaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.30{30} //
S01ratnml_u:4471: tatas te vaṇijaḥ sarve ye viśiṣṭā viṣāditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4472: te yaśodhanavibhraṣṭāḥ śūnyahastā gṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.31{31} //
S01ratnml_u:4474: etad vṛttaṃ svabhāryāyāḥ kathitvaivaṃ vyacintayat // Rm_12.32{32} //
S01ratnml_u:4475: hā hā me mandabhāgyatvāj jāyate mīdṛśī vipat /
S01ratnml_u:4477: atrāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi yato bhāgyaṃ na vidyate // Rm_12.33{33} //
S01ratnml_u:4478: bhāgyavān puruṣo dhīro bhāgyavān kuśalī sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4479: bhāgyena labhyate saṃpad yaśaḥ saukhyaguṇānvitaḥ // Rm_12.34{34} //
S01ratnml_u:4481: etadādyā guṇāḥ sarve śobhanti bhāgyam āśritāḥ // Rm_12.35{35} //
S01ratnml_u:4483: etadādyādiguṇāḥ sarve na prasiddhyaṃti sarvataḥ // Rm_12.36{36} //
S01ratnml_u:4484: tad atra kiṃ kariṣye 'haṃ kva yāsyāmi dhanāptaye /
S01ratnml_u:4485: dhanahīnā na śobhante gṛhasthāḥ sādhavo 'pi hi // Rm_12.37{37} //
S01ratnml_u:4486: varaṃ prāṇaparityāgaṃ na tu dravyair vinā gṛhe /
S01ratnml_u:4487: paśuvan nirasaṃ bhuktvā sthāsyāmy evaṃ nirutsavaṃ // Rm_12.38{38} //
S01ratnml_u:4488: bhāgyena labhyate dravyaṃ bhāgyaṃ dharmeṇa labhyate /
S01ratnml_u:4489: dharme hi jāyate sveṣṭadevatāyāḥ prasādataḥ // Rm_12.39{39} //
S01ratnml_u:4491: samyag ārādhayitvaivaṃ yāyāṃ ratnākaraṃ punaḥ // Rm_12.40{40} //
S01ratnml_u:4494: namas te devate nityaṃ bhaje 'haṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4496: itthaṃ sā devatā samyag ārādhya saṃpramoditā /
S01ratnml_u:4497: sarvasārthān samāhūya punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.43{43} //
S01ratnml_u:4498: bho bhavanto vijānīdhvaṃ vayaṃ sarve vaṇigjanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4499: tad atra bhavatām agre kathyate me samīhitaṃ // Rm_12.44{44} //
S01ratnml_u:4501: tat tathaiva gṛhe sthitvā naiva śobhāṃ vrajemahi // Rm_12.45{45} //
S01ratnml_u:4504: dhanahīnā na śobhante gṛhasthā hi kuṭuṃvinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4507: dhairyyam ālamvya sarvaiś ca karttavyaṃ dhanasādhanaṃ // Rm_12.48{48} //
S01ratnml_u:4509: dhanena sādhayed dharmaṃ dharmeṇa sadgatiṃ vrajet // Rm_12.49{49} //
S01ratnml_u:4511: arjanīyaṃ prayatnena dhanaṃ dānāya bhuktaye // Rm_12.50{50} //
S01ratnml_u:4514: dānaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ dānaṃ śāntikaraṃ sadā // Rm_12.51{51} //
S01ratnml_u:4515: asmād dānaṃ sadā kartuṃ bhoktuṃ saukhyaṃ yathechayā /
S01ratnml_u:4516: bhūyo ratnākaraṃ gaṃtum arhāmahe dhanārjane // Rm_12.52{52} //
S01ratnml_u:4518: yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā dānaṃ kṛtvā vasemahi // Rm_12.53{53} //
S01ratnml_u:4519: yadi daivo vipattiḥ syāt samudre patitā vayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4520: tīrtharāje mṛtāḥ sarve yāsyāmaḥ svargatiṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.54{54} //
S01ratnml_u:4521: yadi bhāgyād athāsmākaṃ devānāṃ ca prasādataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4522: yātrāsiddhir bhaven nūnaṃ yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ tadā // Rm_12.55{55} //
S01ratnml_u:4524: tat prāyāta mayā sārddhaṃ yadi saṃpattim ichatha // Rm_12.56{56} //
S01ratnml_u:4525: iti tasyoditaṃ śrutvā te sarve vaṇijo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:4526: tathā tena sahaichānta gantuṃ ratnākaraiḥ punaḥ // Rm_12.57{57} //
S01ratnml_u:4527: tato 'sau sārthabhṛc chīghraṃ dhṛtvā svastyayanaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:4528: sarve sārthagaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ pratasthe svapurād vahi // Rm_12.58{58} //
S01ratnml_u:4530: pracarantaś ca te sarve tīraṃ prāpur mahodadheḥ // Rm_12.59{59} //
S01ratnml_u:4531: tatra sarve 'pi te sārthā bhāṇḍāni vahane kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:4536: tataḥ pratyāgatāś cābdhes tīrāntikam upāyayuḥ // Rm_12.62{62} //
S01ratnml_u:4538: sā naukā bhidyate caivaṃ teṣāṃ vai hṛdayaiḥ saha // Rm_12.63{63} //
S01ratnml_u:4541: tatra te vilayaṃ prāptā nirālaṃvā nirāśrayāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4542: unmajjanto nimajjantaḥ preritās tīram ūrmibhiḥ // Rm_12.65{65} //
S01ratnml_u:4544: kecid vāhuvalādhānaiḥ samuttīryya sthalaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.66{66} //
S01ratnml_u:4546: utplavantā nimajjantaḥ kheditā nidhanaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.67{67} //
S01ratnml_u:4547: tatas teṣāṃ ca sārthānāṃ ye 'vaśiṣṭā sujīvinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4549: yaśoratnaviyuktās te śūnyahastā gṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.68{68} //
S01ratnml_u:4551: etad vṛttaṃ svavaṃdhūnāṃ kathitvaivam abhāṣata // Rm_12.69{69} //
S01ratnml_u:4552: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenedrig jāyate vipat /
S01ratnml_u:4553: dvidhāpi siddhyate naiva yato bhāgyaṃ na vidyate // Rm_12.70{70} //
S01ratnml_u:4554: pāpair na siddhyate karma atra yatnasya kiṃ valaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4555: dharmeṇa siddhyate karma tasmād dharmo valottamaḥ // Rm_12.71{71} //
S01ratnml_u:4557: dravyena sādhayet karma sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_12.72{72} //
S01ratnml_u:4558: karma tu siddhyate samyak kulavṛttiṃ ca cāriṇāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4559: kulavṛttiṃ parityajya yo 'nyavṛttau caret kudhīḥ // Rm_12.73{73} //
S01ratnml_u:4560: sa ihāpi paribhraṣṭaḥ paratra durgatiṃ vrajet /
S01ratnml_u:4561: yenaivaṃ sadgatiprāptis tadaiva karmma sādhayet // Rm_12.74{74} //
S01ratnml_u:4562: yato 'pi durgatiṃ prāptis tat karma tarhitaṃ budhaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4563: tad atra kiṃ kariṣye 'haṃ kva yāsyāmy artham arjituṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4564: arthaṃ vinā kathaṃ dharmaṃ karttavyaṃ hi kuṭuṃvibhiḥ // Rm_12.75{75} //
S01ratnml_u:4565: vinā dharmaṃ hi saṃsāre janma jīvaṃ ca nisphalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4566: kiṃ te na pauruṣeṇāpi yena dharmaṃ na sādhyate // Rm_12.76{76} //
S01ratnml_u:4567: dhig dhig me janma saṃsāre jīvituṃ na tathotsahe /
S01ratnml_u:4568: varaṃ prāṇaparityāgaṃ na tv evaṃ cirajīvitaṃ // Rm_12.77{77} //
S01ratnml_u:4569: avaśyaṃ jantubhir mṛtyur gantavyaṃ ekadhā dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4570: tato 'tra martum ichāmi na tv evam uṣituṃ gṛhe // Rm_12.78{(78)} //
S01ratnml_u:4572: kathaṃ me śāmyate duḥkhaṃ yenāhaṃ parikheditaḥ // Rm_12.79{(78)} //
S01ratnml_u:4573: kiṃ karttavyaṃ kva gantavyaṃ yatnaṃ cātra na vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:4574: sarvathāhaṃ vinaṣṭo 'smi ko me 'sti rakṣako janaḥ // Rm_12.80{79} //
S01ratnml_u:4578: vinā dharmmaṃ yaśodravyaḥ kiṃ saukhyaṃ gṛhavāsināṃ // Rm_12.82{81} //
S01ratnml_u:4579: vinā dharmayaśodravyair yo gṛhasthaḥ paśuḥ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:4582: puṇyenaiva pralabhyante caturvargā api dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.84{83} //
S01ratnml_u:4584: tad eteṣāṃ mamaiko 'pi na vidyate kathaṃ cana /
S01ratnml_u:4585: hā hato 'smi svadaivena kiṃ karomi vikheditaḥ // Rm_12.85{84} //
S01ratnml_u:4587: evaṃ teṣāṃ svavaṃdhūnāṃ vilapītvā sa sārthapaḥ // Rm_12.86{85} //
S01ratnml_u:4589: evaṃ vyavasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ te sarve 'pi vāṃdhavāḥ // Rm_12.87{86} //
S01ratnml_u:4591: sādho sārthapate satyaṃ tat sarvaṃ yat tvayocyate // Rm_12.88{87} //
S01ratnml_u:4592: tad evaṃ dhairyyam ālaṃvya prodyamasva gṛhe vasan /
S01ratnml_u:4593: sādho kutrāpi mā dhāva nirmāṇasadṛśaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_12.89{88} //
S01ratnml_u:4595: yad abhāvi na tad bhāvi bhāvi naiva tad anyathā // Rm_12.90{89} //
S01ratnml_u:4597: avaśyaṃ bhāvino bhāvā na bhaveyus tathā yadi // Rm_12.91{90} //
S01ratnml_u:4598: pitrā tyaktaḥ kathaṃ rāmo rājyabhraṣṭo vanaṃ yayau /
S01ratnml_u:4599: tatrāpi vasatas tasya bhāryā śītā pativratā // Rm_12.92{91} //
S01ratnml_u:4601: tato rāmeṇa vīryeṇa hatvāsau rāvaṇas tataḥ // Rm_12.93{92} //
S01ratnml_u:4602: pratyānīya punaḥ śītā tyaktā bharttrā svayaṃ kathaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4603: punar ṛṣeḥ samānīya sabhāmadhye parikṣitā // Rm_12.94{93} //
S01ratnml_u:4604: tataḥ pṛthyā svayaṃ gṛhya sītānītā rasātalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4606: nadyāṃ prāṇasvayaṃ tyaktvā janaṃ sārddhaṃ divaṃ yayau /
S01ratnml_u:4608: rājyabhraṣṭā vane gatvā vibhramus te 'pi daivataḥ // Rm_12.96{95} //
S01ratnml_u:4610: uttamā adhamā madhyā saṃti te 'pi svadaivataḥ // Rm_12.97{96} //
S01ratnml_u:4611: kecid gṛhe mṛtāḥ kecij jāyamānā mṛtā api /
S01ratnml_u:4612: kecid vālye mṛtāḥ kecit kaumāratve mṛtās tathā // Rm_12.98{97} //
S01ratnml_u:4613: yauvane 'pi mṛtāḥ kecin mṛtā vṛddhe vadanti me /
S01ratnml_u:4614: sarve 'py evaṃ mṛtā lokāḥ svasvadaivapramāṇataḥ // Rm_12.99{98} //
S01ratnml_u:4617: kecid vālye sukhaṃ bhuktvā yauvane duḥkhabhāginaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4618: kecic ca yauvane saukhyaṃ bhuktvā vṛddhe suduḥkhitāḥ // Rm_12.101{100} //
S01ratnml_u:4620: kecic ca duḥkhitā vālye yauvane saukhyabhāginaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4621: vṛddhatvasya sukhībhūtā bhavaṃti te 'pi hi daivataḥ // Rm_12.102{1} //
S01ratnml_u:4622: sarve 'pi sukham ichanti duḥkhaṃ nechati kaś cana /
S01ratnml_u:4623: tathā sukhāni saṃprāptuṃ yatnaṃ kurvanty anekaśaḥ // Rm_12.103{2} //
S01ratnml_u:4624: keṣāṃ cit siddhyate yatnaṃ keṣāṃ cid vā na siddhyati /
S01ratnml_u:4625: keṣāṃ cid vighnatāṃ yāti tat sarvaṃ daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.104{3} //
S01ratnml_u:4626: tathā ca rogiṇāṃ rogā vaidyopacāraṇair api /
S01ratnml_u:4627: varddhyante naiva śāmyante tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.105{4} //
S01ratnml_u:4628: keṣāṃ cid rogiṇāṃ rogā vinā vaidyopacāraṇe /
S01ratnml_u:4629: śāmyaṃte yatnato cāpi tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.106{5} //
S01ratnml_u:4630: tathā cald maṃtriṇāṃ maṃtrāḥ siddhyante yatnato laghuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4631: keṣāṃ cid vighnatāṃ yānti tad api daivakāraṇāt // Rm_12.107{6} //
S01ratnml_u:4632: tathaivaṃ vaṇijāṃ lābhoḥ siddhyante yatnato 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:4633: keṣāṃ cin naiva yatnena tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.108{7} //
S01ratnml_u:4634: tathā vīrā raṇe śatruṃ vinā yatnaṃ jayaṃty api /
S01ratnml_u:4635: kecit tu ripunā yuddhe hanyamānā mṛtāḥ pare // Rm_12.109{8} //
S01ratnml_u:4637: tyaktvā dehaṃ gatāḥ svargaṃ tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.110{9} //
S01ratnml_u:4638: evaṃ sāṃyātrikā ratnaṃ prāptuṃ ratnākaraṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4639: kecid ratnāni saṃgṛhya svasti pratyāgatā gṛhaṃ // Rm_12.111{10} //
S01ratnml_u:4640: kecid ratnam alabdhaṃ vai śūnyahastā gṛhāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4641: kecic ca nidhanaṃ yātās tatraiva makarālaye // Rm_12.112{11} //
S01ratnml_u:4642: kecid yatnāt samuttīrya jīvanto gṛham āgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4643: kecic ca jāṃgale caurair nihatā maraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_12.113{12} //
S01ratnml_u:4644: kecic ca jaṃtubhir mārge hiṃsyamāne mṛtā vane /
S01ratnml_u:4645: keṣāṃ cit siddhyate yātrā mahallābhasamanvitāḥ // Rm_12.114{13} //
S01ratnml_u:4646: keṣāṃ cid vighnatāṃ yānti tathāpi daivayogataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4647: kaiś cid gṛhe nidhiḥ prāptaḥ kaiś cid deśāntare vane // Rm_12.115{14} //
S01ratnml_u:4648: kaiś cid dūre bhramadbhiś ca naiva kiṃ cit kva cid dhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4649: keṣāṃ cid varddhate saṃpad yatnāyāsaṃ vinā laghu // Rm_12.116{15} //
S01ratnml_u:4650: keṣāṃ cid dhīyate saṃpad rakṣitāpi prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4651: keṣāṃ cit susthirā saṃpat keṣāṃ cid vala asthirā // Rm_12.117{16} //
S01ratnml_u:4652: keṣāṃ cij jāyate naiva nānopāyārjanair api /
S01ratnml_u:4653: evaṃ nānāprakāraiś ca satvās traidhātukodbhavāḥ // Rm_12.118{17} //
S01ratnml_u:4656: sukhasyānte hi duḥkhāni duḥkhasyānte sukhāni ca // Rm_12.119{18} //
S01ratnml_u:4657: bhuṃjante jaṃtavaḥ sarve bhramante ṣaḍgatiṣv api /
S01ratnml_u:4658: tathā bhavanti mitrāṇi dviṣo 'pi hitakāriṇaḥ // Rm_12.120{19} //
S01ratnml_u:4659: mitrāṇy api dviṣo duṣṭā bhavaṃti daivayogataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4660: tathāmṛtaṃ viṣībhūtaṃ viṣaṃ cāpy amṛtī bhavet // Rm_12.121{20} //
S01ratnml_u:4661: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahad varaṃ // Rm_12.122{21} //
S01ratnml_u:4662: tathā ca brahmaṇaḥ śīrṣaṃ nikṛttaṃ śūlapāṇinā /
S01ratnml_u:4663: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalī // Rm_12.123{22} //
S01ratnml_u:4664: tathā cakrī suvīro 'pi vyādheṣu nihato mṛtaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4665: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahad valaṃ // Rm_12.124{23} //
S01ratnml_u:4666: yaś ca bhūtādhipaś ceśaḥ so 'py umatto digaṃvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4667: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ maheśvaraḥ // Rm_12.125{24} //
S01ratnml_u:4668: caṃdro 'pi ca kalaṃkāṅko māse māse 'pi hīyate /
S01ratnml_u:4669: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahadvalaṃ // Rm_12.126{25} //
S01ratnml_u:4671: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalī // Rm_12.127{26} //
S01ratnml_u:4673: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalī // Rm_12.128{27} //
S01ratnml_u:4675: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalaṃ // Rm_12.129{28} //
S01ratnml_u:4676: tathā ca parśurāmeṇa mātāpi nihatā krudhā /
S01ratnml_u:4677: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalaḥ // Rm_12.130{29} //
S01ratnml_u:4679: vaṃdhane māritaṃ caivaṃ tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.131{30} //
S01ratnml_u:4680: tasmāc ca brahmadattena dharmapālo sa nandanaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4681: māritaḥ pramadātuṣṭyai tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.132{31} //
S01ratnml_u:4682: rājñī ca durpatī mātā svātmajasyāpi rohitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4683: pītvaiva nirdayā tuṣṭā tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.133{32} //
S01ratnml_u:4685: asinā ghātito 'raṇye tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.134{33} //
S01ratnml_u:4687: nirvāsito vane bhrāntas tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.135{34} //
S01ratnml_u:4688: evam anye 'pi rājāno hatvā jñātī svavāṃdhavān /
S01ratnml_u:4689: bhuṃjate prāpya rājyāni tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.136{35} //
S01ratnml_u:4690: evaṃ pitrā sutās tyaktvā mātrā ca svātmajā api /
S01ratnml_u:4692: bhāryāpi svāminā tyaktvā bharttāpi bhāryyayā tathā /
S01ratnml_u:4694: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.138{37} //
S01ratnml_u:4695: putreṇāpi pitā tyaktaṃ mātāpi jananī tathā /
S01ratnml_u:4696: dhātrī cāpi parityaktās tathā pautrapitāmahaḥ // Rm_12.139{38} //
S01ratnml_u:4697: tathā pitāmahas tyaktaḥ putraiś cāpy atinirdayaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4698: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.140{39} //
S01ratnml_u:4699: tathā rājñā svabhṛtyāś ca sevakā api sajjanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4700: aparādhaṃ vinā tyaktās tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.141{40} //
S01ratnml_u:4702: parityaktvā nihaṃty ante tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.142{40*} //
S01ratnml_u:4703: tathā śiṣyān gurur hanti śiṣyo hanti gurum api /
S01ratnml_u:4704: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.143{41} //
S01ratnml_u:4705: tathāpi ghnanti bharttāraṃ svāminaṃ sevakānn api /
S01ratnml_u:4706: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.144{42} //
S01ratnml_u:4707: tathā ca svayam ātmānaṃ ghnanti kecid ruṣānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4708: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattamaḥ // Rm_12.145{43} //
S01ratnml_u:4709: kecic chastraiḥ svayaṃ hatvā kecid bhuktvā viṣādikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4710: kecid agnau jale svabhre prapātāt patitā mṛtāḥ // Rm_12.146{44} //
S01ratnml_u:4711: kecit pāśaiḥ svayaṃ badhya mṛtāḥ kecic ca vaṃdhane /
S01ratnml_u:4712: kecit pānāśanādīṃś ca tyaktvā yāṃti yamālayaṃ // Rm_12.147{45} //
S01ratnml_u:4713: evaṃ kṛtvāpi yānty eva kecid vāpi surālayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4714: kecic ca narake yānti tat sarvaṃ daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.148{46} //
S01ratnml_u:4716: devatāś ca dadanty evaṃ phalaṃ daivaniyogataḥ // Rm_12.149{47} //
S01ratnml_u:4717: pare 'pi svajanā iṣṭāḥ sahajā api ca dviṣaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4718: bhavanti tat kṣaṇād eva tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.150{48} //
S01ratnml_u:4719: evaṃ traidhātukotpannāḥ sarve satvāś ca jaṃtavaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4720: ṣaḍgatiṣu bhramantas te caranti daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.151{49} //
S01ratnml_u:4721: kecid vīrā guṇāḍhyāś ca suṃdarā bhāgyamāninaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4723: kecic ca nirguṇāḥ prāḍhyāḥ kecin nirguṇinaḥ śaṭhāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4724: kecic ca vikalāṃgāś ca guṇasaṃpattibhāginaḥ // Rm_12.153{51} //
S01ratnml_u:4725: kecic ca suṃdarā mūrkhā nirdhanā nirguṇāḥ śaṭhāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4726: kecic ca guṇinaḥ prāḍhyā nīcakarmānucāriṇaḥ // Rm_12.154{52} //
S01ratnml_u:4731: kṛpaṇā vikalāṃgāś ca nirdayāś ca durāśayāḥ // Rm_12.156{54} //
S01ratnml_u:4732: kecid vīrā hy alābhijñāḥ kulīnāḥ sādhavo 'pi ye /
S01ratnml_u:4733: te 'pi jātinihīne 'pi bhajaṃti śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_12.157{55} //
S01ratnml_u:4735: pretavad bhujyamānāś ca caraṃti bhikṣukā bhuvi // Rm_12.158{56} //
S01ratnml_u:4736: kecic ca nirguṇā vāpi vaṃcakā duṣṭamānasāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4737: mānyante sādhuval loke tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.159{57} //
S01ratnml_u:4741: kenāpi śakyate naiva vaśe netuṃ kathaṃ cana // Rm_12.161{59} //
S01ratnml_u:4743: sraṣṭā bharttā ca harttā ca traidhātuvāsinām api // Rm_12.162{60} //
S01ratnml_u:4745: tat tasya śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhaktyā nityaṃ samarcaya // Rm_12.163{61} //
S01ratnml_u:4746: tasmiṃ tuṣṭe vidhau devaiḥ parituṣṭaṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4747: tato daivaprasādena sarvatra maṃgalaṃ bhavet // Rm_12.164{62} //
S01ratnml_u:4749: viruddhe tu na siddhyante yatnaiḥ saṃsādhitāny api // Rm_12.165{63} //
S01ratnml_u:4753: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvakāryyeṣu saṃbhavet // Rm_12.167{65} //
S01ratnml_u:4756: tathā cet sarvathā nityaṃ yātrāyaṃ maṃgalaṃ bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:4757: anyad vā cintitaṃ kāryaṃ sarvāpy evaṃ prasatsyate // Rm_12.169{67} //
S01ratnml_u:4758: yadi vāṃchāsti te bhūyo gantuṃ ratnākaraṃ prati /
S01ratnml_u:4759: tathābhyarcya vidhātāraṃ gachet svasti bhavet khalu // Rm_12.170{68} //
S01ratnml_u:4760: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sārthavāhas tatheti saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4761: pratijñāya samabhyarcya brahmāṇaṃ prārthayat tadā // Rm_12.171{69} //
S01ratnml_u:4762: namas te bhagavan brahmaṃ yātrāsiddhiṃ kuruṣva me /
S01ratnml_u:4763: evaṃ vidhiṃ samārādhya sa sārthādhipatis tataḥ // Rm_12.172{70} //
S01ratnml_u:4764: ratnaṃ prāptyai punaḥ sārthān samāhūyābravīt tathā /
S01ratnml_u:4766: bhavantaḥ śrūyatāṃ vākyaṃ yan mayā samudīritaṃ // Rm_12.173{71} //
S01ratnml_u:4767: atrāsti yadi vo vāṃchā tathā kartuṃ samudyatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4768: ahaṃ ratnākaraṃ bhūyo gantuṃ ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_12.174{72} //
S01ratnml_u:4769: tad yadīchatha ratnāni tathā yāta mayā saha /
S01ratnml_u:4770: kiṃ cāpy atra vayaṃ sarve sārthavāhakulodbhavāḥ // Rm_12.175{73} //
S01ratnml_u:4771: tad gṛhe paśuvad bhuktvā kathaṃ śobhī vrajemahi /
S01ratnml_u:4772: saṃsāre sarvajaṃtūnāṃ ekadhā maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.176{74} //
S01ratnml_u:4773: tat kiṃ no maraṇe bhītyā mṛtyuṃ kena nivāryyate /
S01ratnml_u:4774: yadi daivād vipattiḥ syād asmākaṃ karmmadoṣataḥ // Rm_12.177{75} //
S01ratnml_u:4776: yadi bhāgyāc ca no yātrā siddhā svastimatī bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:4777: tadā jīvaṃ sukhaṃ dānaṃ kṛtvā svargaṃ vrajemahi /
S01ratnml_u:4780: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vaṇijo mudā // Rm_12.179{77} //
S01ratnml_u:4781: tatheti ca samutsāhaṃ kṛtvā gaṃtuṃ samudyatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4782: tataḥ sarve 'pi te sārthā dhṛtvā svastyayanaṃ vidhiṃ // Rm_12.180{78} //
S01ratnml_u:4783: paṇyam ādāya tenaiva saha sārthabhṛtā yayuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4784: tatas te prasthitāḥ sarve grāmāraṇyavanasthalīḥ // Rm_12.181{79} //
S01ratnml_u:4785: samuttīryya kramād yātās tīraṃ prāpur mahodadheḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4788: tatas teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ daivayogānuyogataḥ // Rm_12.183{81} //
S01ratnml_u:4790: tadā sarve 'pi te sārthā dṛṣṭvā naukāṃ vibheditāṃ // Rm_12.184{82} //
S01ratnml_u:4792: tatas te vaṇijaḥ sarve vipaṃnāśā viṣāditāḥ // Rm_12.185{83} //
S01ratnml_u:4795: kheditātmā gṛhe tasthau mūkavad dhi natotsavaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4797: dṛṣṭvā taṃ vikalībhūtaṃ samupetyābravīt punaḥ // Rm_12.187{85} //
S01ratnml_u:4798: mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ svāminn atra dhairyyaṃ samāśrayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4799: dharmiṣṭhe śaraṇaṃ gatvā kuruṣva dharmasādhanaṃ // Rm_12.188{86} //
S01ratnml_u:4802: śuddhacitto viśuddhātmā puṇyātmā bhāgyam āpnuyāt // Rm_12.189{87} //
S01ratnml_u:4803: tato bhāgyavataḥ puṃso yad yat karmaṇi sādhitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4804: tat tat sarvaṃ prasiddhyeta tasmād dharmaṃ carottamaṃ // Rm_12.190{88} //
S01ratnml_u:4805: dharmam eva suhṛd mitram ihāmutra sahānugaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4806: dharmmeṇa pālyate sarvaṃ tasmād dharmo jagatsuhṛt // Rm_12.191{89} //
S01ratnml_u:4808: sarveṣām api dharmāṇāṃ dayā dharme viśiṣyate // Rm_12.192{90} //
S01ratnml_u:4813: tasmāt tasya munīndrasya sadbhaktyā śaraṇaṃ vrajan /
S01ratnml_u:4814: saddharmaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityam upāsakaḥ // Rm_12.195{93} //
S01ratnml_u:4815: tatas te naśyate pāpaṃ maṃgalaṃ ca bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4816: tadaiva sarvakāryāṇi sametsyaṃte na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_12.196{94} //
S01ratnml_u:4817: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:4819: namas te bhagavan nātha pāpistho 'haṃ sudurbhagaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4820: bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gache tan māṃ dṛṣṭvāśu rakṣatāṃ // Rm_12.198{96} //
S01ratnml_u:4821: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kāritaṃ vānumoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4822: tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi tan me dehi śubhāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_12.199{97} //
S01ratnml_u:4823: bhavatāṃ sarvadā nātha śaraṇaṃ yāmy upāsakaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4824: anyo me śaraṇaṃ nāsti tan māṃ rakṣa sadā bhaje // Rm_12.200{98} //
S01ratnml_u:4825: tridhāpi me jagannātha yātrā bhagnā svadaivataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4826: gṛhasthaḥ sārthavāho 'haṃ tan me dehi susaṃpadaḥ // Rm_12.201{99} //
S01ratnml_u:4827: yanv ahaṃ sāṃprataṃ nātha bhavataṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajan /
S01ratnml_u:4828: bhūyo ratnākaraṃ gantuṃ ichāmi ratnalabdhaye // Rm_12.202{100} //
S01ratnml_u:4829: yadi yātrā bhavet siddhi yāval lābhaṃ ca lapsyate /
S01ratnml_u:4831: ity evaṃ niścayaṃ kṛtvā saṃbuddhaṃ saṃsmaran muhuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4832: tāṃ bhāryyāṃ bhadrikāṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.204{2} //
S01ratnml_u:4833: bhadre tvayā yad ādiṣṭaṃ tathā kartuṃ samutsahe /
S01ratnml_u:4834: adyāgreṇa jagannāthaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāsyāmy upāsakaḥ // Rm_12.205{3} //
S01ratnml_u:4836: bhadre nāmnā jinendrasya yāsye ratnākare punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4837: yadi yātrā bhavet siddhi yāval lābhaṃ ca lapsyate // Rm_12.206{4} //
S01ratnml_u:4839: yathārhaṃ pūjayiṣye 'ham iti saṃkalpitaṃ mayā // Rm_12.207{5} //
S01ratnml_u:4840: yadi daivād vipattiḥ syāt saṃbuddhanāma saṃsmaran /
S01ratnml_u:4842: tad atra yadi me kāryyaṃ śubhaṃ kartuṃ samichasi /
S01ratnml_u:4843: tad viṣādaṃ parityajya dhairyyaṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_12.209{7} //
S01ratnml_u:4844: iti bharttroditaṃ śrutvā sā bhāryyā bhadrikā satī /
S01ratnml_u:4845: tatheti pratisaṃmodya svāminaṃ taṃ samabravīt // Rm_12.210{8} //
S01ratnml_u:4846: yady evaṃ te samīhāsti kṛtv etaṃ niścayaṃ prabho /
S01ratnml_u:4847: saṃbuddhasmaraṇaṃ dhṛtvā gacha svastiṃ samācara // Rm_12.211{9} //
S01ratnml_u:4849: tathāvaśyaṃ sa saṃbuddhaḥ paśyan tvāṃ cāpy acet khalu // Rm_12.212{10} //
S01ratnml_u:4850: tadā te maṅgalaṃ nityaṃ yātrā svastimatī bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:4851: tatas te janma saṃsāre sāphalyaṃ ca bhavet khalu // Rm_12.213{11} //
S01ratnml_u:4853: gacha yātrā susiddhāstu svasti pratyāgatāśu ca // Rm_12.214{12} //
S01ratnml_u:4854: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:4855: bhūyaḥ sārthagaṇān sarvān samāhūyābravīt tathā // Rm_12.215{13} //
S01ratnml_u:4856: bhavanta śrūyatāṃ vākyaṃ yan mayātra samīhitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4857: ahaṃ ratnākaraṃ bhūyo gantum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_12.216{14} //
S01ratnml_u:4858: tad asti yadi vo vāṃchā yaśaḥsaṃpatsukhāptaye /
S01ratnml_u:4859: samāyāta mayā sārddhaṃ ratnākaraṃ vrajemahi // Rm_12.217{15} //
S01ratnml_u:4860: yadi bhāgyād dhi no yātrā siddhā svastimatir bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:4861: yāvajīvaṃ sukhaṃ dharmaṃ kṛtvā svargaṃ vrajemahi /
S01ratnml_u:4862: atha vā syād vipattir naḥ sarvatīrthajalāśraye /
S01ratnml_u:4863: mṛtāḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyāmo hy avaśyaṃ maraṇe sati // Rm_12.218{16} //
S01ratnml_u:4864: paśuvat kiṃ gṛhe sthitvā sukhaṃ vā kiṃ yaśo vinā /
S01ratnml_u:4865: yaśonvitā mṛtā ye hi tatpumāṃso narottamāḥ // Rm_12.219{17} //
S01ratnml_u:4866: yad artham eva jīvāmas tad arthaṃ yan na vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:4867: kiṃ tena jīvitenāpi kevalaṃ duḥkhabhāginaḥ // Rm_12.220{18} //
S01ratnml_u:4868: varam evādya me mṛtyur na vyarthaṃ cirajīvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4870: yasmāc ciram api sthitvā mṛtyur kena nivāryyate // Rm_12.221{19} //
S01ratnml_u:4874: bodhyamānā vaṇiksaṃghāḥ kiṃ cin naiva samūcire // Rm_12.223{21} //
S01ratnml_u:4875: abhadro 'yaṃ pumāṃ cāpi yato yātrā na siddhyati /
S01ratnml_u:4876: iti tena mahāṃbhodhau naiko 'pi gantum aichata // Rm_12.224{22} //
S01ratnml_u:4877: atha sārthapatir dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān viratotsavān /
S01ratnml_u:4878: eko 'pi vā svayaṃ gantum aichad ratnākaraṃ prati // Rm_12.225{23} //
S01ratnml_u:4880: svastyayanavidhiṃ kṛtvā pratasthe bhārakaiḥ saha // Rm_12.226{24} //
S01ratnml_u:4882: purād vahi vinirgatya kramād deśāṃtaraṃ yayau // Rm_12.227{25} //
S01ratnml_u:4884: parikraman samullaṃghya prāpus tīraṃ mahodadheḥ // Rm_12.228{26} //
S01ratnml_u:4885: tatrāsau sārthabhṛd dṛṣṭvā taṃ samudraṃ mahāmbudhiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4886: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā prārthayac charaṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_12.229{27} //
S01ratnml_u:4888: tvadāsayā samāyāmi tad āśāṃ me prapūraya // Rm_12.230{28} //
S01ratnml_u:4892: tat svasti cārayan naukāṃ yātrāsiddhiṃ prasādhaya // Rm_12.232{30} //
S01ratnml_u:4895: yathā mātā ca garbhasthaṃ vālakaṃ saṃprarakṣate /
S01ratnml_u:4896: tathā mām eva garbhasthe nauke mātaḥ prarakṣatāṃ // Rm_12.234{32} //
S01ratnml_u:4897: tataś ca sugataṃ smṛtvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4899: namas te bhagavan nātha yathā trāsi jagattrayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4900: tathā māṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā pāhi vraje ratnākare // Rm_12.236{34} //
S01ratnml_u:4901: ity evaṃ sārthavāho 'sau praṇatvā sugataṃ smaran /
S01ratnml_u:4903: bhāṇḍāny āropya naukāyaṃ samārohaj janaṃ saha // Rm_12.237{35} //
S01ratnml_u:4906: yat tatra sārthavāho 'sau saṃsmaran sugataṃ muhuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4907: tena puṇyabalenaiva sā naukā svastim ācaran // Rm_12.239{37} //
S01ratnml_u:4908: tathā kramāc caranty evaṃ dvīpalokāntarāṇi ca /
S01ratnml_u:4911: tato ratnāni saṃgṛhya pratasthe vahanāsthitaḥ // Rm_12.241{39} //
S01ratnml_u:4915: grāmāṃ deśāṃ parikramya śrāvastyāṃ puram āyayau // Rm_12.243{41} //
S01ratnml_u:4916: tato gṛhe praviṣṭo 'sau bharyyayā saha moditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4918: tataḥ sadyar gṛhastho 'sau bhāryyayā saha naṃditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4919: bhāṇḍam udghāṭya ratnāni pratyavekṣitum ārabhat // Rm_12.245{43} //
S01ratnml_u:4921: dṛṣṭvā harṣaṃ samāsādya punar evaṃ vabhāṣate // Rm_12.246{44} //
S01ratnml_u:4925: tasmād yathāpratijñātaṃ śraddhayā sāṃprataṃ mayā // Rm_12.248{46} //
S01ratnml_u:4927: tad upārddhaṃ kathaṃ cānudātavyaṃ munaye 'rhate // Rm_12.249{47} //
S01ratnml_u:4928: yadi rājā vijānīyād etad arddhaṃ hare mama /
S01ratnml_u:4929: ratnalubdho nareśo yaṃ daṇḍaṃ vā praṇayaṃ mayi // Rm_12.250{48} //
S01ratnml_u:4930: tadā me syād vipattiś ca tat kathaṃ kriyate mayā /
S01ratnml_u:4931: aho daivād vipattir mām adyāpi ca na muṃcati /
S01ratnml_u:4932: tat kathaṃ vā pratijñātaṃ pūrayituṃ na manyate /
S01ratnml_u:4933: namas te bhagavan nātha sarvajño 'si munīśvaraḥ // Rm_12.251{49} //
S01ratnml_u:4935: ity asau sugataṃ smṛtvā taccintāvyathitāśayaḥ // Rm_12.252{50} //
S01ratnml_u:4936: kapolaṃ svakare dhṛtvā tasthau koṣṭhe nirutsavaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4938: tathaivaṃ sthitam ālokya svāmi naṃ taṃ viṣāditaṃ // Rm_12.253{51} //
S01ratnml_u:4939: sā bhāryā bhadrikopetya puraḥ sthitvābravīt tathā /
S01ratnml_u:4940: svāmiṃ bharttaḥ kim eva tvaṃ sthito 'si duḥkhito yathā // Rm_12.254{52} //
S01ratnml_u:4941: kiṃ vā te jāyate duḥkhaṃ tad vaca cet priyāsmi te // Rm_12.255{53} //
S01ratnml_u:4942: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatiḥ punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4943: tāṃ bhāryyāṃ samupāmaṃtrya punaś caivam abhāṣata // Rm_12.256{54} //
S01ratnml_u:4944: bhadre yaj jāyate duḥkhaṃ tat pravakṣye śṛṇu priye /
S01ratnml_u:4945: yathā mayā pratijñātaṃ pūrayituṃ kathaṃ tathā // Rm_12.257{55} //
S01ratnml_u:4947: etad arddhaṃ hared rājā lobhān me daṇḍayed api // Rm_12.258{56} //
S01ratnml_u:4949: tan me nātra pratīkāro kathaṃ kartuṃ na manyate // Rm_12.259{57} //
S01ratnml_u:4950: iti bharttroditaṃ śrutvā sā bhāryā punar abravīt /
S01ratnml_u:4951: viṣādaṃ mā kṛthāḥ svāmiṃ śṛṇu yan me samīhitaiḥ // Rm_12.260{58} //
S01ratnml_u:4952: tāvad imāni saṃkalpaḥ paścāt tat samayāgate /
S01ratnml_u:4953: pūjayā saha bhojaiś ca sasaṃghāyārhate 'rcayet // Rm_12.261{59} //
S01ratnml_u:4954: evaṃ kṛte tathā svāmin pratijñā tena setsyate /
S01ratnml_u:4955: bhītiś cāpi na vidyeta tasmād evaṃ kuru prabho // Rm_12.262{60} //
S01ratnml_u:4956: iti bhāryāvacaḥ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:4957: tatheti pratisaṃśrutya punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.263{61} //
S01ratnml_u:4958: tāvad imāni sarvāṇi ratnāni te samarppaye /
S01ratnml_u:4959: paścāt kāle sasaṃghaṃ taṃ pūjayiṣye munīśvaraṃ // Rm_12.264{62} //
S01ratnml_u:4961: ity uktvā sarvaratnāni bhāryāyāṃ sa nyadhāpayet // Rm_12.265{63} //
S01ratnml_u:4963: gatvā jetavane vihāre tatra dvāre sthito gurum adhūpayet // Rm_12.266{64} //
S01ratnml_u:4965: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā saṃsmaran prārthayat tathā // Rm_12.267{65} //
S01ratnml_u:4967: tadyathā me pratijñātaiḥ pūrayituṃ samarhasi // Rm_12.268{66} //
S01ratnml_u:4971: yena sa dhūpa ākāśe prābhyudgamya purīṃ ca tāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4973: tatrāsau sārthabhṛd dṛṣṭvā prātihāryaṃ tad adbhutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4975: naitan me pratirūpaṃ syād yad ayaṃ sugato jinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4976: mayā nābhyarcito ratnair dhig me cittabhayād drutaṃ // Rm_12.272{70} //
S01ratnml_u:4977: yanv ahaṃ sāṃprataṃ nāthaṃ prārthayitvā sasāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:4978: saratnaiḥ pūjayiṣyāmi bhojanaiś ca svake gṛhe // Rm_12.273{71} //
S01ratnml_u:4979: ity asau niścayaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:4982: bhavatāṃ pūjanāṃ kartum ichāmi me prasīdatu // Rm_12.275{73} //
S01ratnml_u:4983: ity evaṃ prārthite tena sa saṃbuddho munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4986: praṇatvā ca muneḥ pādau sahasā svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_12.277{75} //
S01ratnml_u:4987: tatra sa bhāryyayā sārddhaṃ vaṃdhumitra janair api /
S01ratnml_u:4988: praṇītaṃ bhojyapūjāṃgaṃ sādhayām āsa satvaraṃ // Rm_12.278{76} //
S01ratnml_u:4990: vihāre sahasā gatvā natvā taṃ prārthayan muniṃ // Rm_12.279{77} //
S01ratnml_u:4992: tad bhavān sāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ samāgantuṃ samarhati // Rm_12.280{78} //
S01ratnml_u:4993: ity evaṃ prārthite tena sa saṃbuddhaḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:4994: pratasthe sūryyavan mārge prātihāryaṃ pradarśayan // Rm_12.281{79} //
S01ratnml_u:4995: tataḥ kramāt purīṃ prāpya tad gṛhaṃ samupāviśat /
S01ratnml_u:4996: tad datte pādyaṃ ādāya śuddhāsane nyaṣīdata // Rm_12.282{80} //
S01ratnml_u:4997: tatas tān sāṃghikān sarvān saṃbuddhapramukhān kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:5001: tataś ca bhojanānte sa śodhayitvā bhujādikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5003: apanīya ca pātrāṇi tāmbūlādīn aḍhaukayat // Rm_12.285{83} //
S01ratnml_u:5005: etaiḥ sarvaṃ suratnais taṃ saṃbuddhaiḥ samavākiran // Rm_12.286{84} //
S01ratnml_u:5007: muner upari khe gatvā chatrībhūtvā sthitā vabhau // Rm_12.287{85} //
S01ratnml_u:5008: tatas taṃ sa gṛhī dṛṣṭvā dviguṇasaṃpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5009: pādau tasya muner natvā praṇidhānaṃ vyadhāt tathā // Rm_12.288{86} //
S01ratnml_u:5013: bhītān āśvāsya saṃbodhau sthāpayiṣyāmi nirvṛtau // Rm_12.290{88} //
S01ratnml_u:5015: saṃbodhau nihitaṃ cittaṃ jñātvā smitaṃ vyadhāt tathā // Rm_12.291{89} //
S01ratnml_u:5018: tatas te bhāsvarāḥ sarve pravisṛtāḥ samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5019: kecid ūrddhaṃ gatāḥ kecin madhyaṃ kecid rasātale // Rm_12.293{91} //
S01ratnml_u:5020: kecid adho gatā yās te sarve te narakeṣu ca /
S01ratnml_u:5023: ye śītanarakās teṣu nyapatad uṣṇikāś ca te // Rm_12.295{93} //
S01ratnml_u:5024: ye ye taiḥ kiraṇaiḥ spṛṣṭās te te sarve sukhānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5025: yadā te sukhasaṃprāptās tadā te vismayānvitāḥ // Rm_12.296{94} //
S01ratnml_u:5026: aho naḥ sukham adyaivaṃ katham etad vyacintayan /
S01ratnml_u:5027: kiṃ nu vayam itaś cyutvā kutra yātāsma sāṃprataṃ // Rm_12.297{95} //
S01ratnml_u:5028: āhosvid upapannāḥ syur anyatra bhuvaneṣv api /
S01ratnml_u:5029: iti saṃdehināṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ paribodhane // Rm_12.298{96} //
S01ratnml_u:5030: bhagavān nirmite buddhaṃ preṣayan narakān prati /
S01ratnml_u:5031: dṛṣṭvā taṃ nirmitaṃ muniṃ vismitā harṣitāś ca vai // Rm_12.299{97} //
S01ratnml_u:5032: te sarve narakā lokāḥ saṃmīlya saṃvabhāṣire /
S01ratnml_u:5033: na bhavanta itaś cyutvā gatāsmānyatra bhūmiṣu // Rm_12.300{98} //
S01ratnml_u:5034: kiṃs tv ayaṃ nu mahāsatvaḥ hy apūrvadarśanaḥ pumān /
S01ratnml_u:5036: nūnam asyānubhāvena duḥkhāni samitāni ca // Rm_12.301{99} //
S01ratnml_u:5037: tad vayam enam ānamya vaṃde mayā pramuktaye /
S01ratnml_u:5038: iti saṃbhāṣya te sarve natvā tac charaṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_12.302{100} //
S01ratnml_u:5040: iti te nirmite tasmin prasādya cittam āratāḥ // Rm_12.303{1} //
S01ratnml_u:5042: evaṃ te bhānavaḥ sarve sarvatra narakeṣv api // Rm_12.304{2} //
S01ratnml_u:5043: prodyante nārakān sarvān pratyāyayur muneḥ puraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5044: tathā tad bhānavaś caivam upariṣṭāṃ gatā api // Rm_12.305{3} //
S01ratnml_u:5046: avabhāsya kramāt sarvān devalokān abhāsayan // Rm_12.306{4} //
S01ratnml_u:5048: evaṃ sarvāś ca tān sarvān avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ // Rm_12.307{5} //
S01ratnml_u:5049: gāthāḥ prodghoṣayantaś ca pralayaṃ saugate vṛṣe /
S01ratnml_u:5050: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkhaśūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ // Rm_12.308{6} //
S01ratnml_u:5051: tasmāt māraṃ parityajya gachadhvaṃ śaraṇaṃ muneḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5054: yo 'py asmin dharmavinaye hy apramattaś cariṣyati // Rm_12.310{8} //
S01ratnml_u:5056: atha te bhānavaḥ sarve traidhātubhuvaneṣv api /
S01ratnml_u:5057: sarvān satvān samuddhṛtya punaḥ pratyāyayur muneḥ // Rm_12.312{10} //
S01ratnml_u:5058: atha te bhānavaḥ sarve bhagavantaṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5059: pradakṣiṇatrayaṃ kṛtvā mūrddhni cāntardadhur muneḥ // Rm_12.313{11} //
S01ratnml_u:5061: tat tadadbhutam ālokya vabhūvur vismayoddhatāḥ // Rm_12.314{12} //
S01ratnml_u:5063: bhagavantaṃ guruṃ natvā papracha smitakāraṇaṃ // Rm_12.315{12/} //
S01ratnml_u:5065: vinirgatā diśaḥ sarvān avabhāsya śatā punaḥ // Rm_12.316{13} //
S01ratnml_u:5066: bhavān hi sugato śāstā saṃbuddho bhagavañ jinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5069: tad bhava bhagavaṃ kasmāt smitaiḥ karoti sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5070: dṛṣṭvaivaṃ taṃ smitaṃ sarve ime lokāḥ pravismitāḥ // Rm_12.318{15} //
S01ratnml_u:5072: darśayanti smitaṃ kecit tat kena bhavataḥ smṛtaṃ // Rm_12.319{16} //
S01ratnml_u:5073: tad etad dhetum ichanti śrotuṃ sarve ime janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5074: tad etat kāraṇaṃ śāstaḥ samādeṣṭuṃ samarhati // Rm_12.320{17} //
S01ratnml_u:5076: tatheti pratisaṃmodya tam ānaṃdaṃ vabhāṣata // Rm_12.321{18} //
S01ratnml_u:5077: evam etat tathānaṃda yathaiva bhāṣasi tvayā /
S01ratnml_u:5078: tat smitaṃ yadarthaṃ me tad vakṣye śṛṇutādarāt // Rm_12.322{19} //
S01ratnml_u:5080: ebhī ratnaiś ca satkṛtya kṛtā pūjā svabhaktitaḥ // Rm_12.323{20} //
S01ratnml_u:5082: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya pūryya pāramitā daśa // Rm_12.324{21} //
S01ratnml_u:5084: saṃbodhiṃ samavāpyaivaṃ jitvā māragaṇān api // Rm_12.325{22} //
