S01ratnml_u:5086: dharmarājo jagaṃnātho loke śāstā bhaviṣyati // Rm_12.326{23} //
S01ratnml_u:5090: dharnio hi jagatāṃ mitram ihāmutra samantataḥ // Rm_12.328{25} //
S01ratnml_u:5092: tasmād dharmaṃ samādhāya saṃcaradhvaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_12.329{26} //
S01ratnml_u:5093: tena vā maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvabhāvī bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.330{27} //
S01ratnml_u:5095: tatheti moditas taṃ ca guruṃ natvā sa naṃdataḥ // Rm_12.331{28} //
S01ratnml_u:5096: so 'pi sārthapatiś caiva svakaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ kila /
S01ratnml_u:5099: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghaṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ vyatijñapat // Rm_12.333{30} //
S01ratnml_u:5102: bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhavāmy aham upāsakaḥ // Rm_12.334{31} //
S01ratnml_u:5103: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kāritaṃ cānumoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5104: tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi tan me dehi śubhāṃ cariṃ // Rm_12.335{32} //
S01ratnml_u:5106: kṣamasva me 'parādhatvaṃ tan māṃ rakṣa mudā tathā // Rm_12.336{33} //
S01ratnml_u:5107: evaṃ tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa saṃbuddho 'bhyadhāt punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5108: yathā te 'bhihitaṃ sādho tathā saṃsetsyate dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.337{34} //
S01ratnml_u:5111: tatas tvaṃ kramato hy evaṃ pūrya pāramitā drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5112: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhaved bodhim avāpnuyāt // Rm_12.339{36} //
S01ratnml_u:5114: tena te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.340{37} //
S01ratnml_u:5115: jayo 'stu te sadā bodhau siddhyatu praṇihitaṃ drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5116: ciraṃ jīvaṃ hitaṃ loke dharmaṃ dhṛtvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_12.341{38} //
S01ratnml_u:5117: ity asau bhagavān buddhas tasmai datvāśiṣaṃ śubhāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5118: saṃghaiḥ saha samutthāya svaṃ vihāraṃ yayau tataḥ // Rm_12.342{39} //
S01ratnml_u:5121: tathā sarve 'pi satvāś ca śrutvā tasya pravṛttitāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5123: etat me guruṇākhyātaṃ saṃśrutaṃ yathā mayā /
S01ratnml_u:5124: tathātraivaṃ tava prītyā kathyate saṃprabudhyatāṃ // Rm_12.345{42} //
S01ratnml_u:5125: tathā rājan tvayāpy evaṃ svayaṃ dhṛtvā vṛṣaṃ śubhe /
S01ratnml_u:5126: bodhayitvā prajāś cāpi sthāpanīyāḥ sadā śubhe // Rm_12.346{43} //
S01ratnml_u:5127: evaṃ cet te sadāpy evaṃ sarvatrāpi sumaṃgalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5128: bhaven nūnaṃ mahārājan satyam etan na saṃśayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5129: dharmeṇa nirjitaṃ pāpaṃ dharmeṇa jīyate kudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5130: dharmeṇa nirjitā mārā dharmeṇa bodhim āpnuyāt /
S01ratnml_u:5133: tathā taṃ kramaṇo rāja bodhicaryyāhitāya ca /
S01ratnml_u:5137: śrutvā rājo tathety evaṃ pratyanandan sapārṣadaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5146: yaḥ śrīmāñ chrīghano loke saddharmaiḥ samupādiśat /
S01ratnml_u:5147: śāsanāni trilokeṣu jayantu tasya sarvadā // Rm_13.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:5148: avadānatatvaṃ vakṣyāmi natvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ guruṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5151: ekasmin samaye tatra sa rājā svajanaiḥ saha // Rm_13.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:5152: paurikaiś ca sabhāṃ kṛtvā saddharmaṃ śrotum aicchata /
S01ratnml_u:5153: tadā sa saugato bhikṣur upagupto jināṃśajaḥ // Rm_13.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:5157: athāśoko mahīpālaḥ sa maṃtripaurikaiḥ saha // Rm_13.6{6} //
S01ratnml_u:5159: sthitvā bhūmau svajānubhyām uttarāsaṅgam udvahan // Rm_13.7{7} //
S01ratnml_u:5160: kṛtāñjaliḥ puṭo natvā punar evam abhāṣata /
S01ratnml_u:5161: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi saddharmaṃ sukhasaṃpradaṃ // Rm_13.8{8} //
S01ratnml_u:5162: yathoktaṃ śrīmunīndreṇa tathā deṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati /
S01ratnml_u:5163: evaṃ tena mahīndreṇa prārthite sa yatīśvaraḥ // Rm_13.9{9} //
S01ratnml_u:5165: sādhu suṣṭhu mahārāja śṛṇu saddharmam ādarāt // Rm_13.10{10} //
S01ratnml_u:5166: yathā me guruṇā khyātaṃ tathā vakṣyāmi te hite /
S01ratnml_u:5167: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śakyasiṃho śubhākaraḥ // Rm_13.11{11} //
S01ratnml_u:5181: śrāvakair bhikṣubhiḥ sārddhaṃ bodhisatvair upāsakaiḥ // Rm_13.18{18} //
S01ratnml_u:5184: evaṃ tatra sabhāsīnaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ dharmabhāṣiṇaṃ // Rm_13.19{19} //
S01ratnml_u:5185: dṛṣṭvā dharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarvalokāḥ samāyayuḥ // Rm_13.20{19/} //
S01ratnml_u:5186: daivā daityāś ca siddhāś ca yakṣagaṃdharvakinnarāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5187: grahā vidyādharāḥ sādhyā nāgeṃdrā garuḍā api // Rm_13.21{20} //
S01ratnml_u:5188: sarve 'pi lokapālāś ca munayaś ca maharṣayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5189: yatayo yoginaś cāpi tīrthikāś ca tapaśvinaḥ // Rm_13.22{21} //
S01ratnml_u:5190: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś cāpi vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca maṃtriṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5191: amātyāḥ koṭṭavārāś ca sārthavāhā mahājanāḥ // Rm_13.23{22} //
S01ratnml_u:5192: śilpino vaṇijaś cāpi gṛhasthāḥ paurikā janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5193: tathā jānapadāś cāpi grāmyāḥ kārpaṭikā api // Rm_13.24{23} //
S01ratnml_u:5197: tatra sarve praviṣṭās te dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ jinaṃ // Rm_13.26{25} //
S01ratnml_u:5198: vanditvānanditāḥ sarve pūjāṃ cakrur yathākramaṃ // Rm_13.27{26/} //
S01ratnml_u:5200: dharmmaṃ śrotuṃ puraskṛtya tasthuḥ sāñjalayo mudā // Rm_13.28{27} //
S01ratnml_u:5201: atha sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃl lokān dharmavāñchinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5204: dharmaṃ prakāśayaṃ loke tasthau dīptāṃśumān iva // Rm_13.30{29} //
S01ratnml_u:5210: ādāya ratisaṃrakto reme nityaṃ yathāsukhaṃ // Rm_13.33{32} //
S01ratnml_u:5212: tataḥ pravṛddhagarbhā sā pāṇḍuvarṇā vyarājata // Rm_13.34{33} //
S01ratnml_u:5213: tataḥ sā garbhasaṃjātaṃ putraṃ tasyām upāśritaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5214: putraṃ matvābhinaṃdaṃtī bharttāram evam abravīt // Rm_13.35{34} //
S01ratnml_u:5215: svāmin garbhe prajāto me yat kukṣau dakṣiṇāśritaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5216: dārako 'yaṃ bhavet putraḥ nūnaṃ tasmāt pramodaya // Rm_13.36{35} //
S01ratnml_u:5217: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasthaḥ praharṣitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5218: garbhe sa vyāśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā mudaivaṃ samudānayat // Rm_13.37{36} //
S01ratnml_u:5219: vata me jāyate putras tad ahaṃ bhāgyavān bhave /
S01ratnml_u:5220: putramukhaṃ hi paśyeyaṃ vaṃśasthitir bhaved api // Rm_13.38{37} //
S01ratnml_u:5222: tenānayor dvayor astu jananīputrayoḥ śivaṃ // Rm_13.39{38} //
S01ratnml_u:5223: evaṃ proktvā gṛhasthaḥ sa śraddhayā saṃpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5224: bhikṣvarthibrāhmaṇebhyaś ca dadau dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_13.40{39} //
S01ratnml_u:5227: tac chubhaṃ prārthayan nityaṃ tasthau putrasamutsukaḥ // Rm_13.41{40} //
S01ratnml_u:5229: asūta samaye putraṃ suṃdaraṃ lakṣaṇānvitaṃ // Rm_13.42{41} //
S01ratnml_u:5230: tataḥ sa janakaḥ śrutvā saṃprajātaṃ sutaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5231: sahasā samupāsritya dadarśa taṃ sasuṃdaraṃ // Rm_13.43{42} //
S01ratnml_u:5233: dṛṣṭvāpi suciraṃ paśyann eva tasthāv atṛptitaḥ // Rm_13.44{43} //
S01ratnml_u:5234: tato jātimahaṃ kṛtvā tasya pitrā prasādinā /
S01ratnml_u:5235: vaḍika iti nāmnā prakhyāpito 'bhūt sa dārakaḥ // Rm_13.45{45/} //
S01ratnml_u:5238: tathā sa vaḍiko vālo 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:5239: pālyamānaḥ pravṛddho 'bhūt hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_13.47{47} //
S01ratnml_u:5242: tatra sa sadguruṃ natvā kramāl lipīn mudāgrahīt /
S01ratnml_u:5244: tataḥ sa gurubhiḥ samyac chiṣyamāṇaḥ subuddhimān /
S01ratnml_u:5245: adhītya sarvaśāstrāṇi vidyāpāraṃ yayau laghu // Rm_13.50{50} //
S01ratnml_u:5247: dehe kasmāt samutpanno mahāvyādhiḥ parākramat // Rm_13.51{51} //
S01ratnml_u:5251: krandantaṃ sa pitā dṛṣṭvā kṛpayaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_13.53{53} //
S01ratnml_u:5253: asahyavedanākrānto bhoktum api na vāñchati // Rm_13.54{54} //
S01ratnml_u:5254: avaśyaṃ maraṇaṃ yāyāt kathaṃ jīved abhuktavān /
S01ratnml_u:5255: mṛte putre mariṣye 'haṃ snehaduḥkhaṃ kathaṃ sahe // Rm_13.55{55} //
S01ratnml_u:5257: tam eva svātmajaṃ paśyaṃs tasthau snehābhivandhitaḥ // Rm_13.56{56} //
S01ratnml_u:5262: sarve te rogiṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā snehārttā evam abruvan // Rm_13.58{58} //
S01ratnml_u:5263: kiṃ bho svasthaṃ na te dehe bhoktuṃ kiṃ vā na vāñchasi /
S01ratnml_u:5264: bhuṃkṣva yathepsitaṃ pathyaṃ tiṣṭha dhairyaṃ samāśrayan // Rm_13.59{59} //
S01ratnml_u:5265: iti prokte 'pi taiḥ sarvaiḥ sa vaḍiko jvarānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5266: dṛṣṭvaiva tān muhuḥ paśyan naiva kiñcid abhāṣata // Rm_13.60{60} //
S01ratnml_u:5267: tataḥ sarve 'pi te dṛṣṭvā taṃ vaḍikaṃ rujāturaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5270: sahasā vaidyam āhūya darśayasva samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.62{62} //
S01ratnml_u:5271: upadiṣṭaṃ yathā tena vaidyena sudhiyā tathā /
S01ratnml_u:5274: kramād asya śarīrastho rogaḥ śāntiṃ vrajed dhruvaṃ // Rm_13.64{64} //
S01ratnml_u:5276: svakuladharmam ādhāya sukhaṃ jīvec chubhe caran // Rm_13.65{65} //
S01ratnml_u:5277: iti matvā mahābhāga mā kṛthās tad viṣādanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5278: dhairyam ālamvya devāṃś ca smṛtvā bhuktvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_13.66{66} //
S01ratnml_u:5279: ity evaṃ samupādiśya tad gṛhasthāt samutthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5280: sarve te snehaduḥkhārttāḥ svasvageham upācarat // Rm_13.67{67} //
S01ratnml_u:5281: tataḥ sa gṛhabhṛt tasya putrasya rogaśāṃtaye /
S01ratnml_u:5283: tasya roganimittaṃ sa vaidyo dṛṣṭvā samīkṣya ca /
S01ratnml_u:5285: tathāpi tasya tadrogaḥ parivṛddho dine dine /
S01ratnml_u:5286: kenāpi hy upacāreṇa naiva śāntim upāyayau // Rm_13.70{70} //
S01ratnml_u:5287: tadrogaṃ varddhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā janakaḥ sa viṣāditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5289: tataḥ sa bhūtiko dṛṣṭvā tasya rogapraśāntaye /
S01ratnml_u:5290: sa bhūtadevatābhyaś ca valiṃ prādād yathāvidhi // Rm_13.72{72} //
S01ratnml_u:5292: kiñcid api viśeṣeṇa naiva śāntim upāyayau // Rm_13.73{73} //
S01ratnml_u:5293: tataḥ sa janako dṛṣṭvā tad rogaṃ parivarddhitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5298: tathā sa janakas tasya rogiṇo grahaśāntaye /
S01ratnml_u:5300: tathāpi tasya tadrogo varddhito na śamaṃ yayau /
S01ratnml_u:5301: daivena samupāghrāte tadupāye na siddhyate // Rm_13.77{77} //
S01ratnml_u:5302: tathā sa janakas tasya putrasya rogavṛddhitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5303: dṛṣṭvā nirāśayā bhinnacitto mūrcchām upāyayau // Rm_13.78{78} //
S01ratnml_u:5304: tadā sā supriyā bhāryā bharttāraṃ taṃ vimohitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5306: svāmin dhairyyaṃ samālambya tyaja citte vimohatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5307: kim asmākaṃ prayatnena daivasyātra pramāṇike // Rm_13.80{80} //
S01ratnml_u:5309: yad abhāvi na tad bhāvi bhāvi cen na tad anyathā // Rm_13.81{81} //
S01ratnml_u:5313: kuladevaṃ samabhyarcya prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.83{83} //
S01ratnml_u:5314: prasīda me kuleśa tvaṃ kṣamasva hy aparādhatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5315: tavaiva śaraṇastho 'haṃ tan me putraṃ prarakṣatāṃ // Rm_13.84{84} //
S01ratnml_u:5317: tasya rogo vivṛddho 'bhūn naiva śāmyam upākramat // Rm_13.85{85} //
S01ratnml_u:5318: tathā brahmādidevāṃś ca sarvān lokādhipān api /
S01ratnml_u:5324: tathāpi tasya rogo na śamito 'bhūt pravarddhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5325: tatas taṃ janako dṛṣṭvā nirāśā mūrchito 'patat // Rm_13.89{89} //
S01ratnml_u:5326: tadā sa vaḍiko rogī pitaraṃ taṃ vimūrchitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5327: pṛthivyāṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śanair nīcasvaro 'vadat // Rm_13.90{90} //
S01ratnml_u:5328: hā hā me jāvate pāpaṃ yenāyaṃ patitaḥ pitā /
S01ratnml_u:5331: hā tātottiṣṭha māṃ paśya mā tyajātmajaṃ āturaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5332: dhairyyam ālamvya saṃdhāya rakṣa māṃ samupasthitaḥ // Rm_13.92{92} //
S01ratnml_u:5333: ity asau vilapan putraḥ pitaraṃ taṃ vimūrchitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5334: dṛṣṭvā bhojanakety aśru muñcaṃs tasthau nirāśritaḥ // Rm_13.93{93} //
S01ratnml_u:5335: tadā sā supriyā bhāryyā bharttāraṃ taṃ vimūrchitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5337: svāmin dhairyaṃ samālaṃbya paśya māṃ te priyaṃ satīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5338: tyaktvā dainyaṃ samādhāya paśyan rakṣātmakaṃ priyaṃ // Rm_13.95{95} //
S01ratnml_u:5339: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhastho samutthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5340: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ supriyāṃ bhāryāṃ putraṃ caivam abhāṣata // Rm_13.96{96} //
S01ratnml_u:5341: hā daiva kiṃ mayā pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ dāruṇaṃ purā /
S01ratnml_u:5342: yenāyaṃ sukṛtī putraḥ tyaktvā māṃ kva prayāsyati // Rm_13.97{97} //
S01ratnml_u:5343: hā hā me saṃpadaś caitāḥ samṛddhāḥ samupārjitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5344: ko nu bhoktā bhaved āsāṃ vyarthaṃ nakṣyanti sarvaśaḥ // Rm_13.98{98} //
S01ratnml_u:5345: kim atrāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yāsyāmi śaraṇaṃ ca kaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5346: ko nu māṃ sahasā rakṣed datvā putrasya jīvitaṃ // Rm_13.99{99} //
S01ratnml_u:5347: kim atrāsya rujaḥ śāntyai kariṣyāmi pratikriyāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5348: na jāne parimūḍho 'smi cetanā me na vidyate // Rm_13.100{100} //
S01ratnml_u:5351: yad ime tīrthikā vijñā bhagavanto vicakṣaṇāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5352: sarvajñāḥ sadguṇādhārāḥ śāstāro me hitaṃkarāḥ // Rm_13.102{102} //
S01ratnml_u:5353: tat tān sarvān samāmaṃtrya gṛhe bhokṣyaiḥ samarcayan /
S01ratnml_u:5354: imaṃ putraṃ puraḥ sthāpya darśayeyaṃ śubhāptaye // Rm_13.103{103} //
S01ratnml_u:5355: tat sudṛṣṭiprasādena nūnam asya bhavec chuvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5356: tato hi kramaśo rogāḥ śāmyeyuḥ sarvathā laghu // Rm_13.104{104} //
S01ratnml_u:5357: tadāyam ātmajaḥ puṣṭo na rogī sutanuḥ sukhī /
S01ratnml_u:5358: kṛtī śubharato bhogī kuladharme samācaret // Rm_13.105{105} //
S01ratnml_u:5359: iti niścitya sa śreṣṭhī tatra tīrthyāśrame gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5360: tān sarvāṃs tīrthikān natvā prārthayed evam ādarāt // Rm_13.106{106} //
S01ratnml_u:5361: namo vo brahmavijñebhyo bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:5362: vijñapyate yad arthaṃ tad anugrahītum arhata // Rm_13.107{107} //
S01ratnml_u:5365: sarve taṃ samupāmaṃtrya pramodayitum abruvan // Rm_13.108{108} //
S01ratnml_u:5366: sādhu vada mahāsādho yat te kāryaṃ samīhitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5367: tat sarvaṃ sarvathāsmābhiḥ kṛtam evaṃ kariṣyate // Rm_13.109{109} //
S01ratnml_u:5368: iti tais tīrthikaiḥ prokte sa śreṣṭhī saṃprasāditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5369: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_13.110{110} //
S01ratnml_u:5371: tat sarvaṃ pratijānīta yad arthaṃ samupācare // Rm_13.111{111} //
S01ratnml_u:5372: tathāpi cārthayiṣye 'tra yan me kaṣṭaṃ pravarttate /
S01ratnml_u:5373: tad vo vijñāpanaṃ kartuṃ bhavataḥ śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_13.112{112} //
S01ratnml_u:5374: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tena me svātmajādhunā /
S01ratnml_u:5376: nānāsvastividhānair hi tasya rogo na śāmyati /
S01ratnml_u:5377: bhiṣajāṃ kṛtayatnāni na siddhyanti kathaṃ cana // Rm_13.114{114} //
S01ratnml_u:5378: anekā devatāś cāpi prābhyarcya prārthito mayā /
S01ratnml_u:5379: tathāpi śāmyate naiva tasya rogo vivarddhitaḥ // Rm_13.115{115} //
S01ratnml_u:5381: tathā tathā na tadrogaḥ praśāmyati pravarddhyate // Rm_13.116{116} //
S01ratnml_u:5382: kim upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi kena śāmyeta tadgadaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5383: tad upāyaṃ pradātavyaṃ yenāśu śāmyate kramāt // Rm_13.117{117} //
S01ratnml_u:5384: iti vijñāpanāṃ kartuṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:5385: tan me 'nukampayāsu no rogaśāntir vidhīyatāṃ // Rm_13.118{118} //
S01ratnml_u:5387: tan me sukṛpayā dṛṣṭyā paritrātuṃ samarhata // Rm_13.119{119} //
S01ratnml_u:5388: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te tīrthikā api /
S01ratnml_u:5389: śreṣṭhinaṃ taṃ samāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samabruvan // Rm_13.120{120} //
S01ratnml_u:5390: śṛṇu sādho yad asmābhir hitārthaṃ te pracakṣyatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5391: tat satyaṃ naḥ parijñāya pramāṇīkriyatāṃ kila // Rm_13.121{121} //
S01ratnml_u:5393: tasmād atra viṣādatvaṃ mā kṛthā dhairyam āśraya // Rm_13.122{122} //
S01ratnml_u:5394: adyaiva sahasā gatvā vayaṃ dṛṣṭvā tavātmajaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5395: niḥpāpaṃ nīrujaṃ svāsthyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ sujīvitaṃ // Rm_13.123{123} //
S01ratnml_u:5396: apy etad vacanaṃ satyaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā pramāṇaya /
S01ratnml_u:5398: anyathā na bhavet kvāpi hy asmākaṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ // Rm_13.124{124} //
S01ratnml_u:5399: iti tais tīrthikaiḥ proktaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasattamaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5400: tatheti pratiharṣitvā natvā tān svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_13.125{125} //
S01ratnml_u:5401: tatra sa gṛha āsādya dāsidāsajanaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:5403: tasminn eva kṣaṇe tatra sarve te tīrthikā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5405: tathā tān samupāsīnān dṛṣṭvā śreṣṭhī sa moditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5407: tataś ca bhojanānte sa vaḍikaṃ taṃ priyātmajaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5409: te sarve tīrthikā dṛṣṭvā vaḍikaṃ taṃ rujānvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5412: tatpātakavimuktyai tu dātavyaṃ dānam ādarāt // Rm_13.131{131} //
S01ratnml_u:5415: yady etad dīyate dānaṃ tvayā gṛhapate tathā /
S01ratnml_u:5420: tataḥ sarve 'pi rogāś ca vinakṣyanti kramād drutaṃ // Rm_13.135{135} //
S01ratnml_u:5421: tato rogair vimukto 'yaṃ kuśalī svāsthyam āpnuyāt /
S01ratnml_u:5422: tataḥ puṣṭo viśuddhāṅgaḥ suśīlaḥ sukṛtī sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5424: iti matvā tvayā sādho dātavyaṃ dānam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:5425: anyathā na bhavet svasti tavāsya naṃdanasya ca // Rm_13.137{167} //
S01ratnml_u:5426: iti tair gaditaṃ śrutvā sa śreṣṭhī paribodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5427: tasyātmajasya trāṇārthaṃ tathā dātum udācarat // Rm_13.138{[138]} //
S01ratnml_u:5428: tataḥ sa punar abhyarcya tān sarvāns tīrthikān patīn /
S01ratnml_u:5430: tatas te tīrthikāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā tāni pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5431: sarvāny api pratigṛhya tathāśīrvacanaṃ daduḥ // Rm_13.140{140} //
S01ratnml_u:5432: svasty astu te sadā sādho kalyāṇam astu sarvathā /
S01ratnml_u:5434: nīrogī suciraṃ jīvyā jayo 'stu te samantataḥ // Rm_13.141{141} //
S01ratnml_u:5435: etad eva samādiśya sarve te tīrthikās tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5436: tāni sarvāṇi vastūni pratigṛhyāśramaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_13.142{142} //
S01ratnml_u:5437: tathāpi tasya rogā na śamitā varddhitāḥ kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:5439: tatas taj janako dṛṣṭvā svātmajaṃ taṃ rujāturaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5440: nirāśāmūrchito bhūmau nipataṃ vyalapat tathā // Rm_13.144{144} //
S01ratnml_u:5441: hā daiva kiṃ mayā pāpaṃ dāruṇaṃ prakṛtaṃ purā /
S01ratnml_u:5442: yato 'yaṃ svātmajaḥ putraḥ puro me maraṇaṃ vrajet // Rm_13.145{145} //
S01ratnml_u:5444: sarvāṇy etāni matpāpair nisphalāni bhavanti hi // Rm_13.146{146} //
S01ratnml_u:5445: kiṃ mayātrāpi karttavyaṃ ko 'tra me hitam ādiśet /
S01ratnml_u:5446: sarvathāhaṃ vinaṣṭo 'smi ko 'pi trātā na vidyate // Rm_13.147{147} //
S01ratnml_u:5447: kasyātra śaraṇaṃ yāsye ko no rakṣed dayādṛśā /
S01ratnml_u:5448: sarve vayaṃ vinaṣṭāsma hā daiva śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_13.148{148} //
S01ratnml_u:5449: ity evaṃ vilapaṃtaṃ taṃ janakaṃ vaḍiko 'pi saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5450: dṛṣṭvā śanaiḥ samāhūya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_13.149{149} //
S01ratnml_u:5451: bho tāta kiṃ tvayātrāpi karttavyaṃ hi mayāpi ca /
S01ratnml_u:5452: sarveṣām api jantūnāṃ daivagatiḥ pramāṇikā // Rm_13.150{150} //
S01ratnml_u:5453: iti matvā viṣādatvaṃ hṛdaye mā kṛthās tyaja /
S01ratnml_u:5454: saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityam anusmaran // Rm_13.151{151} //
S01ratnml_u:5457: tad evaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā saddharmaṃ samupāśrayan /
S01ratnml_u:5458: saṃghānāṃ bhajanaṃ kṛtvā cinu puṇyaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.153{153} //
S01ratnml_u:5459: triratne sādhitaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇuyāt kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:5460: yadi daivād vipattiḥ syāt puṇyaṃ tu labhate varaṃ // Rm_13.154{154} //
S01ratnml_u:5461: puṇyena rakṣyate lokaḥ puṇyena sadgatiṃ vrajet /
S01ratnml_u:5462: tasmāt puṇyaṃ mahāratnaṃ cinu dhairyaṃ samāśrayan // Rm_13.155{155} //
S01ratnml_u:5464: iti matvāpi taṃ buddhaṃ smṛtvā bhaja samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.156{156} //
S01ratnml_u:5465: tathāhaṃ vā tam evātra saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajan /
S01ratnml_u:5466: saṃsmṛtvā bhajanaṃ kurvan vrajeya maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_13.157{157} //
S01ratnml_u:5467: yadi tasya jinendrasya kṛpāsti mayi pāpini /
S01ratnml_u:5471: sarvathā durgatiṃ tyaktvā sadgatiṃ punar āpnuyāṃ // Rm_13.159{159} //
S01ratnml_u:5472: evaṃ jñātvā tvayā tāta mā kriyatāṃ viṣādatā /
S01ratnml_u:5473: saṃsāre 'vaśyaṃ marttavyaṃ sarveṣām api janmināṃ // Rm_13.160{160} //
S01ratnml_u:5474: ity uktvā sa rujārtto 'pi vaḍiko dhairyyam āśrayan /
S01ratnml_u:5475: saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā smṛtvā tasthau samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.161{161} //
S01ratnml_u:5476: tathā sa gṛhabhṛc chreṣṭhī śrutvaitad ātmajoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5477: satyam etat parijñāya buddhaṃ smṛtvā tathāvadat // Rm_13.162{162} //
S01ratnml_u:5478: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāya ca sadā smare /
S01ratnml_u:5479: adyārabhya sadā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_13.163{163} //
S01ratnml_u:5480: yadi vo 'sti kṛpā loke rakṣantu naḥ suduḥkhinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5481: sarvathā kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā dṛṣṭvāśu trātum arhati // Rm_13.164{164} //
S01ratnml_u:5483: tathāsmān kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā trātum arhati sarvathā // Rm_13.165{165} //
S01ratnml_u:5485: kṛpayānugrahaṃ kṛtvā putraratnaṃ prayaccha me // Rm_13.166{166} //
S01ratnml_u:5487: bhavatāṃ śaraṇe sthitvā caratu vratam ādarāt // Rm_13.167{167} //
S01ratnml_u:5488: ity evaṃ smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ vrajan /
S01ratnml_u:5489: sa śreṣṭhī taṃ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasthau mohavinoditaḥ // Rm_13.168{168} //
S01ratnml_u:5490: tasminn eva kṣaṇe lokāṃ trātuṃ sa bhagavān muniḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5491: saṃpaśyan kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā prādrākṣīt tān saduḥkhinaḥ // Rm_13.169{169} //
S01ratnml_u:5492: tathā tān duḥkhino dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa jineśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5493: sahasā tān paritrātuṃ buddharasmiṃ vyamuñcata // Rm_13.170{170} //
S01ratnml_u:5495: samantāt samatikramya tad gṛham avabhāsitaṃ // Rm_13.171{171} //
S01ratnml_u:5496: tato maitryaṃśavaś cāpi tena bhagavatā punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5497: samutṣṛṣṭās tanau tasya paryaspṛśan prasāditāḥ // Rm_13.172{172} //
S01ratnml_u:5498: tatas tasya tanus taiḥ saṃspṛṣṭamātre samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5500: tataḥ sa vaḍikaḥ svāsthyaṃ prāpya nirmalamānasaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5501: vismitaḥ pitaraṃ paśyan samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_13.174{174} //
S01ratnml_u:5503: aho saṃghaprabhāvatvaṃ paśya tāta muneḥ prabhāṃ // Rm_13.175{175} //
S01ratnml_u:5506: dhanyo 'yaṃ bhagavān buddho jayatv evaṃ sadā sthitaḥ // Rm_13.176{176} //
S01ratnml_u:5508: pāpaiś cāpi vimukto 'ham iti satyaṃ pramanyate // Rm_13.177{177} //
S01ratnml_u:5509: tasmāt tam eva śāstāraṃ saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:5511: evaṃ buddhaguṇān smṛtvā vaḍikaḥ sa pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5512: kṛtāñjaliḥ smaran bhūyaḥ praṇatvaivam ayācata // Rm_13.179{179} //
S01ratnml_u:5513: namas te bhagavan nātha bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:5514: yāvadbhavaṃ triratnānāṃ bhaveyaṃ sevakaḥ sadā // Rm_13.180{180} //
S01ratnml_u:5515: ity evaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā vaḍikaḥ so 'bhibodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5516: bhūyo bhūyaḥ smaran natvā tasthau svāsthyatvam āgataḥ // Rm_13.181{181} //
S01ratnml_u:5517: tadā sa bhagavān buddho dṛṣṭvā taṃ śuddhamānasaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5518: saddharmaṃ samupādeṣṭuṃ tad dvāre samupāsarat // Rm_13.182{182} //
S01ratnml_u:5520: dṛṣṭvaiva vismito dvāsthaḥ sahasā gṛham āviśat // Rm_13.183{183} //
S01ratnml_u:5521: tatra gṛhapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā vaḍikaṃ taṃ ca sādaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5524: tad atra sahasopetya samāmaṃtrya praveśaya // Rm_13.185{185} //
S01ratnml_u:5525: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā vaḍikaḥ sa prasāditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5526: utthitaḥ sahasopetya taṃ munīndraṃ mudānamat // Rm_13.186{186} //
S01ratnml_u:5527: natvā taṃ sugataṃ gehe prajñapya svāsanaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5529: svāgataṃ bhagavan vāṃche bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ mune /
S01ratnml_u:5531: iti tenodite buddho bhagavān sa samāviśan /
S01ratnml_u:5532: svāsane samupāsīno vaḍikaṃ taṃ tathāvadat // Rm_13.189{1691} //
S01ratnml_u:5533: kiṃ te vaḍika duḥkhatvaṃ vādhakaś ca kathaṃ vada /
S01ratnml_u:5534: iti bhagavatā pṛṣṭo vaḍikaḥ sa tathāvadat // Rm_13.190{190} //
S01ratnml_u:5535: kāyikaṃ jāyate duḥkhaṃ cetasikaṃ ca me mune /
S01ratnml_u:5536: tad bhavān kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā śamayet tat prabādhanaṃ // Rm_13.191{191} //
S01ratnml_u:5537: iti tad vijñāpitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5541: anena te manodāhaṃ praśāmyeta sadāpi hi // Rm_13.193{193} //
S01ratnml_u:5542: ity ādiśya munīndraḥ sa punar evaṃ vyaciṃtayat /
S01ratnml_u:5545: ādāya kṣīrikāṃ nāma mahauṣadhīm upānayat // Rm_13.195{195} //
S01ratnml_u:5546: tatra so surarājas taṃ bhagavantaṃ praṇamya tāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5547: mahauṣadhīm upasthāpya pura evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_13.196{196} //
S01ratnml_u:5550: ity ukte tena śakreṇa dṛṣṭvā tāṃ bhagavān muniḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5551: gṛhītvā vaḍikāyaivaṃ pradatvā caivam ādiśat // Rm_13.198{198} //
S01ratnml_u:5553: anayā te śarīre saṃskriyatām upacāraṇaiḥ // Rm_13.199{199} //
S01ratnml_u:5555: tatheti tāṃ samādāya yathādiṣṭam upācarat // Rm_13.200{200} //
S01ratnml_u:5556: tatas tasya tanū rogair vimuktā paripuṣṭitā /
S01ratnml_u:5558: tataḥ śāstrā yathādiṣṭaṃ vaḍikena tathā hṛdi /
S01ratnml_u:5559: maitrī prabhāvitā loke svātmaje supriye yathā // Rm_13.202{202} //
S01ratnml_u:5560: tadā tasya mahadduḥkhaṃ cetasikaṃ śaśāma tat /
S01ratnml_u:5562: tataḥ sa vaḍikaḥ svasthaḥ pariśuddhendriyaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5563: bhagavantaṃ tam ānamya prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.204{104} //
S01ratnml_u:5564: vande 'haṃ bhavatāṃ pādau sarvadā śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:5565: tathā ca sarvadā nātha kṛpayā trātum arhati // Rm_13.205{105} //
S01ratnml_u:5566: yady evaṃ bhavatāṃ śāstaḥ kṛpādṛṣṭir na vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:5567: mṛto 'haṃ narake 'dyāpi gato duḥkhāny avāpnuyāṃ // Rm_13.206{106} //
S01ratnml_u:5568: yad evaṃ svasthito jīve tat te kṛpāmbubhāvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5569: tathā me 'nugrahaṃ kartuṃ nityam arhati sarvadā // Rm_13.207{107} //
S01ratnml_u:5570: ity evaṃ prārthanāṃ kṛtvā bhūyaḥ sa vaḍiko mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5571: sāñjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā paśyaṃs tasthau munīśvaraṃ // Rm_13.208{108} //
S01ratnml_u:5573: triratne śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃbuddhaṃ taṃ samarcayat // Rm_13.209{109} //
S01ratnml_u:5575: tataḥ sa gṛhabhṛc chreṣṭhī dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5576: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.210{210} //
S01ratnml_u:5577: vande te caraṇau śāstaḥ sarvadā śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:5578: evaṃ no 'nugrahaṃ kartuṃm arhati kṛpayā sadā // Rm_13.211{211} //
S01ratnml_u:5579: tataḥ sa bhagavān buddhas tathāstv iti samādiśat /
S01ratnml_u:5580: ṛddhyākāśaṃ samutplutya svam āśramam upāyayau // Rm_13.212{212} //
S01ratnml_u:5581: tatra sa bhagavān prāptaḥ sabhāmadhye samāśritaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5582: etad vṛṣṭi samākhyāya tasthau dharmaṃ samādiśat // Rm_13.213{213} //
S01ratnml_u:5583: tadā sa vaḍiko bhūyo buddhaguṇān anusmaran /
S01ratnml_u:5584: sa saṃghaṃ sugataṃ bhojyaiḥ pūjayituṃ samaichata // Rm_13.214{214} //
S01ratnml_u:5585: tadā sa nṛpate rājñaḥ prasenajita ānataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5586: etat sarvaṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ nivedyaivam abhāṣata // Rm_13.215{215} //
S01ratnml_u:5588: tat triratnakṛpādṛṣṭer jīve rogair vimocitaḥ // Rm_13.216{216} //
S01ratnml_u:5589: tan mayā sa munīndro 'pi sarvasaṃghaiḥ sahādhunā /
S01ratnml_u:5590: samāmaṃtrya gṛhe bhojyaiḥ pūjayituṃ samicchyate // Rm_13.217{217} //
S01ratnml_u:5594: vaḍikaṃ taiḥ samālokya praśaṃsyaiva samādiśat // Rm_13.219{219} //
S01ratnml_u:5595: vaḍika tvaṃ mahāsādhus tad buddhaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5596: tathānuśraddhayā nityaṃ bhaja ratnatrayaṃ sadā // Rm_13.220{220} //
S01ratnml_u:5597: iti rājñābhyanujñātaṃ śrutvā sa vaḍiko mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5598: nṛpatiṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ svagṛhaṃ samupāyayau // Rm_13.221{221} //
S01ratnml_u:5600: śāstu nimaṃtraṇāṃ kartuṃ vihāre samudācaran // Rm_13.222{222} //
S01ratnml_u:5601: tatra sa samupāviṣṭo dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5602: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.223{223} //
S01ratnml_u:5604: tathāpy atra bhavadagre prārthaye 'nugrahaṃ kuru // Rm_13.224{224} //
S01ratnml_u:5605: yad ahaṃ roganirmuktaḥ puna janma ivāptavān /
S01ratnml_u:5606: tad bhavatāṃ kṛpādṛṣṭeḥ prasādād itin manyate // Rm_13.225{225} //
S01ratnml_u:5607: tad ahaṃ bhavatāṃ sarvasaṃghānāṃ bhojanair gṛhe /
S01ratnml_u:5608: pūjayituṃ samiche tad anugrahītum arhati // Rm_13.226{226} //
S01ratnml_u:5610: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā sa bhagavān muniḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5613: mudā tasya muneḥ pādau natvāśu svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_13.228{228} //
S01ratnml_u:5614: tatra sa sahasā gehe vandhumitrajanaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:5617: prajñapya śuddhite bhūmau maṃdayitvā samantataḥ // Rm_13.230{230} //
S01ratnml_u:5618: tatas taṃ śrīghanaṃ buddhaṃ sasaṃghaṃ svajanaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:5619: āmaṃtrituṃ vihāre sa sahasā samupācarat // Rm_13.231{231} //
S01ratnml_u:5620: tatra sa samupāviṣṭo dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5621: sasaṃghaṃ sāṃjalir natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.232{232} //
S01ratnml_u:5623: tad bhavāṃ sāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ vijayituṃ samarhati // Rm_13.233{233} //
S01ratnml_u:5624: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā tatheti sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5626: tatra mārgeṣu sarvatra nagare ca samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5627: prakāśayan prātihāryaṃ tad gṛhaṃ samupāviśat // Rm_13.235{235} //
S01ratnml_u:5628: tatra gṛhe samāsādya pādārghaṃ pratigṛhya saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5629: svāsane samupāviśya kramāt tasthau sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_13.236{236} //
S01ratnml_u:5630: tadā sa vaḍiko dṛṣṭvā taṃ buddhaṃ svāsane sthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5632: tataś ca surasair bhojyaiḥ supraṇītaiḥ suhādhitaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5634: tataś ca bhojanānte sa pātrādīny apanīya ca /
S01ratnml_u:5635: mukhādīṃ śodhayitvā ca pūgauṣadhīn praḍhaukayat // Rm_13.239{269} //
S01ratnml_u:5636: tataḥ sa prāñjalir natvā sasaṃghaṃ sugataṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5637: purastho manasā hy evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ vyadhāt smaran // Rm_13.240{270} //
S01ratnml_u:5639: yathāyaṃ bhagavān buddhas tathā bhūyāsam ātmavit // Rm_13.241{271} //
S01ratnml_u:5645: ity evaṃ manasā tena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5646: matvā sa bhagavān buddho smitaṃ prāvirvyadhān mudā // Rm_13.244{274} //
S01ratnml_u:5647: tadā tasya munīndrasya mukhāt paṃca surasmayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5648: nisṛtya triṣu lokeṣu bhāsayantaḥ samāsaran // Rm_13.245{275} //
S01ratnml_u:5649: yāpi kāś cid adholoke prasṛtā narakeṣu tāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5651: tadā tābhiḥ parispṛṣṭāḥ sarve nairayikā janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5652: mahatsaukhyaṃ samāsādya vismitāś caivam ālapat // Rm_13.247{277} //
S01ratnml_u:5653: aho saukhyaṃ kathaṃ hy evam anyatra kiṃ gatā vayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5654: kasya puṇyānubhāvena kvāsmākaṃ jāyate sukhaṃ // Rm_13.248{278} //
S01ratnml_u:5656: bhagavān nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ saṃpreṣya samadarśayat // Rm_13.249{279} //
S01ratnml_u:5657: tatra taṃ nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5658: vismitāḥ sahasaṃmīlya punar evaṃ vabhāṣire // Rm_13.250{280} //
S01ratnml_u:5660: nūnam asyānubhāvena saukhyaṃ no jāyate khalu // Rm_13.251{281} //
S01ratnml_u:5661: iti saṃbhāṣya te sarve tasmin buddhe prasāditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5662: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāya ceti prāvadan // Rm_13.252{282} //
S01ratnml_u:5665: evaṃ tā raśmayaḥ sarvā avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5666: sarvasatvān samuddhṛtya muneḥ pratyāyayuḥ punaḥ // Rm_13.254{284} //
S01ratnml_u:5667: tathā yā raśmayaḥ kāścid upariṣṭāt prasāritāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5668: tāḥ sarvān devalokānāṃ avabhāsya samantataḥ // Rm_13.255{285} //
S01ratnml_u:5670: evaṃ cāpi mahāśabdam udghuṣya samudācaran // Rm_13.256{286} //
S01ratnml_u:5671: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmakaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5672: tad bhave sadgatiṃ hitvā saddharmaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_13.257{287} //
S01ratnml_u:5674: dhunīta mṛtyusainyaṃ ca naḍāgāram iva dvipaḥ // Rm_13.258{288} //
S01ratnml_u:5675: yo 'py asmin dharmavaineye hy apramattaś caret sadā /
S01ratnml_u:5677: sa hitvā jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_13.259{289} //
S01ratnml_u:5678: ity evaṃ tan mahāśabdaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te surāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5680: tathā tā arciṣaḥ sarvā avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5681: punaḥ pratyāgatās tasya muner antikam āyayuḥ // Rm_13.261{291} //
S01ratnml_u:5682: tatas tā arciṣaḥ sarvāḥ saṃmīlya samupāsthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5683: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ traidham uṣṇīṣe 'ntardadhau muneḥ // Rm_13.262{292} //
S01ratnml_u:5687: vinisṛtā diśaḥ sarvā bhāṣayanti samantataḥ // Rm_13.264{294} //
S01ratnml_u:5688: nākāraṇaṃ jinā buddhā darśayanti smitaṃ kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:5689: bhavatsmitaṃ samālokya sarve bhavanti vismitāḥ // Rm_13.265{295} //
S01ratnml_u:5691: tad eṣāṃ saṃśayaṃ chetuṃ taddhetu samupādiśa // Rm_13.266{296} //
S01ratnml_u:5692: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5693: tāṃ ca sarvāṃ sabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathānandam abhāṣata // Rm_13.267{297} //
S01ratnml_u:5695: saṃgheṣu śraddhayā bhaktyā satkṛtya bhajanaṃ kṛtaṃ // Rm_13.268{298} //
S01ratnml_u:5697: kramād bodhicarīḥ pūrya daśabhūmīśvaro bhavan // Rm_13.269{299} //
S01ratnml_u:5701: praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tena saṃbuddho 'yaṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_13.271{301} //
S01ratnml_u:5703: satkṛtya samupāśritya bhaja nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.272{302} //
S01ratnml_u:5704: ye satvāḥ śraddhayā smṛtvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5705: durgatiṃ te na gachanti bhavanti bodhibhāginaḥ // Rm_13.273{303} //
S01ratnml_u:5706: evaṃ matvā triratnānāṃ satkṛtya śraddhayā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5707: saṃsmṛtya śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhaktavyaṃ bodhivāṃchibhiḥ // Rm_13.274{304} //
S01ratnml_u:5708: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvānaṃdaḥ sa moditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5709: sāṃghikaṃ saha lokaiś ca tatheti prābhyanaṃdata // Rm_13.275{305} //
S01ratnml_u:5710: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasmai vaḍikāya subhāgine /
S01ratnml_u:5711: datvāśīrvacanaṃ bhūyaḥ samāmaṃtrya tam abravīt // Rm_13.276{306} //
S01ratnml_u:5713: vaḍika tvaṃ mahābhāga triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5714: bodhicaryyāṃ caran nityaṃ saṃbodhiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_13.277{307} //
S01ratnml_u:5716: tathā ratnatrayaṃ smṛtvā bhaja nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.278{308} //
S01ratnml_u:5717: ity ādiśya munīndraḥ sa saṃghaiḥ sārddhaṃ samutthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5718: vaḍikaṃ taṃ samāmaṃtrya svavihāraṃ yayau tathā // Rm_13.279{309} //
S01ratnml_u:5719: tathā sa vaḍiko nityaṃ triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5720: sadā lokahitaṃ kṛtvā bodhicaryāṃ samācarat // Rm_13.280{310} //
S01ratnml_u:5721: etan me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā narādhipa /
S01ratnml_u:5722: tathā te kathyate rājaṃ śrutvā caivaṃ prakāśaya // Rm_13.281{311} //
S01ratnml_u:5725: tathā te sarvadā nityaṃ sarvatra maṃgalaṃ bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:5726: kramād bodhicarīṃ pūrya saṃbodhim api cāpnuyāḥ // Rm_13.283{313} //
S01ratnml_u:5727: iti matvā mahārāja prajāś cāpi prabodhayan /
S01ratnml_u:5728: saddharme saṃpratisthāpya sarvathā trātum arhasi // Rm_13.284{314} //
S01ratnml_u:5730: rājā tatheti vijñapya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_13.285{315} //
S01ratnml_u:5731: śrutvāvadānaṃ vaḍikasya sādhor idaṃ narā ye 'bhyanumodayanti /
S01ratnml_u:5732: sarve 'pi te lokahitānuraktā bhavanti bodhiguṇalābhikā hi // Rm_13.286{316} //
S01ratnml_u:5737: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_14.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:5738: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5739: tad yathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_14.2{2} //
S01ratnml_u:5740: iti tena narendreṇa prārthitaṃ sa jinātmajaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5741: śrutvā taṃ nṛpatiṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_14.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:5742: śṛṇu rājan mayākhyātaṃ yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5743: tathā śrūtvānumoditvā śubhe caritum arhasi // Rm_14.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:5744: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śrāvastyāṃ bahir āśrame /
S01ratnml_u:5746: bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ cailakair vratibhis tathā /
S01ratnml_u:5747: bhikṣuṇībhis tathānyaiś cā mahāsātvair upāsakaiḥ // Rm_14.6{6} //
S01ratnml_u:5751: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve satvā upagatāḥ // Rm_14.8{8} //
S01ratnml_u:5755: garuḍāḥ kinnarendrāś ca tathānye 'pi samāgatāḥ // Rm_14.10{10} //
S01ratnml_u:5757: yatayo yogino vijñās tathānye tīrthikā api // Rm_14.11{11} //
S01ratnml_u:5759: amātyā maṃtriṇaś cāpi vaiśyāś cāpi prajādhipāḥ // Rm_14.12{12} //
S01ratnml_u:5761: paurā jānapadā grāmyās tathā kārpaṭikā api // Rm_14.13{13} //
S01ratnml_u:5762: evaṃ anye 'pi satvāś ca sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5763: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tad vihāre upāviśat // Rm_14.14{14} //
S01ratnml_u:5764: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā samabhyarcya praṇamya ca /
S01ratnml_u:5766: taṃ muṇīndraṃ samālokya śrotuṃ tad dharmadeśanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5768: tathā tān samupāsīnān dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavāñ jinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5770: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve satvāḥ pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5774: śrāvastyāṃ puri jātāni samadāni pracerire // Rm_14.19{19} //
S01ratnml_u:5775: tadā tāṃ samadān dṛṣṭvā gaṃdharvādhipateḥ sutaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5776: supriyo nāma tan mādam īrṣyayā hantum udyayau // Rm_14.20{20} //
S01ratnml_u:5780: samudghoṣayamānaḥ ca svamatiṃ darśayan yayau // Rm_14.22{22} //
S01ratnml_u:5782: samudghoṣayamānaś ca śrāvastīṃ sa upāviśat // Rm_14.23{23} //
S01ratnml_u:5783: tatra taṃ samupāviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi paurikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5784: śrutvā tad adbhutaṃ nādaṃ vismitāḥ samupācaran // Rm_14.24{24} //
S01ratnml_u:5786: śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca sarvāṇi vismayaṃ samupāyayuḥ // Rm_14.25{25} //
S01ratnml_u:5787: tada tāni ca sarvāṇi dṛṣṭvā paṃcaśatāny api /
S01ratnml_u:5789: tataḥ sarve 'pi te tena sahavāde bhayānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5790: nṛpater antikaṃ gatvā tat pravṛttiṃ nyavedayan // Rm_14.27{27} //
S01ratnml_u:5791: jaya prabho vijānīyād yad vayaṃ samupāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5792: tad atra no bhayatrastāṃ trātum arhati sarvathā // Rm_14.28{28} //
S01ratnml_u:5794: nūnaṃ no madaghātāya vijetuṃ samupāgataḥ // Rm_14.29{29} //
S01ratnml_u:5796: kriyatāṃ sahasāsmākam iti vijñāpanāṃ śṛṇu // Rm_14.30{30} //
S01ratnml_u:5797: iti vijñāpitaṃ sarvais taiḥ śrutvā sa narādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5798: sarvāns tān samupāmaṃtrya pura evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_14.31{31} //
S01ratnml_u:5800: bhaviṣyāmo 'tra kālajñāś caratu sa yathechayā // Rm_14.32{32} //
S01ratnml_u:5802: tad vivādabhayātaṃkaṃ tyaktvā sarve prasedire // Rm_14.33{33} //
S01ratnml_u:5803: tadā sa supriyas tatra dṛṣṭvā tān abhimānikān /
S01ratnml_u:5806: tad anena sahātrāhaṃ vādaṃ kuryāṃ sabhāśraye // Rm_14.35{35} //
S01ratnml_u:5807: ity evaṃ niścayaṃ kṛtvā supriyaḥ so 'bhimānikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5808: nṛpatiṃ tam upālabdhuṃ tat sabhāṃ samupācarat // Rm_14.36{36} //
S01ratnml_u:5809: tatra sa nṛpatir dṛṣṭvā supriyaṃ tam upāgataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5811: svāgataṃ te bhavann atra tiṣṭhāsane prasīda me /
S01ratnml_u:5812: kim arthe 'tra samāyāsi tad ādeṣṭuṃ hi me 'rhasi // Rm_14.38{38} //
S01ratnml_u:5814: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā supriyaḥ sa sabhāsthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5815: nṛpatiṃ taṃ samālokya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_14.39{39} //
S01ratnml_u:5816: śṛṇu rājan mayākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ yat te yaśo mahat /
S01ratnml_u:5817: tad guṇān bhavato draṣṭum ihāhaṃ samupācare // Rm_14.40{40} //
S01ratnml_u:5818: tan me darśaya rājendra gāndharvaguṇām ātmanaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5819: kas te sāstā gurur vāsti taṃ cāpi me pradarśaya // Rm_14.41{41} //
S01ratnml_u:5820: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa rājā pratibhāṇavān /
S01ratnml_u:5821: supriyaṃ taṃ samālokya tathety evam abhāṣata // Rm_14.42{42} //
S01ratnml_u:5822: sādhu paśya mahābhāga darśayisyāmi taṃ guruṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5823: yo me śāstā mahābhijñaḥ sarvavidyāguṇādhipaḥ // Rm_14.43{43} //
S01ratnml_u:5825: jetāraṇye mahodyāne nivaśati vṛṣaṃ diśan // Rm_14.44{44} //
S01ratnml_u:5826: sādhu paśya mahābhāga taṃ guruṃ me hitārthadaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5827: tad ehi saha yāsyāma śāstāraṃ darśayāmi taṃ // Rm_14.45{45} //
S01ratnml_u:5828: iti tena narendreṇa samākhyātaṃ sa supriyaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5829: śrutvā tatheti pramodya gantum abhāṣata // Rm_14.46{46} //
S01ratnml_u:5830: sādhu rājan samichāmi śāstāraṃ tat pradarśaya /
S01ratnml_u:5831: tena saha vivādāni kuryāṃ tatra nayāśu māṃ // Rm_14.47{47} //
S01ratnml_u:5832: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ sa tatheti hi /
S01ratnml_u:5833: supriyaṃ taṃ samādāya vihāre gantum aichata // Rm_14.48{48} //
S01ratnml_u:5835: taiś ca paṃcaśatair anyair gāndharvikaiḥ sahācarat // Rm_14.49{49} //
S01ratnml_u:5836: tasminn avasare buddho bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5837: loke satvān samuddhartuṃ kṛpayā samapaśyata // Rm_14.50{50} //
S01ratnml_u:5838: tadā tena nareśena sārddham evam upāgataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5839: supriyaṃ taṃ sa ālokya manasaiva vyacintayat // Rm_14.51{51} //
S01ratnml_u:5840: aho vata sudhīr yā sā gandharvādhipanandanaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5843: matvā pañcaśikhaḥ so 'pi tathāgantuṃ samaichata // Rm_14.53{53} //
S01ratnml_u:5846: tathā sa saṃkramaṃs tatra vihāre samupāviśan /
S01ratnml_u:5847: dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā tāṃ vīṇāṃ samupānayat // Rm_14.55{55} //
S01ratnml_u:5848: tataḥ sa sugataṃ bhaktyā samabhyarcya prasannadhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5849: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tat sabhāyām upāśrayat // Rm_14.56{56} //
S01ratnml_u:5850: tadā sa supriyo 'py enaṃ dṛṣṭvā mānābhigarvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5851: tāṃ vīṇāṃ kvanayann agre 'nuśrāvituṃ samārabhat // Rm_14.57{57} //
S01ratnml_u:5852: tatprakvāṇāt svarā sapta ekai viṃśati mūrchanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5854: tadā sarve 'pi te lokāḥ śrutvā tat prakvaṇān mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5855: nṛpatipramukhāś cāpi paraṃ vismayam āyajuḥ // Rm_14.59{59} //
S01ratnml_u:5857: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃś cāpi tasya mānābhighātane /
S01ratnml_u:5860: mūrchanāś ca tathā nānāvidhā niścāritās tathā // Rm_14.61{61} //
S01ratnml_u:5861: tataḥ śabdāt samuccerur gāthā evaṃ pracodināḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5862: tadyatheha bhave sarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ // Rm_14.62{62} //
S01ratnml_u:5863: idaṃ kāyaṃ ca vīṇāvad indriyāṇi svarānī ca /
S01ratnml_u:5864: mūrchanā iva cittāni jñātvā bodhau samācara // Rm_14.63{63} //
S01ratnml_u:5866: satyam etad iti jñātvā bodhicittaṃ pralehire // Rm_14.64{64} //
S01ratnml_u:5867: tadā sa supriyo 'py evaṃ śrutvā matvānumoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5869: tato niryātya vīṇāṃ sa gandhakuṭyāṃ virāgitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5871: tadā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā supriyaḥ so 'numoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5872: kṛtāñjaliḥ puraḥ sthitvā pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_14.67{67} //
S01ratnml_u:5873: vaṃde te caraṇau śāsta bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:5874: tan me 'trānugrahaṃ kṛtvā pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_14.68{68} //
S01ratnml_u:5875: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5876: dṛṣṭvā tad āśayaṃ śuddhaṃ gaṃdharvaṃ taṃ tathāvadat // Rm_14.69{69} //
S01ratnml_u:5878: pitror ājñāṃ samāsādya prehi dāsyāmi te vrataṃ // Rm_14.70{70} //
S01ratnml_u:5879: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa supriyo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5880: tatheti taṃ muniṃ natvā sahasarddhyā gṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_14.71{71} //
S01ratnml_u:5881: tatra sa sahasā prāpto natvā tau pitarau mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5882: sāñjaliḥ purataḥ sthitvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_14.72{72} //
S01ratnml_u:5883: śṛṇu me vāñchitaṃ tāta yadi te kṛpayā mayi /
S01ratnml_u:5884: tan mamānugrahaṃ kṛtvā saddharme māṃ niyojaya // Rm_14.73{73} //
S01ratnml_u:5885: ahaṃ hi saugataṃ dharmaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāñchāmi tad vrataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5886: tat pravrajyāṃ samāsādya prāptum ichāmi nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.74{74} //
S01ratnml_u:5887: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ tad atrāpi na me ratiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5888: avaśyaṃ hi bhaven mṛtyuḥ sarveṣāṃ prāṇinām api // Rm_14.75{75} //
S01ratnml_u:5889: evaṃ dṛṣṭvātra saṃsāre bhogyaṃ nechāmi niḥspṛhaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5890: tat pravrajyāvrataṃ dhṛtvā prāptum iche sunirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.76{76} //
S01ratnml_u:5891: api cāsau munīndro hi sadātraiva na tiṣṭhati /
S01ratnml_u:5892: buddhakāryaṃ samāpyaiva nirvṛtiṃ sarvathā vrajet // Rm_14.77{77} //
S01ratnml_u:5893: kiṃ cātra sarvadā naivam utpatsyate munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5894: kadā cid evam utpanno loke bodhiṃ samādiśet // Rm_14.78{78} //
S01ratnml_u:5895: tathā ca durlabhaṃ janma sadgatau ca kṣaṇaṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:5897: dharmaṃ vinātra saṃsāre kiṃ sāraṃ sukhino 'pi hi /
S01ratnml_u:5898: kṣaṇadhvansi śarīraṃ hi jīvitaṃ ca tṛṇāmbuvat // Rm_14.80{80} //
S01ratnml_u:5900: dharmeṇa sadgatiṃ yāyāt saṃbodhim api prāpnuyāt /
S01ratnml_u:5901: tat pravrajyācariṃ dhṛtvā prāptum iche 'tra nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.81{81} //
S01ratnml_u:5902: tad ātra yadi vāṃ tāta kṛpāsti svātmaje mayi /
S01ratnml_u:5903: sarvathānugrahaṃ kṛtvā tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_14.82{82} //
S01ratnml_u:5904: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa gandharvādhipaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5905: suciraṃ taṃ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā snehād evam abhaṣata // Rm_14.83{83} //
S01ratnml_u:5906: satyam evaṃ sutākhyātaṃ tathāpi me vacaḥ śṛṇu /
S01ratnml_u:5907: pravrajyā duṣkarīcaryyā tat kathaṃ tvaṃ samācareḥ // Rm_14.84{84} //
S01ratnml_u:5909: kāmabhogyasukhāraktas tat kathaṃ tad vrataṃ careḥ // Rm_14.85{85} //
S01ratnml_u:5911: sarvān parigrahāns tyaktvā sadaikāntī vane vase // Rm_14.86{86} //
S01ratnml_u:5913: bhuṃjīthās tat kathaṃ bhuktvā samādhiṃ saṃpradhāsyasi // Rm_14.87{87} //
S01ratnml_u:5915: sahasā mā kṛthāś cittaṃ nivāraya samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.88{88} //
S01ratnml_u:5917: vṛddhatve samupāśritya triratnaṃ tad vrataṃ cara // Rm_14.89{89} //
S01ratnml_u:5918: tat tvaṃ yāvad yuvā gehe saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yathepsitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5919: vṛddhatve tad vrataṃ dhṛtvā triratnāni sadā bhaja // Rm_14.90{90} //
S01ratnml_u:5920: tathā cet te bhavej janma sāphalyaṃ bhavacāraṇe /
S01ratnml_u:5921: sukhaṃ bhuktvā vrataṃ dhṛtvā nirvṛtiṃ vā samāpnuyāḥ // Rm_14.91{91} //
S01ratnml_u:5922: iti me vacanaṃ śrutvā matvaivaṃ tat prabodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5923: tāvad gṛhe sukhaṃ bhuktvā smṛtvā ratnatrayaṃ vasa // Rm_14.92{92} //
S01ratnml_u:5925: punas taṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhayann evam abravīt // Rm_14.93{93} //
S01ratnml_u:5926: satyam evaṃ bhave tāta tathāpi vakṣyate mayā /
S01ratnml_u:5927: tac chrutvāpi tvayā parijñāya vibudhyatāṃ // Rm_14.94{94} //
S01ratnml_u:5928: satkule durlabhaṃ janma tatrāpi durlabhaṃ kṣaṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5929: durlabhaṃ sugatotpādaṃ durlabhaṃ tadvrataṃ bhave // Rm_14.95{95} //
S01ratnml_u:5931: avaśyaṃ maraṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāptum iche 'tra nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.96{96} //
S01ratnml_u:5932: tad atra kṛpayā mahyam anujñāṃ dātum arhasi /
S01ratnml_u:5933: yūyaṃ cāpi hi tad dharmabhāṇaiḥ sadgatim āpsyatha // Rm_14.97{97} //
S01ratnml_u:5934: iti hetoḥ pita tatra vilambaṃma kṛthā ciraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5935: sahasānugrahaṃ kṛtvā tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_14.98{98} //
S01ratnml_u:5936: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa gaṃdharvādhipaś cirāt /
S01ratnml_u:5938: ayi supriya putra tvaṃ snehān mayā nivāryasa /
S01ratnml_u:5939: yady ativāṃchase prāptuṃ nirvṛtiṃ tan samācara // Rm_14.100{100} //
S01ratnml_u:5942: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā cara nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.101{1} //
S01ratnml_u:5944: pitroḥ pādān praṇatvaiva sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_14.102{2} //
S01ratnml_u:5945: tataḥ sa sahasā gatvā vihāraṃ samupācarat /
S01ratnml_u:5946: tatra prāpto munīndraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva samupāviśat // Rm_14.103{3} //
S01ratnml_u:5947: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ nātvā prāñjaliḥ pura āśrayan /
S01ratnml_u:5950: tathānujñāṃ pituḥ prāpya prāgatāham ihādhunā // Rm_14.105{5} //
S01ratnml_u:5951: tad atra bhavatāṃ śāstaḥ śaraṇaṃ samupāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5952: brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyāmi tat pravrajyāṃ pradehi me // Rm_14.106{6} //
S01ratnml_u:5953: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5954: dṛṣṭvā tasyāśayaṃ śuddhaṃ punar eva samādiśat // Rm_14.107{7} //
S01ratnml_u:5955: ehi supriya bhikṣo 'tra cara brahmacariṃ śivāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5956: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā samādhiṃ samupāśrayat // Rm_14.108{8} //
S01ratnml_u:5958: paṃcagaṃḍamayaṃ dehaṃ jīvitaṃ ca trināmvuvat // Rm_14.109{9} //
S01ratnml_u:5960: sarvakleśaripuñ jitvā sākṣād arhatpadaṃ yayau // Rm_14.110{10} //
S01ratnml_u:5961: tataḥ supriyo bhikṣuḥ prāptābhijñaḥ kṛtī sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5962: bhindan sarvam avidyāṅgaṃ nirvikalpo 'bhavad yatiḥ // Rm_14.111{11} //
S01ratnml_u:5968: vaṃdyaḥ pūjyo 'bhinaṃdyaś ca mānanīyo bhavan babhau // Rm_14.114{14} //
S01ratnml_u:5970: prālokya vismitāḥ sarve tatsabhāsthāḥ prasedire // Rm_14.115{15} //
S01ratnml_u:5971: tadā sarve 'pi te lokā devā daityāś ca kinnarāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5972: yakṣāḥ siddhāś ca gaṃdharvā nāgāś ca rākṣasā api // Rm_14.116{16} //
S01ratnml_u:5973: garuḍāś ca tathānye 'pi vidyādharāś ca sāpsarāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5974: sarve lokādhipāś cāpi triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_14.117{17} //
S01ratnml_u:5977: tad dṛṣṭvā tāni pañcāpi gāṃdharvikaśatāni ca /
S01ratnml_u:5979: ete sarve vayaṃ nīce karmaṇi parivarttikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5981: yad asmābhiḥ purā puṇyaṃ kiṃ cid vāpi na sādhitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5982: tenāsyātra vayaṃ sarve duḥkhino nīcavṛttayaḥ // Rm_14.121{21} //
S01ratnml_u:5983: tad asmābhir ayam śāstā munīśvaraḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:5984: satkṛtya bhojanair vāpi pūjanīyo yathāvidhiḥ // Rm_14.122{22} //
S01ratnml_u:5988: tataḥ krameṇa saṃprāpya bodhicaryyāṃ śubhāṃ carīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:5989: carantas tadvipākaiś ca nirvṛtiṃ saṃlabhemahi // Rm_14.124{24} //
S01ratnml_u:5990: iti matvā vayaṃ sarve vijñapya nṛpatiṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:5991: sasaṃghaṃ sugataṃ bhojyair arhāmahe samarcituṃ // Rm_14.125{25} //
S01ratnml_u:5993: nṛpater vijñāpanāṃ kartuṃ sahasā samupācaran // Rm_14.126{26} //
S01ratnml_u:5994: tatra te samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpatiṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:5995: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_14.127{27} //
S01ratnml_u:5996: jaya deva mahārāja lokān dharmeṇa pālaya /
S01ratnml_u:5997: kiñcid vijñāpanāṃ karttuṃ vayam upāgatāḥ // Rm_14.128{28} //
S01ratnml_u:5998: vijānīyād bhavān hy etat tathāpi prārthayāmahe /
S01ratnml_u:5999: śrutvā no 'nugrahaṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā tat prasīdatu // Rm_14.129{29} //
S01ratnml_u:6001: tat sasaṃghaṃ muniṃ bhojyaiḥ samichāmaḥ samarcituṃ // Rm_14.130{30} //
S01ratnml_u:6002: tad anujñāṃ pradatvā naḥ kṛpayoddhartum arhasi /
S01ratnml_u:6003: etad vijñāpanāṃ kurmas tat prasīda nṛpādhipa // Rm_14.131{31} //
S01ratnml_u:6004: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ so 'numoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6005: tān sarvān samupāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_14.132{32} //
S01ratnml_u:6007: tat tathā kriyatāṃ buddhe satkāraṃ śraddhayādarāt // Rm_14.133{33} //
S01ratnml_u:6008: saṃbuddhe yat kṛtaṃ karma tat phalaṃ kṣiṇuyān na hi /
S01ratnml_u:6009: kramād bodhicariṃ pūrya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpnuyāt // Rm_14.134{34} //
S01ratnml_u:6010: tad atra sarvathā yūyaṃ sasaṃghaṃ śrīghanaṃ muniṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6012: ity ādiṣṭam ḥ - ndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6013: tatheti pratinaṃditvā nṛpaṃ natvā tato 'caran // Rm_14.136{36} //
S01ratnml_u:6014: tatas te saṃmataṃ kṛtvā vihāre sahasā gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6015: dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_14.137{37} //
S01ratnml_u:6016: bhagavaṃs tad vijānīyād yad arthaṃ samupāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6019: pūjayituṃ samichāmo satkartuṃ bhojanair api // Rm_14.139{39} //
S01ratnml_u:6020: tad bhavāṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā kṛtvāsmākaṃ anugrahaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6021: pure śvaḥ sāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ vijayituṃ samarhasi // Rm_14.140{40} //
S01ratnml_u:6022: iti taiḥ prārthite sarvair bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6025: bhūyas taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā svaṃ puraṃ sahasā yayuḥ // Rm_14.142{42} //
S01ratnml_u:6026: tatra sarve 'pi te bhūmiṃ śodhayitvā samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6027: prajñapya svāsanāny evaṃ sāmagriṃ samasādhayan // Rm_14.143{43} //
S01ratnml_u:6031: tatra taṃ sugataṃ sarvaṃ saṃghaṃ cāmaṃtrituṃ yayuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6034: saṃbuddhapramukhaṃ saṃghaṃ prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_14.146{46} //
S01ratnml_u:6036: tad bhavān saṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ vijayituṃ samarhati // Rm_14.147{47} //
S01ratnml_u:6037: iti taiḥ prārthite dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6040: sarveṣāṃ śubhatāṃ kṛtvā tat pure samupāviśat // Rm_14.149{49} //
S01ratnml_u:6042: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kurvan tatpradeśe samācaran // Rm_14.150{50} //
S01ratnml_u:6043: tatra pādyārgham ādāya krameṇa saha sāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6044: svāsane samupāviśya tasthau bhānur ivojvalan // Rm_14.151{51} //
S01ratnml_u:6045: tadā taṃ śrīghanaṃ sarvasaṃghaṃ ca svāsane sthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6046: dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te harṣāt pūjayituṃ samārabhan // Rm_14.152{52} //
S01ratnml_u:6047: tathā krameṇa saṃpūjya taṃ buddhapramukhaṃ gaṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6049: tatas te bhojanāṃte tatpātrāṇi vyapanīya ca /
S01ratnml_u:6050: karādīñ chodhayitvā tad bhūmiṃ ca paryaśodhayan // Rm_14.154{54} //
S01ratnml_u:6051: tataḥ pūgādikaṃ datvā punaḥ sarve 'pi te mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6053: te ca gāṃdharvikāḥ sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6056: upasthitya sasaṃghaṃ taṃ śrīghanaṃ samatoṣayat // Rm_14.157{57} //
S01ratnml_u:6057: tada sa bhagavāṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ bhaktiprasādinīṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6058: sarveṣāṃ śuddhacittāni vyamuñcat smitam uddhavāt // Rm_14.158{58} //
S01ratnml_u:6060: sarvatra bhuvane gatvā pracerur amṛtāṃśuvat // Rm_14.159{59} //
S01ratnml_u:6061: teṣāṃ ke cid adhogatvā narakeṣu samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6062: avabhāsya parispṛṣṭvā sarvatrāpi sukhaṃ daduḥ // Rm_14.160{60} //
S01ratnml_u:6063: tadā te nārakīyās tat prabhāspṛṣṭāḥ sukhānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6064: kim etad iti saṃdigdhāḥ saṃmīlyaivaṃ vabhāṣire // Rm_14.161{61} //
S01ratnml_u:6065: aho nu jāyate saukhyam asmākaṃ sāṃprataṃ kathaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6066: vatānyatra gatāḥ smo 'dya kasya puṇyānubhāvataḥ // Rm_14.162{62} //
S01ratnml_u:6068: bhagavān nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ saṃpreṣayan samaṃtataḥ // Rm_14.163{63} //
S01ratnml_u:6069: tatrā taṃ saugataṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te narakasthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6072: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāya ca namas sadā /
S01ratnml_u:6073: iti proktvā praṇatvā taccharaṇaṃ samupāyayuḥ // Rm_14.165{65} //
S01ratnml_u:6075: sahasā svargatiṃ yātāḥ saddharme samudācaran // Rm_14.166{66} //
S01ratnml_u:6076: evaṃ tān sarvasatvāṃś ca samuddhṛtya samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6077: sarve te 'py aṃśavo bhūyas saṃbuddhāntikam upācaran // Rm_14.167{67} //
S01ratnml_u:6078: ke cid ūrddhvagatā yāvad akaniṣṭhaṃ samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6080: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ śūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6081: iti satyaṃ parijñāya triratnaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_14.169{69} //
S01ratnml_u:6083: dhunīta mārasainyāś ca naḍāgāraṃ yathā karī // Rm_14.170{70} //
S01ratnml_u:6084: yo 'py asmin saugate dharme hy apramattaś caret sadā /
S01ratnml_u:6085: sa tyaktvā janma saṃsāre duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_14.171{71} //
S01ratnml_u:6086: iti saṃcodayantas tāṃ sārvān devāṃś ca sarvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6087: te sarve 'py aṃśavo bhāyaḥ sugatāntikam āyayuḥ // Rm_14.172{72} //
S01ratnml_u:6088: tatas te 'py aṃśavaḥ sarve saṃmīlya saṃgatā muneḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6091: kim etad iti saṃcintya sarve tasthuḥ śakautukāḥ // Rm_14.174{74} //
S01ratnml_u:6093: utthāya sāñjalir natvā śāstāraṃ taṃ samabravīt // Rm_14.175{75} //
S01ratnml_u:6094: bhagavans te mukhād bhāsiḥ paṃcavarṇā vinirgatā /
S01ratnml_u:6095: avabhāsya diśaḥ sarvā ūrṇāyāṃ ca viśanti tāḥ // Rm_14.176{76} //
S01ratnml_u:6097: taddhetuṃ śrotum ichanti tad upādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_14.177{77} //
S01ratnml_u:6098: nāhetu hi smitaṃ buddhā darśayanti kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:6099: yad dhetau bhavatā śāstur hasitaṃ tat samādiśa // Rm_14.178{78} //
S01ratnml_u:6101: tam ānaṃdaiḥ sabhāṃ cāpi samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_14.179{79} //
S01ratnml_u:6102: paśyānaṃda yad etair hi sarvai gāndharvikair api /
S01ratnml_u:6103: mama sasāṃghikasyaivaṃ satkāraṃ prakṛtaṃ mudā // Rm_14.180{80} //
S01ratnml_u:6105: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāptā niḥkleśā vimalāśayāḥ // Rm_14.181{81} //
S01ratnml_u:6110: evam etāt samālokya yūyaṃ yadi samichatha /
S01ratnml_u:6111: tathātra śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_14.184{84} //
S01ratnml_u:6112: ye triratnaṃ sadā bhaktyā satkṛtyaivaṃ bhajanti te /
S01ratnml_u:6113: vihāya durgatiṃ nityaṃ sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyuḥ // Rm_14.185{85} //
S01ratnml_u:6115: iti matvātra saṃsāre yeṣāṃ vāṃchā sukhe śive /
S01ratnml_u:6116: te satkṛtya triratneṣu śraddhayā bhajatāniśaṃ // Rm_14.186{86} //
S01ratnml_u:6117: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve ca te janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6118: satyam evaṃ pratijñāya triratnaṃ sarvadābhajan // Rm_14.187{87} //
S01ratnml_u:6120: kṛtāñjalipuṭā natvā paprachus taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_14.188{88} //
S01ratnml_u:6121: yad evaṃ bhagavann ebhiḥ satkāraṃ prakṛtaṃ mahat /
S01ratnml_u:6122: tat te kena supuṇyena samyag ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_14.189{89} //
S01ratnml_u:6123: evaṃ tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa jineśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6124: sarvāns tāñ chrāvakān bhikṣūn samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_14.190{90} //
S01ratnml_u:6125: śṛṇudhvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ puṇyaṃ yan mayā prakṛtaṃ purā /
S01ratnml_u:6126: tad atra kathitaṃ śrutvā śraddhayābhyanumodata // Rm_14.191{91} //
S01ratnml_u:6128: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ // Rm_14.192{92} //
S01ratnml_u:6130: mārajil lokavid bharttā subhadro 'rhan hitaṃkaraḥ // Rm_14.193{93} //
S01ratnml_u:6131: tadā sa bhagavān buddho janapadeṣu cārikāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6132: carann anyāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_14.194{94} //
S01ratnml_u:6133: tatra tasya narendrasya krīḍodyāne taror adhaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6134: praviśya svāsanāsīnas tasthau vahnir ivojvalan // Rm_14.195{95} //
S01ratnml_u:6136: saṃgītaiḥ saha saṃrakto ramituṃ samupāviśat // Rm_14.196{96} //
S01ratnml_u:6138: dṛṣṭvaiva sahasopetya natvā kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ // Rm_14.197{97} //
S01ratnml_u:6139: samādhisthaṃ tam ālokya taṣṭhau ciram upāśrayan /
S01ratnml_u:6141: vādyamānaiḥ satair vādyair muniṃ prābodhayan nṛpaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6142: tataḥ sa sugato buddho samādheḥ śīghram utthitaḥ // Rm_14.199{99} //
S01ratnml_u:6144: tadā taṃ nṛpatiṃ dṛṣṭvā sa saṃbuddhaḥ prabodhanaḥ // Rm_14.200{100} //
S01ratnml_u:6146: ehi rājan mahāvāho svāgataṃ te mahīpate // Rm_14.201{1} //
S01ratnml_u:6148: sadā dānaṃ pradatvātra śīlaṃ dhṛtvā samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.202{2} //
S01ratnml_u:6150: bodhau cittaṃ samādhāya prajñāratnam upārjaya // Rm_14.203{3} //
S01ratnml_u:6152: tatas te maṅgalaṃ nityam ihāmutre sadā bhavet // Rm_14.204{4} //
S01ratnml_u:6154: iti matvā mahārāja saddharmaṃ samupāśrayan // Rm_14.205{5} //
S01ratnml_u:6155: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā satkṛtya bhaja sarvadā /
S01ratnml_u:6156: triratneṣu kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇoti kadā cana // Rm_14.206{6} //
S01ratnml_u:6158: sarvadā satphalāny eva sūte bodhiṃ samarpayet /
S01ratnml_u:6159: iti matvā mahārāja triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_14.207{7} //
S01ratnml_u:6161: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_14.208{8} //
S01ratnml_u:6163: iti tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa sa bhūpatiḥ // Rm_14.209{9} //
S01ratnml_u:6165: tataḥ sa mudito rājā taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ // Rm_14.210{10} //
S01ratnml_u:6167: tataś ca bhojanānte sa nṛpatiḥ sāñjalir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6168: taṃ munīndraṃ praṇatvaivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ hṛdo vyadhāt // Rm_14.211{11} //
S01ratnml_u:6170: samyag bodhiṃ samāgamya bhaveyaṃ sugato jinaḥ // Rm_14.212{12} //
S01ratnml_u:6171: etat tena narendreṇa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6172: matvā sa sugatas tasya tathāśīrvacanaṃ dadau // Rm_14.213{13} //
S01ratnml_u:6173: jayo 'stu te sadā rājaṃ dharmeṇa pālaya prajāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6174: praṇidhānaṃ yathā bodhau tathā te siddhyatu dhruvaṃ // Rm_14.214{14} //
S01ratnml_u:6175: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa tena śrutvā sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6176: muditaḥ sāñjalir natvā taṃ munīndraṃ samabravīt // Rm_14.215{15} //
S01ratnml_u:6179: tad bhavān kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā sadā māṃ draṣṭum arhati /
S01ratnml_u:6180: sarvadā bhavatām eva śaraṇe 'smi samāsthitaḥ // Rm_14.217{17} //
S01ratnml_u:6181: iti saṃprārthanāṃ kṛtvā rājā sa sajano mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6182: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya sānaṃdaḥ svapuraṃ yayau // Rm_14.218{18} //
S01ratnml_u:6183: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā samutthāya sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6184: sarvatra bhadratāṃ kṛtvā svāśrame samupāyayau // Rm_14.219{19} //
S01ratnml_u:6186: aham eva tadābhūvan nānyo draṣṭavya eva saḥ // Rm_14.220{20} //
S01ratnml_u:6187: yan mayā śraddhayā tasya prabodhanasya tāyinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6190: etair gāndharvikair evaṃ satkāraḥ prakṛtādhunā // Rm_14.222{22} //
S01ratnml_u:6192: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhajanīyaṃ śubhārthibhiḥ // Rm_14.223{23} //
S01ratnml_u:6193: yūyaṃ cāpi sadā nityaṃ śāstāraṃ sadguruṃ jinaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6195: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te bhikṣavo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6196: sarve tatheti vijñapya triratnāni sadābhajan // Rm_14.225{25} //
S01ratnml_u:6197: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā narādhipa /
S01ratnml_u:6199: evaṃ rājaṃs tvayāpy evaṃ triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6200: saṃbuddhaśāsanaṃ dhṛtvā cara dharmaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.227{27} //
S01ratnml_u:6202: prajāś cāpi tathā rājaṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6204: tathā cet te sadā bhadraṃ bhaven nūnaṃ samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6205: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_14.229{29} //
S01ratnml_u:6206: iti śāstrā samādeṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6208: gāṃdharvikānām avadānam etac chrutvānumodanti narā mudā ye /
S01ratnml_u:6209: te sarva enaḥparimuktacittā bhuktvā sukhāny eva labhanti bodhiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6214: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_15.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:6215: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6216: tadyathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhasi // Rm_15.2{2} //
S01ratnml_u:6217: iti saṃprārthite rājñā sa yatiḥ sugatātmajaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6218: aśokaṃ taṃ nṛpaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evam upādiśat // Rm_15.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:6219: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6220: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvāpy evaṃ pramodaya // Rm_15.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:6221: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śākyasiṃho jagadguruḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6223: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra sarve bhikṣugaṇā api /
S01ratnml_u:6224: śrāvakāś cailakāś caiva sarva upāsakā api // Rm_15.6{6} //
S01ratnml_u:6230: bhadradharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ // Rm_15.9{9} //
S01ratnml_u:6235: rājāno rājaputrāś ca vaiśyā maṃtrijanā api /
S01ratnml_u:6236: amātyāḥ śreṣṭhino bhaṭṭāḥ paurikāś ca gṛhādhipāḥ // Rm_15.12{12} //
S01ratnml_u:6238: vaṇijaḥ śilpinaś cāpi grāmyāḥ kārpaṭikā api // Rm_15.13{13} //
S01ratnml_u:6240: sarve dharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ vihāre samupāgatāḥ // Rm_15.14{14} //
S01ratnml_u:6242: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya praṇatvā samupācaran // Rm_15.15{15} //
S01ratnml_u:6243: tatra te samupāsṛtya sarve taṃ śrīghanaṃ muniṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6245: tataḥ sarve 'pi te lokāḥ parivṛtya samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6247: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāṃs tān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:6249: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te tridaśādayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6252: tasminn avasare tatra śrāvastyāṃ pauriko gṛhī /
S01ratnml_u:6253: śreṣṭhī mahājanaḥ śrimāñ chrāddho bhadrāśayābhavat // Rm_15.20{20} //
S01ratnml_u:6254: sa ekasmiṃ dine svasmin bhāṇḍālakoṣṭhake viśan /
S01ratnml_u:6256: aho me jāyate saṃpad dīyatī saṃpravarddhitā /
S01ratnml_u:6257: tathāpi varddhyate tṛṣṇā yataḥ saukhyaṃ na kiṃ cana // Rm_15.22{22} //
S01ratnml_u:6258: yad ime caṃcalā bhogā jalacaṃdranibhā mama /
S01ratnml_u:6260: tad atra kiṃ mano 'dyāpi tṛṣṇayākṛṣyate mama /
S01ratnml_u:6261: yena carāmy ahaṃ loke duḥkhī bhavikalāśayaḥ // Rm_15.24{24} //
S01ratnml_u:6262: tat kiṃ me saṃpadā sāraṃ yataḥ saukhyaṃ na vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:6263: dharmārthe gocaraṃ naiva kevalaṃ madavṛddhaye // Rm_15.25{25} //
S01ratnml_u:6264: madena varddhate mānaṃ mānāl loke pramādatā /
S01ratnml_u:6265: pramādād dīpyate cerṣyā kopāgnir dīpyate tataḥ // Rm_15.26{26} //
S01ratnml_u:6268: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parāṃś cāpi nāśayati durāśayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6273: narakeṣu bhraman nityaṃ duḥkhāny eva sadāśnuyāt // Rm_15.30{30} //
S01ratnml_u:6274: yad vātrāpi ca saṃsāre jīvitam adhruvaṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:6275: kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca sārveṣāṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_15.31{31} //
S01ratnml_u:6276: tad atrāham asārebhyo bhogebhyaḥ sāram uttamaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6277: saddharmaṃ samupādātuṃ yatnaṃ kuryāṃ samādarāt // Rm_15.32{32} //
S01ratnml_u:6278: saddharmaṃ saugataṃ dharmam ity ākhyātaṃ purāvidaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6279: tad atra saugate kṣetre dānaṃ kurvīya sāṃprataṃ // Rm_15.33{33} //
S01ratnml_u:6280: bauddhakṣetre kṛtaṃ dānaṃ bodhivījaṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6281: etad evātra saṃsāre sādhanīyaṃ śubhāptaye // Rm_15.34{34} //
S01ratnml_u:6282: dānena śuddhyate cittaṃ sucittaḥ sumatiṃ labhet /
S01ratnml_u:6293: ity arhadbhir mahābhijñaiḥ samākhyātaṃ mayā śrutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6294: tat saṃbuddhapadāṃ praptuṃ buddhaṃ bhajeya sāṃprataṃ // Rm_15.40{40} //
S01ratnml_u:6296: tad buddhapramukhaṃ sarvasaṃghaṃ pūjeya sādaraṃ // Rm_15.41{41} //
S01ratnml_u:6297: iti niścitya sa śrīmān gṛhasthaḥ saṃpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6298: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghan taṃ pūjayituṃ samaichata // Rm_15.42{42} //
S01ratnml_u:6301: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa gṛhasthaḥ pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6303: tataḥ sa sajano natvā sāñjaliḥ saṃpramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6304: munīndraṃ taṃ samālokya puraḥ sthitvaivam abravīt // Rm_15.45{45} //
S01ratnml_u:6305: sarvajña bhagavaṃ chāstar bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:6308: pūjayituṃ samichāmi tad anujñāṃ dadātu me // Rm_15.47{47} //
S01ratnml_u:6309: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6310: tathāstv iti pratijñāya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_15.48{48} //
S01ratnml_u:6311: tataḥ sa gṛhabhṛn matvā bhagavatādhyuvāsa taṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6312: sāñjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā muditaḥ svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_15.49{49} //
S01ratnml_u:6313: tatra sa svajanaiḥ svasmiṃ gṛhe margeṣu sarvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6319: tato 'nye dyur gṛhasthaḥ sa snātvā śuddhāṃvarāvṛtaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6320: saṃbuddhāmaṃtraṇaṃ kartuṃ vihāre sajano yayau // Rm_15.53{53} //
S01ratnml_u:6321: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghaṃ sa purogataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6322: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_15.54{54} //
S01ratnml_u:6324: tat sasaṃgho mamāvāse bhāvān āgantum arhati // Rm_15.55{55} //
S01ratnml_u:6325: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6327: tatra sa bhagavān mārge kṛtvā bhadraṃ prabhāsayan /
S01ratnml_u:6330: upadravāṇi sarvāṇi sahasā vilayaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_15.58{58} //
S01ratnml_u:6331: andhā rūpāṇi paśyantaḥ śṛṇvanto vadhirā ravān /
S01ratnml_u:6332: hīnendriyāś ca ye te 'pi pratilabdhendriyā vavuḥ // Rm_15.59{59} //
S01ratnml_u:6334: rogiṇo nīrujā āsan kuvelā rucirāmvarāḥ // Rm_15.60{60} //
S01ratnml_u:6336: mūkā āsan pravaktāro jaḍāś cāpi suvāgminaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6338: ye ca caṇḍāśāyāḥ krūrās te 'py abhūvan dayālavaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6339: ye ca duṣṭā durācārās te santas samyamodyatāḥ // Rm_15.62{62} //
S01ratnml_u:6341: ye śaṭhā vaṃcakāś cauras te āryāḥ satyavādinaḥ // Rm_15.63{63} //
S01ratnml_u:6342: evaṃ ye duḥkhinaḥ satvās te sarve sukhino 'bhavan /
S01ratnml_u:6343: evaṃ sa bhagavāṃs tatra kṛtvā bhadraṃ samantataḥ // Rm_15.64{64} //
S01ratnml_u:6345: tatra tasya munīndrasya sa gṛhastho yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6346: pādyaṃ dadau sasaṃghasya sadārāḥ śucināmbunā // Rm_15.65{65} //
S01ratnml_u:6347: tataḥ sa suprāsannātmā sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6348: prajñapte svāsane tatra yathākramaṃ nyaveśayat // Rm_15.66{66} //
S01ratnml_u:6349: tatra te sāṃghikāḥ sarve saṃbuddhapramukhāḥ kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:6352: tān sarvān sa gṛhī dṛṣṭvā yathāvidhi samarcayat // Rm_15.68{68} //
S01ratnml_u:6353: tataḥ sa sajanaḥ śreṣṭhī svahastena sasāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6354: taṃ munīndraṃ sudhākalpair bhojanaiḥ samatarpayet // Rm_15.69{69} //
S01ratnml_u:6355: tataḥ saṃtṛptitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6356: apanīya sa pātrāṇi tad dhastādīn vyaśodhayat // Rm_15.70{70} //
S01ratnml_u:6357: tataḥ sa sāñjalir natvā tān buddhapramukhān yatīn /
S01ratnml_u:6358: puro nīcāsanāsīno dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayat // Rm_15.71{71} //
S01ratnml_u:6359: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ gṛhaṣṭhaṃ subhāvinaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6361: ārogyam astu te nityaṃ gṛhapate sadā śivaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6362: bodhau cittaṃ samādhāya cara dharmaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_15.73{73} //
S01ratnml_u:6363: dharmeṇa jīyate pāpaṃ niṣpāpaḥ sadgatiṃ vrajet /
S01ratnml_u:6364: sadgatau satsukhāny eva bhuktvā saṃcarate sadā // Rm_15.74{74} //
S01ratnml_u:6366: sudhiro guṇavān vijño bhavec chrīmān maharddhikaḥ // Rm_15.75{75} //
S01ratnml_u:6367: dharmeṇa suciraṃ jīved ārogyaṃ ca sadā tanau /
S01ratnml_u:6368: sarvatrāpi bhaven nityaṃ maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ // Rm_15.76{76} //
S01ratnml_u:6369: dharmo na naśyate kvapi hriyate nāpi kena cit /
S01ratnml_u:6370: kenāpi naśyate naiva cālayituṃ kadā cana // Rm_15.77{77} //
S01ratnml_u:6371: nāgnibhir dahyate dharmaḥ klidyate nāpi codakaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6372: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate naiva kṣīyate nāpi bhūmiṣu // Rm_15.78{78} //
S01ratnml_u:6374: dharmeṇa calate vāyur dharmeṇa vahate jalaḥ // Rm_15.79{79} //
S01ratnml_u:6377: meghā dharmeṇa varṣāṇā bhūmiḥ śaṣyauṣadhībharāḥ // Rm_15.80{80} //
S01ratnml_u:6380: dharmo na śīyate kvāpi dharmo na paribhūyate /
S01ratnml_u:6381: sarvatra jayate dharmo dharmo hi śobhate sadā // Rm_15.82{82} //
S01ratnml_u:6382: dharmahīnā na śobhante śrimanto guṇino 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:6383: dharmmiṣṭhā eva śobhante daridrā nirguṇā api // Rm_15.83{83} //
S01ratnml_u:6387: mahāmbudhiṃ samuttīrya ratnāny api labhanti ca // Rm_15.85{85} //
S01ratnml_u:6393: rājyakāryāṇi sarvāṇi sādhayanto jayanty arīn // Rm_15.88{88} //
S01ratnml_u:6398: tathā dharmadharā eva yatayo yogino 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:6399: sarvakleśagaṇāñ jitvā labhanti paramaṃ padaṃ // Rm_15.91{91} //
S01ratnml_u:6401: yathābhilaṣitāṃ siddhiṃ prāpya mokṣaṃ vrajanti ca // Rm_15.92{92} //
S01ratnml_u:6404: tathā ca mānavāḥ sarve lokā dharmānusārataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6409: sukhāni suciraṃ bhuktvā pravasanti pramoditāḥ // Rm_15.96{96} //
S01ratnml_u:6411: sarve satvāḥ sukhaprāptāḥ pracaranti yathechayā // Rm_15.97{97} //
S01ratnml_u:6414: kim atra vahunoktena dharma eva jagatprabhuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6415: dharmeṇaiva sadā nityaṃ rakṣitaḥ pracarec chubhe // Rm_15.99{99} //
S01ratnml_u:6416: ṣubhena siddhyate cittaṃ śuddhacittaḥ sudhīr bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:6419: bodhicittaṃ samādhāya triratnāni sadā bhajet // Rm_15.101{1} //
S01ratnml_u:6422: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bodhicaryāṃ vrataṃ caret // Rm_15.102{2} //
S01ratnml_u:6423: tato māragaṇāñ jitvā pūrya pāramitāḥ kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:6424: trividhāṃ bodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāt // Rm_15.103{3} //
S01ratnml_u:6427: mṛtyukāle vipattau ca dharmma evānugas suhṛt /
S01ratnml_u:6428: tadā sarve tyajanty āśu ko 'pi naiva sahānugaḥ // Rm_15.105{5} //
S01ratnml_u:6429: dharma eva tadā trātā sarvatrāpy anugaḥ suhṛt /
S01ratnml_u:6430: tasmād dharmo mahāratnaṃ sādhanīyaṃ prayatnataḥ // Rm_15.106{6} //
S01ratnml_u:6432: samādiśya kṣaṇaṃ tasthau tūṣṇībhūtvā samāhitaḥ // Rm_15.107{7} //
S01ratnml_u:6433: tatas tasya munīndrasya pādau sa mudito gṛhī /
S01ratnml_u:6434: praṇatvā manasā caivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ sāmadadhe // Rm_15.108{8} //
S01ratnml_u:6436: pratyekāṃ bodhim āsādya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpnuyāt // Rm_15.109{9} //
S01ratnml_u:6437: tataḥ sa suprasannāsyo gṛhasthaḥ sajano mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6438: bhagavataṃ tam ālokya puras tasthau samāhitaḥ // Rm_15.110{10} //
S01ratnml_u:6439: tadā sa bhagavāṃs tasya śrīmato hṛdaye sthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6443: tāsāṃ yā raśmayo yātā adholoke samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6444: tāḥ sarvanarakeṣv evam avabhyāsya samāsarat // Rm_15.113{13} //
S01ratnml_u:6445: tadā tābhiḥ parispṛṣṭāḥ sarve te narakasthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6449: aho citraṃ kim adyaivaṃ mahat saukhyaṃ prajāyate /
S01ratnml_u:6450: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanto 'smāc cyutā anyatra cāgatāḥ // Rm_15.116{16} //
S01ratnml_u:6451: yad asmākaṃ mahad duḥkhaṃ tat sarvaṃ śāmyate 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:6452: saṃjāyate mahāsaukhyaṃ tad adbhutaṃ na manyate // Rm_15.117{17} //
S01ratnml_u:6454: yasmād iyaṃ mahāraśmir avabhāsya prasaryati // Rm_15.118{18} //
S01ratnml_u:6456: bhagavān nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ sarvatra tatra preṣayet // Rm_15.119{19} //
S01ratnml_u:6457: tadā taṃ saugatiṃ mūrttiṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6458: aho citram iti proktvā vismitāś caivam abruvan // Rm_15.120{20} //
S01ratnml_u:6459: nehaivetaś cyutāḥ sarve nāpy anyatra gatā vayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6460: ihaiva saṃsthitāḥ sarve narake pravasāmahe // Rm_15.121{21} //
S01ratnml_u:6461: api tv ayaṃ mahān satvo 'pūrvadarśana āgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6462: nūnam asyānubhāvena saṃjāyante sukhāni naḥ // Rm_15.122{22} //
S01ratnml_u:6463: tad asmiṃ sugatākare vayaṃ sarve prasāditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6464: upetya praṇatiṃ kṛtvā sarvathā saṃbhajemahi // Rm_15.123{23} //
S01ratnml_u:6465: iti saṃbhāṣya sarve te nārakīyāḥ pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6468: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāye ca namaḥ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:6469: ity uktvā ca triratnānāṃ saṃsmṛtvā śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_15.125{25} //
S01ratnml_u:6470: iti te nirmite tasmiṃ cittaṃ prasādya nirmalāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6472: tathā corddhagatā yās tāḥ kramāc cāturmahādhipān /
S01ratnml_u:6473: samārabhya trayastriṃśān sarvāṃś cāpi surālayāt // Rm_15.127{27} //
S01ratnml_u:6475: tathā cāpi samodghuṣya sarvān devān anodayan /
S01ratnml_u:6476: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkham śūnyam anātmakaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6477: iti matvā śubhe nityaṃ caritavyaṃ sadāpi ca // Rm_15.129{28} //
S01ratnml_u:6479: dhunīta mṛtyusainyāni naḍāgāraṃ karī yathā // Rm_15.130{29} //
S01ratnml_u:6480: yo hy asmiṃ dharmavinaye hy apramattaś cariṣyati /
S01ratnml_u:6481: tyaktvā janmātra saṃsāre duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_15.131{30} //
S01ratnml_u:6483: tac chraddhayā triratnāni bhajadhvaṃ sarvadādarāt // Rm_15.132{31} //
S01ratnml_u:6484: etac chabdaṃ samākarṇya sarve devāḥ prabodhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6485: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prabhejire sadādṛtāḥ // Rm_15.133{32} //
S01ratnml_u:6486: evaṃ tā raśmayaḥ sarvāḥ sarvāṃl lokāṃc chubhe vṛṣe /
S01ratnml_u:6487: bodhayitvā pratisthāpya pratyāyayur muneḥ puraḥ // Rm_15.134{33} //
S01ratnml_u:6488: tatra tā raśmayaḥ sarvāḥ piṇḍitās tasya tāyinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6489: tridhā pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā sūrṇāyāṃ nyaviśat punaḥ // Rm_15.135{34} //
S01ratnml_u:6490: tad dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve lokās te samitisthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6491: kiṃ dharmam ādiśed buddha iti saṃciṃtya tasthire // Rm_15.136{35} //
S01ratnml_u:6493: puraḥ sthito munīndraṃ taṃ praṇatvā prārthayat tathā // Rm_15.137{36} //
S01ratnml_u:6499: tad yad arthaṃ bhavān smitaṃ darśayati munīśvara /
S01ratnml_u:6500: tad arthaṃ śrotum icchaṃti sarve lokā ime 'dhunā // Rm_15.140{39} //
S01ratnml_u:6501: tad bhavāṃ yat samādeṣṭum ichati sāṃprataṃ mune /
S01ratnml_u:6502: tad dharmaṃ samupādiśya prasādayatv imāṃ sabhāṃ // Rm_15.141{40} //
S01ratnml_u:6503: iti tena vaśiṣyeṇa prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6504: tam āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_15.142{41} //
S01ratnml_u:6506: saṃbuddhā api te sarve darśayanti kadā cana // Rm_15.143{42} //
S01ratnml_u:6507: yad arthe smitam ānaṃda darśitaṃ sāṃprataṃ mayā /
S01ratnml_u:6509: tad arthaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇudhvaṃ samāhitāḥ // Rm_15.144{43} //
S01ratnml_u:6510: paśyasi tvaṃ tadānaṃda śreṣṭhinānena yan mama /
S01ratnml_u:6511: evaṃvidhaṃ sasaṃghasya satkāraṃ śraddhayā kṛtaṃ // Rm_15.145{44} //
S01ratnml_u:6513: ayaṃ śrīmān mahāsatvo bodhisatvo bhavet sudhīḥ // Rm_15.146{45} //
S01ratnml_u:6515: sūkṣmatvag iti vikhyātaḥ pratyekabuddha ātmavit // Rm_15.147{46} //
S01ratnml_u:6519: buddhakṣetre kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇoti kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:6520: saṃbodhisatphalaṃ dadyān nānyad dharmaphalaṃ khalu // Rm_15.150{49} //
S01ratnml_u:6522: matvā taccharaṇaṃ kṛtvā triratnaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_15.151{50} //
S01ratnml_u:6524: te sadā sadgatiṃ yātāś caraṃti bodhisaṃvaraṃ // Rm_15.152{51} //
S01ratnml_u:6525: ye dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā śrutvā bhajanti sādaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6526: sarve te 'kleśino bhadrāḥ saṃprayānti jinālayaṃ // Rm_15.153{52} //
S01ratnml_u:6527: ye saṃghe śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhajanti śraddhayā sadā /
S01ratnml_u:6528: na te gacchanti duḥkhatvaṃ sadā yānti sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_15.154{53} //
S01ratnml_u:6529: iti matvā tathā yūyaṃ sadā nityaṃ samāhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6532: trividhāṃ bodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyatha // Rm_15.156{55} //
S01ratnml_u:6534: sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokāś ca saṃpramoditāḥ // Rm_15.157{56} //
S01ratnml_u:6536: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ prabhejire samāhitāḥ // Rm_15.158{57} //
S01ratnml_u:6537: so 'pi śreṣṭhī tathā śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ tadātmanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6539: tataḥ prabhṛti sa śrīmāṃs triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6540: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ sadā bheje pramoditaḥ // Rm_15.160{59} //
S01ratnml_u:6541: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā sasāṃghikaḥ samutthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6542: tathā sarvatra bhadrāṇi prakurvan svāśramaṃ yayau // Rm_15.161{60} //
S01ratnml_u:6543: ity evaṃ guruṇākhyātaṃ tathā mayātra kathyate /
S01ratnml_u:6544: tvam apy evaṃ mahārāja śrutvā dharmaṃ śubhe cara // Rm_15.162{61} //
S01ratnml_u:6545: prajāś cāpi tathā dharmaṃ śrāvayitvā prabodhayan /
S01ratnml_u:6547: tathā te sarvadā nityaṃ maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6548: bhaven nūnaṃ mahārāja satyam etat prabudhyatāṃ // Rm_15.164{63} //
S01ratnml_u:6550: paripūryya krameṇaivaṃ saṃbodhim api cāpsyai // Rm_15.165{64} //
S01ratnml_u:6551: evaṃ satyaṃ parijñāya triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6552: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhaja bodhiṃ yadīchasi // Rm_15.166{65} //
S01ratnml_u:6554: iti tenārhatā śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6555: nṛpas tatheti saṃśrutya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_15.167{66} //
S01ratnml_u:6556: sūkṣmatvaco 'vadānaṃ yat tad idaṃ ye narā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6557: satkṛtya śraddhayā bhaktyā śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti ca // Rm_15.168{67} //
S01ratnml_u:6558: te sarve sadgatiṃ yātā bhuktvā saukhyāni sarvadā /
S01ratnml_u:6564: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar eva samabravīt // Rm_16.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:6565: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6566: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhasi // Rm_16.2{2} //
S01ratnml_u:6567: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena rājñā sa yatir ātmavit /
S01ratnml_u:6568: tam aśokaṃ mahīpālaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_16.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:6569: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6570: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvānumodanāṃ kuru // Rm_16.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:6571: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śākyasiṃho jagadguruḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6572: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājas tathāgataḥ // Rm_16.5{5} //
S01ratnml_u:6585: ṛṣayo brahmaṇāś cāpi yatayo yogino 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:6586: rājāno rājaputrāś ca maṃtriṇo 'pi ca // Rm_16.12{12} //
S01ratnml_u:6588: vaṇijaḥ śilpinaś cāpi gṛhasthāḥ paurikā janāḥ // Rm_16.13{13} //
S01ratnml_u:6589: grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi kārpaṭikāś ca nairgamāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6591: tatra sarve 'pi te lokā vihāre samupāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6592: taṃ munīndraṃ samāsīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā natvā pramoditāḥ // Rm_16.15{15} //
S01ratnml_u:6594: natvā sāñjalayaḥ sarve parivṛtya samaṃtataḥ // Rm_16.16{16} //
S01ratnml_u:6596: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya samātasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_16.17{17} //
S01ratnml_u:6597: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:6599: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā lokāḥ sarve 'pi te mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6609: vibhramanti sadā kvāpi kiñci sthitiṃ na lebhire // Rm_16.23{23} //
S01ratnml_u:6611: āyuṣmān saugato bhikṣur mahābhijño dayānvitaḥ // Rm_16.24{24} //
S01ratnml_u:6613: rājagṛhe pure piṇḍaṃ yācituṃ samupācaran // Rm_16.25{25} //
S01ratnml_u:6614: tatra yatiḥ sa tāṃ pretāṃ sarvān vibhramato 'mvare /
S01ratnml_u:6615: dṛṣṭvene ka iti dhyātvā paśyañ janair upācaran // Rm_16.26{26} //
S01ratnml_u:6616: te sarve pretakāś cāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhikṣum āgataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6617: sahasopetya natvāgre rudanta etad abruvan // Rm_16.27{27} //
S01ratnml_u:6619: tad asmākaṃ hitaṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā trātum arhati // Rm_16.28{28} //
S01ratnml_u:6620: vayaṃ rājagṛhe jātāḥ paurāḥ paṃcaśatāny api /
S01ratnml_u:6622: tadā vayam ime sarve gṛhasthāḥ śreṣṭhino narāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6626: naiva kiñ cit tadā dānam adadmahi kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:6627: arthinam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā prākuṣyāmahi roṣitāḥ // Rm_16.32{32} //
S01ratnml_u:6628: paradattāny api śrutvā dṛṣṭvā cāpi praroṣitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6630: saugatā api cārhantaḥ pretā iveyam āgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6632: tata ete vayaṃ sarve kālaṃ kṛtvā ca sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6634: iti bhadanta vijñāya gatvā rājagṛhe bhavān /
S01ratnml_u:6639: asmannāmnā prakarttavyaṃ praṇāmam api sadguro // Rm_16.38{38} //
S01ratnml_u:6642: bhavatā kārayitavyā ity asmāsu kṛpāṃ kuru // Rm_16.39{39} //
S01ratnml_u:6643: yathāsmākam itaḥ pretalokā muktir bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6644: tathāsmāsu bhavāmc chāstā kṛpayā kartum arhāti // Rm_16.40{40} //
S01ratnml_u:6645: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ sarvaiḥ sa maudgalyāyanaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6646: śrutvā tatheti saṃśrutya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_16.41{41} //
S01ratnml_u:6647: tatas tān pretikān sarvān sa maudgalyāyano yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6648: samālokya samāśvāsya punar etat samabravīt // Rm_16.42{42} //
S01ratnml_u:6649: tatra yūyaṃ ca sarva śvaḥ pravṛtte saṃghabhojane /
S01ratnml_u:6650: sasaṃghaṃ śrīghanaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāyāta samādarāt // Rm_16.43{43} //
S01ratnml_u:6651: iti tenārhātādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te pretakā api /
S01ratnml_u:6652: tatheti hi pratijñāya praṇatvā taṃ vane yayuḥ // Rm_16.44{44} //
S01ratnml_u:6653: tataḥ sa saugato bhikṣur maudgalyo yatir ātmavit /
S01ratnml_u:6654: gatvā rājagṛhe teṣāṃ jñātīnāṃ samupācaran // Rm_16.45{45} //
S01ratnml_u:6655: tatra sarvatra teṣāṃ tat jñātīnāṃ bhavaneṣu sa /
S01ratnml_u:6656: gatvā teṣāṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ sarvam evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_16.46{46} //
S01ratnml_u:6657: tataḥ sa tatra sarvāṃs tāṃ jñātīn āhūya sādaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6658: teṣāṃ pretagater muktihetor evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_16.47{'47} //
S01ratnml_u:6659: śṛṇuta bho mahābhāgya yūyaṃ sarve samāhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6663: nāpi dānaṃ pradattaṃ taiḥ kasmai ci kvāpi kiṃ cana /
S01ratnml_u:6664: paradattāny api śrutvā dṛṣṭvā vā paryabhāṣyata // Rm_16.50{50} //
S01ratnml_u:6665: arhanto bhikṣavo vā tair yācakāś ca gṛhāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6668: ity arhato yatī cāpi dṛṣṭvaiva te 'bhyanindayan // Rm_16.52{52} //
S01ratnml_u:6672: saṃbuddhaśāsane dānaṃ kartum ichāmy ahaṃ khalu // Rm_16.54{54} //
S01ratnml_u:6674: tadā tat pāpamuktās te sarve yāyur divaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_16.55{55} //
S01ratnml_u:6675: tad atra śraddhayā yūyaṃ yathāśakti mayārthitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6677: saṃghabhojye pravṛtte 'tra sarve te pretikā api /
S01ratnml_u:6678: draṣṭuṃ samāgamiṣyanti yūyaṃ cāgaṃtum arhatha // Rm_16.57{57} //
S01ratnml_u:6679: ity uktvā prārthite tena maudgalyena dayālunā /
S01ratnml_u:6680: śrutvā taj jātayaḥ sarve vismayāṃ samupāyayuḥ // Rm_16.58{58} //
S01ratnml_u:6681: tatas te vismitāḥ sarve tat pretagatimuktaye /
S01ratnml_u:6683: tat bhojyasāmagrīṃ śraddhayā dātum icchire // Rm_16.59{59} //
S01ratnml_u:6684: ke cit tasmai suvarṇāni ke cid ratnāni saṃdaduḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6685: ke cid ropyādi dhātūṃś ca dravyāni vividhāni cā // Rm_16.60{60} //
S01ratnml_u:6686: taṇḍulāni daduḥ ke cid dadur dhānyāni ke cana /
S01ratnml_u:6687: ke cid daduḥ kalāyāṃś ca godhūmāṃś ca yavān api // Rm_16.61{61} //
