S01ratnml_u:6689: mudgāṃś cāpi tathānyāṃś ca sarvān vrīhin daduḥ pare // Rm_16.62{62} //
S01ratnml_u:6693: surasāni supathyāni pradaduś cāpare mudā // Rm_16.64{64} //
S01ratnml_u:6695: śunṭhīś ca pippirīś cāpi maricāni dadur mudā // Rm_16.65{65} //
S01ratnml_u:6696: hiṅguṃ ca jīrakāṃś cānye viḍarkasaiṃdhavādi ca /
S01ratnml_u:6697: anye ghṛtāni tailāni pradaduḥ śraddhayā mudā // Rm_16.66{66} //
S01ratnml_u:6698: śaktūṃś ca piṣṭakāṃś cānyamodakāṃś ca dadur mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6699: tathā dadhīni dugdhāni madhuni ca guḍāni ca // Rm_16.67{67} //
S01ratnml_u:6700: tathānye sarkarāś cāpi pradaduḥ śraddhayā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6701: tathauṣadhāni pathyāni pācakāni daduḥ pare // Rm_16.68{68} //
S01ratnml_u:6704: sarve te jñātayas teṣāṃ saṃghabhokṣyāya saṃdaduḥ // Rm_16.69{69} //
S01ratnml_u:6705: evaṃ te sarvavastūni datvā sarve pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6706: sāṃjalayaḥ praṇatvā taṃ maudgalyaṃ yatim ūcire // Rm_16.70{70} //
S01ratnml_u:6710: tān pretān samupāyātān sarvān draṣṭuṃ sabāndhavāḥ // Rm_16.72{72} //
S01ratnml_u:6711: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā tatheti sa prabodhayan /
S01ratnml_u:6712: tāni dravyāni sarvāṇi gṛhītvā svāśrame yayau // Rm_16.73{73} //
S01ratnml_u:6713: tataḥ sa bhikṣur āyuṣmān vihāre samupācaran /
S01ratnml_u:6714: dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā sāñjaliḥ samupāśrayan // Rm_16.74{73} //
S01ratnml_u:6715: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ maudgalyam upasthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6717: kaṃ cit te kuśalaṃ vatsa kuto 'trāsi samāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6718: lokeṣu kiṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ tan pracakṣva mahāmate // Rm_16.76{75} //
S01ratnml_u:6719: ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa sa maudgalyāyanaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6720: bhagavantaṃ tam ānatvā sāñjalir etad abravīt // Rm_16.77{76} //
S01ratnml_u:6721: bhagavan kṛpayā śāstaḥ sarvatra kauśalaṃ mama /
S01ratnml_u:6722: rājagṛhe pure piṃḍaṃ yācituṃ samupācaran // Rm_16.78{77} //
S01ratnml_u:6723: tatra mārge vanopānte paṃca pretaśatāny api /
S01ratnml_u:6724: dṛṣṭvā māṃ samupasṛtya praṇatvaitad vadanti vai // Rm_16.79{78} //
S01ratnml_u:6725: bhadanta tad vijānīyā yad vayaṃ pretikā ime /
S01ratnml_u:6726: sarve rājagṛhe jātā gṛhasthāḥ paurikāḥ khalu // Rm_16.80{79} //
S01ratnml_u:6731: jñātīnām api sarveṣāṃ karmaplotiṃ nivedya hi // Rm_16.82{81} //
S01ratnml_u:6739: bodhimārge pratisthāpya pātum arhati sarvadā // Rm_16.86{85} //
S01ratnml_u:6740: iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā tathā rājagṛhe gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6741: tad jñātīnāṃ puras teṣāṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ nivedya ca // Rm_16.87{86} //
S01ratnml_u:6744: iti me prārthanāṃ kṛtvā bhavāṃ chāstā jagadguruḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6745: tad adhivāsanāṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā tān samuddhara // Rm_16.89{88} //
S01ratnml_u:6746: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6751: sāñjalis taṃ munīndraṃ ca praṇatvaitat samabravīt // Rm_16.92{91} //
S01ratnml_u:6753: tat sarvasāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ sahasāgaṃtum arhati // Rm_16.93{92} //
S01ratnml_u:6754: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavāṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6755: bhikṣuṃ prāha samāhūya gaṇḍīm ākoṭyatām iti // Rm_16.94{93} //
S01ratnml_u:6756: tadādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā bhikṣus tatheti saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6757: āśrutya sahasādāya gaṇḍīm ākoṭayat tadā // Rm_16.95{94} //
S01ratnml_u:6758: tad gaṇḍīśabdam ākarṇya sarve te sāṃghikā api /
S01ratnml_u:6760: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra svāsane samupāviśat /
S01ratnml_u:6761: sarve te sāṃghikāś cāpi kramāt svasvāsane 'viśan // Rm_16.97{96} //
S01ratnml_u:6762: tatas tad jñātayaḥ sarve tatrānye paurikā api /
S01ratnml_u:6763: tān pretān draṣṭum āyātā upatasthuḥ sakautukāḥ // Rm_16.98{97} //
S01ratnml_u:6764: tadā te pretikāḥ sarve prakṣiptāḥ karmavāyubhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6765: bahulokāntare dure yātās tasthur vimohitāḥ // Rm_16.99{98} //
S01ratnml_u:6766: tadā sa yatir ālokya sarvasaṃghān samāsthitān /
S01ratnml_u:6767: tadjñātibandhuvargāṃś ca pretān draṣṭuṃ samācarat // Rm_16.100{99} //
S01ratnml_u:6768: tatra pretān adṛṣṭvā sa maudgalyo vismitāśayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6769: kiṃ te 'tra nāgatā veti samantato vyalokayat // Rm_16.101{100} //
S01ratnml_u:6771: vilokayan sa sarvatra nādrakṣīt tāṃ samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6772: sa saṃdigdhaḥ punas tatra samyagdṛṣṭyā vyalokayat // Rm_16.102{1} //
S01ratnml_u:6773: sarvatrāpi sa tāṃ pretān adṛṣṭvā vismayānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6775: tatrāpi ca sa sarvatra naiva kaṃ cid apaśyate /
S01ratnml_u:6778: tatrāpi tān adṛṣṭvā sa narakeṣu samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6779: divyena cakṣuṣā paśyan na ca tatrāpy apaśyata // Rm_16.105{4} //
S01ratnml_u:6781: sa divyacakṣuṣā paśyaṃs tatrāpi nābhyapaśyata // Rm_16.106{5} //
S01ratnml_u:6782: tatrāpi tān adṛṣṭvā sa maudgalyo vismayānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6786: tatra sa purato gatvā śāstāraṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6789: mayā na dṛśyate kaś cit te pretāḥ kvādhunā gatāḥ // Rm_16.110{9} //
S01ratnml_u:6790: teṣāṃ nāmnā bhavatpūjāṃ karttum etat prasādhitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6791: yad atra nāgatāḥ kecit tat te pretā gatāḥ kuha // Rm_16.111{10} //
S01ratnml_u:6792: dṛśyante na mayā kvāpi sarvatrāpi samīkṣyate /
S01ratnml_u:6793: eko 'pi nāgato hy atra kva gatās te 'dhunā khalu // Rm_16.112{11} //
S01ratnml_u:6794: tan me cittaṃ prasaṃdigdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā śāstā bhavān sudṛk /
S01ratnml_u:6795: teṣāṃ gatiṃ samākhyāya saṃbodhayitum arhati // Rm_16.113{12} //
S01ratnml_u:6796: iti saṃprārthite tena maudgalyena sa sarvavit /
S01ratnml_u:6797: bhagavāṃs taṃ samālokya maudgalyam etad abravīt // Rm_16.114{13} //
S01ratnml_u:6798: maudgalya mā kṛthā yatnaṃ khedam evābhipatsyase /
S01ratnml_u:6799: gatās te pretikāḥ sarve sudūrabhuvane 'dhunā // Rm_16.115{14} //
S01ratnml_u:6801: adṛśye viṣaye yātāḥ preritāḥ karmavāyubhiḥ // Rm_16.116{15} //
S01ratnml_u:6802: yadi sarvāṃ ca tāṃ draṣṭuṃ vāṃchasi tvam ihāśritaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6803: sarvāṃs tāṃ darśayiṣyāmi paśya buddhānubhāvatāṃ // Rm_16.117{16} //
S01ratnml_u:6804: tad atra tvaṃ samādāya gaṇḍīm ākoṭaya drutaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6805: oṃ namo bhagavate aparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyakambuddhāya // tadyathā //
S01ratnml_u:6806: oṃ puṇye puṇye mahāpuṇye aparimitapuṇye aparimitapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacite /
S01ratnml_u:6807: oṃ sarvasaṃskārapariśuddhe dharmate gagaṇasamudgate svabhāvaviśuddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā /
S01ratnml_u:6810: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa pratibodhitaḥ // Rm_16.119{18} //
S01ratnml_u:6811: sahasā tat sabhāmadhye gaṇḍīm ākoṭayat tathā /
S01ratnml_u:6812: tad gaṇḍīśabdam ākarṇya sarve te pretikā api /
S01ratnml_u:6815: tatra sarve 'pi te pretā dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6817: kramāt tāṃ sarvasaṃghāṃś ca praṇatvā te pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6818: sarve 'py ekāntam āśritya paśyanta upatasthire // Rm_16.122{21} //
S01ratnml_u:6819: tatra tad jñātayaḥ sarve paurikāś cāpare 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:6820: tān pretān samupāsīnān dṛṣṭvā tasthuḥ sakautukāḥ // Rm_16.123{22} //
S01ratnml_u:6821: evaṃ sarve 'pi te pretāḥ svasvajñātīn upasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:6822: bhātrādīn bandhuvargāṃś ca dṛṣṭvaivam upatasthire // Rm_16.124{23} //
S01ratnml_u:6823: tataḥ so 'rhan mahābhijño maudgalyas tān upasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:6824: pretān sarvān samālokya natvāhaivaṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_16.125{24} //
S01ratnml_u:6825: bhagavan nātha sarvajña te pretāḥ sarva āgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6826: tad eṣāṃ bhagavāṃ cchāstānugrahaṃ karttum arhati // Rm_16.126{25} //
S01ratnml_u:6828: sarvaṃ saṃghaṃ samabhyarcya bhojayan samatoṣayat // Rm_16.127{26} //
S01ratnml_u:6829: tataḥ sa sarvasaṃghaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃtṛptikaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6832: datvā kṣamārthanāṃ kṛtvā prārthayat sa munīśvaraṃ // Rm_16.129{28} //
S01ratnml_u:6833: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavāṃ chāstā sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6834: dakṣiṇādeśanām ebhyaḥ pretebhyaḥ kartum arhati // Rm_16.130{29} //
S01ratnml_u:6835: iti saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te pretikā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6836: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ muniṃ natvā sādaram upatasthire // Rm_16.131{30} //
S01ratnml_u:6837: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghas tān upasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:6838: dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vidadhe śubhāṃ // Rm_16.132{31} //
S01ratnml_u:6839: ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat pretān anugachatu /
S01ratnml_u:6840: uttiṣṭhantaḥ prayānty ete sarve pretāḥ surālayaṃ // Rm_16.133{21} //
S01ratnml_u:6841: ity ādiśya punas tatra bhagavāṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6847: duḥkhāny eva bhave nityaṃ puṇye matiḥ kathaṃ caret // Rm_16.137{25} //
S01ratnml_u:6848: vinā puṇyamatiṃ jantuḥ saddharme katham ācaret /
S01ratnml_u:6849: vinā saddharmabhāvena sadgatiṃ katham āpnuyāt // Rm_16.138{26} //
S01ratnml_u:6851: tiryakṣu narakeṣv eva bhraman duḥkhāny avāpnuyāt // Rm_16.139{27} //
S01ratnml_u:6852: tad atra mānuṣe janmaprāptair yatnena mānavaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6853: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ śrotavyaṃ sadvṛṣaṃ mudā // Rm_16.140{28} //
S01ratnml_u:6855: etat puṇyavipākena sadgurau sarvadā bhajet // Rm_16.141{29} //
S01ratnml_u:6859: tatra sukhāni saṃbhuktvā saṃcareta śubhe sadā // Rm_16.143{31} //
S01ratnml_u:6862: dānena varddhyate lakṣmīr lakṣmīmāṃ cchobhate pumān /
S01ratnml_u:6865: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhajed bhaktyā sadādarāt // Rm_16.146{34} //
S01ratnml_u:6867: bodhicitte hi labdhe hi bodhisatvo bhavet kṛtī // Rm_16.147{35} //
S01ratnml_u:6869: paripūrya mahāsatvas trividhāṃ bodhim āpnuyāt // Rm_16.148{36} //
S01ratnml_u:6871: qsākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāt // Rm_16.149{37} //
S01ratnml_u:6872: evaṃ vijñāya martyena karttavyaṃ dānam arthine /
S01ratnml_u:6873: dānena sadgatiṃ yāyād adātā durgatiṃ vrajet // Rm_16.150{38} //
S01ratnml_u:6874: durgatiṣu sadā bhuktvā duḥkhāni vividhāṃ sa /
S01ratnml_u:6875: sarvadā duḥkhasaṃkliṣṭaḥ pāpeṣv evārataś caret // Rm_16.151{39} //
S01ratnml_u:6877: nirato hy aviśaṃkena saṃcareta pramādataḥ // Rm_16.152{40} //
S01ratnml_u:6878: tataḥ so hy atipāpiṣṭhaḥ saddharmanindakaḥ kudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6879: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parāṃś cāpi nāśayen nāstikaḥ śaṭhaḥ // Rm_16.153{41} //
S01ratnml_u:6881: ghoreṣu narakeṣv eva gatvā bhraman sadā vaset // Rm_16.154{42} //
S01ratnml_u:6882: sadāpi narakeṣv evaṃ bhramatas tasya duḥkhinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6883: kaścin naiva samuddhartuṃ śaknuyāt saugatād ṛte // Rm_16.155{43} //
S01ratnml_u:6884: yāvan na smarate buddhaṃ tāvat sa narake vaset /
S01ratnml_u:6885: yad eva smarate buddhaṃ tadā syāc chuddhitāśayaḥ // Rm_16.156{44} //
S01ratnml_u:6886: tadā taṃ kṛpayā buddho dṛṣṭvā bauddhena cakṣuṣā /
S01ratnml_u:6887: puṇyakareṇa saṃspṛṣṭvā samuddhared araṃ tataḥ // Rm_16.157{45} //
S01ratnml_u:6888: tatas taṃ pāpinaṃ bauddhā dharmāmbubhir viśodhya ca /
S01ratnml_u:6891: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saddharma eva prācaret // Rm_16.159{47} //
S01ratnml_u:6893: kramāt pāramitāḥ sarvā pūrayituṃ samudyamet // Rm_16.160{48} //
S01ratnml_u:6895: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo buddhātmajo bhaved api // Rm_16.161{49} //
S01ratnml_u:6897: trividhāṃ bodhim āsādya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāt // Rm_16.162{50} //
S01ratnml_u:6898: evaṃ matvā sadā nityaṃ triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6899: saddharmaṃ samupāśritya caradhvaṃ mānavā mudā // Rm_16.163{51} //
S01ratnml_u:6900: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te brāhmaṇādayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6902: sarve lokā parijñāya dṛṣṭasatyās tathācaran // Rm_16.164{52} //
S01ratnml_u:6903: tathā sarve 'pi te pretāḥ śrutvā tad dharmadeśanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6904: mudā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā śuddhātmānas tato 'caran // Rm_16.165{53} //
S01ratnml_u:6905: tatas tad jñātayaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā śrutvā sakautukāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6906: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ muniṃ natvā svasvālayaṃ yayur mudā // Rm_16.166{54} //
S01ratnml_u:6907: tataḥ sa bhagavān buddhaḥ samutthāya saṣāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6910: śāstāraṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ svam āśramaṃ samāśrayat // Rm_16.168{56} //
S01ratnml_u:6912: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā tataś cyutā divaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_16.169{57} //
S01ratnml_u:6916: kutaś cyutāḥ kuhāyāmaḥ karmaṇā kena vā vayaṃ // Rm_16.171{59} //
S01ratnml_u:6919: bhavanto yad vayaṃ sarve pretā buddhānubhāvataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6925: etat satyaṃ parijñāya tasya śāstur jagadguroḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6926: punaḥ sarve vayaṃ gatvā satkṛtya prabhajemahi // Rm_16.176{64} //
S01ratnml_u:6927: iti saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā sarve te pretapūrvakāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6931: sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ bhābhir avabhāsya samantataḥ // Rm_16.178{66} //
S01ratnml_u:6932: vihāre samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:6934: tatra divyopacārais taiḥ pūjāṃgais taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6935: sarve 'pi te samabhyarcya satkṛtya śraddhayābhajan // Rm_16.180{68} //
S01ratnml_u:6938: atha sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:6940: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te pretapūrvakāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6941: devaputrāś ca dharmāṇāṃ viśeṣatvaṃ pralebhire // Rm_16.183{71} //
S01ratnml_u:6943: śāstāraṃ taṃ punar natvā samālokyaitad abruvan // Rm_16.184{72} //
S01ratnml_u:6946: pretalokāt paricyutvā svarge yātāḥ sma sāṃprataṃ // Rm_16.185{73} //
S01ratnml_u:6949: tat kṛpālo yatas tasya maudgalyasya mahāmateḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6951: tad bhavaddarśanaṃ prāpya pītvā dharmāmṛtāny api /
S01ratnml_u:6952: muditāḥ śraddhayā bhaktyā triratnaṃ saṃbhajāmahe // Rm_16.188{76} //
S01ratnml_u:6954: bhavatāṃ darśanaṃ kartuṃ bhūyaḥ prāyāmahe vayaṃ // Rm_16.189{77} //
S01ratnml_u:6956: āryadharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā saṃtuṣṭiṃ na labhāmahe // Rm_16.190{78} //
S01ratnml_u:6957: tad vayaṃ bhavatām evaṃ sarvadā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6958: satkṛtya samupāsṛtya bhaktum ichāmahe punaḥ // Rm_16.191{79} //
S01ratnml_u:6959: tad bhavān kṛpayāsmā kaṃ kṛtvānugraham ābhavaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6960: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya sarvadā trātum arhati // Rm_16.192{80} //
S01ratnml_u:6963: jñānacakṣuś ca saṃprāptaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ māyāmayaṃ bhavaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6964: āryamārgaś ca saṃprāptaḥ prāptā ca nirvṛtiśrutiḥ // Rm_16.194{82} //
S01ratnml_u:6965: dhanyā ime vayaṃ sarve yad bhavaccharaṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6967: dhanyās te puruṣāḥ sarve ye buddhaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6968: sadā dharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā kārāṃ kurvanti śāsane // Rm_16.196{84} //
S01ratnml_u:6970: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya tiṣṭhatu sarvadā sukhaṃ // Rm_16.197{85} //
S01ratnml_u:6971: iti prabhākhya sarve te devaputrāḥ pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6972: taṃ munīndraṃ praṇatvā ca suprasannā divaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_16.198{86} //
S01ratnml_u:6973: tatra sarve 'pi te devās triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6976: taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ śiṣyaṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_16.200{88} //
S01ratnml_u:6977: sādhu maudgalya saṃvṛttaṃ saphalaṃ te kṛpāmate /
S01ratnml_u:6978: yat tvayā prakṛtaṃ kāyaṃ vaiyāvṛttaṃ suśobhitaṃ // Rm_16.201{89} //
S01ratnml_u:6979: yannāmnā bhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapūjā kṛtā tvayā /
S01ratnml_u:6980: te sarve devalokeṣu samutpannāḥ pratisthitāḥ // Rm_16.202{90} //
S01ratnml_u:6982: teṣāṃ bhadrāśayaṃ dṛṣṭvā saddharmo deśito mayā // Rm_16.203{91} //
S01ratnml_u:6983: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā te sarve 'pi pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6984: dṛṣṭasatyāḥ prakrāntāś ca gachanti tridaśālaye // Rm_16.204{92} //
S01ratnml_u:6985: tatra svarge 'pi te sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6987: yannāmnā yat kṛtaṃ karma tat phalaṃ te prabhuṃjate /
S01ratnml_u:6989: evaṃ lokahitaṃ kartuṃ karttavyaṃ puṇyasādhanaṃ // Rm_16.206{94} //
S01ratnml_u:6990: evaṃ lokahitaṃ kṛtvā prakurvanti śubhāni ye /
S01ratnml_u:6991: te pumāṃso mahāsatvā bodhisatvā jinātmajāḥ // Rm_16.207{95} //
S01ratnml_u:6992: evaṃ vijñāya lokānāṃ hitaṃ kartuṃ samudyataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6994: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā so 'rhaṃ mahāmatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:6995: satyam iti pratijñāya prābhyanandat prabodhitaḥ // Rm_16.209{97} //
S01ratnml_u:6996: tataḥ so 'rhan mahābhijñas tac chāstrādiṣṭam ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:6997: tad jñātīnāṃ purogatvā sarvam evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_16.210{98} //
S01ratnml_u:6998: te 'pi ca jñātayaḥ sarve tenārhatā niveditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:6999: śrutvā satyam iti jñātvā prāmodyaṃ pratilebhire // Rm_16.211{99} //
S01ratnml_u:7000: tatas te jñātayaḥ sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7001: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ prabhejire samādarāt // Rm_16.212{100} //
S01ratnml_u:7002: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā narādhipa /
S01ratnml_u:7005: triratnabhajanaṃ lokaiḥ kārayituṃ tvam arhasi // Rm_16.214{2} //
S01ratnml_u:7006: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ bhaven nūnaṃ samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7008: iti matvā mahārāja lokān sarvān prabodhayan /
S01ratnml_u:7009: pratiṣṭhāpya śubhe dharme pālayasva samāhitaḥ // Rm_16.216{4} //
S01ratnml_u:7010: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7012: pretāvadānaṃ manujā idaṃ ye śṛṇvanti ye cāpi niśāmayanti /
S01ratnml_u:7013: te sarva evaṃ pratilabdhapuṇyā bhuktvā sukhāni pracaranti loke // Rm_16.218{6} //
S01ratnml_u:7018: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar evaṃ abhāṣata // Rm_17.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:7019: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7020: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_17.2{2} //
S01ratnml_u:7021: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan yatiḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7022: upagupto nareṃdrāṃ taṃ samalokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_17.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:7023: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7024: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvā cāpy anumodaya // Rm_17.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:7026: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ sāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_17.5{5} //
S01ratnml_u:7028: vihāre śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ bhikṣubhiś cailakair api // Rm_17.6{6} //
S01ratnml_u:7033: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7036: garuḍā vidyādharāś cāpi sarve te saṃpracerire // Rm_17.10{10} //
S01ratnml_u:7037: tataḥ sarve 'pi te tatra puraskṛtya samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7038: parivṛtya sasaṃghaṃ tam upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_17.11{11} //
S01ratnml_u:7039: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:7041: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te saṃpramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7045: tatra tāṃ bhagavān dṛṣṭvā matvā janmāntaraprasūṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7046: ānaṃdaṃ samupāmaṃtrya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_17.15{15} //
S01ratnml_u:7048: bhagavāṃs tṛṣito mātas tad ambu dīyatām iti // Rm_17.16{16} //
S01ratnml_u:7050: sahasā samupāśritya tāṃ vṛddhām evam abravīt // Rm_17.17{17} //
S01ratnml_u:7051: mātar me bhagavāñ chāstā tṛṣito 'yam ihādhunā /
S01ratnml_u:7052: tat pānīyaṃ pradatvā me mahaddharmam avāpnuhi // Rm_17.18{18} //
S01ratnml_u:7054: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā sā sthavirā satī /
S01ratnml_u:7055: tam ānandaṃ samālokya muditaivam abhāṣata // Rm_17.19{19} //
S01ratnml_u:7057: svayam eva samānīya dāsyāmi vrajatāṃ bhavān // Rm_17.20{20} //
S01ratnml_u:7058: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sa ānaṃdaḥ prabodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7059: upetyaivaṃ samākhyāya śāstuḥ pura upāśrayat // Rm_17.21{21} //
S01ratnml_u:7060: tadā sā sahasā kṛtvā ghaṭaṃ śuddhāmbupūritaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7062: tatra sā samupāśritya prādrākṣīt taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7065: jaṃgamam iva ratnābhaṃ saumyaṃ samantabhadrakaṃ // Rm_17.24{24} //
S01ratnml_u:7067: stanābhyāṃ praśrutās tasyāḥ kṣīradhārā niraṃtaraṃ // Rm_17.25{25} //
S01ratnml_u:7069: putra putreti soktvā taṃ pariṣvektum upācarat // Rm_17.26{26} //
S01ratnml_u:7070: tadā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve evaṃ tāṃ samupadrutāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7072: tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavāṃ chastā sarvāṃs tāṃ sāṃghikān api /
S01ratnml_u:7073: sahasā samupāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_17.28{28} //
S01ratnml_u:7074: mā bhikṣava imāṃ vṛddhāṃ dhārāyatātra muñcata /
S01ratnml_u:7075: paṃcajanmaśatāny eṣā mātā me bhūyataḥ purā // Rm_17.29{29} //
S01ratnml_u:7077: samāliṃgatum īchantī mama gātre pradhāvati // Rm_17.30{30} //
S01ratnml_u:7078: yady atraiṣā nivāryyete gātra me śleṣmaṇād api /
S01ratnml_u:7079: idānīṃ rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ kamṭhād asyāḥ kṣaret kṣaṇāt // Rm_17.31{31} //
S01ratnml_u:7082: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te sarvasāṃghikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7083: tāṃ śāstuḥ pūrvaprasūṃ matvā vyavatasthuḥ savismayāḥ // Rm_17.33{33} //
S01ratnml_u:7084: tatkṣaṇād urddhavāhuḥ sā samīkṣya taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7085: sahasā saṃpradhāvitvā samāliṃgya namac ciraṃ // Rm_17.34{34} //
S01ratnml_u:7086: tataś cirāt samutthāya sā vṛddhā sāñjalir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7087: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya puras tasthau samāhitā // Rm_17.35{35} //
S01ratnml_u:7088: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃ puraḥ samupāsthitāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7090: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sa vṛddhāpi kacaṃgalā /
S01ratnml_u:7095: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā gāthā imā abhāṣata // Rm_17.39{39} //
S01ratnml_u:7098: tat kṛtaṃ bhavatā me 'tra cittaṃ mokṣaparāyaṇaṃ // Rm_17.40{40} //
S01ratnml_u:7099: durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge mokṣaṃ ca sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7102: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dātum arhati sāṃprataṃ bhavān // Rm_17.42{42} //
S01ratnml_u:7105: ity arthitaṃ tayā śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7107: yadi śraddhāsti te mātaḥ pravrajyāsadhane khalu /
S01ratnml_u:7108: bharttur anujñāṃ samāsādya prāgacha cara saṃvaraṃ // Rm_17.45{44} //
S01ratnml_u:7109: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā saṃpramoditā /
S01ratnml_u:7110: tathā hīti pratijñāya muniṃ natvā tato 'carat // Rm_17.46{45} //
S01ratnml_u:7111: tatra sā sahasā gehe gatvā taṃ svāminaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7112: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā puraḥ sthitvaivam abravīt // Rm_17.47{46} //
S01ratnml_u:7113: svāmi cchṛṇv adbhutaṃ vakṣye yad adyāhaṃ jalārthinī /
S01ratnml_u:7114: ghaṭaṃ dhṛtvā vahir deśe kūpāntikam upācare // Rm_17.48{47} //
S01ratnml_u:7117: tato 'haṃ sahasā śuddhaiḥ pūrayitvā jalair ghaṭaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7118: dhṛtvā svayaṃ pradātuṃ tat sabhāyām upasaṃcare // Rm_17.50{49} //
S01ratnml_u:7119: tatra tam śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ me snehamohitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7120: kṣāradhārā stanābhyāṃ ca saṃpraśrutā niraṃtaraṃ // Rm_17.51{50} //
S01ratnml_u:7121: tatrāhaṃ sneharāgāṃdhā svātmajam iva taṃ muniṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7123: evaṃ mām abhidhāvantīṃ dṛṣṭvā te sāṃghikā api /
S01ratnml_u:7124: sarve pradhātum ichantaḥ pradhāvanti samutthitāḥ // Rm_17.53{52} //
S01ratnml_u:7125: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān evam utthitān /
S01ratnml_u:7126: sahasā samupāmaṃtrya pura evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_17.54{53} //
S01ratnml_u:7127: mā imāṃ sarvathā yūyaṃ nivārayitum arhatha /
S01ratnml_u:7128: yan mameyaṃ puṇyaṃ ca śatajanmaprasū kila // Rm_17.55{54} //
S01ratnml_u:7131: yady atreṣātra dhāryyeta purato me vimūrchitā /
S01ratnml_u:7132: uṣṇaṃ rudhiram utsṛjya mṛtyuṃ yāyān na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_17.57{56} //
S01ratnml_u:7133: etac chāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te sāṃghikās tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7134: prabodhitāḥ praṇatvā māṃ svasvāsane samāśritāḥ // Rm_17.58{57} //
S01ratnml_u:7135: evaṃ tena munīndreṇa samākhyātaṃ niśamya tat /
S01ratnml_u:7136: sarvaṃ prabudhyamānāhaṃ purāvṛttaṃ smarāmi hi // Rm_17.59{58} //
S01ratnml_u:7139: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatiṣṭhāmi sādaraṃ // Rm_17.60{59} //
S01ratnml_u:7140: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā mām evaṃ samupasthitāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7143: bhūyo 'pi tad rasāsvādatṛṣitaṃ pātum ichate // Rm_17.62{61} //
S01ratnml_u:7151: vihāre samupāsīnāḥ pradṛśyante mayā prabho // Rm_17.66{65} //
S01ratnml_u:7152: tat sabhāgaṃ cariṃ prāptuṃ pravrajyāvratam ichyate /
S01ratnml_u:7153: tad atra kṛpayā bharttas tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_17.67{66} //
S01ratnml_u:7155: sāścaryastambhitas tasthau paśyaṃs tām eva niścalaḥ // Rm_17.68{67} //
S01ratnml_u:7156: tataḥ sa suciraṃ bhāryāṃ tām evam abhilokayan /
S01ratnml_u:7157: viyogaśaṃkayā trastaḥ śanair evam abhāṣata // Rm_17.69{68} //
S01ratnml_u:7158: are nāri pramūdhāsi kim evaṃ tvaṃ prabhāṣase /
S01ratnml_u:7159: katham evaṃ tvayākhyātaṃ ko 'tra satyaṃ pratīṣyati // Rm_17.70{69} //
S01ratnml_u:7163: munīndro mārajid arhan ṣaḍabhijñas tathāgataḥ // Rm_17.72{71} //
S01ratnml_u:7167: śaraṇyo mānanīyo hi vandyaḥ pūjyo bhavaty api // Rm_17.74{73} //
S01ratnml_u:7169: dāsī paravatī preṣyā kṛpaṇā duḥkṛtākṛtiḥ // Rm_17.75{74} //
S01ratnml_u:7170: katham evaṃvidhāyās te garbhe jāto 'py asau mahān /
S01ratnml_u:7173: adhunā bodhim āsādya saṃbuddho 'yaṃ bhavaty api // Rm_17.77{76} //
S01ratnml_u:7175: adyāpīdṛgavasthā hi kiṃ cit saukhyaṃ na vidyate // Rm_17.78{77} //
S01ratnml_u:7176: tad atra mā vadaivaṃ ca tathoktvā naiva śobhase /
S01ratnml_u:7177: kas tavaitad vacaḥ śrutvā supratītaḥ pramāṇayet // Rm_17.79{78} //
S01ratnml_u:7179: vamitvā rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ tvaṃ nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ vrajeḥ // Rm_17.80{79} //
S01ratnml_u:7181: tvam api ca tathā nūnaṃ narake na vrajeḥ kathaṃ // Rm_17.81{80} //
S01ratnml_u:7183: narakeṣu sadā nityaṃ duḥkhāni vividhāni vai /
S01ratnml_u:7185: iti bharttroditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhā strī kacaṃgalā /
S01ratnml_u:7187: tadā sā sucireṇaiva saṃprāpya cetanāṃ tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7188: bharttāraṃ taṃ punar dṛṣṭvā bodhayitum abhāṣata // Rm_17.84{83} //
S01ratnml_u:7189: svāminn atra prasīda tvaṃ mām evaṃ vada sarvathā /
S01ratnml_u:7190: satyam etan mayā proktaṃ na mithyeti prakalpaya // Rm_17.85{84} //
S01ratnml_u:7191: yadi mithyāvacaḥ syān me tenāhaṃ narake vraje /
S01ratnml_u:7192: atha me vacanaṃ satyam atrāhaṃ sadgatiṃ vraje // Rm_17.86{85} //
S01ratnml_u:7193: tenātrobhayathāpy eva viyogaṃ nau bhavet khalu /
S01ratnml_u:7194: sarveṣām api jaṃtūnām avaśyaṃ maraṇaṃ bhave // Rm_17.87{86} //
S01ratnml_u:7196: yatra na vidyate dharmmaṃ tatra kiṃ sukhatāpi ca // Rm_17.88{87} //
S01ratnml_u:7198: dharmaṃ vinā kim etair naḥ kevalaṃ duḥkhatāptaye // Rm_17.89{88} //
S01ratnml_u:7200: sarvān parigrahān tyaktvā pravrajanti jināśrame // Rm_17.90{89} //
S01ratnml_u:7202: saddharmasādhanaṃ karttum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ prabho // Rm_17.91{90} //
S01ratnml_u:7204: etatpuṇyavibhāgena tvaṃ cāpi sadgatiṃ vrajeḥ // Rm_17.92{91} //
S01ratnml_u:7206: akasmāt mṛtyunāghrāte tadā kathaṃ nivāraye // Rm_17.93{92} //
S01ratnml_u:7207: kiyat kālaṃ ca jīveyaṃ vṛddhāhaṃ jirṇitendriyā /
S01ratnml_u:7208: iti matvātra māṃ naivaṃ nivārayitum arhasi // Rm_17.94{93} //
S01ratnml_u:7209: kiṃ cāhaṃ jaratī vṛddhā tat te kiṃ snehatā mayi /
S01ratnml_u:7210: vṛddhayā durbalāṅgātra kārye kiṃ nu prayojanaṃ // Rm_17.95{94} //
S01ratnml_u:7212: tat kiṃ te sneharāgeṇa vṛddhāyā mayi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_17.96{95} //
S01ratnml_u:7214: avaśyaṃ mṛtyur atrāvāṃ samākramya grasiṣyati // Rm_17.97{96} //
S01ratnml_u:7215: tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tvaṃ cāpi kiṃ kariṣyasi /
S01ratnml_u:7216: śocitveva niṣatsyāmi tvam apy evaṃ niṣatsyasi // Rm_17.98{97} //
S01ratnml_u:7217: avaśyam atra saṃsāre bhāvi bhāvā phalanty api /
S01ratnml_u:7218: kasyāpi bhūyate nātra bhāvi bhāvānyathā kvacit // Rm_17.99{98} //
S01ratnml_u:7220: yātā yānti ca yāsyaṃti dehaṃ tyaktvā yamālayaṃ // Rm_17.100{99} //
S01ratnml_u:7222: dharmiṇaḥ sadgatiṃ yātāḥ pāpino durgatiṃ gatāḥ // Rm_17.101{100} //
S01ratnml_u:7224: sasukhāni ca duḥkhāni bhuktvā bhramanti sarvadā // Rm_17.102{1} //
S01ratnml_u:7227: dharmam evātra saṃsāre karttavyaṃ yatnataḥ sadā // Rm_17.103{2} //
S01ratnml_u:7229: iti buddhaiḥ samākhyātaṃ tvayāpy etac chrutaṃ na kiṃ // Rm_17.104{3} //
S01ratnml_u:7230: tasmād ahaṃ munīndrasya śāsane śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7231: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dharttum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ prabho // Rm_17.105{4} //
S01ratnml_u:7233: sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāṃ // Rm_17.106{5} //
S01ratnml_u:7234: etad dharmavibhāgena tvaṃ cāpi sadgatiṃ vrajeḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7235: iti matvā tathā svāmiṃs tad anujñāṃ dadātu me // Rm_17.107{6} //
S01ratnml_u:7236: tvam atra svagṛhe sthitvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7237: yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā śubhe cara sadādarāt // Rm_17.108{7} //
S01ratnml_u:7238: etatpuṇyavipākena tvaṃ cāpy evaṃ sudhīr bhaveḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7239: tatas te saugate dharme vāṃchā jāyeta cetasi // Rm_17.109{8} //
S01ratnml_u:7240: tatas tvaṃ śraddhayā gatvā saṃbuddhaśāsane svayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7241: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ prāpya sākṣād arhatvam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_17.110{9} //
S01ratnml_u:7242: iti matvā bhavān svāmin saddharmaṃ yadi vāñchati /
S01ratnml_u:7243: tat pravrajyāvratānujñāṃ mahyaṃ pradātum arhati // Rm_17.111{10} //
S01ratnml_u:7244: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sa daridraḥ prabodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7245: tāṃ bhāryāṃ suciraṃ dṛṣṭvā śanair evam abhāṣata // Rm_17.112{11} //
S01ratnml_u:7246: hā priye katham eva tvaṃ māṃ vihātuṃ samichasi /
S01ratnml_u:7247: kim atrāhaṃ vadiṣyāmi tvayaivaṃ pratibhāṣate // Rm_17.113{12} //
S01ratnml_u:7248: yadi te 'sti mano dhairyyaṃ kṛtvā śraddhānvitāśrayā /
S01ratnml_u:7249: pravraja saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā cara satyasamāhitā // Rm_17.114{13} //
S01ratnml_u:7250: iti bhartroditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhāpi kacaṃgalā /
S01ratnml_u:7251: bharttāraṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ tato 'carat pramoditā // Rm_17.115{14} //
S01ratnml_u:7252: tataḥ sā sahasā gatvā tatrāśrame upāgatā /
S01ratnml_u:7253: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya purataḥ samupācarat // Rm_17.116{15} //
S01ratnml_u:7254: tatra tat purato gatvā sāñjaliḥ sā pramoditā /
S01ratnml_u:7255: munīndraṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_17.117{16} //
S01ratnml_u:7256: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:7257: tad bhavāṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā mahyaṃ pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_17.118{17} //
S01ratnml_u:7258: tayeti prārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7259: savyena pāṇinā tasyā vṛddhāyāḥ śirasi spṛśan // Rm_17.119{18} //
S01ratnml_u:7260: ehi mataś cara brahmacārikāṃ tvaṃ samāhitā /
S01ratnml_u:7261: ity uktvā tāṃ samāgṛhya sāṃghike punar abravīt // Rm_17.120{19} //
S01ratnml_u:7262: gacha māta prajāpatyā gautamyāḥ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
S01ratnml_u:7263: sārhantī bhikṣuṇīmātā pravrajyāṃ te pradāsyati // Rm_17.121{20} //
S01ratnml_u:7264: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā pratinaṃditā /
S01ratnml_u:7265: tathety āśrutya śāstāraṃ taṃ praṇatvā tato 'carat // Rm_17.122{21} //
S01ratnml_u:7266: tatra sā samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā tāṃ gautamīṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7268: upetya sāṃjalir natvā pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_17.123{22} //
S01ratnml_u:7269: mātar atra samāyāmi bhavatyāḥ śaraṇaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7270: tad bhavantī jaganmātā pravrajyāṃ pradadātu me // Rm_17.124{23} //
S01ratnml_u:7272: hastena śirasi spṛṣṭvā sāṃghikatāṃ samagrahīt // Rm_17.125{24} //
S01ratnml_u:7277: tataḥ sā bhikṣuṇī śāstu gautamyāś ca prasādataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7284: sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya vabhūva brahmacāriṇī // Rm_17.131{32} //
S01ratnml_u:7290: vaṃdyā pūjyābhimānyā ca vabhūva sā subhāṣiṇī // Rm_17.134{35} //
S01ratnml_u:7291: yadā sa bhagavañ chāstā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7293: tadā sā bhikṣuṇī tatra kacaṃgalā subhāṣiṇī /
S01ratnml_u:7295: tac chrutvā bhagavāṃs tatra tayā sūtrāṃtadeśite /
S01ratnml_u:7296: sarvāns tān sāṃghikān bhikṣūn samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_17.137{38} //
S01ratnml_u:7299: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7300: savismayā munīndraṃ taṃ paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_17.139{40} //
S01ratnml_u:7301: bhagavann anayā karmaṃ kiṃ prakṛtaṃ purākṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7302: imān sarvān sabhāsīnān prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_17.140{41} //
S01ratnml_u:7304: sākṣād arhatvam āsādya bhavati brahmacāriṇī // Rm_17.141{42} //
S01ratnml_u:7305: kiṃ vānayā purākarma kṛtaṃ kutra kadā kathaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7307: kiṃcāpi prakṛtaṃ karmaṃ purānayā kadā kathaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7308: yenātra paścime garbhāvāse na dhārito bhavān // Rm_17.143{44} //
S01ratnml_u:7309: etat sarvaiḥ parijñāya bhagavānn asyāḥ purākṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7310: imān sarvān sabhāsīnān prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_17.144{45} //
S01ratnml_u:7312: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7313: sarvāṃs tān sāṃghikān dṛṣṭvā samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_17.145{46} //
S01ratnml_u:7314: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad yat kṛtaṃ purānayā /
S01ratnml_u:7315: tat tat sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi yuṣmākaṃ cittabodhane // Rm_17.146{47} //
S01ratnml_u:7317: paṃcajanmaśatāny eṣā janany āsīn niraṃtaraṃ // Rm_17.147{48} //
S01ratnml_u:7318: tadā me dadato dānam antarāyaḥ kṛto 'nayā /
S01ratnml_u:7319: tenādyāpi daridreyaṃ durbhagā ca bhavaty api // Rm_17.148{49} //
S01ratnml_u:7320: pravrajyāyai tadai caiṣā vahudhā prārthitā mayā /
S01ratnml_u:7321: naivānujñāṃ dadau mahyaṃ vighnam eva vyadhād dhaṭhāt // Rm_17.149{50} //
S01ratnml_u:7323: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ prāptā carati mama śāsane // Rm_17.150{51} //
S01ratnml_u:7324: yadi naiṣā tadā dānaṃ vighnā mamākariṣyati /
S01ratnml_u:7325: naiṣādhunā daridrātra bhavati hi kadā cana // Rm_17.151{52} //
S01ratnml_u:7326: pravrajyāyāṃ ca me vighnaṃ yadi naiṣākariṣyata /
S01ratnml_u:7327: acariṣyad vrataṃ vālye na tu vṛddhātra sāṃprataṃ // Rm_17.152{53} //
S01ratnml_u:7328: yan mamaivaṃ kṛtaṃ vighnaṃ dāne vrate tadānayā /
S01ratnml_u:7329: tenādhunā daridraiṣā vṛddhā vrataṃ caraty api // Rm_17.153{54} //
S01ratnml_u:7330: yat tadā sukṛtaṃ kiṃ cit prakṛtaṃ nānayā purā /
S01ratnml_u:7331: tenāhaṃ paścime garbhāvāse 'dhunā na dhāritaḥ // Rm_17.154{55} //
S01ratnml_u:7333: tenāhaṃ paścime garbhāvāse tayātra dhāritaḥ // Rm_17.155{56} //
S01ratnml_u:7334: bhūyo 'py eṣā purā tatra vāraṇasyāṃ dvijātmajāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7337: śāsane śaraṇaṃ gatvā pravrajitācarad vrataṃ // Rm_17.157{58} //
S01ratnml_u:7340: tadā sā bhikṣuṇī tatra kiñcit kāryārtharoṣitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7341: sarvās tā bhikṣuṇīr dāsīvādena paryabhāṣata // Rm_17.159{60} //
S01ratnml_u:7344: yac cānayā tadā tatra vidyābhyāsīkṛtaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7346: yac cāpy esā tadā tatra sūtrāntaṃ samupādiśat /
S01ratnml_u:7347: tena sūtrāntavaktānām agrā bhavati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_17.162{63} //
S01ratnml_u:7348: evaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ sarve manyadhvaṃ karmasaṃbhavaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7349: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca saṃsāre bhramatāṃ sarvadehināṃ // Rm_17.163{64} //
S01ratnml_u:7350: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ tenaivaṃ bhujyate phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7351: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karmaṃ kvāpi kadā cana // Rm_17.164{65} //
S01ratnml_u:7352: nāgnibhir dahyate karmaṃ klidyate nodakair api /
S01ratnml_u:7353: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate naiva kṣīyate na ca bhūmiṣu // Rm_17.165{66} //
S01ratnml_u:7355: ahyathāpi bhaven naiva vipāke karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7356: yad uptaṃ bhūtale bījaṃ tad eva sūyate phalaṃ // Rm_17.166{67} //
S01ratnml_u:7357: anyathā na bhavet kvāpi kṛtaṃ karmaṃ phalaṃ bhave /
S01ratnml_u:7358: śubhasya karmaṇaḥ pāke śubhataiva sadā bhave // Rm_17.167{68} //
S01ratnml_u:7360: evaṃ vijñāya kṛṣṇāni vihāya miśritāni ca // Rm_17.168{69} //
S01ratnml_u:7361: śubha eva sadāpy atra caritavyaṃ śubhārthibhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7362: śubhena sadgatiṃ yāyāt kṛṣṇena durgatiṃ sadā // Rm_17.169{70} //
S01ratnml_u:7363: miśritena tathohe ca gatīr yāyād bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7365: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_17.170{71} //
S01ratnml_u:7366: ye bhajanti sadā buddhaṃ na te gacchanti durgatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7367: sarvadā sadgatau bhadraṃ kṛtvā yānti jinālayaṃ // Rm_17.171{72} //
S01ratnml_u:7368: ye śṛṇvanti sadā dharmmaṃ na yānti te 'pi durgatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7369: sarvadā bhadrasaukhyāni bhuktvā yānti sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_17.172{73} //
S01ratnml_u:7370: dānaṃ dadanti ye saṃghe te 'pi na yānti durgatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7371: sarvadā śubhasaukhyāni bhuktvā yānti jināśrayaṃ // Rm_17.173{74} //
S01ratnml_u:7372: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7373: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajadhvaṃ samupāsthitāḥ // Rm_17.174{75} //
S01ratnml_u:7382: jitvā māragaṇāñ cāpi prāpya saṃbodhim uttamāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7383: sarvatra dharmasotkṛtvā tato nirvṛtim āyayuḥ // Rm_17.179{80} //
S01ratnml_u:7385: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtipadam āgatāḥ // Rm_17.180{81} //
S01ratnml_u:7387: puṇyair bodhiṃ samāsādya gacheyur nirvṛtiṃ tathā // Rm_17.181{82} //
S01ratnml_u:7389: puṇyair evaṃ kramād bodhiṃ prāpya yāsyanti nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_17.182{83} //
S01ratnml_u:7392: tathāham api sarvatra kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat /
S01ratnml_u:7393: sarvān bodhau niyojyaivaṃ yāsyāmi nirvṛtiṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_17.184{85} //
S01ratnml_u:7394: evaṃ ye ye bhajanty atra triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7395: te te sarve 'pi saṃbodhiṃ prāpya nirvṛtim āyayuḥ // Rm_17.185{86} //
S01ratnml_u:7398: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracaradhvaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_17.186{87} //
S01ratnml_u:7400: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpsyatha // Rm_17.187{88} //
S01ratnml_u:7401: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7402: sāṃghikāś ca tathety uktvā prābhyanaṃdat prabodhitāḥ // Rm_17.188{89} //
S01ratnml_u:7403: tadā tatra janāḥ sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7407: iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
S01ratnml_u:7408: śrutvā rājans tvam apy evaṃ triratnaṃ bhaja sarvadā // Rm_17.191{92} //
S01ratnml_u:7409: prajāś cāpi tathā dharmaṃ śrāvayitvā prabodhayan /
S01ratnml_u:7411: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7412: kramāt pāramitā pūrya bodhiṃ cāpi samāpsyasi // Rm_17.193{94} //
S01ratnml_u:7414: tathā hīti pratijñāya prābhyanandan sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_17.194{95} //
S01ratnml_u:7415: kacaṃgalāyā avadānam etac chṛṇvanti ye śrāvayatīha yaś ca /
S01ratnml_u:7416: vihāya pāpaṃ khalu te 'pi sarve bhuktvā sukhāny eva sugatiṃ vrajanti // Rm_17.195{96} //
S01ratnml_u:7421: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_18.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:7422: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7423: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_18.2{2} //
S01ratnml_u:7424: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7425: upagupto narendraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_18.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:7426: śṛṇu rājan samādhāya yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7429: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_18.5{5} //
S01ratnml_u:7430: bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ bhikṣuṇībhiś ca cailakaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7436: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tatra sarve samāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7439: garuḍā nāgarājāś ca vidyādharāś ca dānavāḥ // Rm_18.10{10} //
S01ratnml_u:7441: brahmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā bhūpā rājāno 'pi narādhipāḥ // Rm_18.11{11} //
S01ratnml_u:7442: tathā rājakumārāś ca vaiśyā maṃtrijanā api /
S01ratnml_u:7443: gṛhasthāḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ paurāḥ sārthavāhā mahājanāḥ // Rm_18.12{12} //
S01ratnml_u:7445: grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi tathā kārpaṭikā api // Rm_18.13{13} //
S01ratnml_u:7447: sarve te samupāyātās tatrādrākṣus tam īśvaraṃ // Rm_18.14{14} //
S01ratnml_u:7449: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya sarve te samupāśritāḥ // Rm_18.15{15} //
S01ratnml_u:7452: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_18.16{16} //
S01ratnml_u:7453: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:7457: tadā te dharmavaiśeṣyaṃ matvā pratinanaṃdire // Rm_18.18{18} //
S01ratnml_u:7458: tadā tatra mahāpūryyāṃ vaiśālyāṃ pauriko mahān /
S01ratnml_u:7459: gṛhastho dhaniko nāma śrīmān sarvaguṇī sudhīḥ // Rm_18.19{19} //
S01ratnml_u:7463: tanayaś ca vaṃdānyākhyaḥ satyavatyabhidhā snuṣā // Rm_18.21{21} //
S01ratnml_u:7464: tadā tatra dvijā sarve bhaktimanto jagadguroḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7465: pūjānimaṃtraṇe cakruḥ samayaṃ saṃmatās tathā // Rm_18.22{22} //
S01ratnml_u:7469: ato nimaṃtraṇīyo 'tra sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya nānyathā // Rm_18.24{24} //
S01ratnml_u:7470: ekaś cet kurute dravyamadād asya nimaṃtraṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7472: tadā sa dhaniko 'jñātvā samayaṃ tais tathā kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7473: svayam eva munīndraṃ taṃ pūjayituṃ samichata // Rm_18.26{26} //
S01ratnml_u:7475: svayaṃ nimaṃtraṇaṃ karttuṃ sasaṃghasya muner yayau // Rm_18.27{27} //
S01ratnml_u:7476: tatra sa samupāsṛtya natvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7477: sasaṃghaṃ tat puraḥ sthitvā prārthayad eva sāṃjaliḥ // Rm_18.28{28} //
S01ratnml_u:7479: pūjayituṃ samichāmi paśyan me 'nugrahaṃ kuru // Rm_18.29{29} //
S01ratnml_u:7480: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7481: tathā hīti pratiśrutvā tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_18.30{30} //
S01ratnml_u:7482: tadā te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve saṃbhūya samupāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7483: bhagavataś caraṇau natvā cakrur bhojyanimaṃtraṇaṃ // Rm_18.31{31} //
S01ratnml_u:7484: tac chrutvā bhagavān prāha tān dṛṣṭvā bhaktimānasān /
S01ratnml_u:7485: pūrvam eva sasaṃghāham anenodya nimaṃtritaḥ // Rm_18.32{32} //
S01ratnml_u:7486: etad ākarṇya sarve te brāhmaṇā bheditāśayāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7487: paraṃ pratīkṣyamānāś ca śanaiḥ svasvagṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_18.33{33} //
S01ratnml_u:7489: muditas taṃ muniṃ natvā sahasā svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_18.34{34} //
S01ratnml_u:7490: tatra sa svagṛhe gatvā vāṃdhaveṣṭajanais saha /
S01ratnml_u:7493: ratnadhvajair vitānaiś ca sa patākair amaṇḍayat // Rm_18.36{36} //
S01ratnml_u:7497: tataḥ sa prātar utthāya snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7500: sāñjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_18.39{39} //
S01ratnml_u:7502: tat sasaṃgho mamāvāse vijayituṃ samarhasi // Rm_18.40{40} //
S01ratnml_u:7503: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7505: tatra sa bhagavān mārge kṛtvā bhadraṃ samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7508: dṛṣṭvā vaiśālikāḥ lokāḥ sarve 'pi samapūjayan // Rm_18.43{43} //
S01ratnml_u:7510: bhāsayan bhadratāṃ kṛtvā saṃghaiḥ saha samācarat // Rm_18.44{44} //
S01ratnml_u:7511: tatra tasya gṛhe gatvā sasaṃghaḥ sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7512: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svāsane samupāśrayat // Rm_18.45{45} //
S01ratnml_u:7513: tatas te sāṃghikāś cāpi sarve tatra yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7514: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svasvāsane samāśrayan // Rm_18.46{46} //
S01ratnml_u:7515: tataḥ sa dhaniko dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7519: tadbhojyaṃ surasaṃ bhuktvā bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7520: amṛtair iva saṃtuṣṭas tṛptiṃ yayau pramoditaḥ // Rm_18.49{49} //
S01ratnml_u:7521: asaṃghaiḥ taṃ muniṃ tṛptaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dhaniko mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7524: buddhapramukhasaṃghebhyo muditaḥ sa svayaṃ dadau // Rm_18.51{51} //
S01ratnml_u:7525: tataḥ sa harṣito natvā taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7526: purataḥ sāñjaliḥ sthitvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_18.52{52} //
S01ratnml_u:7527: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7528: bhaktyaiva bhajanaṃ kurve tat kṣamasvāparādhatāṃ // Rm_18.53{53} //
S01ratnml_u:7529: sadaivaṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭya paśyan bhavān sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7530: mamānugraham ādhāya trātum arhati sarvathā // Rm_18.54{54} //
S01ratnml_u:7532: dhanikaṃ taṃ samālokya naṃdayann evam ādiśat // Rm_18.55{55} //
S01ratnml_u:7533: gṛhapate sadā nityam ārogyam astu vo dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7534: bodhipraṇidhisiddhiś ca bhūyād bhadraṃ ca sarvadā // Rm_18.56{56} //
S01ratnml_u:7535: tatas tasya priyā bhāryā śīlavaty anumoditā /
S01ratnml_u:7536: sāñjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā prārthayat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_18.57{57} //
S01ratnml_u:7537: bhagavan nātha sarvajña śvaś cātra bhavatām ahaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7539: pūjāṃ kartuṃ samicche tad anugrahītum arhati // Rm_18.58{58} //
S01ratnml_u:7540: tayeti prārthite dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa tad āśayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7542: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā samutthāya sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7543: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kṛtvā svāśrame ca samāśrayat // Rm_18.60{60} //
S01ratnml_u:7545: sādhitvā sarvasāmagrīṃ sā dūtaṃ preṣayan munau // Rm_18.61{61} //
S01ratnml_u:7546: sa dūtaḥ sahasā gatvā vihare taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7547: sasaṃghaṃ sāṃjalir natvā punar evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_18.62{62} //
S01ratnml_u:7549: tat sasaṃgho bhavāṃs tatra sahasāgantum arhati // Rm_18.63{63} //
S01ratnml_u:7550: tataḥ sa bhagavānn evaṃ bhadraṃ kṛtvā sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7551: dhanikasya gṛhe gatvā pādyaṃ gṛhyāsane 'viśat // Rm_18.64{64} //
S01ratnml_u:7553: dṛṣṭvā śīlavatī sātha yathāvidhi samarcayat // Rm_18.65{65} //
S01ratnml_u:7554: tataś ca sā muditā sarvaṃ saṃghaṃ buddhādikaṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7557: datvā tāmvurapūgādiṃ natvā sā samupāśrayat // Rm_18.67{67} //
S01ratnml_u:7558: tataḥ sa bhagavān tasmai datvāśiṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7559: samutthāya tataś caivaṃ svavihāre samāśrayat // Rm_18.68{68} //
S01ratnml_u:7561: tat paredyu vihāraṃ taṃ gatvā natvā nyamaṃtrayat // Rm_18.69{69} //
S01ratnml_u:7562: bhagavānn api tasyaivaṃ dṛṣṭvā śraddhānvitaṃ manaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7564: tataḥ sas taṃ muniṃ natvā svagṛhaṃ sahasāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7567: vihāre samupāsṛtya natvaivaṃ munim abravīt // Rm_18.72{72} //
S01ratnml_u:7569: tat saṃgho bhavān gehe mamāgantuṃ samarhati // Rm_18.73{73} //
S01ratnml_u:7570: tataḥ sasaṃgha utthāya bhagavān sa tathācarat /
S01ratnml_u:7571: tadgṛhe pādyam ādāya tatrāsane samāśrayat // Rm_18.74{74} //
S01ratnml_u:7575: datvā pūgādikaṃ natvā purataḥ samupāśrayat // Rm_18.76{76} //
S01ratnml_u:7576: punaḥ sa sāṃjalir natvā prakṛtvā ca kṣamārthanāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7577: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīndraṃ tam saṃdṛṣṭvaivaṃ samupāśrayat // Rm_18.77{77} //
S01ratnml_u:7578: tadā tasya snuṣā cāpi satyavatī pramoditā /
S01ratnml_u:7579: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghaṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ nyamaṃtrayat // Rm_18.78{78} //
S01ratnml_u:7581: bhagavānn api tasyāś ca dṛṣṭva śraddhānvitaṃ manaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7582: tatheti pratimoditvā tuṣṇībhūtvā radhāṃ vyadhāt // Rm_18.79{79} //
S01ratnml_u:7583: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasmai datvāśiṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7584: tathā kṛtvā śubhaṃ loke gatvāśrame samāśrayat // Rm_18.80{80} //
S01ratnml_u:7585: tataḥ sāpi tathā prātaḥ snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtā /
S01ratnml_u:7586: dūtenāpi munīndraṃ taṃ sasaṃghaṃ samacodayat // Rm_18.81{81} //
S01ratnml_u:7587: tathā sa bhagavāṃś cāpi sasāṃghikaḥ samutthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7588: pracaran bhadratāṃ kṛtvā tasyā gehe samāviśat // Rm_18.82{82} //
S01ratnml_u:7589: tatra pādyārgham ādāya bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7590: śubhāsane samāsīnas tasthau tatra prabhāsayan // Rm_18.83{83} //
S01ratnml_u:7592: yathāvidhi samabhyarcya tathā bhojyair atoṣayat // Rm_18.84{84} //
S01ratnml_u:7593: tātas taṃ sugataṃ tṛptaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ samīkṣya sā /
S01ratnml_u:7595: tataḥ pūgādikaṃ datvā prārthayitvā kṣamāṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7596: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ muniṃ natvā sā sāñjalir upāśrayat // Rm_18.86{86} //
S01ratnml_u:7597: tathā sa bhagavāṃs tasyai datvāśīṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7598: tato vihāyasā gatvā svāśrame ca samāśrayat // Rm_18.87{87} //
S01ratnml_u:7599: tathā sa dhaniko bhaktyā bhagavantaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7602: sasaṃgho bhagavānn evaṃ divyabhogair nimaṃtritaḥ // Rm_18.89{90} //
S01ratnml_u:7603: tac chrutvā tad dvijāḥ sarve vaiśālikāḥ prajā api /
S01ratnml_u:7605: tatas te saṃmataṃ kṛtvā sarve viprāḥ sapaurikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7606: dhanikāya puraṃ kruddhāś cakrur nikāsanodyamaṃ // Rm_18.91{92} //
S01ratnml_u:7607: evaṃ tat samataṃ jñātvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7608: dhanikaṃ taṃ samāhūya pura evam upādiśat // Rm_18.92{93} //
S01ratnml_u:7609: sādho gṛhapate sarve ime vaiśālikā dvijāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7610: kruddhās te saṃghabhojye 'tra hy alabdhāvasarā mama // Rm_18.93{94} //
S01ratnml_u:7611: tad atra tvaṃ kṣamāṃ kṛtvā dvijān sarvān prabodhaya /
S01ratnml_u:7612: kṛtvātra vinayaṃ dharme prasādayitum arhasi // Rm_18.94{95} //
S01ratnml_u:7613: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa dhanikas tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7614: ity āśrutya dvijān sarvān samupetyaivam abravīt // Rm_18.95{96} //
S01ratnml_u:7615: bhavanto na mayā jñātaṃ bhavatāṃ kopakāraṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7616: tad atra me samākhyāta yad arthe kupyate 'dhunā // Rm_18.96{97} //
S01ratnml_u:7617: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te brāhmaṇā /
S01ratnml_u:7620: dhanikaṃ taṃ samāmaṃtrya bodhayituṃ samabravīt // Rm_18.98{99} //
S01ratnml_u:7623: tathā tat te pravakṣyāmi śrutvā tat pratibudhyatāṃ // Rm_18.99{100} //
S01ratnml_u:7627: ato nimaṃtraṇīyo 'tra sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya nānyathā // Rm_18.101{2} //
S01ratnml_u:7628: ekaś cet kurute vittamadād asya nimaṃtraṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7630: ity asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ sādho samayaṃ sarvasaṃmataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7631: tad vilaṃghya tvayaikena śāstuḥ pūjā kṛtā sadā // Rm_18.103{4} //
S01ratnml_u:7632: etad dheto ime sārve brāhmaṇā ruṣitās tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7634: kiṃ cāpi bhagavān atra sarvadā sthāsyate na hi /
S01ratnml_u:7635: tat sarve bhagavatpūjāṃ kartuṃ vāṃchanti sāṃprataṃ // Rm_18.105{6} //
S01ratnml_u:7636: yac cāyaṃ bhagavāñ chāstā dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7639: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya caraty ayaṃ samaṃtataḥ // Rm_18.107{8} //
S01ratnml_u:7643: dātum arhasi sarveṣām api puṇyapravṛddhaye // Rm_18.109{10} //
S01ratnml_u:7644: eka eva tvaṃ evaṃ tu mā kṛthā bhajanaṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:7645: sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya te sāstuḥ karttavyaṃ bhajanaṃ sadā // Rm_18.110{11} //
S01ratnml_u:7646: iti tenoditam śrutvā dhanikaḥ sa vivodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7647: brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ samālokya praṇatvaivam abhāṣata // Rm_18.111{12} //
S01ratnml_u:7648: mayā na jñāyate hy evaṃ bhavadbhiḥ samayaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7649: tad atra me 'parādhatvaṃ kṣantum arhanti sarvathā // Rm_18.112{13} //
S01ratnml_u:7650: yadi vo vidyate śraddhā triratnabhajane sadā /
S01ratnml_u:7651: kurudhvaṃ sarvadāpy atra saṃbuddhabhajanaṃ khalu // Rm_18.113{14} //
S01ratnml_u:7652: yadā na vidyate pūjā saṃbuddhe 'smin sasāṃghike /
S01ratnml_u:7654: iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te dvijāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7655: satyam iti parijñāya vabhūvus tat prasāditāḥ // Rm_18.115{16} //
S01ratnml_u:7656: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saha paurikaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7658: tatra te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve sametya saha paurikaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7659: sāñjalayo munīndraṃ taṃ natvaivaṃ prārthayan mudā // Rm_18.117{18} //
S01ratnml_u:7660: bhagavan nātha sarvajña trimāsyaṃ bhavatāṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:7661: satkāraṃ kartum ichāma tvadanujñāṃ dadātu naḥ // Rm_18.118{19} //
S01ratnml_u:7662: iti taiḥ prārthite sarvair dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavān muniḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7666: matvā sapaurikā natvā taṃ muṇiṃ svapure 'caran // Rm_18.120{21} //
S01ratnml_u:7667: tatra te paurikā viprāḥ śodhayitvā samamṭataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7668: bhojyakṣatre dhvajair uccair vitānaiḥ paryaśobhayan // Rm_18.121{22} //
S01ratnml_u:7670: kṛtvā sarve 'pi te lokā mahotsāhaṃ pracakrire // Rm_18.122{23} //
S01ratnml_u:7671: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ prātaḥ snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7672: tatrāśrame sametyaivaṃ natvā taṃ prārthayan muniṃ // Rm_18.123{24} //
S01ratnml_u:7674: tat sasaṃgho bhavāṃs tatra pure āgantum arhati // Rm_18.124{25} //
S01ratnml_u:7675: tataḥ sa bhagavān buddhaḥ sasaṃghaś cīvarāvṛtaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7677: tatra mārgeṣu sarvatra bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7678: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kṛtvā pracaraṃs tatpure 'viśat // Rm_18.126{27} //
S01ratnml_u:7679: tatra sa bhagavān kṣetre suśodhite sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7680: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svāsane samupāśrayat // Rm_18.127{28} //
S01ratnml_u:7682: tatas taṃ sugataṃ tṛptaṃ saṃghaṃ cāpi vilokyate // Rm_18.128{29} //
S01ratnml_u:7683: tat pātrāṇy upanītvā tad dhastādīkaṃ vyaśodhayat /
S01ratnml_u:7685: datvā kṣamārthanaṃ kṛtvā taṃ sasaṃghaṃ praṇemire /
S01ratnml_u:7686: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve paurāś cāpi pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7687: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātim upātasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_18.130{31} //
S01ratnml_u:7688: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāṃs tān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:7690: tato bhadrāśiṣaṃ datvā bhagavān saha saṃghikaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7691: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kurvan gatvā svāśramam āśrayat // Rm_18.132{33} //
S01ratnml_u:7692: evaṃ vaiśālikā lokās te traimāsyaṃ niraṃtaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7694: tato 'nte dhanikaś cāpi patnī putraḥ snuṣāpi ca /
S01ratnml_u:7696: bhagavānn api tathā tebhyo datvā śubhāśiṣaṃ tataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7697: samutthāya sasaṃghaś ca gatvāśrame samāśrayat // Rm_18.135{36} //
S01ratnml_u:7701: sarvalokahitaṃ kṛtvā pracacāra śubhe sadā // Rm_18.137{38} //
S01ratnml_u:7702: tad dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve bhikṣavaḥ samupāśritāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7703: bhagavantaṃ praṇatvaivaṃ paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_18.138{39} //
S01ratnml_u:7704: bhagavan kiṃ purānena dhanikena vṛṣaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7705: kutra kathaṃ kadaitan naḥ sarvam ākhyātum arhati // Rm_18.139{40} //
S01ratnml_u:7707: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7708: sarvāns tāṃ saṃghikān dṛṣṭvā tadaivaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_18.140{41} //
S01ratnml_u:7709: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad anena vṛṣaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7710: tat patnyā ca putreṇa snuṣayā ca tad ucyate // Rm_18.141{42} //
S01ratnml_u:7712: durbhikṣakṣapite kāle parāṃ durgatim āgataḥ // Rm_18.142{43} //
S01ratnml_u:7714: pāṭalokhyā snuṣā ceti vabhūvus tasya saṃmatāḥ // Rm_18.143{44} //
S01ratnml_u:7716: udyāne sāyam āgatya pratyekabuddha āśrayet // Rm_18.144{45} //
S01ratnml_u:7717: te sarve ekavastrā hi paryyāyena nṛpālaye /
S01ratnml_u:7718: datvā puṣpāṇi prāyātāḥ svabhavane niṣīdire // Rm_18.145{46} //
S01ratnml_u:7719: tadā sa ca gṛhasthās te tatrodāne jvalat prabhāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7720: dṛṣṭvā kiṃ mahojvālam udyāne iti vismitāḥ // Rm_18.146{47} //
S01ratnml_u:7722: sarvagatāḥ samīkṣantaḥ dadṛśus taṃ prabhāsayaṃ // Rm_18.147{48} //
S01ratnml_u:7723: tatra te samupāśritya dṛṣṭvā taṃ dhyānasaṃsthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7724: sāñjalayaḥ praṇatvaiva muditā svagṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_18.148{49} //
S01ratnml_u:7726: nirddhanās tad vyathāṃ prāpu lūnapakṣāḥ khagā iva // Rm_18.149{50} //
S01ratnml_u:7727: tadā sa mālikas tasmai pūjāṃ kartuṃ samutsukaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7728: tad dravyaṃ svagṛhe samyag anviṣya samalokayat // Rm_18.150{51} //
S01ratnml_u:7729: tatra gṛhe sa sarvatra samanviṣya samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7730: kañci mātram api dravyam alabdhaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_18.151{52} //
S01ratnml_u:7731: aho mayā purā pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ kiṃ yato 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:7732: akiṃcanyo daridro 'smi kim atra jīvitena me // Rm_18.152{53} //
S01ratnml_u:7733: yato na vidyate dravyaṃ kiṃ cid api gṛhe mama /
S01ratnml_u:7734: tat kena kariṣyāmi pūjām asya mahātmanaḥ // Rm_18.153{54} //
S01ratnml_u:7736: pratyekabuddha ātmajo dhyātvā tiṣṭhati bhāsayan // Rm_18.154{55} //
S01ratnml_u:7737: tad asya sugatasyātra karttavyā satkṛtir mayā /
S01ratnml_u:7738: kadāyaṃ puri ramyatra samāgachet svayaṃ punaḥ // Rm_18.155{56} //
S01ratnml_u:7739: tat prātaḥ śūnyapātreṇa gached ito mamātmavit /
S01ratnml_u:7740: tan mamātra bhave śūnyam iva janmāpi nisphalaṃ // Rm_18.156{57} //
S01ratnml_u:7741: yato mānyo 'bhipūjyo yaṃ pūjyate na kathaṃ cana /
S01ratnml_u:7742: tatra kiṃ jāyate bhadraṃ puṇyaṃ vāsya kathaṃ kutaḥ // Rm_18.157{58} //
S01ratnml_u:7743: puṇyaṃ vinātra saṃsāre kiṃ sāraṃ janma nisphalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7744: bhuktvāpi kiṃ sukhāny atra suciraṃ jīvite nanu // Rm_18.158{59} //
S01ratnml_u:7745: puṇyārthe jīvitaṃ janma tad atra yadi naśyati /
S01ratnml_u:7746: kim eva jīvitenāpi janmanā pāpasādhinā // Rm_18.159{60} //
S01ratnml_u:7747: tan mṛtyur me varaṃ hy atra na mithyācirajīvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7748: avaśyam eva saṃsāre sarvatra maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_18.160{61} //
S01ratnml_u:7749: kim evaṃ dehapuṣṭena bhuktvā duḥkhāṃ sarvadā /
S01ratnml_u:7750: tat kenāpi pradānena pūjayeyam imaṃ jinaṃ // Rm_18.161{62} //
S01ratnml_u:7752: puṇyena sadgatiṃ yāyāṃ pāpena durgatiṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:7753: tat pāpaṃ parityaktuṃ puṇyaṃ prāptu yateya hi // Rm_18.162{63} //
S01ratnml_u:7754: yady atra pūjyate nāyaṃ drakṣyate ca kadā kuha /
S01ratnml_u:7755: buddhapūjāṃ vinā bhadre puṇyaṃ ca lapsyate kutaḥ // Rm_18.163{64} //
S01ratnml_u:7756: yāvan na prāpyate puṇyaṃ tāvad durgaticāraṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7757: tasmāt puṇyaṃ prayatnena karttavyaṃ sukhatāptaye // Rm_18.164{65} //
S01ratnml_u:7758: tad atra śraddhayā kiṃcin mātreṇāpi svavastunā /
S01ratnml_u:7761: bhāryāṃ putraṃ snuṣāṃ cāpi samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_18.166{67} //
S01ratnml_u:7762: aye priye snuṣe putra yūyaṃ śṛṇuta madvacaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7763: yad atra kartum ichāmi tatra yūyaṃ prasādataḥ // Rm_18.167{68} //
S01ratnml_u:7764: yad atrāyaṃ mahābhijñaḥ svayam eva samāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7765: asmākaṃ gṛhe dravyaṃ kiñcit mātraṃ na vidyate // Rm_18.168{69} //
S01ratnml_u:7766: tat kenātra kariṣyāmaḥ pūjām asya mahātmanaḥ // Rm_18.169{69/} //
S01ratnml_u:7767: yadi na pūjyate 'smābhiḥ sugato 'yaṃ munir yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7768: tadā puṇyaṃ vayaṃ kutra lapsyāmahe kadā kathaṃ // Rm_18.170{70} //
S01ratnml_u:7769: puṇyaṃ vinātra saṃsāre nisphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7770: tad vayaṃ puṇyato prāptuṃ yatema sarvathā vayaṃ // Rm_18.171{71} //
S01ratnml_u:7771: puṇyena sadgatiṃ prāpya pāpena durgatiṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:7772: tat sadgatisukhaprāptyai puṇyaṃ kurvīmahi dhruvaṃ // Rm_18.172{72} //
S01ratnml_u:7774: anenāpy enam āchādya prabhajamahi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_18.173{73} //
S01ratnml_u:7776: etat me vacanaṃ śrutvābhyanumoditum arhatha // Rm_18.174{74} //
S01ratnml_u:7777: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā patnī putraḥ snuṣāpi te /
S01ratnml_u:7778: sarve 'py abhyanumoditvā tathā kurv iti procire // Rm_18.175{76/} //
S01ratnml_u:7779: ity etat samayaṃ kṛtvā sarve te śraddhayānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7780: gatvā tenaikavastreṇa taṃ prāchādya samārcayan // Rm_18.176{77} //
S01ratnml_u:7781: tatas te muditāḥ sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭā muneḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7782: tasya pādau praṇatvaivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ pracakrire // Rm_18.177{78} //
S01ratnml_u:7785: śāstāraṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ samārādhya sadā bhave /
S01ratnml_u:7787: iti tair muditaiḥ sarvaiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7788: viditvā sa mahāvijñas tathāstv iti samādiśat // Rm_18.180{81} //
S01ratnml_u:7789: tatas tesāṃ manoharṣaṃ kṛtvā sa sugato muniḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7790: tata uḍḍīya pakṣīva bhāsayan svāśrame yayau // Rm_18.181{82} //
S01ratnml_u:7791: tad dṛṣṭvā te nanditāḥ sarve buddhadharmānuśaṃsinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7792: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pracerire sukhaṃ sadā // Rm_18.182{83} //
S01ratnml_u:7797: bhavanty alaghvyāḥ saṃkalpaiḥ saṃpadaḥ satvaśālināṃ // Rm_18.184{85} //
S01ratnml_u:7798: buddhakṣetreṣu yat karma sukṛtaṃ duḥkṛtaṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7799: mahattaratvam āsādya phalaty eva sadā bhave // Rm_18.185{86} //
S01ratnml_u:7800: iti matvātra saṃsāre karttavyaṃ sukṛtaṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:7802: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7804: tac chrutvā brāhmaṇās te 'pi tatpuṇyavismitā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:7806: tathā te brāhmaṇāś cāpi sarve 'pi paurikās tathā /
S01ratnml_u:7808: helārpitaṃ ratnadhanaṃ tṛṇāgraṃ śraddhāvatīrṇaṃ tṛṇam apy anarghaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7809: anekaśobhānubhavaṃ hi cittaṃ cittaṃ nimittaṃ śubhasaṃbhavānāṃ // Rm_18.190{91} //
S01ratnml_u:7810: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
S01ratnml_u:7811: śrutvāpy evaṃ mahārāja karttavyaṃ sukṛtaṃ sadā // Rm_18.191{92} //
S01ratnml_u:7813: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_18.192{94} //
S01ratnml_u:7815: tathā hīti pratijñāya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_18.193{95} //
S01ratnml_u:7816: idaṃ narā ye dhanikāvadānaṃ śṛṇvanti ye cāpi niśāmayanti /
S01ratnml_u:7817: sukhāni bhuktvā sa śubhe sadā te sarve 'pi śamyānti jinālayan te /
S01ratnml_u:7822: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_19.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:7823: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7824: tadyathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭum ca me 'rhati // Rm_19.2{2} //
S01ratnml_u:7825: iti sāṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhaṃ mahāmatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7826: upagupto narendraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_19.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:7827: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7828: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvaivaṃ paribudhyatāṃ // Rm_19.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:7829: krauryeṇa dvirasanāḥ śuciveṣṭitānāṃ mithyāpavādaviṣamaṃ viṣam utsṛjanti /
S01ratnml_u:7836: dhenuvatsā vane naṣṭā vabhūvur yūthanirgatāḥ // Rm_19.8{8} //
S01ratnml_u:7837: tadā sa brāhmaṇo dṛṣṭvā taṃ duṣṭāśitaśaṃkitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7838: sarvatrāpi samanviṣṭā tatrāpy anveṣituṃ yayau // Rm_19.9{9} //
S01ratnml_u:7840: dhūmaṃ sa dvija ālokya vatsapākam amanyata // Rm_19.10{10} //
S01ratnml_u:7841: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ sārddhaṃ svajanaiḥ śastrapāṇibhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7842: tad draṣṭuṃ śailam āruhya sahasāgāt tadantike // Rm_19.11{11} //
S01ratnml_u:7843: tatra taṃ raivataṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dvija ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:7845: tad dṛṣṭvā śaṃkitaś cāsau vinayān samupāsaran /
S01ratnml_u:7846: kim etat kriyate bhikṣor iti taṃ paryapṛchata // Rm_19.13{13} //
S01ratnml_u:7847: iti pṛṣṭe dvijenāsau raivato bhikṣur ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:7848: tatra cīvararāgo 'yam iti taṃ dvijam abravīt // Rm_19.14{14} //
S01ratnml_u:7851: sukhaṃ duḥkhatvam ānāti śuklam apy eti kālatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7852: vidhau vidhuratāṃ yāte dharmo 'py āyāty adharmatāṃ // Rm_19.16{16} //
S01ratnml_u:7856: doṣaḥ samunmiṣati yāty aguṇaḥ prakāśaṃ kāryaṃ viparyayam upeti viśīryate dhīḥ // Rm_19.18{18} //
S01ratnml_u:7857: puṃsāṃ purāvihitaḥ duḥkṛtapākakāle ke ke na nāma nipatanti mahābhighātāḥ // Rm_19.19{19} //
S01ratnml_u:7858: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇo 'py atra kumbhe kim iti śaṃkitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7861: apaśyan sa dvijaḥ kumbhe māṃsapiṇḍaṃ supakvitaiḥ // Rm_19.21{21} //
S01ratnml_u:7864: aho vata sadācāraḥ sthito 'yaṃ vijane vane /
S01ratnml_u:7865: yasyedṛśāni karmāṇi na kasyacid iha paśyati // Rm_19.23{23} //
S01ratnml_u:7868: ity ukte tena sākṣepaṃ sa raivato 'py aciṃtayat /
S01ratnml_u:7869: doṣe pratyakṣalakṣyasmin kiṃ bravīmi niruttaraḥ // Rm_19.25{25} //
S01ratnml_u:7870: mama daivāya ghāto 'yam ity ukte ko 'numanyate /
S01ratnml_u:7872: upasthitaṃ sahe sarvaṃ maunam ālambya kevalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7873: ayaṃ me niḥpratīkāraḥ salilād agnidutthitaḥ // Rm_19.27{27} //
S01ratnml_u:7874: doṣe guṇātiśayam āśu guṇe 'pi doṣaṃ paiyūṣadhāmni viṣam apy amṛtaṃ viṣe ca //
S01ratnml_u:7875: saṃdarśayaty aniśam adbhutarūpam eva kālendrajālikāvadhūr bhavitavyeyaṃ // Rm_19.28{28} //
S01ratnml_u:7876: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā raivataḥ sa mahāmatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7878: iti dhyānaṃ samālambya sthitaṃ taṃ raivataṃ muniṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7880: are re durmate bhikṣo kiṃ atra durjane vane /
S01ratnml_u:7881: sthitvevaṃ dāruṇaṃ pāpaṃ sādhayitvā niṣīdasi // Rm_19.31{31} //
S01ratnml_u:7882: are pāpiṣṭha bhāṣasva yad arthe vālakāṃ vṛṣaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7883: hatvātra pacyate māṃsa tvayātmano pareṇa vā // Rm_19.32{32} //
S01ratnml_u:7884: pareṇāpi hataṃ dṛṣṭvā tat pāpaiḥ parilipyase /
S01ratnml_u:7885: tat tvayā vṛṣabhī hatvā kathaṃ pāpair na dahyase // Rm_19.33{33} //
S01ratnml_u:7886: dhig dhik tvām atra rebhikṣo saṃbuddhaśāsane yataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7887: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā nirjane vana āśrayan // Rm_19.34{34} //
S01ratnml_u:7889: are re śrūyate kiṃ na tvayā saṃbuddhabhāṣitaṃ // Rm_19.35{35} //
S01ratnml_u:7890: atha śrutvāpi te tatra śraddhā na vidyate khalu /
S01ratnml_u:7891: kim evaṃ pātakaṃ kṛtvā pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ caran // Rm_19.36{36} //
S01ratnml_u:7895: adattaṃ kasya cid dravyaṃ gṛhīyān na kathaṃ cana /
S01ratnml_u:7898: kāmabhogam adharmeṇa naiva bhuṃjyāt kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:7899: mṛṣāvādaṃ kadāpy atra naiva brūyāt kathaṃ cana // Rm_19.40{39} //
S01ratnml_u:7900: pāruṣyavacanaṃ cāpi naiva brūyāt kathaṃ cana /
S01ratnml_u:7901: paiśunyavacanaṃ vāpi vaden na kasya cit puraḥ // Rm_19.41{40} //
S01ratnml_u:7902: saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ ca na pravadet kasya cid api /
S01ratnml_u:7903: vyāpādaṃ kasya cic cāpi bhāvayen na kathaṃ cana // Rm_19.42{41} //
S01ratnml_u:7904: abhidhyāṃ ca tathā naiva ciṃtayet kasya cid api // Rm_19.43{42} //
S01ratnml_u:7905: mithyādṛṣṭiṃ sadā kvāpi bhāvayen na kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:7906: etāni daśapāpānāṃ mūlāni sarvathā tyajet // Rm_19.44{43} //
S01ratnml_u:7908: te sarve kleśasaṃtaptā bhramanti duḥkhino bhave // Rm_19.45{44} //
S01ratnml_u:7910: duḥkhāny eva sadā bhuktvā narakeṣu bhramanti te // Rm_19.46{45} //
S01ratnml_u:7911: iti matvātra saṃsāre tyaktvaitāni daśāpi hi /
S01ratnml_u:7912: santo nityam śubheṣv eva pracaranti samāhitāḥ // Rm_19.47{46} //
S01ratnml_u:7913: śubhena sadgatiṃ yānti papina durgatiṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:7914: ity ākhyātaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ kiṃ naitac chrūyate tvayā // Rm_19.48{47} //
S01ratnml_u:7915: katham etad avajñāya pravrajitas tvam ācareḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7916: dhik te cittaṃ yad evaṃ me govatsaṃ bhoktum ichati // Rm_19.49{48} //
S01ratnml_u:7924: sākṣād arhatvam āsādya brahmacaryaṃ samācaret // Rm_19.53{52} //
S01ratnml_u:7925: evaṃ pravrajito bhikṣuś caran nityaṃ suśīlabhṛt /
S01ratnml_u:7926: śivāṃ bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāt // Rm_19.54{53} //
S01ratnml_u:7928: kṛtvātra nirjane bhuktvā carase mlechacārikāṃ // Rm_19.55{54} //
S01ratnml_u:7929: hā vatātra vinaṣṭo 'si yad etat pātakānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7930: sahasā narake gatvā ciraṃ duḥkhāni bhokṣyasi // Rm_19.56{55} //
S01ratnml_u:7931: kiṃ tvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ purā janmāntare kathaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7932: yad atra saugate dharmaṃ prāpto 'py evaṃ durāśayaḥ // Rm_19.57{56} //
S01ratnml_u:7935: tathā te śuddhite kāye maṃgalaṃ ca bhavet kramāt /
S01ratnml_u:7936: pariśuddhas trikāyaś ca pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ cara // Rm_19.59{58} //
S01ratnml_u:7937: tadā tvaṃ sarvathā jitvā kleśān māragaṇānn api /
S01ratnml_u:7938: sākṣād arhatvam āsādya brahmacārī bhaviṣyati // Rm_19.60{59} //
S01ratnml_u:7941: śivāṃ bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_19.61{60} //
S01ratnml_u:7942: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā raivataḥ sa prabodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7943: tathāpi maunam ādhāya tathau daivābhyanusmaran // Rm_19.62{61} //
S01ratnml_u:7944: evaṃ sthitaṃ tam ālokya brāhmaṇaḥ sa ruṣānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7945: evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpy enaṃ paribhāṣyābhyanindayat // Rm_19.63{62} //
S01ratnml_u:7946: evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpy ukte brāhmaṇena sa raivataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7948: svadaivacintayas tasya maunāt sa brāhmaṇo ruṣā /
S01ratnml_u:7949: raivataṃ tāṃ katākṣeṇa dṛṣṭvainaṃ paryabhāṣata // Rm_19.65{64} //
S01ratnml_u:7950: are re durmate bhikṣo kim evaṃ tiṣṭhase 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:7951: uttiṣṭhātra pravaṃdhitva nayāmi tvāṃ nṛpāntike // Rm_19.66{65} //
S01ratnml_u:7952: evaṃ tenodite 'py eva sthitaḥ sa raivato yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7953: kiṃ cin naivāvaden maunam evālambya nyaṣīdata // Rm_19.67{66} //
S01ratnml_u:7954: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇas tasya maunād atiprakopitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7955: murddhni pāpam iva sthūlaṃ laguḍaṃ marpayātayat // Rm_19.68{67} //
S01ratnml_u:7958: tathāsthitaṃ taṃ munim ātmavidyaṃ daivaṃ smaraṃtaṃ hy akṛtāparādhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7959: nināya paścātkṛtavāhudaṃḍaṃ sadas tadā naṃdanabhūmibhartuḥ // Rm_19.70{69} //
S01ratnml_u:7960: tathāsthitaṃ tam ālokya sa dvijaḥ pratiroṣitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7961: raktākṣaṃ raivataṃ vaddhvā sahasānayan nṛpāntike // Rm_19.71{70} //
S01ratnml_u:7962: tatra sa brāhmaṇo nītvā taṃ rājñaḥ sthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7964: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ krūras tasya bhikṣo savistaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7965: sarvavṛttāṃtam ākhyāya taṃ nṛpaṃ paryakopayat // Rm_19.73{72} //
S01ratnml_u:7966: tad vatsamāṃsam ālokya nṛpatiḥ sa prakopitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7967: raivataṃ taṃ yatiṃ vaddhvā cakre kārāgṛhātithiṃ // Rm_19.74{73} //
S01ratnml_u:7969: jānāti kasya kaḥ śuddhiṃ citrākāreṣv asākṣiṣu // Rm_19.75{74} //
S01ratnml_u:7970: tatra sa vaṃdhanāgāre vaṃdhito 'pi sa sanmatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7973: kāle na visnito rājā tad vicāre 'pi nāsmarat // Rm_19.77{76} //
S01ratnml_u:7974: tadānyasmin dine tatra te vatsāḥ sarva āgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7975: mātṛbhiḥ saha saṃsaktās tṛṇaṃ bhuktvā niṣedire // Rm_19.78{77/} //
S01ratnml_u:7976: tān vatsān mātṛsaṃsaktān sarvān ālokya sa dvijaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7977: vismitaḥ punar ālokya paśyann evaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_19.79{78} //
S01ratnml_u:7978: aho vatsā ime sarve kutra gatvādhunāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7981: hā mamātra mahatpāpo jāyate sāṃprataṃ kathaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:7982: yan mayā sahasā bhikṣor asamīkṣyāparādhyate // Rm_19.81{80} //
S01ratnml_u:7983: yathā bhikṣor ghaṭe mānsaṃ dṛṣṭvaiṣām iti cintayat /
S01ratnml_u:7984: caurāyam iti taṃ bhikṣuṃ paryabhāṣaṃ ruṣābhṛtaṃ // Rm_19.82{81} //
S01ratnml_u:7986: vaddhvā taṃ sahasā rājñaḥ puro 'tra samupānayaṃ // Rm_19.83{82} //
S01ratnml_u:7989: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi vatsāḥ sarve ihāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7990: aparādhā yater neti vadeya sāṃprataṃ kathaṃ // Rm_19.85{84} //
S01ratnml_u:7991: yady avakṣyaṃ tathā rājā tadā me kupito nṛpaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:7992: sarvasvam apahṛtvāpi prāhariṣyate mām iha // Rm_19.86{85} //
S01ratnml_u:7993: atha yadi bhayād rājño nāvadiṣyaṃs tathā kvacit /
S01ratnml_u:7994: nūnaṃ taṃ yatim arhantam api rājā haniṣyate // Rm_19.87{86} //
S01ratnml_u:7997: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi yatropāyaṃ na vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:7998: sarvathāhaṃ vinaṣṭo 'smi vrajeya śaraṇaṃ kuha // Rm_19.89{88} //
S01ratnml_u:7999: yad imaṃ saugataṃ bhikṣum arhantaṃ brahmacāriṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8000: anaparādhinaṃ hatvā kathaṃ pāpair na lepsyate // Rm_19.90{89} //
S01ratnml_u:8001: etair hi pātakair ghorair ahaṃ rājā janā ime /
S01ratnml_u:8002: sarve vatsyāmahe 'vīcau bhuktvā duḥkhāni sarvadā // Rm_19.91{90} //
S01ratnml_u:8003: hā me daivād yateś cāpi nirjane vasato 'pi yat /
S01ratnml_u:8005: avaśyaṃ bhāvino bhāvā bhavanty eva na cānyathā /
S01ratnml_u:8006: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi bhikṣur vā kiṃ kariṣyati // Rm_19.93{92} //
S01ratnml_u:8008: atha mamaiva daivena tad iti manyate na hi // Rm_19.94{93} //
S01ratnml_u:8009: tad atra kiṃ vadeyāhaṃ daivaṃ hi sarvakarmakṛti /
S01ratnml_u:8010: iti mamārho 'py asya dūṣaṇaṃ nātra vidyate // Rm_19.95{94} //
S01ratnml_u:8011: tathapy etat pravṛttir na vaktavyaṃ kasya cid api /
S01ratnml_u:8012: na gaṃtavyaṃ vahiḥ kvāpi sthātavyaṃ svagṛhe sadā // Rm_19.96{95} //
S01ratnml_u:8013: kadā cit skhalitā buddhir vāṇī ca vismṛtasya me /
S01ratnml_u:8014: etad dhi pātakaṃ ghoraṃ samācakṣata kutra cit // Rm_19.97{96} //
S01ratnml_u:8016: bhratsyamānaḥ kathaṃ loke cariṣye duṣṭajaṃtuvat // Rm_19.98{97} //
S01ratnml_u:8017: iti dhyātvā viniścitya brāhmaṇaḥ sa viṣāditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8018: kasyāpy etat pravṛttāṃtaṃ noce daurjanyalajjayā // Rm_19.99{98} //
S01ratnml_u:8019: tat pātakāgnisaṃtaptaḥ smṛtvārhantaṃ tam eva saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8020: prāyaścittavrataṃ kurvann iva tasthau gṛhāśritaḥ // Rm_19.100{99} //
S01ratnml_u:8024: atha dvādaśavarṣānte tac chiṣyāḥ sarva āgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8025: tat pravṛttiṃ samākarṇya vismitās te 'bhavaṃs tadā // Rm_19.102{1} //
S01ratnml_u:8026: tataḥ sarve 'pi te śiṣyāḥ saṃmīlya nṛpateḥ puraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8028: ārogyam astu te rājan lokān dharmeṇa pālaya /
S01ratnml_u:8029: yadarthe vayam āyāmas tatra bhavān prasīdatu // Rm_19.104{3} //
S01ratnml_u:8030: yad asmākaṃ gurur bhikṣur aparādhaṃ vinā kathaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8031: bhavatā vaṃdhanāgāre sthāpitas tad vicāraya // Rm_19.105{4} //
S01ratnml_u:8032: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvais tac chiṣyaiḥ prārthite tadā /
S01ratnml_u:8033: vyomavāṇī tathākhyāya narendraṃ taṃ vyabodhayat // Rm_19.106{5} //
S01ratnml_u:8034: tat khavāṇiṃ samākarṇya nṛpaḥ sa paribodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8035: tac chiṣyaiḥ sārito bhikṣuṃ taṃ mumocāśu vaṃdhanāt // Rm_19.107{6} //
S01ratnml_u:8037: prāptabhijño 'pi yat prāpa krūrakleśadaśāṃ tathā // Rm_19.108{7} //
S01ratnml_u:8038: taṃ yatiṃ nirgataṃ dṛṣṭvā sa rājābhyānutāpitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8039: ninindā mandapuṇyatvaṃ pramādād dhatam ātmanaḥ // Rm_19.109{8} //
S01ratnml_u:8040: tadā sa nṛpati rājā sahasā tasya pādayoḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8041: sāṃjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā samutthāyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.110{9} //
S01ratnml_u:8042: bhadanto vicāryaiva pramadā yad bhavān mayā /
S01ratnml_u:8043: sthāpito vaṃdhane tan me 'parādhaṃ kṣaṃtum arhati // Rm_19.111{10} //
S01ratnml_u:8044: vismṛtā me sahāyāṃ ca parijñātā na kena cit /
S01ratnml_u:8045: daṇḍaḥ patati śuddheṣu prāptaḥ pāpe mahīpatau // Rm_19.112{11} //
S01ratnml_u:8047: raivataḥ sa nareṃdraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.113{12} //
S01ratnml_u:8048: rājan na te 'parādhatvaṃ mamaitat karmajaṃ phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8049: tad atra mā kṛthāḥ kheṭaṃ saugata ātmavidyutaṃ // Rm_19.114{13} //
S01ratnml_u:8050: tatas taṃ yatim arhantaṃ sa rājā sahasādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:8052: tadaitad vṛttim ākarṇya brāhmaṇaḥ sa tvarānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8053: āgatya tat sabhāmadhye dattāśīḥ samupācarat // Rm_19.116{15} //
S01ratnml_u:8054: tatra sa samupāsṛtya rājñe datvā jayāśiṣāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8055: taṃ yatiṃ sāñjalir natvā prārthayan vinayāt kṣamāṃ // Rm_19.117{16} //
S01ratnml_u:8057: tan me 'parādhatāṃ kṣaṃtum arhati sarvathā bhavān // Rm_19.118{17} //
S01ratnml_u:8058: ity ukte tena vipreṇa raivataḥ sa viśuddhadhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8059: brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ viṣaṇṇāsyaṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.119{18} //
S01ratnml_u:8060: na manyur vidyate vipra na tvayāpakṛtaṃ mayi /
S01ratnml_u:8061: mamaiva daivayā kena māṃsībhūtaṃ hi cīvaraṃ // Rm_19.120{19} //
S01ratnml_u:8063: tenātra kiṃ vadiṣyāmi daivā hi valavān bhave // Rm_19.121{20} //
S01ratnml_u:8066: tan mamopanataṃ pāke svakarmasadṛśaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_19.122{21} //
S01ratnml_u:8067: yat sautkaṇṭhatayaiva sarvavipadaḥ kurvanti kaṇṭhagrahaṃ sarvāṅgaprasabhopabhogasubhagāḥ kliśyanti yat saṃpadaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8068: yat svāchaṃdyasukhāspadaṃ viharaṇaṃ dīrghaṃ ca yad vaṃdhanaṃ tat puṃsāṃ nijakarmapākaśavalaṃ saṃsāravallīphalaṃ // Rm_19.123{22} //
S01ratnml_u:8069: iti tenārhatākhyātaṃ śrutvā naṃdaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8070: vismitaḥ kautukāc caivaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ yatim abravīt // Rm_19.124{23} //
S01ratnml_u:8071: tavāpi sumate kasya phalam etat kukarmaṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8072: kiṃ purā prakṛtaṃ karman tat samākhyātum arhati // Rm_19.125{24} //
S01ratnml_u:8073: iti pṛṣṭe narendreṇa raivataḥ sa sudhir yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8074: taṃ nareṃdraṃ samālokya bodhayituṃ tathāvadat // Rm_19.126{25} //
S01ratnml_u:8075: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yan mayā prakṛtaṃ purā /
S01ratnml_u:8079: kadā cit sa vane gatvā hatvā govatsam ātmanā /
S01ratnml_u:8080: tad vatsamāṃsam ādāya sahasā tato viniryayau // Rm_19.129{28} //
S01ratnml_u:8082: dṛṣṭvā taṃ māṃsabhārārttaṃ kopāt samabhidudruvuḥ // Rm_19.130{29} //
S01ratnml_u:8083: tatra sa kutha ālokya tān sarvān samupadrutān /
S01ratnml_u:8086: upanikṣipya tan māṃsaṃ tatraikānte nyalīyata // Rm_19.132{31} //
S01ratnml_u:8088: tatra pratyekabuddhaṃ tam ālokya samupācaran // Rm_19.133{32} //
S01ratnml_u:8089: tatra sa kutha āgatya teṣāṃ gorakṣiṇāṃ puraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8090: gomāṃsaṃ darśayitvā taṃ caurāyam ity adarśayat // Rm_19.134{33} //
S01ratnml_u:8091: tatra te gobhṛtaḥ sarve gomāṃsaṃ tan muneḥ puraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8092: dṛṣṭvaiva sahasā kopāt taṃ munim abhyaghātayat // Rm_19.135{34} //
S01ratnml_u:8093: vadhyo 'yam iti taṃ vadhvā gopālās te prakopitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8095: tataḥ sa kutha ākarṇya taṃ yatiṃ vaṃdhane dhṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8097: hā mayā pāpināpy evaṃ sādhyate pātakāni ca /
S01ratnml_u:8098: avaśyaṃ vahnināvīcau kuṃhbhyāṃ pakṣye rataṃś ciraṃ // Rm_19.138{37} //
S01ratnml_u:8099: yad ayaṃ nirjane dhyāto pratyekabuddha ātmavit /
S01ratnml_u:8100: caurāyam iti saṃdarśya vaṃdhane sthāpitomayā // Rm_19.139{38} //
S01ratnml_u:8102: tīvraduḥkhāgnisaṃtapta ante māṃ svakṛte phalaṃ // Rm_19.140{39} //
S01ratnml_u:8103: hā mayaivaṃ mahāghoraṃ pātakaṃ durdhiyā kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8104: kadā tat pātakān mukto vrajeyaṃ sadgatiṃ kathaṃ // Rm_19.141{40} //
S01ratnml_u:8106: hā sarvajña namas tubhyaṃ paśya mām atipāpinaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8107: bhavānn eva jagattrātā tan me 'pi trātum arhati // Rm_19.142{41} //
S01ratnml_u:8109: tad vimuktyām upāyaṃ me kṛpayā dātum arhati // Rm_19.143{42} //
S01ratnml_u:8110: iti kuthaḥ sa cāṇḍālaḥ smṛtvā saṃbuddham ādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:8113: sahasā tata utthāya tadantike upācarat // Rm_19.145{44} //
S01ratnml_u:8114: tatra sa samupāsṛtya tesāṃ gorakṣiṇaṃ puraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8116: bhavanto 'tra mayā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tat pratidekṣyate /
S01ratnml_u:8117: tad bhavaṃtaḥ samākarṇya kṣaṃtum arhaṃti sarvathā // Rm_19.147{46} //
S01ratnml_u:8118: asya pratyekabuddhasya hy aparādho na vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:8119: tatra mayātiduṣṭena cauro 'yam iti darśitaḥ // Rm_19.148{47} //
S01ratnml_u:8120: tad atra mucyatām eṣa pratyekasugato muniḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8121: satkṛtyābhyarcya piṃḍena mānanīyo hi sarvadā // Rm_19.149{48} //
S01ratnml_u:8122: atraitat pātakaṃ nāsya mamaiva mastake pacet /
S01ratnml_u:8123: tad aham eva vadhyo 'tra tad ayaṃ mucyatāṃ yatiḥ // Rm_19.150{49} //
S01ratnml_u:8124: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve gorakṣiṇo 'pi te /
S01ratnml_u:8125: ruṣṭās taṃ sahasā vaddhvā paryyākhyāyātyatāḍayat // Rm_19.151{50} //
S01ratnml_u:8126: tat tāḍanaravaṃ śrutvā sa pratyekajinaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8127: gopālāṃs tān samāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_19.152{51} //
S01ratnml_u:8129: kṣamā hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ tat kurvantu kṣamām iha // Rm_19.153{52} //
S01ratnml_u:8131: kiṃ daivaṃ nihataṃ hatvā yuṣmākaṃ setsyate phalaṃ // Rm_19.154{53} //
S01ratnml_u:8133: tad asyāpy aparādho 'tra nāstīty eṣa vimucyatāṃ // Rm_19.155{54} //
S01ratnml_u:8135: tatheti pratibuddhitvā tat kopaṃ mumucus tadā // Rm_19.156{55} //
S01ratnml_u:8136: atha te gobhṛtaḥ sarve śrutvā tasya muner vacaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8137: sahasā vinatiṃ kṛtvā vaṃdhanāt taṃ vyamuṃcayat // Rm_19.157{56} //
S01ratnml_u:8138: tatas te gobhṛtaḥ sarve taṃ pratyekamuniṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:8141: tad aparādhasaṃtaptāḥ prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_19.159{58} //
S01ratnml_u:8143: tenāsmākaṃ kṣamāṃ kartum arhaty atra bhavān api // Rm_19.160{59} //
S01ratnml_u:8144: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa pratyekajinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8145: tān sarvān gobhṛto dṛṣṭvā samāśvāsyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.161{60} //
S01ratnml_u:8146: bhavanto mā viṣīdantu dūṣaṇaṃ vā na vidyate /
S01ratnml_u:8147: etad vṛttiṃ vijānāmi saugatā hi bhavārthavit // Rm_19.162{61} //
S01ratnml_u:8149: ity ādiśya sa sarvajñaḥ pratyekabuddha utthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8150: tata ākāśa utplutya svāśramaṃ gate āśrayan // Rm_19.163{62} //
S01ratnml_u:8151: tad dṛṣṭvā te janāḥ sarve gopālāḥ prativismitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8152: tam eva sugataṃ smṛtvā saddharme sarvadācaran // Rm_19.164{63} //
S01ratnml_u:8154: tatpāpair narakeṣv evaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhāni bhuktavān // Rm_19.165{64} //
S01ratnml_u:8156: tad asyātrāparādhaṃ na mamaitad daivayogataḥ // Rm_19.166{65} //
S01ratnml_u:8158: saṃsāre 'tra sadā puṇyaṃ karttavyaṃ satsukhārthibhiḥ // Rm_19.167{66} //
S01ratnml_u:8160: puṇyaṃ vinā na siddhyante kṛtakarmāṇi sarvathā // Rm_19.168{67} //
S01ratnml_u:8161: puṇyena jāyate svarge puṇyena yānti sadgatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8162: puṇyena sarvadā bhadraṃ kṛtvā yāṃti jinālayaṃ // Rm_19.169{68} //
S01ratnml_u:8167: sarve te puṇyakarttāra iti jñeyā narādhipa /
S01ratnml_u:8168: puṇyena śuddhyate cittaṃ śuddhāśayo bhavet sudhīḥ // Rm_19.172{71} //
S01ratnml_u:8169: subuddhiḥ sarvadā nityaṃ śubheṣv eva samācaret /
S01ratnml_u:8175: dānaṃ kṛtvā sadā saukhyaṃ bhuktyā nityaṃ śubhe caret /
S01ratnml_u:8187: sarvasatvahitaṃ kṛtvā śubhe nityaṃ samācaret // Rm_19.181{80} //
S01ratnml_u:8189: sarveṣāṃ maṃgalaṃ kṛtvā bhadracaryāṃ samācaret // Rm_19.182{81} //
S01ratnml_u:8191: sarvamārān vinirjitya cared bodhivrataṃ sadā // Rm_19.183{82} //
S01ratnml_u:8195: tataḥ sarvatra lokeṣu kṛtvā bhadrāṇi sarvadā /
S01ratnml_u:8198: satvān bodhau pratisthāpya kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat // Rm_19.186{85} //
S01ratnml_u:8200: nirvṛta ālayalīno mahābuddho bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_19.187{86} //
S01ratnml_u:8202: yadīchasi tathā puṇyam eva karttavyam ābhavaiḥ // Rm_19.188{87} //
S01ratnml_u:8206: puṇyāny evātra saṃsāre karttavyāni hi sarvadā // Rm_19.190{89} //
S01ratnml_u:8207: pāpena sarvadāpy evaṃ durgatīṣv eva saṃgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8210: sarve te pāpakarttāra iti buddhaiḥ prakathyate // Rm_19.192{91} //
S01ratnml_u:8211: iti matvā mahārāja sadā bhadraṃ yadīchasi /
S01ratnml_u:8212: hitvā pāpānurāgatvaṃ saddharmaṃ cinu sādaraṃ // Rm_19.193{92} //
S01ratnml_u:8213: saddharmaṃ saugataṃ dharmaṃ yal lokaṃ hitasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8214: tenātra sarvadharmāṇāṃ pravaram agram ucyate // Rm_19.194{93} //
S01ratnml_u:8216: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajasva samupasthitaḥ // Rm_19.195{94} //
S01ratnml_u:8217: triratne yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:8218: tat phalam aprameyam asaṃkhyeya mahattaraṃ // Rm_19.196{95} //
S01ratnml_u:8220: jagad dharmamayaṃ kṛtvā niḥkleśā parinirvṛtāḥ // Rm_19.197{96} //
S01ratnml_u:8221: evaṃ vijñāya bhūmīndra hitvā pāparatiṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:8222: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā cara nityaṃ sadā śubhe // Rm_19.198{97} //
S01ratnml_u:8223: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva kvāpi karma śubhāśubhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8224: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ tenaiva bhujyate phalaṃ // Rm_19.199{98} //
S01ratnml_u:8225: nāgnibhir dahyate karmaṃ dahyate deha eva hi /
S01ratnml_u:8226: nodakaiḥ klidyate karmaṃ klidyate tanur eva ca // Rm_19.200{99} //
S01ratnml_u:8228: na kṣītau kṣīyate karmaṃ kṣīyate tanur eva hi // Rm_19.201{100} //
S01ratnml_u:8229: anyathāpi bhaven naiva vipāke karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8230: yathaiva yat kṛtaṃ yena tenaiva bhujyate tathā // Rm_19.202{1} //
S01ratnml_u:8231: kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ pāke duḥkhataiva sadā bhave /
S01ratnml_u:8232: śubhasya sukhatā nityaṃ miśritasyobhayaṃ tathā // Rm_19.203{2} //
S01ratnml_u:8234: bhuktvā sarvatra saṃsāre bhramanti sarvajaṃtavaḥ // Rm_19.204{3} //
S01ratnml_u:8235: evaṃ matvā mahārāja kṛṣṇāni miśritāni ca /
S01ratnml_u:8236: vihāyātra śobheṣv eva caritavyaṃ sadā bhave // Rm_19.205{4} //
S01ratnml_u:8239: tatheti prativijñapya sajanaḥ prābhya naṃdataḥ // Rm_19.206{5} //
S01ratnml_u:8240: tataḥ sa nṛpatir bhūyo raivataṃ taṃ mahāmatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:8241: sucīvaraiḥ samāchādya sāṃjaliḥ praṇatiṃ vyadhāt // Rm_19.207{6} //
S01ratnml_u:8242: punar utthāya bhūpālas tam arhantaṃ kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8243: praṇatvā vinayaṃ kurvan kramāc ca prārthayat tathā // Rm_19.208{7} //
S01ratnml_u:8245: sarvadā darśanaṃ datvānugrahaṃ kartum arhasi // Rm_19.209{8} //
S01ratnml_u:8246: ity ukte 'nena bhūpena raivataḥ sa prasāditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8247: haṃsarāja ivāplutya bhāsayan khe samāyayau // Rm_19.210{9} //
S01ratnml_u:8249: lokaiḥ saṃdṛśyamāno 'sau dhyātvā tasthau samujvalan // Rm_19.211{10} //
S01ratnml_u:8250: tatas tair bhikṣubhiḥ śiṣyaiḥ samanvitaḥ prabhāsayan /
S01ratnml_u:8251: tathākāśāś caraṃ gatvā svāśrame samupāśrayan // Rm_19.212{11} //
S01ratnml_u:8252: tad dṛṣṭvā sa nṛpo lokaiḥ sahātivismayānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:8253: triratnabhajanaṃ kurvan pracacāra sadā mudā // Rm_19.213{12} //
S01ratnml_u:8255: alaṃkṛtaḥ sādhujanaḥ khalena nighnīkṛto 'pi na vikāram eti // Rm_19.214{13} //
S01ratnml_u:8257: tan nānyasyāparādhatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ kena cit kva cit // Rm_19.215{14} //
S01ratnml_u:8258: iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ tathātra kathyate mayā /
S01ratnml_u:8259: iti matvā mahārāja sadā dharme samācara // Rm_19.216{15} //
S01ratnml_u:8260: prajāś cāpi tathā rājan bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
