S01ratnml_u:11368: tan me 'trānugrahaṃ kṛtvā samyag ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_28.69{69} //
S01ratnml_u:11369: yad atra bhagavan satvāḥ pravarttanto bhavodadhau /
S01ratnml_u:11371: karmaṇā kena devāḥ syur mānuṣāḥ kena karmaṇā /
S01ratnml_u:11372: daityāś ca karmaṇā kena tat samyak samupādiśa // Rm_28.71{71} //
S01ratnml_u:11373: tiryañcaḥ karmaṇā kena pretāś ca kena karmaṇā /
S01ratnml_u:11374: nārakāḥ karmaṇā kena tat sarvaṃ samupādiśa // Rm_28.72{72} //
S01ratnml_u:11375: tatrāpy anekarūpāś ca sarve bhinnāśayā api /
S01ratnml_u:11377: etat sarvaṃ samākhyāya bhavāñ chāstā jagad guruḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11379: iti saṃprārthite tena rājñā sa bhagavān sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11380: taṃ viśuddhāśayaṃ bhūpaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_28.75{75} //
S01ratnml_u:11382: samyag dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi yuṣmākaṃ paribodhane // Rm_28.76{76} //
S01ratnml_u:11384: lokas tasya phalaṃ bhukte karttā nānyo 'sti kasya cit // Rm_28.77{77} //
S01ratnml_u:11385: iti sarve kṛpāviṣṭās trailokye guravo jināḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11386: uktavantas tathā tad dhi karmaṇo yasya yat phalaṃ // Rm_28.78{78} //
S01ratnml_u:11389: saṃvaddhyānyāñ ca hi santi saṃjīvaṃ yānti te dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11391: saṃjīvanti yatas tatra tena saṃjīva ucyate // Rm_28.81{81/} //
S01ratnml_u:11395: jvaladbhiḥ krakacais tatra kālasūtras tataḥ smṛtaḥ // Rm_28.83{83} //
S01ratnml_u:11396: dāvādau dahanair dāhaṃ dehināṃ vidadhāti ye /
S01ratnml_u:11397: sa tīvrajvalanair jantus tapyate tapane raṭan // Rm_28.84{84} //
S01ratnml_u:11400: yat tato 'nvartham āloke khyātas tapanasaṃjñayā // Rm_28.85{85} //
S01ratnml_u:11402: saṃtāpayati cānyāṃś ca tapyate sa pratāpane // Rm_28.86{86} //
S01ratnml_u:11406: anyāṃś ca prāṇino ghnaṃti saṃghātaṃ yānti te narāḥ // Rm_28.88{88} //
S01ratnml_u:11408: tasmāt saṃghāta ity evaṃ vikhyāto 'nvarthasaṃjñayā // Rm_28.89{89} //
S01ratnml_u:11410: kaṭukyapaṭikā ye ca rauravaṃ yānti te nārāḥ // Rm_28.90{90} //
S01ratnml_u:11412: raudraṃ ravaṃ vimuṃcanti yatas tasmāt sa rauravaṃ // Rm_28.91{91} //
S01ratnml_u:11413: devadvijaguror dravyaṃ hṛtaṃ yair duḥkhinām iha /
S01ratnml_u:11414: te mahārauravaṃ yānti ye cānyasvāpahāriṇaḥ // Rm_28.92{92} //
S01ratnml_u:11416: rauravo hi mahāṃs tasya mantva rauravād api // Rm_28.93{93} //
S01ratnml_u:11417: kṛtvā guṇādhike tīvram apakāraṃ nihatya ca /
S01ratnml_u:11418: mātāpitṛgurun kalpam avīcau pacyate dhruvaṃ // Rm_28.94{94} //
S01ratnml_u:11419: asthīny api viśīryyante raudrāgnau tatra dehināṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11420: yato na vīciḥ saukhyasya nāvīcir udāhṛtaḥ // Rm_28.95{95} //
S01ratnml_u:11422: pāpād asinakhās te tu jāyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ // Rm_28.96{96} //
S01ratnml_u:11423: nakhā evāsayas teṣām āyasā jvalitāḥ kharāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11424: tair anyonyaṃ nikṛntanti yat tenāsinakhāḥ smṛtāḥ // Rm_28.97{97} //
S01ratnml_u:11426: balād ārohyata hraṃdan śālmalīḥ pāladārikaḥ // Rm_28.98{98} //
S01ratnml_u:11430: aśivaṃ kurvate chinnā viśvāsaghāṭino narāḥ // Rm_28.100{100} //
S01ratnml_u:11432: yāpyante kvathitaṃ tāmraṃ ye parasvāpahāriṇaḥ // Rm_28.101{1} //
S01ratnml_u:11433: krūraiḥ śvabhir ayodraṃṣṭraiḥ kṛtyante vivaśā bhṛśaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11434: varṣakoṭi raṭanto 'pi ye narāḥ kheṭake ratāḥ // Rm_28.102{2} //
S01ratnml_u:11436: yāti vaitaraṇīṃ śaśvad vahninā dahyate naraḥ // Rm_28.103{3} //
S01ratnml_u:11438: karoti narake kradan sa cakreṇābhipīḍyate // Rm_28.104{4} //
S01ratnml_u:11439: pīḍā vahubhir ākāraiḥ kṛtā yair duḥkhinām iha /
S01ratnml_u:11440: pīḍyante te ciraṃ taptair yatra mudgaraparvataiḥ // Rm_28.105{5} //
S01ratnml_u:11443: kṣuradhārācitaṃ mārgaṃ gatvā krāmanti te narāḥ // Rm_28.106{6} //
S01ratnml_u:11445: bhūyo bhūyo mahākāyāḥ krandantas te śaracchataṃ // Rm_28.107{7} //
S01ratnml_u:11446: vrataṃ yas tu samāśritya saṃpanno parirakṣati /
S01ratnml_u:11448: aṇunāpi hi yaḥ kaścin mithyājīvena jīvati /
S01ratnml_u:11449: bhakṣyate krimibhiś caṇḍaiḥ saṃmagno gūthamṛttike // Rm_28.109{9} //
S01ratnml_u:11451: āyasai mukhalais taptaiḥ kṣobhyante te punaḥ punaḥ // Rm_28.110{10} //
S01ratnml_u:11454: sarveṣām eva duḥkhānāṃ vījaṃ mṛd vābhibhedataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11455: kāyavāgmānasaṃ karma pāpaṃ yat tad aṇv api varttayet /
S01ratnml_u:11458: yena rāgeṇa jāyante mūḍhāḥ kīṭādiyoniṣu // Rm_28.112{1} //
S01ratnml_u:11462: jāyante mukharā dhṛṣṭāś capalātmānaś ca vāyasāḥ // Rm_28.114{3} //
S01ratnml_u:11466: jāyante pretamansādoḥ krodhanā matsarā narāḥ // Rm_28.116{5} //
S01ratnml_u:11468: bhavāntatyāgino darppāt krodhāc ca garuḍeśvarāḥ // Rm_28.117{6} //
S01ratnml_u:11469: kṛtaṃ yat pāpakaṃ karma svayaṃ vākkāyamānasaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11470: tiryañcas tena jāyante tan manogatim ākṛthāḥ // Rm_28.118{7} //
S01ratnml_u:11473: bhavanti kuṇapāhārāḥ pretās te kaṭapūtanāḥ // Rm_28.119{1} //
S01ratnml_u:11474: viheṭhayanti ye bālā vaṃcayanty api tṛṣṇayā /
S01ratnml_u:11477: jāyaṃte ye narāḥ pretā 'ṣṭās te galagaṇḍakāḥ // Rm_28.121{3} //
S01ratnml_u:11478: dānaṃ nivārayaty eva na hi kiṃ tid dadāti yaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11479: kṣutkṣāmāsau mahākukṣiḥ pretaḥ śūcimukho bhavet // Rm_28.122{4} //
S01ratnml_u:11480: dhanaṃ rakṣati vaṃśārthe na bhuṃkte na dadāti yaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11481: dattādāyī tataḥ pretaḥ śrāddhabhoktā sa jāyate // Rm_28.123{5} //
S01ratnml_u:11483: bhoktā viṭśleṣmavāntānāṃ pretya pretaḥ sa jāyate // Rm_28.124{6} //
S01ratnml_u:11484: apriyaṃ vakti yaḥ krodhād vākyaṃ marmavibhedataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11485: bbavanty ulkāmukhaḥ pretaḥ suciraṃ tena karmaṇā // Rm_28.125{7} //
S01ratnml_u:11487: kurute kalahaṃ yas tu niṣkṛpaḥ krūramānasaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11489: grāmakūṭau dadāty eva yo janaṃ pīḍayanty api /
S01ratnml_u:11490: kumbhāṇḍo vikṛtākāraḥ pūyāhāraś ca jāyate // Rm_28.127{9} //
S01ratnml_u:11491: nirdayāḥ prāṇino ghnanti bhakṣyārthaṃ ye dadanty api /
S01ratnml_u:11492: māṃsāhārāś ca te 'vaśyaṃ bhavanti pretarākṣasāḥ // Rm_28.128{10} //
S01ratnml_u:11494: gaṃdharvāḥ pretya jāyante devānāṃ ratihetavaḥ // Rm_28.129{11} //
S01ratnml_u:11496: sa piśācaṃ praduṣṭātmā jāyate vikṛtānanaḥ // Rm_28.130{12} //
S01ratnml_u:11498: saṃpradānaratā nityaṃ bhūtāḥ pretya bhavanti te // Rm_28.131{13} //
S01ratnml_u:11499: krūrāḥ krūddhāḥ pradātāraḥ priyā sarvasurā ca ye /
S01ratnml_u:11500: jāyante pretya yakṣās tu krūrātmānaḥ surāpriyāḥ // Rm_28.132{14} //
S01ratnml_u:11504: yakṣādayaḥ śubhaiḥ kliṣṭair atas tān parivarjayet // Rm_28.134{16} //
S01ratnml_u:11507: jāyate hinsayā svalpām ato hiṃsāṃ vivarjayet // Rm_28.135{1} //
S01ratnml_u:11510: yo na harttā parasvānāṃ na vañcavit prayachati /
S01ratnml_u:11511: mahatāpi prayatnena sa dravyaṃ nādhigachati // Rm_28.137{3} //
S01ratnml_u:11512: adattaṃ vittam ādāya dānāni ca dadāti yaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11513: sa pretya dravyavān bhūtvā bhūyo bhavati nirdhanaḥ // Rm_28.138{4} //
S01ratnml_u:11514: yo na harttā na dātā ca na cātikṛpaṇo naraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11515: kṛtsnena mahatā dravyaṃ sthiraṃ sa labhate dhruvaṃ // Rm_28.139{5} //
S01ratnml_u:11516: na harttā yaḥ parasvānāṃ tyāgavān vītamatsaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11517: ahāryaṃ vipulaṃ vittam iṣṭam ca labhate naraḥ // Rm_28.140{6} //
S01ratnml_u:11519: sukhī ca sa labhen nityaṃ yo dadātīha bhojanaṃ // Rm_28.141{7} //
S01ratnml_u:11520: salajjo rūpavān bhogī suchāyaḥ prāṇināṃ priyaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11521: sa bhaved vastralābhī ca yo vāsānsi prayachati // Rm_28.142{8} //
S01ratnml_u:11523: prāsādāḥ sarvakāmāś ca jāyante tasya dehinaḥ // Rm_28.143{9} //
S01ratnml_u:11525: bhavanti sukhino nityaṃ yānāni ca labhanti te // Rm_28.144{10} //
S01ratnml_u:11527: sukhinas tyaktasaṃtāpā niḥpipāsā bhavanti te // Rm_28.145{11} //
S01ratnml_u:11529: samṛddhitaḥ sa syād ārāmaṃ yaḥ prayachati // Rm_28.146{12} //
S01ratnml_u:11536: balavān varṇavān bhogī dīrghāyuḥ sa bhaven naraḥ // Rm_28.149{15} //
S01ratnml_u:11539: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyam abhayaṃ vacanaṃ priyaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11540: yad yad evepsitaṃ śaktyā dātavyaṃ tat tad arthinaḥ // Rm_28.151{17} //
S01ratnml_u:11541: kleśayitvā dadātīha svakārthaṃ vā ha yena vā /
S01ratnml_u:11542: yaśaḥsaukhyābhilākhād vā sa kliṣṭaṃ labhate phalaṃ // Rm_28.152{18} //
S01ratnml_u:11544: parārthaṃ yo dadātīha so 'kliṣṭaṃ phalam aśnute // Rm_28.153{19} //
S01ratnml_u:11546: tena tena prakāreṇa tat sarvam upatiṣṭhate // Rm_28.154{20} //
S01ratnml_u:11550: dānaṃ hi sarvasaukhyānām ananyat kāraṇaṃ mataṃ // Rm_28.156{22} //
S01ratnml_u:11552: svebhyo 'py adeśakālau ca varjayet puṃstvam archati // Rm_28.157{23} //
S01ratnml_u:11553: paradāreṣu saṃsaktaṃ cittaṃ yo na niyachati /
S01ratnml_u:11554: anaṃgeṣu cakṣyeta sa pumāṃ strītvam archati // Rm_28.158{24} //
S01ratnml_u:11556: puṃstvam ākāṃkṣate nityaṃ sā nārī naratāṃ vrajet // Rm_28.159{25} //
S01ratnml_u:11558: tejasvī sadguṇaḥ śrīmān devair api sa lakṣyate // Rm_28.160{26} //
S01ratnml_u:11560: jāyate satyavādī ca yaśaḥsaukhyānvitaḥ pumān // Rm_28.161{27} //
S01ratnml_u:11561: bhinnānām api satvānāṃ bhedaṃ naiva karoti yaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11563: yas tv ājñāṃ kurute nityaṃ gurūṇāṃ hṛṣṭamānasaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11564: hitāhitābhidhāyī ca sa syād ādeyavākkṛtī // Rm_28.163{29} //
S01ratnml_u:11566: bhavanti sukhinaḥ saukhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ datvā ca duḥkhinaḥ // Rm_28.164{30} //
S01ratnml_u:11568: kubjavāmanatāṃ yānti ye ca rūpābhimāninaḥ // Rm_28.165{31} //
S01ratnml_u:11571: duḥkham pāpasya puṇyasya sukhaṃ miśrasya miśritaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11572: sarvaṃ sādṛśyaniḥsyandam abhyuhyaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ // Rm_28.167{33} //
S01ratnml_u:11575: kalipriyaḥ pradātā ca sa bhaved asureśvaraḥ // Rm_28.168{1} //
S01ratnml_u:11578: nātmanā yaḥ sukhākāṃkṣī na ca kṛvyeta parigrahaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11579: grahāṇām agraṇī cāsau mahārājikatāṃ vrajet // Rm_28.169{1} //
S01ratnml_u:11581: hṛṣyame yo na kalahais tridaśeṣu sa jāyate // Rm_28.170{2} //
S01ratnml_u:11582: na vigrahe ratā naiva kalahe hṛṣṭamānasāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11583: ekāntakuśalodyuktā ye ca moyāpagās tu te // Rm_28.171{3} //
S01ratnml_u:11585: ye parihṛṣṇāś ca narās te tuṣitopagāḥ // Rm_28.172{4} //
S01ratnml_u:11589: guṇādhikāś ca ye yānti paranirmitatāṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_28.174{6} //
S01ratnml_u:11590: śīlena svargam āpnoti dhyānena ca viśeṣataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11592: śubhāśubhaphalaṃ karma yad etat kathitaṃ sphuṭaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11593: śubhena labhyate saukhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ tv aśubhasaṃbhavaṃ // Rm_28.176{8} //
S01ratnml_u:11594: mṛtyur vyādhir jarā caiva cintanīyam idaṃ trayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11595: viprayogā priyaiḥ sārddhaṃ karmaṇāṃ ca svakaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_28.177{9} //
S01ratnml_u:11596: evaṃ virāgam āpnoti viviktaḥ puṇyam archati /
S01ratnml_u:11597: pāpaṃ ca nārjayed evaṃ tac ca saṃkṣepataḥ śṛṇu // Rm_28.178{10} //
S01ratnml_u:11599: puṇyaṃ viparyayāt pāpabhuktam eva munīśvaraiḥ // Rm_28.179{11} //
S01ratnml_u:11602: saṃbodhidharmam ādhāya caritavyaṃ sadā śubhe // Rm_28.180{1} //
S01ratnml_u:11605: evaṃ vijñāya rājendra sadā bhadraṃ yadīchasi /
S01ratnml_u:11606: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityaṃ samādarāt // Rm_28.182{3} //
S01ratnml_u:11608: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_28.183{4} //
S01ratnml_u:11609: iti tena munīndreṇa samākhyātaṃ niśamya saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11611: tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā samutthāya kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11612: bhagavantam ānatvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_28.185{6} //
S01ratnml_u:11613: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11614: saṃbodhivratam ādhāya prechāmi carituṃ sadā // Rm_28.186{7} //
S01ratnml_u:11616: tan me 'nugrahatāṃ kṛtvā pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_28.187{8} //
S01ratnml_u:11617: iti saṃprārthite tena rājñā sa bhagavān sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11618: tasya rājño manaḥśuddhaṃ vijñāyaivam upādiśat // Rm_28.188{9} //
S01ratnml_u:11619: sādhu rājan mahābhāga yadīchasi śubhāṃ gatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11620: ehi cara samādhāya cara me śāsane vrataṃ // Rm_28.189{10} //
S01ratnml_u:11621: ity ādiśya munīndro 'sau pāṇinā tac chiraḥ spṛśan /
S01ratnml_u:11623: saṃbuddhe śāsane dharme taṃ nareṃdraṃ samagrahīt // Rm_28.190{11} //
S01ratnml_u:11624: ehīti tena śāstrokte nṛpatiḥ sa prabodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11626: tataḥ sa bhūpatiś cāpi virakto bhogyanispṛhaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11630: tataḥ sa brahmavid yogī traidhātuvāsinām api /
S01ratnml_u:11633: utthāya sāṃjalir natvā prārthyat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_28.195{16} //
S01ratnml_u:11634: bhagavan nātha sarvajña kṛpayā me prasīdatu /
S01ratnml_u:11635: traimāsyaṃ bhaktum ichāmi tat kurutām anugrahaṃ // Rm_28.196{17} //
S01ratnml_u:11636: iti saṃprārthite rājñā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11637: nṛpatiṃ taṃ samālokya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_28.197{18} //
S01ratnml_u:11643: āchādya sāṃjalir natvā praṇidhānaṃ mudā vyadhāt // Rm_28.200{21} //
S01ratnml_u:11645: saddharmabhāskaraḥ śāstā saṃbuddho 'rhaṃ bhaveya hi // Rm_28.201{22} //
S01ratnml_u:11646: evaṃ tena narendreṇa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:11647: matvā sa bhagavān smitaṃ prāmuñcac chubharociṣaṃ // Rm_28.202{23} //
S01ratnml_u:11652: tadā te vismitāḥ sarve nārakīyāḥ pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11653: kim evaṃ jāyate saukhyam iti dhyātvā niṣedire // Rm_28.205{26} //
S01ratnml_u:11655: manāṃsi paribodhārthaṃ praiṣayat tatra nairmitaṃ // Rm_28.206{27} //
S01ratnml_u:11656: tadā te nārakāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:11657: upetya praṇatiṃ kṛtvā prābhajañ charaṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_28.207{28} //
S01ratnml_u:11658: tatas tat puṇyaliptās te sarve vimuktapāpakāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11660: tatas tā raśmayaḥ sarvā avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11662: gāthāghoṣaiś ca sarvatra sarvān devān pramodinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11663: bodhayitvā śubhe dharme pratiṣṭhāpya pacerire // Rm_28.210{31} //
S01ratnml_u:11664: tatas tā raśmayaḥ sarvā piṇḍībhūtā muneḥ puraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11668: śāstā kim ādiśed dharmam iti dhyātvā niṣedire // Rm_28.212{33} //
S01ratnml_u:11670: upetya sāṃjalir natvā prārthayet taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_28.213{34} //
S01ratnml_u:11671: bhagavan hetunā kena smitaṃ muṃcati sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11672: nāhetvapratyayaṃ smitaṃ na muṃcaṃti munīśvarāḥ // Rm_28.214{35} //
S01ratnml_u:11673: tad yadarthe bhavān smitaṃ muṃcatīme sabhājanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11674: śrotum ichaṃti sarve tad artham ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_28.215{36} //
S01ratnml_u:11675: ity ānaṃdoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11676: sarvāṃl lokān samālokya tam ānaṃdaṃ samabravīt // Rm_28.216{37} //
S01ratnml_u:11677: evam eva sadānaṃda sarve buddhā munīśvarāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11678: nāhetupratyayaṃ smitaṃ vimuṃcanti kadā cana // Rm_28.217{38} //
S01ratnml_u:11680: satkṛtya śraddhayāsmākaṃ traimāsyaṃ bhajate mudā // Rm_28.218{39} //
S01ratnml_u:11682: kramāt pāramitāḥ sarvāḥ paripūrya balānvitaḥ // Rm_28.219{40} //
S01ratnml_u:11684: bodhim āsādya sarvajñas tathāgato munīśvaraḥ // Rm_28.220{41} //
S01ratnml_u:11686: vijayo nāma saṃbuddho bhaviṣyati bhavāntare // Rm_28.221{42} //
S01ratnml_u:11690: saṃbodhivāñchibhir lokaiś caritavyaṃ śubhe mudā // Rm_28.223{44} //
S01ratnml_u:11692: sarve lokās tathety uktvā prābhyanandan prasāditāḥ // Rm_28.224{45} //
S01ratnml_u:11694: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracacāra śubhe sadā // Rm_28.225{46} //
S01ratnml_u:11697: iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathā 'dhunā /
S01ratnml_u:11698: kathyate 'tra tvayāpy evaṃ caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_28.227{48} //
S01ratnml_u:11700: bodhimārge pratiṣṭhāpya pālanīyāḥ sadā tvayā // Rm_28.228{49} //
S01ratnml_u:11701: tathā te sarvadā bhadraṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11702: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_28.229{50} //
S01ratnml_u:11705: rājño pāñcālayor yan munikathitam idaṃ tat prasiddhāvadānaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11706: śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti pramuditamanasaḥ śraddhayā ye prasannāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11708: kṛtvā lokeṣu bhaddraṃ munivaranilaye saṃprayānti pramodāḥ // Rm_28.231{52} //
S01ratnml_u:11714: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_29.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:11715: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11716: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathākhyātuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_29.2{2} //
S01ratnml_u:11717: iti saṃprarthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan mahāmatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11718: upagupto nareṃdraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_29.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:11719: sādhu śṛṇu maharāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11720: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvā cāpy anumodaya // Rm_29.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:11722: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_29.5{5} //
S01ratnml_u:11725: tatra sa bhagavān gatvā suramye naṃdane vane /
S01ratnml_u:11727: tatra śakrādayo devāḥ sarve taṃ sadguṇākaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11729: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve devāḥ pramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11735: tadā sā jananī mātā māyādevī samāgatā /
S01ratnml_u:11736: tam ātmajaṃ jagannāthaṃ saṃdṛṣṭvā samupācarat // Rm_29.12{12} //
S01ratnml_u:11737: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā mātaraṃ tāṃ samāgatāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11739: svāgataṃ kuśalaṃ mātar ārogyam astu te sadā /
S01ratnml_u:11740: tvatmukhaṃ draṣṭum āyāmi tat prasāditum arhasi // Rm_29.14{14} //
S01ratnml_u:11742: upadikṣyāmi saddharmaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva samāhitā // Rm_29.15{15} //
S01ratnml_u:11743: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā jananī satī /
S01ratnml_u:11744: māyādevī samālokya tam ātmajaṃ samavrāvīt // Rm_29.16{16} //
S01ratnml_u:11745: prāyāmi te mukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ kuśalaṃ te sadātmaja /
S01ratnml_u:11746: tan mamānugrahārthena dharmam ādeṣṭum arhasi // Rm_29.17{17} //
S01ratnml_u:11747: ity uktvā sā satī māyādevī mātā jagadguroḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11749: tataḥ śakrādayo devāḥ sarve te saṃpraharṣitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11751: pūjāṃgais taṃ jagannāthaṃ māyādevīṃ ca prārcayan // Rm_29.19{19} //
S01ratnml_u:11752: tataḥ pādāns tayor natvā kṛtvā ca tripradakṣiṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11753: parivṛtya puraskṛtvā dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayan // Rm_29.20{20} //
S01ratnml_u:11754: tatas ta bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān devān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:11756: tataś ca bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ devānāṃ sukhamāninaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11758: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāre duḥkhaṃ śūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11759: kāme kiṃcit sukhaṃ nātra kleśasaṃghe samākule // Rm_29.23{23} //
S01ratnml_u:11760: iti matvātra saṃsāre sadā saukhyaṃ yadīchatha /
S01ratnml_u:11761: bodhicaryāvrataṃ dhṛtvā saṃcaradhvaṃ sadā śubhaṃ // Rm_29.24{24} //
S01ratnml_u:11765: sa samyag bodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyati // Rm_29.26{25} //
S01ratnml_u:11766: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre sarve yūyaṃ samāhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11768: ye triratnaṃ bhajanty atra na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11769: sadā sadgatisaṃyātāḥ kramād bodhim avāpnuyuḥ // Rm_29.28{27} //
S01ratnml_u:11770: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te 'marāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11771: satyam eva parijñāya prābhyanandan prabodhitāḥ // Rm_29.29{28} //
S01ratnml_u:11773: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_29.30{29} //
S01ratnml_u:11775: saddharmaṃ naḥ samādiśya bhavan vihartum arhati // Rm_29.31{30} //
S01ratnml_u:11776: vayaṃ sarve surā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11777: saddharmaṃ sarvadākarṇya cariṣyāmaḥ śubhāṃ cariṃ // Rm_29.32{31} //
S01ratnml_u:11779: upetya sāṃjalir natvā bhagavantaṃ tam abravīt // Rm_29.33{32} //
S01ratnml_u:11780: dhanyo 'si yat tvayā putra pratijñātaṃ yathāpurā /
S01ratnml_u:11781: tathā tvaṃ pūryate sarvaṃ sarvārthasiddhir astu te // Rm_29.34{33} //
S01ratnml_u:11784: iti mātrārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11785: jananīṃ tāṃ sabhāṃ cāpi samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_29.36{35} //
S01ratnml_u:11787: sarveṣām api satvānāṃ hitārthe 'haṃ jino bhave // Rm_29.37{36} //
S01ratnml_u:11788: tad atra sarvadā naivaṃ tiṣṭheyaṃ tridaśaiḥ saha /
S01ratnml_u:11789: varṣā māsatrayaṃ sthātum ichāmi dharmam ādiśan // Rm_29.38{37} //
S01ratnml_u:11790: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā jananī mudā /
S01ratnml_u:11791: tathāstv iti prabhāṣitvā prābhyanaṃdat prabodhitā // Rm_29.39{38} //
S01ratnml_u:11792: tathā sa bhagavāns tatra bodhicaryāṃ prakāśayan /
S01ratnml_u:11793: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya tasthau māsatrayaṃ divi // Rm_29.40{39} //
S01ratnml_u:11796: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā prabhejire // Rm_29.41{40} //
S01ratnml_u:11797: tadā tatra sadā svarge maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11799: tasmiṃś cā samaye tatra srāvastyā vahir āśrame /
S01ratnml_u:11800: jetodyāne vihāre sa maudgalyāyana āśrayat // Rm_29.43{42} //
S01ratnml_u:11801: tadā te sāṃghikāḥ sarve taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ yatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11802: vihāre saṃsthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmaṃ śrotuṃ samīchire // Rm_29.44{43} //
S01ratnml_u:11803: tatas te sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokāś cānye 'pi sajjanāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11804: tat saddharmadeśanāṃ śrotuṃ muditāḥ samupācaran // Rm_29.45{44} //
S01ratnml_u:11805: tatra sarve 'pi te lokās taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ guruṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11806: samabhyarcya samānamya dharmaṃ śrotu]m upāśrayan // Rm_29.46{45} //
S01ratnml_u:11807: tān dṛṣṭvā samupāsīnān sa maudgalyo jinātmajaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11809: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokāś ca sāṃghikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11811: atha te bhikṣavaḥ sarve kṛtāṃjaliḥ puṭo mudā /
S01ratnml_u:11812: taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ natvā paprachur evam ādarāt // Rm_29.49{48} //
S01ratnml_u:11814: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya viharati na manyate // Rm_29.50{49} //
S01ratnml_u:11815: tad asmākaṃ manānsy atra bhagavāñ chāstā yataḥ sthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11816: tat satyaṃ samupādiśya prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_29.51{50} //
S01ratnml_u:11817: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa maudgalyāyanaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11818: sarvāns tān saṃghikān bhikṣūn samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_29.52{51} //
S01ratnml_u:11819: śrutaṃ mayā bhavanto 'sau bhagavāñ chāstā 'dhunā divi /
S01ratnml_u:11820: tato mātuḥ surāṇāṃ cā tiṣṭhate dharmam ādiśat // Rm_29.53{52} //
S01ratnml_u:11822: atra lokahitaṃ kartum avataret svayaṃ khalu // Rm_29.54{53} //
S01ratnml_u:11823: iti tenārhatākhyātaṃ śrutvā te sāṃghikā janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11825: sadā te sāṃghikās tasya maudgalyasya mahāmateḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11827: tato varṣātrimāsānte sarve te sāṃghikā janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11828: api taṃ maudgalyam ānatvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_29.57{56} //
S01ratnml_u:11830: draṣṭum ichāmahe śāstuḥ saddharmaṃ tṛṣitā vayaṃ // Rm_29.58{57} //
S01ratnml_u:11831: ciradṛṣṭo yad asmābhir bhagavāṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11832: tad asyāgramunīndrasya darśanaṃ dātum arhati // Rm_29.59{58} //
S01ratnml_u:11834: gatvā svarge munīndrasya sahasā samupakramet // Rm_29.60{59} //
S01ratnml_u:11835: tatra gatvā bhavāc chāstur munīndrasya jagadguroḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11836: asmākaṃ vacanaiś cāpi vaṃdatāṃ caraṇāmbujau // Rm_29.61{60} //
S01ratnml_u:11838: dehe ca kauśalaṃ saukhyaṃ pṛchatāṃ vacanaiś ca naḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11839: evaṃ cāpi puraḥ śāstur nivedituṃ samarhati // Rm_29.62{61} //
S01ratnml_u:11840: bhagavaṃ nātha sarvajña te jāmbūdvīpikā narāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11842: yad bhavān sarvasatvānāṃ hitaṃ kartuṃ samudyataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11843: tad bhagavān manuṣyāṇāṃ dharmam ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_29.64{63} //
S01ratnml_u:11844: narāḥ svarge samāgaṃtuṃ śaknuvanti na ke cana /
S01ratnml_u:11845: devās tu sarvalokeṣu pracaranti yathechayā // Rm_29.65{64} //
S01ratnml_u:11848: vayaṃ sarve sadā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11849: satkṛtya śraddhayā dharmmaṃ śrutvā saṃprabhajemahi // Rm_29.67{66} //
S01ratnml_u:11850: evaṃ śāstar mahāvijña gatvā tatra surālaye /
S01ratnml_u:11852: iti taiḥ prārthitaiḥ śrutvā sa maudgalyo mahārddhimān /
S01ratnml_u:11853: evam iti pratijñāya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_29.69{68} //
S01ratnml_u:11854: atha te sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokāś cāpi mahātmanā /
S01ratnml_u:11855: tenādhivāsitaṃ matvā muditāḥ svasvālayaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_29.70{69} //
S01ratnml_u:11857: svarge gaṃtuṃ samādhāya samādhiṃ vidadhe kṣaṇaṃ // Rm_29.71{70} //
S01ratnml_u:11858: tataḥ sa ṛddhivīryeṇa suparṇa iva khe 'gamat /
S01ratnml_u:11859: bhāsayan sahasā gatvā divi śāstur upācarat // Rm_29.72{71} //
S01ratnml_u:11860: tatra taṃ samupāyātaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavān mudā /
S01ratnml_u:11861: svāgataṃ prehi maudgalya niṣīdeti samabravīt // Rm_29.73{72} //
S01ratnml_u:11862: ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa sa maudgalyaḥ pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11863: sāñjaliḥ pādayoḥ śāstuḥ praṇatvaivaṃ samabravīt // Rm_29.74{73} //
S01ratnml_u:11864: bhagavan nātha sarvajña prāgato 'haṃ mudā divi /
S01ratnml_u:11865: bhavatāṃ darśanaṃ kartuṃ tat prasīda dayānidhe // Rm_29.75{74} //
S01ratnml_u:11866: kaccit te kuśalaṃ śāstaḥ kiñcid vādhāpi naiva hi /
S01ratnml_u:11867: yātrā sukhaṃ valaṃ vīryaṃ kaccit kāye na cānyathā // Rm_29.76{75} //
S01ratnml_u:11869: tathāpi bhagavann atra vijñāpayeya sarvathā // Rm_29.77{76} //
S01ratnml_u:11870: bhavatāṃ sāṃghikaiḥ sarvair lokaiś cāpi mahājanaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11871: bhavantaṃ draṣṭum ichadbhiḥ preṣito 'ham ihāgataḥ // Rm_29.78{77} //
S01ratnml_u:11872: te sarve sāṃghikā lokā bhavatāṃ caraṇāmbuje /
S01ratnml_u:11873: vandanti kauśalaṃ kāye paripṛchanti cādarāt // Rm_29.79{78} //
S01ratnml_u:11874: evaṃ cāpi vadante te sarve lokāś ca sāṃghikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11877: tat tathātra manuṣyāṇāṃ dharmam ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_29.81{80} //
S01ratnml_u:11878: tataḥ svarge samāgaṃtuṃ śaknuvanti na ke cana /
S01ratnml_u:11879: devās tu sarvalokeṣu pracaranti yathechayā // Rm_29.82{81} //
S01ratnml_u:11883: vayaṃ sarve sadā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11884: satkṛtya śraddhayā dharmaṃ śrutvā saṃprabhajemahi // Rm_29.84{83} //
S01ratnml_u:11885: evam asmadvacobhis tvaṃ gatvā tatra surālaye /
S01ratnml_u:11888: bhavatāṃ vijñāpanāṃ kartuṃ sahasā samupācare // Rm_29.86{85} //
S01ratnml_u:11890: saddharmaṃ samupādeṣṭuṃ bhuvy eva tarttum arhati // Rm_29.87{86} //
S01ratnml_u:11891: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11892: taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_29.88{87} //
S01ratnml_u:11893: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra sarve śakrādayo 'marāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11896: parivṛtya puraskṛtya dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayan // Rm_29.90{89} //
S01ratnml_u:11897: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvan samupāśritān /
S01ratnml_u:11899: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve śakrādayo 'pi te /
S01ratnml_u:11901: tat samīkṣya sa maudgalyaḥ kiñcid vihasito mudā /
S01ratnml_u:11902: bhagavaṃtaṃ munīndraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_29.93{92} //
S01ratnml_u:11905: atha sa bhagavāṃs tasya maudgalyasya mahāmateḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11906: manaścintitam ājñāya taṃ maudgalyaṃ samabravīt // Rm_29.95{94} //
S01ratnml_u:11907: na me maudgalya satkāravaṃdhitaṃ bhavate manaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11908: api tv ahaṃ yathechāmi tathā sarvaṃ samṛddhyati // Rm_29.96{95} //
S01ratnml_u:11909: āyāntv ihāmarāḥ sarve iti mayā yadecchyate /
S01ratnml_u:11910: tadā sarva ime devā āgachaṃti samaṃtataḥ // Rm_29.97{96} //
S01ratnml_u:11911: gachantu ca surāḥ sarve iti mayā yadehyate /
S01ratnml_u:11912: tadā sarva ime devā gachaṃti ca svam ālayaṃ // Rm_29.98{97} //
S01ratnml_u:11914: tathātra sarvakāryāṇi siddhyaṃte hi sadā tadā // Rm_29.99{98} //
S01ratnml_u:11915: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā maudgalya ātmavit /
S01ratnml_u:11916: śāstuḥ pādāmbujau natvā sāṃjaliḥ samupāśrayat // Rm_29.100{99} //
S01ratnml_u:11917: tataḥ sabhāṃ surāṃ kīrṇāṃ sa maudgalyāyano yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11918: tāra sarvāṃ saṃnirīkṣyaivaṃ bhagavantam abhāṣata // Rm_29.101{100} //
S01ratnml_u:11920: nūnam ime surāḥ sarve saṃbuddhapadalābhinaḥ // Rm_29.102{1} //
S01ratnml_u:11921: santi hy asyāṃ sabhāyāṃ ye saṃbuddhe saṃprasāditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11923: santi dharme prasannā ye āryaśīlaiḥ samanvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11928: iti maudgalyasaṃproktaṃ śrutvā sa bhagavāṃs tathā /
S01ratnml_u:11930: evam etad dhi maudgalya vicitreyaṃ mahāsabhā /
S01ratnml_u:11931: surendrapramukhā devā yatra santi pramoditāḥ // Rm_29.107{6} //
S01ratnml_u:11938: evaṃ śāstrā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā devādhipo 'pi saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11939: bhagavaṃtaṃ samālokya maudgalyaṃ ca tathābravīt // Rm_29.111{10} //
S01ratnml_u:11942: santi buddhe prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11944: saṃti dharme prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11946: santi dharme prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11948: saṃti saṃghe prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11951: maudgalyaṃ śrīghanaṃ cāpi śakraṃ caikṣyaivam abravīt // Rm_29.117{16} //
S01ratnml_u:11954: santi saṃghe prasannā ye satkṛtya prabhajanti te /
S01ratnml_u:11956: santi dharme prasannā ye bhajanti śraddhayā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:11958: santi buddhe prasannā ye bhajaṃti śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11961: munīndraśakradevaiś ca śrutvā sarve surā mudā // Rm_29.122{21} //
S01ratnml_u:11963: tatra sarve 'pi te devās triratnabhajanodyatāḥ // Rm_29.123{22} //
S01ratnml_u:11965: tatas tāṃ śrīghanaṃ nātvā maudgalyaṃ ca prasāditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11966: te śakrādayo devāḥ sarve svasvālayāṃ yayuḥ // Rm_29.125{24} //
S01ratnml_u:11968: bhagavantaṃ tam ānamya sāṃjalir evam abravīt // Rm_29.126{25} //
S01ratnml_u:11971: atra sarve surā bhadraiś caranti bodhimānasāḥ // Rm_29.127{26} //
S01ratnml_u:11972: tat tatrāpi manuṣyāṇāṃ hitāya bhagavān api /
S01ratnml_u:11975: bhagavāṃs taṃ mahāsatvaṃ maudgalyam evam ādiśat // Rm_29.129{28} //
S01ratnml_u:11979: sāṃkāśe nagare hy āpajjure vana udumvare // Rm_29.131{30} //
S01ratnml_u:11980: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā maudgalya ātmavit /
S01ratnml_u:11981: tatheti prativijñapya tathā kartuṃ samaichata // Rm_29.132{31} //
S01ratnml_u:11982: atha sa ṛddhimān yogī maudgalyāyana ātmavit /
S01ratnml_u:11983: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā samādhiṃ vidadhe tadā // Rm_29.133{32} //
S01ratnml_u:11985: kṣaṇāt pakṣī yathākāśāj jambudvīpam avātarat // Rm_29.134{33} //
S01ratnml_u:11989: matvā te sāṃghikāḥ sarve muditāḥ samupācaran // Rm_29.136{35} //
S01ratnml_u:11990: tac chrutvā muditāḥ sarve lokāś cāpi nṛpādayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:11993: dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te natvā parivṛtyopatasthire // Rm_29.138{37} //
S01ratnml_u:11994: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve maudgalyaṃ taṃ maharddhikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:11995: kṛtāṃjalipuṭā natvā paprachur evam ādarāt // Rm_29.139{38} //
S01ratnml_u:11997: kutra sa bhagavān dharmam ādiśaṃs tiṣṭhate divi // Rm_29.140{39} //
S01ratnml_u:11998: kadā sa bhagavāṃc chāstā svargād iha samācaret /
S01ratnml_u:11999: kathaṃ cāpi samākhyāti tat sarvaṃ samupādiśa // Rm_29.141{40} //
S01ratnml_u:12000: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa maudgalyāyano yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12001: tāṃ sarvān saṃghikāl lokāṃś cāpi dṛṣṭvaivam abravīt // Rm_29.142{41} //
S01ratnml_u:12002: bhavantaḥ kuśalaṃ śāstu munīndrasya mamāpi ca /
S01ratnml_u:12003: yuṣmākam api nāmno 'ham avandaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_29.143{42} //
S01ratnml_u:12005: mātuḥ sa bhagavān dharmam ādiśaṃs tiṣṭhate divi // Rm_29.144{43} //
S01ratnml_u:12006: yathā yuṣmābhir ākhyātaṃ tathā niveditaṃ mayā /
S01ratnml_u:12007: śrutvā sa bhagavāṃc chāstā mamaivaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_29.145{44} //
S01ratnml_u:12011: etad yūyaṃ parijñāya prābhyanandata sāṃprataṃ // Rm_29.147{46} //
S01ratnml_u:12012: iti tenārhatākhyātaṃ śrutvā te saṃghikā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:12013: sevaṃ nṛpādi lokāś ca prābhyanandan pramoditāḥ // Rm_29.148{47} //
S01ratnml_u:12015: tatas te sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokā bhūpādayo 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:12017: tadā sa bhagavāṃs tatra svarge sendrān surān api /
S01ratnml_u:12018: mātaraṃ samupāmaṃtrya pura evam upādiśat // Rm_29.150{49} //
S01ratnml_u:12019: mātaḥ sendrādi devāś ca yūyaṃ sarve samādarāt /
S01ratnml_u:12020: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracaradhvaṃ sadā śubhe // Rm_29.151{50} //
S01ratnml_u:12022: nṛṇām api hitārthena gantum ichāmi nānyathā // Rm_29.152{51} //
S01ratnml_u:12023: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa sarve sendrāḥ surā api /
S01ratnml_u:12024: mātāpi sāṃjalir natvā prārthayat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_29.153{52} //
S01ratnml_u:12025: bhagavan nātha sarvajña ko 'smākaṃ dharmam ādiśet /
S01ratnml_u:12026: tad atra kṛpayā dharmam ādeṣṭuṃ sthātum arhati // Rm_29.154{53} //
S01ratnml_u:12027: iti taiḥ prārthite bhūyo bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12028: mātaraṃ tān surān sarvān dṛṣṭvaivaṃ ca samādiśat // Rm_29.155{54} //
S01ratnml_u:12029: mātar nāhaṃ sadaikatra tiṣṭheyaṃ dharmam ādiśan /
S01ratnml_u:12031: tan mātar aham ālokya martyānāṃ hitakāmpayā /
S01ratnml_u:12033: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā mātā surā api /
S01ratnml_u:12034: sendrāḥ sarve 'pi te śāstuḥ pādāmbuje praṇemire // Rm_29.158{57} //
S01ratnml_u:12035: tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve mātāpi tasya tāyinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12036: tridhā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya natvā svasvālayaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_29.159{58} //
S01ratnml_u:12037: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra devālaye samāhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12038: tat samādhiṃ samādhāya kṣaṇād antarhito 'carat // Rm_29.160{59} //
S01ratnml_u:12039: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra jambudvīpe prabhāsayan /
S01ratnml_u:12044: sarve te sāṃghikā lokā bhūpādayo 'py upācaran // Rm_29.163{62} //
S01ratnml_u:12045: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā sarve te saṃpramoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12048: daityā vidyādharā nāgā garuḍāḥ siddhādayo 'pi ca // Rm_29.165{64} //
S01ratnml_u:12052: devādi sarvalokāṃś ca bhojayituṃ nyamaṃtrayat // Rm_29.167{66} //
S01ratnml_u:12053: bhagavān api devādi lokāḥ sarve prasāditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12058: tathāsanāṃ vastrāṇi divyāni rucirāni ca // Rm_29.170{69} //
S01ratnml_u:12063: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghaṃ taṃ natvaivaṃ prārthayan mudā // Rm_29.172{71} //
S01ratnml_u:12065: tat sasaṃgho bhavān atra svasvāsane niṣīdatu // Rm_29.173{72} //
S01ratnml_u:12066: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra pādyaṃ gṛhya sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12068: tathā devādi lokāś ca sarvasvasvāsaneṣu tat /
S01ratnml_u:12071: dṛṣṭvā sa mudito bhikṣur yathāvidhiṃ samarcayat // Rm_29.176{75} //
S01ratnml_u:12073: tān buddhapramukhān sarvan yathechaiḥ samatoṣayat // Rm_29.177{76} //
S01ratnml_u:12075: tad divyabhojanaṃ bhuktvā vismitās tṛptim āyayuḥ // Rm_29.178{77} //
S01ratnml_u:12076: tataḥ sa bhikṣur ālokya sarvāns tān saṃpratoṣitān /
S01ratnml_u:12079: tān buddhapramukhān sarvān saṃmoditān akārayat // Rm_29.180{79} //
S01ratnml_u:12081: sasāṃghikaṃ munīndraṃ taṃ natvā tatpura āśrayat // Rm_29.181{80} //
S01ratnml_u:12082: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasya bhikṣor matvā śubhāśayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12083: āryasatyaṃ samārabhya dideśa dharmam uttamaṃ // Rm_29.182{81} //
S01ratnml_u:12094: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_29.188{87} //
S01ratnml_u:12095: bhagavan kiṃ purānena bhikṣuṇā sukṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12096: yenopapāduko 'rhaṃ ca bhavaty ayaṃ mahāsudhīḥ // Rm_29.189{88} //
S01ratnml_u:12097: yac cāpy asya yater bhikṣoḥ prārthitaṃ tat samṛdhyati /
S01ratnml_u:12098: etat sarvaṃ samākhyāya sarvān asmān prabodhaya // Rm_29.190{89} //
S01ratnml_u:12099: evaṃ tair bhikṣubhiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12100: tān sarvān sāṃghikāl lokān samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_29.191{90} //
S01ratnml_u:12104: purāsīn bhagavān buddho vipaścī nāma sarvavit /
S01ratnml_u:12111: anyasmin mahodyāne varṣāsu vyaharans tadā // Rm_29.196{95} //
S01ratnml_u:12114: tatas te bhikṣavas sarve catvāras tatprasādhanāt /
S01ratnml_u:12118: tān arhato mahābhijñān dṛṣṭvā sa paṃcamo yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12119: muditas taccaraṇān natvā praṇidhānaṃ tathā vyadhāt // Rm_29.200{99} //
S01ratnml_u:12120: yad etebhir mamāgamya sākṣād arhattvam āgataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12123: tat tathā sarvam apy eva sarvatrāpi samṛddhyatu // Rm_29.202{1} //
S01ratnml_u:12125: ayam eva mahābhijño bhavati hīti manyatāṃ // Rm_29.203{2} //
S01ratnml_u:12126: punar api bhavaty atra yenāyam upapādukaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12127: tat karmaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇuta yūyam ādarāt // Rm_29.204{3} //
S01ratnml_u:12128: purāsīd bhagavān buddhaḥ kāśyapo nāma sarvavit /
S01ratnml_u:12129: arhan nātho jagacchāstā dharmarājas tathāgataḥ // Rm_29.205{4} //
S01ratnml_u:12132: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra vārāṇasyaṃ gṛhādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12133: āsīt tasya priyā bhāryyā garbhiṇī garbhapīḍitā // Rm_29.207{6} //
S01ratnml_u:12135: tasyā ārttaravaṃ śrutvā sa bharttā karuṇārditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12137: hā duḥkhaṃ garbbhapīḍāsyā jāyate kiṃ kariṣyate /
S01ratnml_u:12138: evaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi saṃsāre rogiṇāṃ bhavacāriṇāṃ // Rm_29.209{8} //
S01ratnml_u:12139: mātur evaṃ mahad duḥkhaṃ garbbhasthasya śiśor na kiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12140: etad duḥkham ahaṃ soḍhuṃ na śaknuyāṃ kathaṃ cana // Rm_29.210{9} //
S01ratnml_u:12141: tad atra kāśyapasyāhaṃ śāsane śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12142: pravrajya saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā careyaṃ saṃvṛtiṃ sadā // Rm_29.211{10} //
S01ratnml_u:12143: iti niścitya sa śreṣṭhī gatvā kāśyapaśāsane /
S01ratnml_u:12144: pravrajya saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā cacāra saṃvṛtiṃ sadā // Rm_29.212{11} //
S01ratnml_u:12145: tataḥ kāle samāghrāte śreṣṭhī sa parikheditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12146: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ vyadhāt tadā // Rm_29.213{12} //
S01ratnml_u:12149: mātur garbhe hy ajāyeyaṃ bhaveyam upapādukaḥ // Rm_29.214{13} //
S01ratnml_u:12153: bhavaty ayaṃ mahābhijñaḥ sāṃpratam upapādukaḥ // Rm_29.216{15} //
S01ratnml_u:12154: yathānena tadā tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:12155: tathātra śāsane bauddhe pravrajyārhattvam āpyate // Rm_29.217{16} //
S01ratnml_u:12156: evaṃ hi manyatāṃ sarve saṃsāre karma yat kṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12157: tat phalaṃ bhujyate nūnaṃ yathehitaṃ tathā dhruvaṃ // Rm_29.218{17} //
S01ratnml_u:12158: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ tenaiva bhujyate phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12159: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva kṛtakarmaphalaṃ kvacit // Rm_29.219{18} //
S01ratnml_u:12160: nāgnibhir dahyate karmaṃ kriyate nāpi codakaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12161: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate nāpi kṣīyate naiva bhūmiṣu // Rm_29.220{19} //
S01ratnml_u:12162: anyāthāpi bhaven naiva yat kṛtaṃ tat phalaṃ khalu /
S01ratnml_u:12163: sarvatra bhujyate sarvair jantubhir bhavacāribhiḥ // Rm_29.221{20} //
S01ratnml_u:12164: kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ pāke duḥkhataiva sadā bhave /
S01ratnml_u:12165: śubhasya sukhatā nityaṃ miśritasyāpi miśritaṃ // Rm_29.222{21} //
S01ratnml_u:12167: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_29.223{22} //
S01ratnml_u:12168: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te bhikṣavas tathā /
S01ratnml_u:12169: satyam iti parijñāya prābhyanandan prabodhitāḥ // Rm_29.224{23} //
S01ratnml_u:12171: prabodhitaḥ prasannātmā prācaran sarvadā śubhe // Rm_29.225{24} //
S01ratnml_u:12172: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
S01ratnml_u:12173: śrutvā rājans tvayāpy evaṃ caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_29.226{25} //
S01ratnml_u:12175: prerayitvā śubhe dharme pālanīyās tvayādarāt // Rm_29.227{26} //

S01ratnml_u:12273: te 'pi sarve prayānty eva kāle mṛtyuṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_30.43{42} //

S01ratnml_u:12283: te 'pi sarve prayānty eva nivīryā maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_30.48{47} //
S01ratnml_u:12284: evam anye 'pi satvāś ca siṃhavyāghrādi jaṃtavaḥ /

S01ratnml_u:12286: aṇḍajāḥ svedajāś caiva sarve 'pi prāṇino 'pi te /

S01ratnml_u:12295: te 'pi sarve nirutsāhāḥ kāle yāṃti yamāntike // Rm_30.54{53} //

S01ratnml_u:12321: tathāgatāś ca saṃbuddhāḥ sarvajñāḥ sugatā jināḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12326: bodhicaryāṃ kṛtvā samādiśya saddharmaṃ ca samaṃtataḥ // Rm_30.69{71} //
S01ratnml_u:12327: sarvatra maṃgalaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat /
S01ratnml_u:12331: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre sarveṣāṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12332: sarvān saṃskārajān duḥkhāns tyaktuṃ prārabhatodyamaṃ // Rm_30.72{74} //
S01ratnml_u:12335: tasmāt saṃsāraduḥkhāni tyaktum ichaṃti ye narāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12336: te māyāsaṃratiṃ tyaktvā caraṃtu buddhaśāsane // Rm_30.74{76} //
S01ratnml_u:12337: ye buddhaśāsane bhaktyā triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12340: bodhicaryāṃ samāsādya kuryus satvahitaṃ sadā // Rm_30.76{78} //
S01ratnml_u:12342: samyakṣaṃbodhim āsādya bhaveyuḥ sugatā jināḥ // Rm_30.77{79} //
S01ratnml_u:12343: tataḥ sarvatra lokeṣu kṛtvā loke subhadratāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12346: tadā te vimalātmāno nilīnāḥ syu nijālaye // Rm_30.79{81} //
S01ratnml_u:12348: trikāye vīryam utthāpya carantu buddhaśāsane // Rm_30.80{82} //
S01ratnml_u:12350: kiṃ kāyena vinā dharmaṃ vācāpi kiṃ vinā guṇaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12351: manaso kiṃ vinā vīryyaṃ kiṃ vīryaṃ saṃvaraṃ vinā // Rm_30.81{83} //
S01ratnml_u:12352: yathā puṣpaṃ tathā dehaṃ yathā pakvaphalaṃ tanuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12353: kṣaṇāc cyutvāyate bhumau tathā kiṃ śobhate tanuḥ // Rm_30.82{84} //
S01ratnml_u:12355: tadvad dehaṃ kṣaṇadhvaṃsi matvā carantu saṃvaraṃ // Rm_30.83{85} //
S01ratnml_u:12357: matvā dehaṃ samutthāya carantu saugataṃ vṛsaṃ // Rm_30.84{86} //
S01ratnml_u:12359: matvā vīryamahotsāhaṃ dhṛtvā caraṃtu saṃvaraṃ // Rm_30.85{87} //
S01ratnml_u:12361: matvā saṃbodhisaṃprāptyai carantu saugataṃ vrataṃ // Rm_30.86{88} //
S01ratnml_u:12363: durgatiṃ na gachaṃti gachaṃti sadgatiṃ sadā // Rm_30.87{89} //
S01ratnml_u:12364: tasmād ichaṃti ye bhadraṃ saṃsāre bodhisādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12365: te triratnaṃ sadā bhaktyā bhajaṃtu śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_30.88{90} //
S01ratnml_u:12368: puṇyam eva jaganmitraṃ pāpa eva jagadripuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12369: tat puṇyamitram ārādhya jayaṃtu pāpakaṃ ripuṃ // Rm_30.90{92} //
S01ratnml_u:12370: puṇyavān puruṣaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvatra jagate sadā /
S01ratnml_u:12371: yathābhilaṣitaṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yāṃti sukhāvatiṃ // Rm_30.91{93} //
S01ratnml_u:12372: ity evaṃ bhagavān āha śrutvā te sarvasāṃghikāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12373: satyam iti paribuddhvā praceruḥ saugataṃ vrataṃ // Rm_30.92{94} //
S01ratnml_u:12374: etan me guruṇākhyātaṃ tathā tatra mayocyate /
S01ratnml_u:12375: tvayāpy evaṃ mahārāja caritavyaṃ śubhe vṛṣe // Rm_30.93{95} //
S01ratnml_u:12377: śubhe dharme pratiṣṭhāpya pālanīyāḥ sadādarāt // Rm_30.94{96} //
S01ratnml_u:12378: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhavet sadā /
S01ratnml_u:12379: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_30.95{97} //
S01ratnml_u:12381: tathety uktvā praṇatvā ca prābhyanadat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_30.96{98} //
S01ratnml_u:12382: anityatāsūtram idaṃ subhāṣyaṃ śṛṇvanti ye cāpi narāḥ prasannāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12383: sukhāni bhuktvā śubhadharmaraktāḥ samyāṃti cānte sugatālaye te // Rm_30.97{99} //
S01ratnml_u:12388: upaguptaṃ tam ānamya mudaivaṃ punar abravīt // Rm_31.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:12389: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12390: tadyathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_31.2{2} //
S01ratnml_u:12391: iti saṃprārthite rājñā sa yatīśaḥ prasannadhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12392: tam aśokaṃ mahārājaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_31.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:12393: śṛṇu sādhu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12394: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvānumodanāṃ kuru // Rm_31.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:12401: tatra te bhikṣavo 'rhantaḥ sāṃghikāś cailakā api /
S01ratnml_u:12403: bhikṣuṇyaḥ śuddhaśīlāś ca vratinaś ca śubhāśayāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12405: sarve 'pi sāṃghikās tatra saddharmaṃ śrotum āgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12406: kramāt taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā kṛtvā tridhā pradakṣiṇāṃ // Rm_31.10{10} //
S01ratnml_u:12412: rākṣasā garuḍā nāgāḥ siddhā vidyādharādayaḥ // Rm_31.13{13} //
S01ratnml_u:12413: evam anye 'pi lokāś ca brāhmaṇāś ca maharṣayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12414: yatayo yoginaś cāpi tīrthikāś ca tapaśvinaḥ // Rm_31.14{14} //
S01ratnml_u:12416: vaiśyāś ca maṃtriṇaḥ śreṣṭhā amātyāś ca mahājanāḥ // Rm_31.15{15} //
S01ratnml_u:12417: senānyaḥ sabalāś cāpi gṛhasthāḥ paurikā janāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12418: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca dhaninaḥ śilpino 'pi ca // Rm_31.16{16} //
S01ratnml_u:12419: anye jānapadāś cāpi grāmyāḥ kārpaṭikā api /
S01ratnml_u:12420: evam anye 'pi lokāś ca saddharmaguṇavāṃchinaḥ // Rm_31.17{17} //
S01ratnml_u:12421: sarve tatra samāyātā dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ muniṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12422: natvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya samabhyarcya kramān mudā // Rm_31.18{18} //
S01ratnml_u:12423: tataḥ sarve 'pi te natvā puraskṛtya samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12424: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_31.19{19} //
S01ratnml_u:12425: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
S01ratnml_u:12427: bodhicaryāṃ samārabhya dideśa dharmam uttamaṃ // Rm_31.20{20} //
S01ratnml_u:12428: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokāḥ prabodhitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12430: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra śrāvastye yo gṛhādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12431: āḍhyo mahādhanaḥ śrāddhaḥ śrīmāñc chrīdopamaḥ kṛtī // Rm_31.22{22} //
S01ratnml_u:12432: sa tadā tatra saṃbuddhaṃ śrīghanaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12433: draṣṭuṃ jetāśrame ramye vihāre samupācarat // Rm_31.23{23} //
S01ratnml_u:12435: dṛṣṭvā sa muditaḥ śreṣṭhī praṇatvā samupācarat // Rm_31.24{24} //
S01ratnml_u:12437: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ purataḥ samupāśrayat // Rm_31.25{25} //
S01ratnml_u:12438: taṃ dṛṣṭvā samupāsīnaṃ bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12439: matvā tasyāśayaṃ śuddham āryasatyam upādiśat // Rm_31.26{26} //
S01ratnml_u:12442: tatra sa suprasannātmā śreṣṭhī mudā samutthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12443: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_31.28{28} //
S01ratnml_u:12444: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
S01ratnml_u:12445: tat pravrajyāṃ vrataṃ mahyaṃ kṛpayā dātum arhati // Rm_31.29{29} //
S01ratnml_u:12446: iti saṃprārthite tena dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavān muniḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12448: yadi śrāddhāsti te vatsa saugataśāsane vrate /
S01ratnml_u:12449: ehi cara samādhāya brahmacaryaṃ vratottamaṃ // Rm_31.31{31} //
S01ratnml_u:12450: ity uktvā sa jagacchāstā savyahastena tac chiraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12451: saṃspṛṣṭvā śāsane bauddhe śreṣṭhinaṃ taṃ samagrahīt // Rm_31.32{32} //
S01ratnml_u:12452: tatra pravrajitas tena munīndreṇa sa muṇḍitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12454: tataḥ sa bhikṣur ātmajño lābhī lokābhipūjitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12456: tallabdhaṃ saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ sa saha brahmacāribhiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12457: saṃvibhāgaṃ guroḥ kiṃcid apy akarot kadā cana // Rm_31.35{35} //
S01ratnml_u:12459: svayam eva prabhuṃjānaḥ kiṃcin naiva dadau kvacit // Rm_31.36{36} //
S01ratnml_u:12461: tad dravyasaṃcayaṃ smṛtvā nitaḥ pretālayaṃ yayau // Rm_31.37{37} //
S01ratnml_u:12462: pretībhūto 'pi sa smṛtvā tad dravyasaṃcayaṃ punaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12463: svakoṣṭhālaya āgatya tasthau svāsana āśrayan // Rm_31.38{38} //
S01ratnml_u:12464: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve tatkoṣṭhe taṃ mṛtakaṃ yatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12465: dṛṣṭvā gaṇḍīṃ parāhatya saṃskārtuṃ vidhi cārcayan // Rm_31.39{39} //
S01ratnml_u:12467: tataḥ pratyāgatāḥ sarve tat koṣṭhadvāram āyayuḥ // Rm_31.40{40} //
S01ratnml_u:12469: pratyaveksitum ālabdhās taṃ pretaṃ samapaśyata // Rm_31.41{41} //
S01ratnml_u:12471: taṃ pretaṃ vikṛtaṃ pātraṃ dhṛtaṃ cīvaraprāvṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12472: dṛṣṭvā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve samudvignā vicerire // Rm_31.42{42} //
S01ratnml_u:12473: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve bhagavataḥ purogatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12476: sa lokodvejanārthaṃ ca tad deśaṃ samupācarat // Rm_31.44{44} //
S01ratnml_u:12477: tatrāsau preta ārāt taṃ bhagavaṃtam upāgataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12480: ratnāṃgam iva bhadrāṃśaṃ dadarśa śrīghanaṃ muniṃ // Rm_31.46{46} //
S01ratnml_u:12482: prarudan sāṃjalir natvā tasthau prasāditāśayaḥ // Rm_31.47{47} //
S01ratnml_u:12483: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ pretaṃ saṃprasāditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12486: pātracīvaram ādhāya caritaṃ saṃvaraṃ vṛthā // Rm_31.49{49} //
S01ratnml_u:12488: kim idānīṃ ruditvātra svakṛtaṃ paribhuktavān // Rm_31.50{50} //
S01ratnml_u:12489: sādhv atra sāṃprataṃ cittaṃ prasādaya mamāntike /
S01ratnml_u:12490: asmāc cāpi pariṣkāradravyāc cittaṃ virāgaya // Rm_31.51{51} //
S01ratnml_u:12491: mā haivetaḥ punaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā yāsyasi nairaye /
S01ratnml_u:12492: tat saṃghe śaraṇaṃ gaccha tena tvaṃ sadgatiṃ vraje // Rm_31.52{52} //
S01ratnml_u:12493: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa preta utthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12494: sa pātracīvaraṃ dravyaṃ saṃghebhyo nirayātayat // Rm_31.53{53} //
S01ratnml_u:12496: nipatya svakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ dideśa sāṃjalir mudā // Rm_31.54{54} //
S01ratnml_u:12497: bhagavan nātha sarvajña yat pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ mayā /
S01ratnml_u:12499: tat sarvaṃ sāṃprataṃ śāstar darśayāmi bhavatpuraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12500: tat kṣamasvāparādhaṃ me prasīdatu bhavān guruḥ // Rm_31.56{56} //
S01ratnml_u:12501: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa kṛpānvitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12502: tat pretaṃ sudṛśālokya samapaśyac ciraṃ mudā // Rm_31.57{57} //
S01ratnml_u:12505: etaddānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat puṇyaṃ tvam avāpnuyāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12506: uttiṣṭha kṣipram etasmāt pretalokāt sudāruṇāt // Rm_31.59{59} //
S01ratnml_u:12507: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā pretaḥ sa moditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12509: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasya pretasya śubhasādhanaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12510: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya sasaṃghaḥ svāśraye yathā // Rm_31.61{61} //
S01ratnml_u:12511: tathā sa preta ākarṇya saddharmaṃ taj jinoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12512: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bheje nityaṃ prabodhitaḥ // Rm_31.62{62} //
S01ratnml_u:12513: tataḥ kāle samāghrātaḥ ca preto jvaradāhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12515: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā mṛto yayau yamālayaṃ // Rm_31.63{63} //
S01ratnml_u:12517: yamena preritas tasmāt pretamaharddhike yāyau // Rm_31.64{64} //
S01ratnml_u:12518: tatrāpi sa samutpanne vismitas taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12519: smṛtvā nityaṃ sadā bheje śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_31.65{65} //
S01ratnml_u:12520: tataḥ so cintayed evaṃ kutaḥ kutrāham āgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12521: kena puṇyānubhāvena mahatsaukhyaṃ labhe nv iti // Rm_31.66{66} //
S01ratnml_u:12523: triratnasmaraṇāt puṇyād iti mene sa puṇyabhāk // Rm_31.67{67} //
S01ratnml_u:12526: aho mayā sukhaṃ labdhaṃ tat saṃbuddhaprasādataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12527: tad idāniṃ munīṃdraṃ taṃ draṣṭum arhāmi sarvathā // Rm_31.69{69} //
S01ratnml_u:12528: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā so 'pi pretamaharddhikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12533: vihāre śrīghanaṃ draṣṭuṃ muditaḥ samudācarat // Rm_31.72{72} //
S01ratnml_u:12534: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvānaṃditaḥ sa kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12536: tatas taṃ sugataṃ nāthaṃ samabhyarcya pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12537: natvā sa sāṃjalir dharmaṃ śrotum ekāṃta āśrayat // Rm_31.74{74} //
S01ratnml_u:12538: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasya dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ viśodhitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12539: bodhicaryāṃ samārabhya saddharmam evam ādiśat // Rm_31.75{75} //
S01ratnml_u:12541: vakṣyāmy etat parijñāya samādhāya śubhe cara // Rm_31.76{76} //
S01ratnml_u:12542: yaḥ pumān atra saṃsāre satsaukhyaṃ sarvadechati /
S01ratnml_u:12543: sa ādau śraddhayā bhaktyā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_31.77{77} //
S01ratnml_u:12546: itthaṃ kṛtaṃ pradānaṃ yat tad vipāke mahat phalaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12547: kramād vṛddhitaraṃ yāyān na kṣiṇuyāt kadā cana // Rm_31.79{79} //
S01ratnml_u:12549: śāstā dharmādhipo rājā bodhisatvaḥ sudhīr bhavet // Rm_31.80{80} //
S01ratnml_u:12551: triratnabhajaṇaṃ kṛtvā dadyād dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_31.81{81} //
S01ratnml_u:12553: suśīlasaṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā triratnaṃ sarvadā bhajan // Rm_31.82{82} //
S01ratnml_u:12555: tatrāpi śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnaṃ sarvadā bhajan // Rm_31.83{83} //
S01ratnml_u:12564: tatrāpi śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_31.87{87} //
S01ratnml_u:12572: tatrāpi śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnabhajano rataḥ // Rm_31.91{84} //
S01ratnml_u:12590: tatpuṇyair bodhisaṃprāpto dharmarājo jino bhavet // Rm_31.100{93} //
S01ratnml_u:12591: tataḥ sa sugataḥ śāstā jagannātho vināyakaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12594: sarvasatvāñ chubhe sthāpya nirvṛtaḥ saugatiṃ vrajet // Rm_31.102{95} //
S01ratnml_u:12595: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre ya ichati śivāṃ gatiṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12596: sa evaṃ śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnabhajanodyataḥ // Rm_31.103{96} //
S01ratnml_u:12598: tataḥ kramāt sa tatpuṇyaiḥ sarvāḥ pāramitā api // Rm_31.104{97} //
S01ratnml_u:12600: iti matvā śubhe nityaṃ caritavyaṃ śubhārthibhiḥ // Rm_31.105{98} //
S01ratnml_u:12601: śubhena sadgatiṃ yāyā pāpena durgatīṃ vrajet /
S01ratnml_u:12602: pāpas tu jāyate lobhāt mātsaryamalināśrayāt // Rm_31.106{99} //
S01ratnml_u:12603: vopakārāṃ sukhecho 'pi na kiṃ cit sukham āpnuyāt /
S01ratnml_u:12608: saṃbodhipraṇidhiṃ kṛtvā caren nityaṃ susaṃvare // Rm_31.108{1} //
S01ratnml_u:12612: śivāṃ bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāt // Rm_31.110{3} //
S01ratnml_u:12613: evaṃ tvaṃ vā parijñāya triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12614: bodhicittaṃ samādhāya cara nityaṃ susaṃvare // Rm_31.111{4} //
S01ratnml_u:12615: tathā te sarvadā bhadraṃ bhaven nityaṃ samantataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12616: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_31.112{5} //
S01ratnml_u:12617: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa paribodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12618: tatheti hi pratiśrutvā prābhyanaṃdat prasāditaḥ // Rm_31.113{6} //
S01ratnml_u:12619: tataḥ sa taṃ jagannāthaṃ praṇatvā sāṃjalir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:12622: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pracaran sarvadā mudā // Rm_31.115{8} //
S01ratnml_u:12623: tad rātrau tatprabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavo vismayānvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12624: sarve te prātar utthāya natvāpṛchan munīśvaraṃ // Rm_31.116{9} //
S01ratnml_u:12625: bhagavan nātha sarvajña ko 'dya rātrāv ihāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12626: etad vṛttaṃ samākhyāya sarvān naḥ paribodhaya // Rm_31.117{10} //
S01ratnml_u:12627: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12628: tān sarvān sāṃghikān dṛṣṭvā bodhayitum upādiśat // Rm_31.118{11} //
S01ratnml_u:12629: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yo 'dya rātrāv ihāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12630: etat sarvaṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ pravakṣyāmi suvistaraṃ // Rm_31.119{12} //
S01ratnml_u:12631: yo 'sau śreṣṭhī mahāśrāddhaḥ saugate śāsane mudā /
S01ratnml_u:12632: śraddhayā pravrajitvātra brahmacaryaṃ mudā caran // Rm_31.120{13} //
S01ratnml_u:12634: labdhadravyaṃ na kasmai cid dadau kiñcit kadā cana // Rm_31.121{14} //
S01ratnml_u:12635: kevalaṃ saṃcayaṃ kṛtvā koṣṭhāgāre nidhāya tat /
S01ratnml_u:12636: guptīkṛtvā prayatnena vyabhajan naiva kiṃ cana // Rm_31.122{15} //
S01ratnml_u:12637: tataḥ kāle samāghrāte dhyātvā tad dravyasaṃcayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12640: punaḥ pratyāgatas tatra svālaye saṃnyaṣīdata // Rm_31.124{17} //
S01ratnml_u:12641: tatra taṃ saṃsthitaṃ pretaṃ dṛṣṭvāhaṃ samupācaran /
S01ratnml_u:12644: sa pātracīvaraṃ sarvaṃ taddravyaṃ nirayātayat // Rm_31.126{19} //
S01ratnml_u:12647: tatra sa suprasannātmā smṛtvā ratnatrayaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:12648: matsaddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum iha rātrau samāgataḥ // Rm_31.128{21} //
S01ratnml_u:12652: yo 'yaṃ śreṣṭhī na cānyo hi rātrāv iha samāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12653: yat sa mṛto 'bhavat pretas mātsaryaduritāśrayāt // Rm_31.130{23} //
S01ratnml_u:12655: mātsaryaṃ hi trilokeṣu pāpamūlaṃ nigadyate // Rm_31.131{24} //
S01ratnml_u:12657: mātsaryaṃ sumaduṣṭaṃ ripuṃ jayata sarvathā // Rm_31.132{25} //
S01ratnml_u:12658: mātsaryaṃ jīyate yair hi samuddhṛtya svamānasāt /
S01ratnml_u:12659: te eva mānino vīrāḥ śūrāḥ prājñā vicakṣaṇāḥ // Rm_31.133{26} //
S01ratnml_u:12660: ye ca jetuṃ na mātsaryaṃ śaknuvaṃti kathaṃ cana /
S01ratnml_u:12661: kiṃ te śūrā vijetāro virā na kleśabhojinaḥ // Rm_31.134{27} //
S01ratnml_u:12662: yeṣāṃ na jāyate citte mātsaryan duḥkṛtākaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12663: te eva sukhino virā jayinaḥ kleśaghātakāḥ // Rm_31.135{28} //
S01ratnml_u:12664: yāvan na jīyate citte mātsaryaṃ duritāśayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12665: tāvat kiṃ te suvīrā vā kṣaṇāt kleśānucāriṇaḥ // Rm_31.136{29} //
S01ratnml_u:12666: ye ca kleśavaśā vīrā na te dhīrā vicakṣaṇāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12667: kṣaṇāt kiṃ cin nimitteti careyur vikṛtāśayāḥ // Rm_31.137{30} //
S01ratnml_u:12669: duṣṭāḥ krodhāgnisaṃdagdhāḥ saṃpaśyeyur na kiṃ cana // Rm_31.138{31} //
S01ratnml_u:12670: tatas te 'ndhā ivāloke careyur na ca satpathe /
S01ratnml_u:12671: kumārga eva saṃraktāḥ pracareyuḥ pramāditāḥ // Rm_31.139{32} //
S01ratnml_u:12675: vighnaṃ kartuṃ samudyogaṃ kuryur nityaṃ samāhitāḥ // Rm_31.141{34} //
S01ratnml_u:12676: tatas te pāpino duṣṭā unmattā iva tāyinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12677: svayaṃ naṣṭāḥ parāṃś cāpi nāśayeyuḥ pravaṃcakāḥ // Rm_31.142{35} //
S01ratnml_u:12684: tatra yamo mahārājā dṛṣṭvā taṃ duritāśayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12686: tatra tair yamadūtās tāṃ gṛhītvā sahasā balāt /
S01ratnml_u:12688: tatra te daivabhogyāṃ bhuktvā bhoktuṃ samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12689: coditā yamadūtaiś ca bhrameyur narakeṣv api // Rm_31.148{41} //
S01ratnml_u:12692: evaṃ te daivabhogyāṃ bhuktvā tathā ciraṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:12694: narakān narake gatvā duḥkhāny evāśnuyu vabha // Rm_31.150{43} //
S01ratnml_u:12697: tadā tān sugatān dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā saṃpracoditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12699: tatra te sukhasaṃpannāḥ smṛtvā ratnatrayaṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:12700: sarvadā śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pracareyuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_31.153{46} //
S01ratnml_u:12702: śraddhayā satkṛtiṃ kṛtvā śṛṇuyur dharmam ādarāt // Rm_31.154{47} //
S01ratnml_u:12704: bodhicittaṃ samāsādya prakuryu dānam ādarāt // Rm_31.155{48} //
S01ratnml_u:12706: sarvasatvahitaṃ kṛtvā sādhayeyuḥ śubhāṃ cariṃ // Rm_31.156{49} //
S01ratnml_u:12708: tatas te vimalātmāno dhyātvā yogasamāhitāḥ // Rm_31.157{50} //
S01ratnml_u:12710: tato māragaṇāṃ jitvā pariśuddhās trimaṇḍalāḥ // Rm_31.158{51} //
S01ratnml_u:12712: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre mātsaryaṃ mūlam enasāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12714: tato vo maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ bhaved bhave samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12715: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyatha // Rm_31.161{54} //
S01ratnml_u:12716: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te sāṃghikā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:12718: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
S01ratnml_u:12719: evaṃ tvaṃ nṛpa mātsaryyaṃ tyaktvā cara śubhe sadā // Rm_31.163{56} //
S01ratnml_u:12720: prajāś cāpi tvayā rājan bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12721: bodhicaryāśayāḥ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpyāḥ śubhe sadā // Rm_31.164{57} //
S01ratnml_u:12722: evaṃ te sarvadā bhadraṃ bhaved bhave samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12723: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_31.165{58} //
S01ratnml_u:12726: pretībhūtāvadānaṃ duritahṛtamataiḥ śreṣṭhino lobhino ye śṛṇvaṃti śravayaṃti pramuditamanasaḥ śraddhayedaṃ manuṣyāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12727: mātsaryaṃ te vihāya trimaṇiśaraṇagāḥ sarvasatvānurāgā dānaṃ datvā prasannāḥ satataśubhacarā yānti buddhālayaṃ te // Rm_31.167{60} //
S01ratnml_u:12732: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā prārthayec caivam ādarāt // Rm_32.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:12733: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12734: tad yathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_32.2{2} //
S01ratnml_u:12735: iti saṃprārthite rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12736: tam aśokaṃ mahārājaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:12737: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12738: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tava dharmapravṛddhaye // Rm_32.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:12739: tad yathaivaṃ puraikasmin samaye sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12745: tatra te bhikṣavaḥ sarve bhikṣuṇyo 'pi samāgatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12746: yatinaś cailakāś caivam upāsakā upāsikāḥ // Rm_32.8{8} //
S01ratnml_u:12748: nirgranthās tīrthikāś cāpi tāpasāś ca maharṣayaḥ // Rm_32.9{9} //
S01ratnml_u:12750: daityā yakṣāś ca gaṃdharvāḥ kinnarāś cāpi rākṣasāḥ // Rm_32.10{10} //
S01ratnml_u:12751: siddhā vidyādharāś cāpi nāgāś ca garuḍā api /
S01ratnml_u:12752: sādhyā grahāḥ satārāś ca vasavaś cāpsarogaṇāḥ // Rm_32.11{11} //
S01ratnml_u:12754: vaiśyāś ca maṃtriṇo 'mātyāḥ śreṣṭhinaś ca mahājanāḥ // Rm_32.12{12} //
S01ratnml_u:12755: gṛhasthā vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca dhanino 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:12756: śilpinaḥ paurikāś cāpi jānapadāś ca nairgamāḥ // Rm_32.13{13} //
S01ratnml_u:12758: sarve te samupāgatya vihāre samupāviśan // Rm_32.14{14} //
S01ratnml_u:12759: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te saṃprasāditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12761: tatra sarve 'pi te lokāḥ samabhyarcya yathākramaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12762: taṃ munīndraṃ praṇatvaiva dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayan // Rm_32.16{16} //
S01ratnml_u:12763: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupāśritān /
S01ratnml_u:12765: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te tridaśādayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12766: lokāḥ satyam iti jñātvā prābhyanandan prabodhitāḥ // Rm_32.18{18} //
S01ratnml_u:12768: tasminn avasare tatra śrāvastyāḥ pauriko gṛhī /
S01ratnml_u:12769: āsīn mahādhanaḥ śrīmāñ chṛdopamo mahājanaḥ // Rm_32.19{19} //
S01ratnml_u:12771: kāṃtāṃ bhāryyāṃ samānīya samyakvyūhe yathāvidhiḥ // Rm_32.20{20} //
S01ratnml_u:12772: tataḥ sa kāmasaṃraktaḥ sukāminyā tayā saha /
S01ratnml_u:12773: yathechayā sukhaṃ bhuktvā reme nityaṃ pracoditaḥ // Rm_32.21{21} //
S01ratnml_u:12775: samaye sā satī bhārya garbhitābhūt kṛśāṃgikā // Rm_32.22{22} //
S01ratnml_u:12778: dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ mātā bhinnāśayā viṣeditāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12779: kiṃ īdṛg ātmajenāpi dhig mām iti vyaciṃtayat // Rm_32.24{24} //
S01ratnml_u:12780: tataḥ sa janakaḥ śrutvā taṃ jātaṃ vikṛtāśrayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12781: virūpaṃ durbhagākāram ity evaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_32.25{25} //
S01ratnml_u:12782: aho kiṃ prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ janmāṃtare purā mayā /
S01ratnml_u:12783: yenāyaṃ durbhagākāro virūpo jāyate sutaḥ // Rm_32.26{26} //
S01ratnml_u:12784: tad atra kiṃ mayopāyaṃ karttavyaṃ nāpi manyate /
S01ratnml_u:12785: dhig māṃ yena sute jāte lajjayā me sukhaṃ hṛtaṃ // Rm_32.27{27} //
S01ratnml_u:12786: tathāpi kiṃ kariṣyāmi daivāt me jāyate hy ayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12787: tad virūpo 'pi putro 'yaṃ pālanīyo mayātmajaḥ // Rm_32.28{28} //
S01ratnml_u:12788: iti bhartroditaṃ śrutvā sā bhāryyāpy evam abravīt /
S01ratnml_u:12789: yad ābhyāṃ prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatphalaṃ bhujyate khalu // Rm_32.29{29} //
S01ratnml_u:12790: yad abhāvi na tad bhogyaṃ bhāvi cen na tad anyathā /
S01ratnml_u:12791: sarvatra bhāvino bhogyaṃ bhuṃjate sarvajaṃtavaḥ // Rm_32.30{30} //
S01ratnml_u:12792: tad atrāham imaṃ bālaṃ pālayeyaṃ prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12793: ity uktvā sā vibhinnāsyā nārī tasthau pralajjitā // Rm_32.31{31} //
S01ratnml_u:12794: taṃ virūpaṃ sutaṃ jātaṃ vīkṣya sa janako 'pi ca /
S01ratnml_u:12796: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ manyate na bhavāṃtare /
S01ratnml_u:12797: yato 'yaṃ dārako jāto virūpo durbhagākṛtiḥ // Rm_32.33{33} //
S01ratnml_u:12798: tathāpi kiṃ kariṣyāmi daivān no jāyate hy ayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12799: daivabhogyaṃ prabhoktavyaṃ sarvair api hi jaṃtubhiḥ // Rm_32.34{34} //
S01ratnml_u:12801: tad ayaṃ svātmajo bālaḥ pālanīyotmayā mayā // Rm_32.35{35} //
S01ratnml_u:12802: iti dhyātvā pitā so 'thadṛṣṭvā tasya śiśor mukhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12804: tato jñātīn samāhūya kṛtvā jātimahaṃ sa ca /
S01ratnml_u:12805: pitāsya nāma vikhyāte kuruteti samabravīt // Rm_32.37{37} //
S01ratnml_u:12806: tatas te jñātayaḥ sarve saṃkṛtvā samataṃ tathā /
S01ratnml_u:12807: tad gṛhasthaṃ samāmaṃtrya pura evam upādiśan // Rm_32.38{38} //
S01ratnml_u:12808: gṛhapate virūpo 'yaṃ putro yat tava jāyate /
S01ratnml_u:12809: tasmād bhavatun āmnāyaṃ prasiddho bālako bhuvi // Rm_32.39{39} //
S01ratnml_u:12811: tataḥ snehād virūpo 'sau mātrā yatnena pālitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12812: krāmāt puṣṭo vivṛddhābhūd hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_32.40{40} //
S01ratnml_u:12813: tadā yadā kumāratvaṃ prāptaḥ sa vikṛtāśrayaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12814: svarūpaṃ darppaṇe dṛṣṭvā virūpo lajjito 'bhavat // Rm_32.41{41} //
S01ratnml_u:12817: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenāhaṃ duritākṛtiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12818: kiṃ mamānena kāyena mṛtyuṃ me 'tra varaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_32.43{43} //
S01ratnml_u:12819: kiṃ kariṣye virūpo 'haṃ kva yāsyāmi durākṛtiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12820: kiṃ mamānena jīvena kevalaṃ duḥkhabhoginā // Rm_32.44{44} //
S01ratnml_u:12821: tad atrāhaṃ gṛhaṃ tyaktvā vanodyāne samāśrayan /
S01ratnml_u:12822: saṃbuddhaṃ sugataṃ dhyātvā mṛtyuṃ gaccheya muktaye // Rm_32.45{45} //
S01ratnml_u:12823: avaśyam eva sarveṣāṃ jaṃtūnaṃ maraṇaṃ bhave /
S01ratnml_u:12824: tan mamedṛg virūpo 'smin śarīre jīvite spṛhā // Rm_32.46{46} //
S01ratnml_u:12825: yady atrāhaṃ ciraṃ jīvī nindito duḥkham āpnuyāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12826: tad buddhaṃ sugataṃ dhyātvā tiṣṭheyaṃ prāṇamuktaye // Rm_32.47{47} //
S01ratnml_u:12827: tat saṃbuddhaṃ jinaṃ dhyātvā mṛto 'haṃ yadi sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12828: tat puṇyaḥ paritātmā sugatiṃ gacheya sarvathā // Rm_32.48{48} //
S01ratnml_u:12829: ye buddhaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā gachanti mṛtyum ātmanā /
S01ratnml_u:12830: durgatiṃ te na gachanti samyānty eva sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_32.49{49} //
S01ratnml_u:12831: tasmāt te sudhiyaḥ santaḥ tyaktvā yāyāt kulaṃ gṛhaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12832: saṃbuddhasmaraṇaṃ dhyātvā tiṣṭhanti nirjane vane // Rm_32.50{50} //
S01ratnml_u:12833: tathāhaṃ tat samālokya saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12834: samādhāya sadā smṛtvā vaseyaṃ vijane vane // Rm_32.51{51} //
S01ratnml_u:12835: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā virūpaḥ sa prasannadhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12836: sa saṃpadaṃ gṛhaṃ tyaktvā jīrṇodyānaṃ samāśrayat // Rm_32.52{52} //
S01ratnml_u:12839: tadā sa bhagavāñ chāstā taṃ tathā sthitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12842: tatrodyāne virūpaṃ taṃ paśyan bhāsvān upācarat // Rm_32.55{55} //
S01ratnml_u:12844: vismitas taṃ samāyātaṃ sasāṃghikam apaśyata // Rm_32.56{56} //
S01ratnml_u:12845: taṃ munīṃdraṃ samālokya virūpaḥ sa vimohitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12847: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā virūpaṃ taṃ parāyitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12849: tathā nirudhyamānaḥ sa virūpas tena śāsinā /
S01ratnml_u:12850: parāyituṃ prayatnena na śaśāka kathaṃ cana // Rm_32.59{59} //
S01ratnml_u:12853: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā nilīnaṃ lajjayāsane /
S01ratnml_u:12856: tataḥ sa bhagavañ chāstā tat samādheḥ samutthitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12857: svayaṃ virūpam ātmānaṃ nirmāya vikṛtāśrayaṃ // Rm_32.62{62} //
S01ratnml_u:12861: sa virūpaḥ samālokya harṣita evam abravīt // Rm_32.64{64} //
S01ratnml_u:12862: svāgataṃ bho sahāye hi kutra gantum ihāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12864: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa virūpadhṛk /
S01ratnml_u:12865: tvāṃ draṣṭum ihāyāmi proktveti samupāśrayet // Rm_32.66{66} //
S01ratnml_u:12866: tatra sthitaḥ kathāṃ kṛtvā bhagavān sa virūpadhṛk /
S01ratnml_u:12868: tat pradattaṃ prabhuktvānnaṃ sa virūpaḥ sa moditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12870: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā dṛṣṭvā taṃ saṃpramoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12871: svarūpeṇa sthitas tatra vyarājat saṃprabhāsayan // Rm_32.69{69} //
S01ratnml_u:12873: sa virūpaḥ samālokya vismitaś caivam abravīt // Rm_32.70{70} //
S01ratnml_u:12874: aho kathaṃ bhavaty evam abhirūpataro bhavān /
S01ratnml_u:12875: kasya puṇyavipākān tad vaktum arhati me puraḥ // Rm_32.71{71} //
S01ratnml_u:12876: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12877: bodhayituṃ virūpaṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.72{72} //
S01ratnml_u:12880: tasyā eva prabhāvena bhavāmy ahaṃ śubheṃdriyaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12882: ity ādiśya munīndraḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra śubhāsane /
S01ratnml_u:12884: tatas te sāṃghikāḥ sarve saumyarūpāḥ śubheṃdriyāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12887: dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ matvā babhūva vismayānvitaḥ // Rm_32.77{77} //
S01ratnml_u:12888: aho bhāgya mayā labdhaṃ mahatpuṇyam ihādhunā /
S01ratnml_u:12889: yan mamārthe munīndro 'yaṃ sasāṃghika upāgataḥ // Rm_32.78{78} //
S01ratnml_u:12892: tad aham asya munīndrasya śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12893: satkṛtya saugataṃ dharmaṃ śrotum arhe samāhitaḥ // Rm_32.80{80} //
S01ratnml_u:12894: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā virūpaḥ sa pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12895: upetya sāṃjalir natvā taṃ munīndram upāśrayat // Rm_32.81{81} //
S01ratnml_u:12902: mudā tasya muneḥ pādau vavande sa kṛtāṃjaliḥ // Rm_32.84{84} //
S01ratnml_u:12903: tataḥ utthāya taṃ nāthaṃ bhagavaṃtaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12904: samālokya prasannātmā prārthayat sa samādarāt // Rm_32.85{85} //
S01ratnml_u:12906: prādurbhūtātra me lakṣmī bhavāmi yātisuṃdaraḥ // Rm_32.86{86} //
S01ratnml_u:12907: tad etan mahad āścaryaṃ dṛṣṭvā me rocate manaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12908: bhavatāṃ śaraṇe sthitvā carituṃ saṃvaraṃ sadā // Rm_32.87{87} //
S01ratnml_u:12909: tad atra bhagavan nātha kṛpayā buddhaśāsane /
S01ratnml_u:12910: anvāhṛtya śubhe dharme niyoktuṃ māṃ samarhati // Rm_32.88{88} //
S01ratnml_u:12912: pravrajya saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā cariṣye 'tra samāhitaḥ // Rm_32.89{89} //
S01ratnml_u:12913: iti tat saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12914: tasya śuddhāśayam ālokya samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.90{90} //
S01ratnml_u:12915: yadi vāṃchāsti te vatsa carituṃ saugataṃ vrataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12916: pitur ājñāṃ samāsādya prāgacha dāsyate tadā // Rm_32.91{91} //
S01ratnml_u:12917: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa pratiharṣitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12918: mudā tasya muneḥ pādau praṇatvaiva tato 'carat // Rm_32.92{92} //
S01ratnml_u:12919: tatra sa svagṛhe gatvā pādau pituḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12920: praṇatvā purataḥ sthitvā prāvadad evam ādarāt // Rm_32.93{93} //
S01ratnml_u:12922: parṇakuṭyāṃ samāsīno dhyatvā vasāmi yogavit // Rm_32.94{94} //
S01ratnml_u:12923: tatra sa bhagavān buddhaḥ sasaṃghaḥ svayam āgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12925: tad dattam amṛtaṃ bhuktvā bhavāmi suṃdarākṛtiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12926: lakṣmīś cāpi samudbhūtā mamaivaṃ jāyate śubhaṃ // Rm_32.96{96} //
S01ratnml_u:12928: nānyathā hīti vijñāya prasīda sugate sadā // Rm_32.97{97} //
S01ratnml_u:12929: evam etat mahaccitraṃ dṛṣṭvā me saṃprasāditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12930: mano 'dya śāsane bauddhe carituṃ rocate vrataṃ // Rm_32.98{98} //
S01ratnml_u:12932: tad atra kṛpayā tāta tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_32.99{99} //
S01ratnml_u:12934: tatra ca sarvadā saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yāyāj jinālayaṃ // Rm_32.100{100} //
S01ratnml_u:12935: iti matvā prasīdātra mā kuruṣva mano 'nyathā /
S01ratnml_u:12936: śraddhayānugrahaṃ kṛtvā tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_32.101{1} //
S01ratnml_u:12937: iti saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasthaḥ savismayaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12938: pitā taṃ svātmajaṃ dṛṣṭvā sucirād evam abravīt // Rm_32.102{2} //
S01ratnml_u:12939: aho hi bhāgyavān putra puṇyavāñchābhi sāṃprataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12940: yato 'sau kṛpayopetya buddhat tvām abhirakṣati // Rm_32.103{3} //
S01ratnml_u:12941: tat te 'sti yadi vāñchati carituṃ saugataṃ vrataṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12942: taṃ buddhaśaraṇaṃ gatvā vrataṃ cara samāhitaḥ // Rm_32.104{4} //
S01ratnml_u:12944: iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā sa virūpaḥ prasāditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12945: pādau pitroḥ praṇatvaiva sahasā prācarad gṛhāt // Rm_32.105{5} //
S01ratnml_u:12946: tato jetāśrame gatvā sa virūpaḥ pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12947: pādau tasya muner natvā prārthayed evam ādarāt // Rm_32.106{6} //
S01ratnml_u:12949: tad bhavān kṛpayā mahyaṃ saṃvaraṃ dātum arhati // Rm_32.107{7} //
S01ratnml_u:12950: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavāṃs tasya mastake /
S01ratnml_u:12951: savyahastena saṃspṛṣṭvā śāsane taṃ samagrahīt // Rm_32.108{8} //
S01ratnml_u:12952: tatra sa vrājitaḥ sāstrā virūpo muṇḍito 'pi saḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12954: tataḥ sa bhikṣur ātmajñaḥ saṃyamī vijiteṃdriyaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12958: sarvakleśagaṇāñ jitvā sākṣād arhatvam āptavān // Rm_32.112{11} //
S01ratnml_u:12962: mānyaḥ pūjyo 'bhivandyo 'bhūd brahmacarī sa yogavit // Rm_32.114{13} //
S01ratnml_u:12963: tadā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ yatim uttamaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12964: vismitās taṃ muniṃ natvā paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_32.115{14} //
S01ratnml_u:12965: bhagavann arhatānena kiṃ karma prakṛtaṃ purā /
S01ratnml_u:12967: yac cāyaṃ bhagavāc chāsta bhavatā saṃprasāditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12968: lakṣmīvān abhirūpaś ca bhavati sadguṇārataḥ // Rm_32.117{16} //
S01ratnml_u:12969: yac cāyaṃ śāsane bauddhe śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12971: tad asya sarvavṛttāṃtaṃ yad anena purākṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12972: suvistaraṃ samākhyāya sarvān naḥ paribodhaya // Rm_32.119{18} //
S01ratnml_u:12973: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12974: sarvāṃs tān sāṃghikān bhikṣūn samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.120{19} //
S01ratnml_u:12975: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad anena purākṛtaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:12976: tat sarvaiḥ karma vakṣyāmi sarvalokaprabodhane // Rm_32.121{20} //
S01ratnml_u:12979: sa bhagavāñ jagannāthaḥ kṛtvā bhadraṃ samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12980: sarvatra saugataṃ dharmam upadeṣṭum upācarat // Rm_32.123{22} //
S01ratnml_u:12981: evaṃ sarvatra lokeṣu sasāṃghikaḥ sa mārajit /
S01ratnml_u:12985: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokaḥ prabodhitaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12986: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracerire śubhe sadā // Rm_32.126{25} //
S01ratnml_u:12988: tatra sa bhagavān puṣyo buddhadṛṣṭya samaṃtataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12989: loke paśyan hitaṃ kartuṃ dadarśa dvau jinātmajau // Rm_32.127{26} //
S01ratnml_u:12990: ekaḥ śākyamunir nāma maitreyaś cāparaḥ sudhīḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12991: tasmin kāle ubhav etau bodhisatvau jinātmajau // Rm_32.128{27} //
S01ratnml_u:12993: tasya śāstuś ca vaineyāḥ satvā na paripācitāḥ // Rm_32.129{28} //
S01ratnml_u:12994: śākyamunes tu vaineyāḥ paripakvā na saṃtatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12995: evaṃ sa sugataḥ puṣyo dṛṣṭvaivaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_32.130{29} //
S01ratnml_u:12998: iti vicintya puṣyaḥ sa tathāgataḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:12999: himavaṃtaṃ giriṃ gatvā pracakrāma prabhāsayan // Rm_32.132{31} //
S01ratnml_u:13000: tatra ratnaguhāyāṃ sa praviśya sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13002: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra śākyamuniḥ sa sanmatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13004: tatra ratnaguhāyāṃ taṃ puṣyaṃ tathāgataṃ muniṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13010: tatra taṃ sugataṃ dṛṣṭvā śākyamuniḥ sa moditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13011: sahasā sāṃjalir natvā pūjāṃgainārcayan mudā // Rm_32.138{37} //
S01ratnml_u:13012: tataḥ sa ekapādena sthitvā saptaniśāṃ mudā /
S01ratnml_u:13013: sāṃjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā tuṣṭāva gāthayānayā // Rm_32.139{38} //
S01ratnml_u:13014: na divi bhuvi vā nāsmil loke na vaiśravaṇālaye /
S01ratnml_u:13015: na marubhavane divye sthāne na dikṣu vidikṣu vā // Rm_32.140{39} //
S01ratnml_u:13018: etayo gāthayā stutvā taṃ puṣyaṃ sugataṃ muniṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13019: sa śākyamunir utsāhāt saptarātriṃ mudā bhajan // Rm_32.142{41} //
S01ratnml_u:13021: paristutas tam ālokya śākyamunim abhāṣata // Rm_32.143{42} //
S01ratnml_u:13022: sādhu sādhu mahāsatva tvam evaṃ yat samudyataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13025: kramāt pāramitāḥ pūrya saṃbodhiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_32.145{44} //
S01ratnml_u:13026: ity ādiśya munīndro 'sau puṣyo dharmādhipo jinaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13029: tasya puṣyasya sadbhaktya śaraṇasthaḥ sadābhajat // Rm_32.147{46} //
S01ratnml_u:13030: tatra tasmin sthite buddhe devī guhānivāsinī /
S01ratnml_u:13032: tadguhāyāṃ praveṣṭum 'sau na śaśāka kathaṃ cana // Rm_32.148{47} //
S01ratnml_u:13034: bhūtvā taṃ sugataṃ puṣyaṃ dhyānālīnam abhīṣapat // Rm_32.149{48} //
S01ratnml_u:13036: kiñcit tasya muneś cittaṃ cārayituṃ śaśāka na // Rm_32.150{49} //
S01ratnml_u:13038: svarūpeṇaiva taṃ draṣṭuṃ praṇatā samupācarat // Rm_32.151{50} //
S01ratnml_u:13039: tatra taṃ sugataṃ puṣyaṃ tathāgatam munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13044: iti dhyātvā surūpeṇa tadantikam upācarat // Rm_32.154{53} //
S01ratnml_u:13045: tatra sā sāṃjalir natvā pādau tasya muneḥ puraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13046: sthitvā kṣamārthanāṃ karttuṃ prārthayad evam ānatā // Rm_32.155{54} //
S01ratnml_u:13047: bhagavan nātha sarvajña yan mayā prakṛtaṃ tvayi /
S01ratnml_u:13048: tat kṣamasva jagannātha kṣāntidharmādhipo 'si hi // Rm_32.156{55} //
S01ratnml_u:13049: tad atrāhaṃ jagacchāstar bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā /
S01ratnml_u:13050: sarvadā samupāśritya bhajeyaṃ śraddhayā mudā // Rm_32.157{56} //
S01ratnml_u:13051: yad atra te sasaṃghasya yathāvidhi samarcituṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13052: ichāmy ahaṃ jagannātha tad adhyuṣitum arhati // Rm_32.158{57} //
S01ratnml_u:13053: iti tenārthite puṣyo bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13054: tāṃ viśuddhāśayāṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_32.159{58} //
S01ratnml_u:13057: tataḥ sā muditopetya pūjāṃgais taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13058: abhyarcya bhojanair divyaiḥ sasaṃghaṃ samatoṣayat // Rm_32.161{60} //
S01ratnml_u:13059: tataḥ sā bhojanānte 'pi praṇatvā sāñjalir mudā /
S01ratnml_u:13060: bhūtvā kṣamāpayitvā ca prārthayad evam ānatā // Rm_32.162{61} //
S01ratnml_u:13061: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇe sthitā /
S01ratnml_u:13063: tat kṣamasva jagannātha yan mayāpakṛtaṃ vṛthā /
S01ratnml_u:13064: prasīdatu bhavāñ chāstā saṃbuddho hi kṣamākaraḥ // Rm_32.164{63} //
S01ratnml_u:13065: iti tayārthitaṃ śrutvā puṣyaḥ sa bhagavān muniḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13066: devatāṃ tāṃ samālokya saddharmaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_32.165{64} //
S01ratnml_u:13068: dharmeṇa rakṣitā loke sarvatrāpi sukhī bhavet // Rm_32.166{65} //
S01ratnml_u:13069: tad ādau śraddhayā dharmaṃ śrotavyaṃ saugataṃ varaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13070: tatas triratnam abhyarcya dātavyaṃ dānam arthine // Rm_32.167{66} //
S01ratnml_u:13079: dharmaṃ śrutvā sadā dānaṃ prakarttavyaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_32.171{70} //
S01ratnml_u:13080: tvaṃ cāpy evaṃ sadā saukhyaṃ yadīchasi śubhānvitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13081: triratnaṃ bhajanaṃ kṛtvā kuru dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_32.172{71} //
S01ratnml_u:13084: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā devatā mudā /
S01ratnml_u:13086: tataḥ sa sugataḥ puṣyas tathāgataḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13088: eṣa hy ayaṃ virūpo 'sau devatā yā guhāśritā /
S01ratnml_u:13089: yuṣmābhiḥ satyam eveti manyatāṃ nānyathā khalu // Rm_32.176{75} //
S01ratnml_u:13091: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_32.177{76} //
S01ratnml_u:13092: śubhasya karmaṇaḥ pāke śubhataivaṃ sadā bhave /
S01ratnml_u:13093: kṛṣṇasya duḥkhataivaṃ hi miśritasyāpi miśritaṃ // Rm_32.178{77} //
S01ratnml_u:13094: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana /
S01ratnml_u:13095: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tenaiva bhujyate phalaṃ // Rm_32.179{78} //
S01ratnml_u:13096: nāgnibhir dahyate karma klidyate nāpi codakaiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13097: śuṣyate vāyubhir naiva kṣīyate ca na bhūmiṣu // Rm_32.180{79} //
S01ratnml_u:13098: nānyathāpi bhave naiva karma kvāpi kathaṃ cana /
S01ratnml_u:13099: yad yathā prakṛtaṃ karmaṃ tat tathaiva kuled dhruvaṃ // Rm_32.181{80} //
S01ratnml_u:13100: yad asau devatā tatra guhāśritā durāśayā /
S01ratnml_u:13101: vikṛtāṅgā virūpākṣā bhūtvā puṣyaṃ vyabhīṣapat // Rm_32.182{81} //
S01ratnml_u:13103: vikṛtāṅgo virūpākṣo babhūvāyaṃ bhave sadā // Rm_32.183{82} //
S01ratnml_u:13105: vibhransyo durbhagākāro bhavaty atrāpi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_32.184{83} //
S01ratnml_u:13107: tasya puṣyasya buddhasya prasannā śaraṇaṃ gatā // Rm_32.185{84} //
S01ratnml_u:13108: śraddhayā bhojanair divyaiḥ satkṛtya prābhajan mudā /
S01ratnml_u:13112: iti yūyaṃ parijñāya caradhvaṃ sarvadā śubhe /
S01ratnml_u:13113: tato bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyuḥ // Rm_32.188{87} //
S01ratnml_u:13114: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa sarve te sāṃghikā api /
S01ratnml_u:13115: śrutvānumoditāḥ satyam ity uktvā parimenire // Rm_32.189{88} //
S01ratnml_u:13117: tvayāpy evaṃ mahārāja caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_32.190{89} //
S01ratnml_u:13118: prajāś cāpi tathā rājan bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13120: tena te sarvadā nityaṃ sarvatrāpi śubhaṃ bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:13122: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_32.192{91} //
S01ratnml_u:13124: tathā hīti pratijñāya prābhyanandat prabodhitaḥ // Rm_32.193{92} //
S01ratnml_u:13125: śāstrādiṣṭaṃ prasannā idam api manuja ye virūpāvadānaṃ śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti pramuditamanaso ye ca puṇyābhirāgāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13126: sarve te śrīsametāḥ sakalaguṇadharāḥ satsukhāni prabhuktvā saṃbuddhabhaktiraktāḥ sugatavaragṛhe saṃprayānti pramodaṃ // Rm_32.194{93} //
S01ratnml_u:13131: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_33.1{1} //
S01ratnml_u:13132: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13134: iti saṃprārthite rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13135: aśokaṃ taṃ mahīpālaṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_33.3{3} //
S01ratnml_u:13136: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13137: tathāhaṃ tat pravakṣyāmi tava dharmavivṛddhaye // Rm_33.4{4} //
S01ratnml_u:13139: prasenajid iti khyāto mahārājā mahīpatiḥ // Rm_33.5{5} //
S01ratnml_u:13144: tatra sa kṣatriyo rājā prasenajin narādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13149: vadhvā kāṣṭapaṭaṃ tatra prāvatasthe pure yathā // Rm_33.10{10} //
S01ratnml_u:13150: tac chrutvā brahmadatto 'pi kṣatriyo bhūpatir nṛpaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13153: vaijayantīṃ samucchrāya nadyā tīram upācarat // Rm_33.12{12} //
S01ratnml_u:13155: vadhvā kāṣṭapaṭaṃ tatra saṃtasthe nagare yathā // Rm_33.13{13} //
S01ratnml_u:13156: tatra sa bhūpatī rājā brahmadatto narādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13158: tadā sa mahiṣī rājñā saha krīḍāratā satī /
S01ratnml_u:13160: tathā tasmin kṣaṇe so 'pi prasenajin narādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13161: mahiṣyā saha saṃraktaḥ prareme paricārayan // Rm_33.16{16} //
S01ratnml_u:13168: sā sūta samaye putraṃ divyāṃśam atisuṃdaraṃ // Rm_33.19{19} //
S01ratnml_u:13169: tac chrutvā sa bhūpālo brahmadattaḥ pramoditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13170: sahasopetya taṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā na tṛptim āyayau // Rm_33.20{20} //
S01ratnml_u:13171: tasminn eva dine tasya prasenajin mahīpateḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13172: bhāryāpi samaye sūta sutāṃ divyātisuṃdarīṃ // Rm_33.21{21} //
S01ratnml_u:13175: tac chrutvā sa mahīpālaḥ prasenajit prasāditaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13177: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa nareṃdro 'pi me vabhūva samāgataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13178: tām eva suciraṃ paśyann avatasthe suniścalaḥ // Rm_33.24{24} //
S01ratnml_u:13179: tayor apy ubhayo rājñoḥ skaṃdhācārāḥ pravarttitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13180: ye nityaṃ tatpravṛttāṃtaṃ svaprabhor upahārakāḥ // Rm_33.25{25} //
S01ratnml_u:13182: putro jāta iti śrutvā parijñāya prasedire // Rm_33.26{26} //
S01ratnml_u:13184: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā pura evaṃ nyavedayan // Rm_33.27{27} //
S01ratnml_u:13185: jaya deva mahārāja śṛṇu tatra pravarttitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13186: brahmadattasya bhūpasya putro jāto 'dhunā khalu // Rm_33.28{28} //
S01ratnml_u:13188: tat tvayā saha saṃvaṃdhaṃ kṛtvā sa svapuraṃ vrajet // Rm_33.29{29} //
S01ratnml_u:13189: tat prasīda mahārāja mā vibhaiṣīḥ śubhaṃ bhavet /
S01ratnml_u:13190: tena saṃdhiṃ bhavān kṛtvā viharatāṃ yathāsukhaṃ // Rm_33.30{30} //
S01ratnml_u:13191: iti taiḥ kathitaṃ śrutvā sa prasenajin narādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13192: satyam etad iti jñātvā prasasāda 'viśaṃkitaḥ // Rm_33.31{31} //
S01ratnml_u:13194: te prasenajitaḥ putrī jāteti śuśruvus tadā // Rm_33.32{31} //
S01ratnml_u:13195: tatas te sahasā tatra brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13197: jaya deva mahārāja śṛṇu tatra pravarttitaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:13202: tena sahātra saṃvaṃdhaṃ karttum arhati sarvathā // Rm_33.36{36} //
S01ratnml_u:13203: iti taiḥ kathitaṃ śrutvā brahmadatto narādhipaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13204: bhadram iti parijñāya tatraivaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_33.37{37} //
S01ratnml_u:13205: aho citra mahotsāho bhadram ekasmin divase yataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:13206: jāto me 'tra suto bhadras tasyāpi jāyate sutā // Rm_33.38{38} //
S01ratnml_u:13207: tat tāṃ bhadrāṃ ramākārāṃ taṃ prasenajitam ādarat /
