S01ratnml_u:17808: tadā tān kleśitāl lokān dṛṣṭvā ghṛṇādayāhataḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17809: svakāyajīvitasnehaṃ tyaktvā yo dharmam ādiśet // Rm_38.960{97} //
S01ratnml_u:17810: sa eva hi mahābhijño dhīraḥ sudhīr vicakṣaṇaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17811: sarvakleśavijetā ca mārajit syāj jinātmajaḥ // Rm_38.961{98} //
S01ratnml_u:17812: yaś cāpi ca tadā kleśasaṃghasamākule tathā /
S01ratnml_u:17813: tyaktaḥ svaprāṇakāyo yaḥ saddharmaṃ śṛṇuyān mudā // Rm_38.962{99} //
S01ratnml_u:17816: yaś cāpy eva kalau kāle saddharmāntarhite tathā /
S01ratnml_u:17817: nisnehasvāsukāyo yaḥ saddharmaṃ śrāvayet parān // Rm_38.964{1} //
S01ratnml_u:17820: yaś cāpi parataḥ śrutvā saddharmaṃ saugatoditaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17821: anumodet prasannātmā so 'pi syāt sugatātmajaḥ // Rm_38.966{3} //
S01ratnml_u:17822: sarvatīrthābhiṣeke yat puṇyaṃ tat sarvam āpnuyuḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17823: sarvatra sajjanā nūnaṃ karttavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaṃ // Rm_38.967{4} //
S01ratnml_u:17824: yāvaṃtaḥ prāṇinaḥ satvās tān sarvān yo hi pālayet /
S01ratnml_u:17825: tasya yāvan mahatpuṇyaṃ tat sarvaṃ te samāpnuyuḥ // Rm_38.968{5} //
S01ratnml_u:17827: yāvaṃto bhikṣavo 'rhantas tān sarvān yaḥ samarcayet /
S01ratnml_u:17828: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ yāvat tat sarvaṃ te hy avāpuyuḥ // Rm_38.969{6} //
S01ratnml_u:17829: yāvat pratyekabuddhāś ca tān sarvān yo bhajen mudā /
S01ratnml_u:17830: yāvat puṇyaphalaṃ tasya labheyus te tato 'rthikaṃ // Rm_38.970{7} //
S01ratnml_u:17831: yāvaṃtaḥ sugatāś cāpi tān sarvān yaḥ sadā bhajet /
S01ratnml_u:17832: yāvat puṇyaṃ mahat tasya labheyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.971{8} //
S01ratnml_u:17833: yāvaṃto bhūtale gavas tān sarvāñ chraddhayā dadet /
S01ratnml_u:17834: tasya yāvan mahatpuṇyaṃ prāpnuyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.972{9} //
S01ratnml_u:17836: tasya puṇyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ prayāyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.973{10} //
S01ratnml_u:17837: sābdhiśailaṃ mahīṃ sarvāṃ śraddhayā yaḥ samarppayet /
S01ratnml_u:17838: tasya bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ samyāyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.974{11} //
S01ratnml_u:17840: tasya puṇyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ labheyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.975{12} //
S01ratnml_u:17842: yāvaṃtasya mahatpuṇyaṃ labheyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.976{13} //
S01ratnml_u:17844: tāvat tasya mahatpuṇyaṃ prāpnuyus te tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_38.977{14} //
S01ratnml_u:17846: saṃti tato 'dhikaṃ puṇyaṃ te sarve samavāpnuyuḥ // Rm_38.978{15} //
S01ratnml_u:17847: iti satyaṃ samākhyātaṃ sarvair api munīśvaraiḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17848: etan me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā ca vakṣyate // Rm_38.979{16} //
S01ratnml_u:17849: etat satyaṃ parijñāya yadi saṃbodhim ichasi /
S01ratnml_u:17850: sadā saddharmam ākarṇya triratnabhajanaṃ kuru // Rm_38.980{17} //
S01ratnml_u:17853: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17854: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_38.982{19} //
S01ratnml_u:17858: so 'śoko 'pi mahārājas tathā dharmaṃ sadācarat // Rm_38.984{21} //
S01ratnml_u:17859: etad evaṃ samākhyāya jayaśrī sa jinātmajaḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17860: sarvāsāṃ śiṣyasaṃghāṃś ca samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_38.985{22} //
S01ratnml_u:17862: yo yatra meva śṛṇvaṃti śrāvayaṃty api ye mudā // Rm_38.986{23} //
S01ratnml_u:17863: śrutvānumodaṃti ye ca dṛṣṭvā namaṃti ye mudā /
S01ratnml_u:17864: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ samabhyarcya bhajaṃti ye // Rm_38.987{24} //
S01ratnml_u:17865: eteṣāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ bhavaṃtu maṃgalaṃ sadā /
S01ratnml_u:17866: jayaśrī parivṛddhāstu sarvatra sarvadāpi ca // Rm_38.988{25} //
S01ratnml_u:17867: ītaya upasargāś ca sarve vighnagaṇā api /
S01ratnml_u:17868: duṣṭā māragaṇāṃś cāpi vilayaṃ yāṃtu sarvadā // Rm_38.989{26} //
S01ratnml_u:17869: gṛheṣu sarvadā teṣaṃ lakṣmīs tiṣṭhatu susthirāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17871: dharmārthakāmabhogyāś ca saṃsiddhyaṃtu sa medhitāḥ // Rm_38.990{27} //
S01ratnml_u:17876: kramāt pāramitāḥ pūrya vrajaṃtu saugataṃ padaṃ // Rm_38.992{29} //
S01ratnml_u:17878: bhavaṃtu maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ subhikṣaṃ nirupadravaṃ // Rm_38.993{30} //
S01ratnml_u:17879: sarve satvāś ca saddharmaṃ sādhayaṃtu samudyatāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17881: kāle varṣaṃtu meghāś ca bhūyāc chasyavatī mahī /
S01ratnml_u:17883: sarvadā suphalaiḥ puṣpaṃ vṛkṣāḥ saṃtu samanvitāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17884: rājā bhavaṃtu dhārmiṣṭho nayasthāḥ saṃtu maṃtriṇaḥ // Rm_38.996{33} //
S01ratnml_u:17885: sarve sainyāś ca yodhāro jayaṃtu dūrjanān narīn /
S01ratnml_u:17886: sarvetayaḥ praśāmyaṃtu saṃtu saukhyānvitāḥ prajāḥ // Rm_38.997{34} //
S01ratnml_u:17889: vighnāñ jitvā śubhaṃ kṛtvā pālayaṃtu prajāḥ sadā // Rm_38.998{35} //
S01ratnml_u:17890: sarve traidhātulokāś ca kṛtvā maitrīṃ parasparaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17892: sarve bhadrāṇi paśyaṃtu mā kaścit pāpam ācarat /
S01ratnml_u:17893: sarvatra śāsanaṃ bauddhaṃ dhṛtvā yāṃtu jinālayaṃ // Rm_38.1000{37} //
S01ratnml_u:17895: sarvān svaśiṣyān paribodhayan saḥ samādideśa śryavadānamālāṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17896: śrutvāpi te sarva udāracittāḥ śrutvā salokā abhinaṃdyamānāḥ /
S01ratnml_u:17897: saddharmam āśritya sadā triratnaṃ bhaktyā bhajaṃta vyaharan pramādā // Rm_38.1001{38} //
S01ratnml_u:17898: yatredaṃ sūtrarājeṃdraṃ prāvarttayet kalāv api bhāṣed yaḥ śṛṇuyād yaś ca śrāvayed yaś ca cārayet /
S01ratnml_u:17899: eteṣāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ saṃbuddhāḥ sakalā sadā kṛpādṛṣṭyā samālokya kurvaṃtu bhadram ābhavaṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā devyas tesāṃ tatra sadā śivaṃ /
S01ratnml_u:17902: kleśānalaprahvarir āturāsu prajāsu duḥkhaṃ praśamo 'stu nityaṃ // Rm_38.1002{39} //
S01ratnml_u:17904_0: śreyo 'stu samvat 1028 māghamāse kṛṣṇapakṣe dvitīyāyāṃ tithau pūrvaphālguṇīnakṣatre
S01ratnml_u:17904_1: suddhayoge budhavāsare kuṃbharāśigate savitari siṃharāśigate caṃdramasi etaddine
S01ratnml_u:17905: mānadevasaṃskāritacakramahāvihāre nivāsitaḥ vajrācāryyaśrīdharmmarājena likhitam idaṃ pustakam etatpuṇyena dharmmārthakāmamokṣān prāptim astu śvapustakasunānaṃ lobhayāyamadu //
